#Kwibohora 27: Abanyarwanda batuye mu Busuwisi beretse amahanga ibyo u Rwanda rumaze kugeraho
Abanyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda batuye mu Busuwisi, Autriche, na Liechtenstein bizihije ku nshuro ya 27 Umunsi wo Kwibohora, baratira amahanga ibyo igihugu kimaze kugeraho kibikesha imiyoborere myiza ya FPR Inkotanyi.
Ni ibirori byabaye ku wa 06 Nyakanga 2021 hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga mu kwirinda COVID-19, byitabirwa n’abahagarariye ibihugu byabo, abakozi b’Umuryango w’Abibumbye, ndetse n’abakozi b’imiryango mpuzamahanga bakorera i Genève mu Busuwisi.
Insanganyamatsiko yagiraga iti “Dufatanyije tugera ku iterambere”.
Mu ijambo yagejeje ku bitabiriye, Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Busuwisi, Umuryango w’Abibumbye n’Imiryango Mpuzamahanga ikorera i Genève; Rwakazina Marie Chantal yakeje ingabo za RPA zabohoye igihugu, azishimira ubutwari, ubwitange ndetse no kutizigama byaziranze.
Yashimiye cyane Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame waziyoboye zigahagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, amahanga arebera.
Ambasaderi Rwakazina yagize ati “Itariki ya 4 Nyakanga ntizibagirana mu mateka y’Isi haba ku Banyarwanda n’abanyamahanga kuko ni ikimenyetso cy’ihagarikwa rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Jenoside yagombaga kuba yaraburijwemo, ariko igakorwa na Leta nkoramaraso yari yaramunzwe n’amacakubiri, igategura ndetse igashyira mu bikorwa umugambi wayo amahanga arebera”.
Yibukije ko nyuma yo guhagarika Jenoside intego za FPR Inkotanyi kwari ugutuza buri Munyarwanda mu gihugu akubaka ejo heza mu mahoro n’ituze.
Yaboneyeho kugaragaza isura nshya u Rwanda rufite, anamurikira abitabiriye ibirori bimwe mu byo rwagezweho mu myaka 27 ishize mu bukungu n’imibereho myiza y’abaturage,rukesha imiyoborere myiza ya Perezida Kagame.
Ambasaderi Rwakazina yakanguriye Abanyarwanda by’umwihariko urubyiruko rutuye imahanga gushishikarira guteza imbere igihugu cyabo kuko aribo maboko yacyo, abasaba kugira uruhare rugaragara mu gusigasira ibyagezweho no gutanga umusanzu mu iterambere ryacyo.
Ibirori byaranzwe n’ imbyino n’indirimbo Nyarwanda by’Itorero ry’Igihugu, Urukerereza; ibiganiro,imivugo, ubuhamya bw’Abanyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda byose bishimira bikanarata ingabo zahoze ari iza RPA zarubohoye zikanahagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi Abatutsi.
Abanyarwanda baba USA bibukijwe ko badakwiye gusinzira ngo bibagirwe ababohoye Igihugu
Abanyarwanda batuye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika by’umwihariko mu gice cy’Uburengerazuba bwo hagati, bizihije Isabukuru y’imyaka 27 yo kwibohora k’u Rwanda, bazirikana ubutwari n’ubwitange bwa FPR Inkotanyi banibutswa ko badakwiye gusinzira ngo bibagirwe abaguye muri uru rugamba.
Uyu muhango wabaye ku wa 4 Nyakanga 2021, muri Leta ya Indiana mu Majyepfo y’Umujyi wa Bend, aho Abanyarwanda benshi baturutse mu bice birimo Michigan, Illinois, Ohio na Tennessee bahuriye hamwe mu kwishimira ukwibohora k’u Rwanda.
Umuyobozi wa Diaspora Nyarwanda muri Midwest, Nxumalo Ruhaya, yashimiye Ambasade y’u Rwanda yohereje Lt Col. Raoul Bazatoha uyishinzwemo ibikorwa bya gisirikare ngo aze kwifatanya n’Abanyarwanda.
Ruhaya yibukije abitabiriye uyu muhango ko batagomba gusinzira ngo bibagirwe abagabo n’abagore, abasore n’inkumi b’ingabo za RPA, bemeye guhara ubuzima bwabo kugira ngo Abanyarwanda bose bagire igihugu cyiza bishimira kandi bita iwabo.
Lt Col. Raoul Bazatoha, yibukije abitabiriye uyu muhango amateka yaranze urugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda no guhagarika Jenoside yakorerwaga Abatutsi mu 1994.
Yavuze ko FPR Inkotanyi ijya gutegura urugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda hari impamvu zifatika yari ifite zirimo ubutegetsi bubi bwahereye mu myaka ya 1959 butanya Abanyarwanda, buvutsa benshi amahirwe yo kuba mu gihugu cyabo, ingengabitekerezo iganisha kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi n’ibindi bitandukanye.
Lt Col Bazatoha yashimiye Perezida Kagame wayoboye urwo rugamba ndetse akaba akomeje kuyobora urundi rukomeye rwo kubaka u Rwanda no guhesha agaciro Abanyarwanda.
Yakomeje agira ati “Ukwibohora kwacu kwagezweho kandi dukeneye kwibohora mu buryo burambye. Ukwibohora kuzuye ni ukuba witeguye kurinda icyubahiro cy’igihugu cyacu. Urugamba rwo kwibohora rurakomeje, mu kubaka ubuhanga n’ubushobozi ndetse no kwigira kw’igihugu cyacu.”
Lt Col Bazatoha avuga ko ibyo byose bizagerwaho ari uko bigizwemo uruhare n’abaturage bose by’umwihariko abagiye mu mahanga kubera impamvu zitandukanye zirimo guhaha ubumenyi n’ubushobozi.
Ibirori by’isabukuru ya 27 yo Kwibohora, muri Amerika, igice cya Midwest byaranzwe n’imbwirwaruhame z’abayobozi batandukanye, ubuhamya bw’abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bwagarutse ku kuntu ingabo za FPR Inkotanyi zabarokoye, indirimbo zigaruka ku butwari bw’Inkotanyi n’ibindi.
Uyu muhango wahurije hamwe bamwe mu Banyarwanda batuye mu burengerazuba bwo hagati bwa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika
Ushinzwe ibikorwa bya gisirikare muri Ambasade y'u Rwanda muri USA, Lt Col. Raoul Bazatoha, yibukije abitabiriye uyu muhango amateka yaranze urugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda
Emmanuel Hategeka yatanze impapuro zimwemerera guhagararira u Rwanda muri Bahrain
Ambasaderi Emmanuel Hategeka uhagarariye u Rwanda mu bihugu birimo Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu, yashyikirije Umwami wa Bahrain, Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa, impapuro zimwemerera guhagararira u Rwanda muri icyo gihugu.
Uyu muhango wabereye mu ngoro y’Umwami mu murwa mukuru Manama ku wa kabiri tariki ya 6 Nyakanga 2021.
Nyuma yo gutanga izo mpapuro, Ambasaderi Hategeka yashimye umubano mwiza usanzwe hagati y’ibihugu byombi, avuga ko yiteguye guteza imbere ubufatanye hagati y’ibihugu byombi mu nzego zinyuranye.
Yagizi ati “Ntewe ishema cyane no kuba nashyikirije Umwami Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa impapuro zinyemerera guhagararira u Rwanda mu Bwami bwa Bahrain. Niteguye guteza imbere umubano w’ibihugu byombi.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Nashyikirije Umwami indamutso ya Nyakubahwa Perezida Paul Kagame ndetse n’ubushake bwe bwo guteza imbere umubano hagati y’ibihugu byombi n’abaturage babyo.”
Ambasaderi Hategeka yaboneyeho umwanya wo kwifuriza Umwami Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa ubuzima bwiza ndetse yifuriza igihugu amahoro, iterambere n’uburumbuke.
Igihugu cya Bahrain, ubusanzwe cyitwa Ubwami bwa Bahrain, giherereye mu kigobe cya Perse. Ni Ikirwa kigizwe n’uturwa duto karemano turenga 50 ndetse n’utundi abantu bahimbye tugeze kuri 33.
U Rwanda rufite umubano mwiza na Bahrain umaze imyaka irenga 25, aho ibihugu byombi byasinye amasezerano y’Ubufatanye mu bya diplomasi muri Werurwe 1998.
Ibihugu byombi bikorana mu nzego zirimo kwaguriramo ubufatanye mu bucuruzi n’ishoramari, ubukerarugendo, serivisi z’imari, ingufu, ikoranabuhanga, guhanga imirimo n’udushya.
Nka Ambasaderi ufite icyicaro Abu Dhabi, Emmanuel Hategeka asanzwe ahagarariye u Rwanda muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu (UAE), Ubwami bwa Saudi Arabia n’Ikigo mpuzamahanga gishinzwe ingufu zisubir a(IRENA).
Ambasaderi Hategeka yakiriwe n'Umwami Hamad wa Bahrain.
#Kwibohora27: Abanya-Singapore bashimye uko u Rwanda rwiyubatse mu gihe gito.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’itangazamakuru ya Singapore, Tan How Kiat, yavuze ko aho u Rwanda rugeze ari imwe mu nkuru za Afurika zibumbatiye intsinzi ikomeye, zihamya imbaraga n’ukwiyubaka vuba kw’Abanyarwanda.
Ibyo Kiat yabitangarije mu muhango wo kwizihiza Umunsi wo Kwibohora ku nshuro ya 27 ku Banyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda baba muri Singapore, Australie, Nouvelle Zélande na Indonésie byabaye ku wa 5 Nyakanga 2021 hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga.
Kuva ingabo za FPR Inkotanyi zahagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, igihugu cyabayemo impinduka zikomeye bitoroshye kuzisobanurira utazibonera.
Kongera kwiyubaka mu gihe gito u Rwanda rukaba rubaye icyitegererezo mu ruhando mpuzamahanga, ni byo Minisitiri Kiat yavuze ko ari imwe mu nkuru z’ubutsinzi bukomeye.
Yasobanuye ko nubwo ubukungu bw’Isi bwahungabanye kubera COVID-19, u Rwanda “rwo rwabyitwayemo neza kubera ubuyobozi bwiza bururangaje imbere”.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Singapore,Uwihanganye Jean de Dieu, yashimiye umubano mwiza uri hagati y’ibihugu byombi; aboneraho kugaragaza ko kuva byatangira imikoranire mu bya dipolomasi mu 2005, habayeho ubufatanye mu kubaka ubushobozi, kungurana ubumenyi no guhanahana amakuru, ubumenyi n’koranabuhanga, ishoramari, ubucuruzi n’ubukerarugendo. Ubwo bufatanye bwateye imbere kandi buratanga icyizere.
Ambasaderi Uwihamganye yakomeje avuga ko ibihugu byombi biherutse gusinyana amasezerano y’imikoranire mu ikoranabuhanga ryo mu ishoramari, ubucamanza ndetse no mu burezi aho abanyeshuri bo mu gihugu kimwe bazajya boroherezwa kwiga mu kindi nta nkomyi.
Yagaragaje ko sosiyete z’Abanya-Singapore zagiriye u Rwanda icyizere zikahashora imari mu nzego zitandukanye zirimo inganda, ubuhinzi n’ubwikorezi; hakaba hari n’abandi bashoramari baho bashya bacyiza bafite gahunda z’ishoramari zishimishije.
Umwe muri abo Banya-Singapore bageze mu Rwanda akaba n’Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Magerwa, Kong Kok Chee, yatanze ubuhamya bwe ku ishoramari ryo mu Rwanda ndetse aboneraho kurushimira iterambere rumaze kugeraho.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Singapore,Uwihanganye Jean de Dieu, yashimiye umubano mwiza uri hagati y’ibihugu byombi.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’itangazamakuru ya Singapore, Tan How Kiat, yavuze ko aho u Rwanda rugeze ari imwe mu nkuru za Afurika zibumbatiye intsinzi iikomeye.
Umwe Banya-Singapore bageze mu Rwanda akaba n’Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Magerwa,Kong Kok Chee, yatanze ubuhamya bwe ku ishoramari ryo mu Rwanda.
Umunsi wo Kwibohora ku nshuro ya 27 ku Banyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda baba muri Singapore,Australie,Nouvelle Zélande na Indonésie wizihijwe ku wa 5 Nyakanga 2021 hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga.
Amb. Mukantabana yakebuye Abanyarwanda bari mu mahanga barebera abasebya urwababyaye.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Mukantabana Mathilde, yongeye kwibutsa Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga kutarebera abasebya igihugu cyabo ahubwo bakaba ba “Perezida” aho bari.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na One Nation Radio ku wa 29 Kamena 2021, Ambasaderi Mukantabana yavuze ko buri Munyarwanda agomba kumva ko aho ari ahagarariye igihugu cye akakirwanira ishyaka, baba bagize amahirwe bakahahurira ari benshi bagafatanya.
Ati “Aho uri hose uri Perezida waho ntabwo uri wenyine. Uzi ko uri kumwe n’abandi, [guhangana n’abasebya u Rwanda] n’iyo utanashaka kubikora wenyine wabikorana n’abandi muri leta zose barahari. Kuki umuntu yaza agatoba amateka yica igihugu […] kandi muzi neza ko atari byo?”
Yagaragaje ko isura nziza u Rwanda rwubatse mu ruhando mpuzamahanga ari yo ituma bagera hanze bakubahwa, bityo ko bagomba kuyirinda kugira ngo icyubahiro bahabwa kigumeho.
Ati “Igihugu cyanyu cyaragiye kibashyira mu mwanya abantu bose babubaha aho muri hose kubera ibyo gikora. Icyo washobora kugikorera ni uko batazajya baza ngo bagitere amabuye kuko iyo bamaze kwica iryo zina cyubatse nawe ntusigara uhagaze neza.”
Yakomoje ku bihugu n’abanyamahanga bakunda kwifashisha itangazamakuru baharabika u Rwanda.
Ati “Uzajya aza abeshya, muzi ko abeshya; amakuru arahari, ibihamya birahari, ni ukugenda mugahangana nabyo mukabivuga kandi ntabwo bizaba ari bibi ni ugukiza igihugu kizaba icy’abana banyu.”
Abanditsi, abanyamakuru n’abanyepolitiki bo mu Burengerazuba bw’Isi bakunze kumvikana baharabika u Rwanda, akenshi bakabivuga mu rwego rw’ubutabera.
Ambasaderi Mukantabana yabwiye Abanyarwanda ko “ntawe ubarusha kwandika” bityo ko niba abo banditse nabo bagomba kwandika babanyomoza kuko abenshi baba banabivuga batabisobanukiwe.
Amb. Karabaranga yagaragaje uko politiki yari yarimakaje ivangura yashyizweho iherezo.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Sénégal, Jean Pierre Karabaranga yasabye Abanyarwanda aho bari hose kuzirikana Umunsi wo Kwibohora ku nshuro ya 27 ariko bibuka aho igihugu cyavuye n’aho kigeze mu rwego rwo kurushaho gutera indi ntambwe cyifuza mu iterambere, babigizemo uruhare.
Hari mu muhango wo kwizihiza umunsi wo kwibuhora ku nshuro ya 27, Abanyarwanda baba muri Sénégal bateguye bifashishije ikoranabuhanga ndetse ukanitabirwa n’inshuti z’u Rwanda n’abahagarariye abanyarwanda baba mu bihugu bimwe na bimwe byo muri Afurika y’Iburengerazuba harimo Sénégal, Mali, Gambie, Guinée-Bissau na Cap-Vert.
Ambasaderi Karabaranga yavuze ko Kwibohora byaje ari umusaruro uvuye mu bwitange bw’Inkotanyi ziyemeje guhagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ndetse no kubohora Abanyarwanda ubutegetsi bubi bwari bwarasaritswe n’ivanguramoko ndetse no gukandamiza rubanda.
Yagize ati “Uyu munsi nk’uko mubizi, tariki ya 4 Nyakanga mu mwaka 1994 ni bwo FPR yahagaritse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, aho abasaga miliyoni imwe bishwe. Iyo ntsinzi kandi ihurirana no guhagarika ubutegetsi bubi bw’igitugu. Umunsi wo kwibohora rero ku Rwanda n’Abanyarwanda ni ingenzi cyane kandi ni umunsi wongera kuzamura imbamutima zacu.”
“Uyu munsi kandi ugaragaza iherezo ry’imyaka 32 ya Politiki mbi yimakaje ivangura uhereye ku munsi u Rwanda rwaboneho ubwigenge, iyo politiki yatsinzwe mu 1994.
Ukwibohora kwacu ni umusaruro w’intwari zitanze, abagabo n’abagore basanzwe ariko abenshi muri bo bari urubyiruko, bahaye intsinzi igihugu bagashyiraho iherezo kuri ibyo byose.”
Yavuze ko bashingiye ku butwari bwaranze Inkotanyi mu rugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda bakwiye gushyiraho umusanzu wabo mu iterambere ry’igihugu cyane ko aho kigeze ari heza.
“Ku bw’ibyo turibanda cyane kuri zo ntwari zacu, ibyo bakoze cyane ko n’ubwigenge dufite uyu munsi ari bo. Kuri uyu munsi twibuka aho twavuye, tukareba n’aho tugeze. Imyaka 27 irashize, abakuze murabizi ko u Rwanda rwari igihugu cyarimbutse, rwasenywe ku buryo bukomeye, ariko uyu munsi rwarahindutse kuko rwateye imbere mu ngeri zose.”
“Twageze kuri byinshi tutari gutekereza nyuma y’ihagarikwa rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Ibyo rwagezeho bisobanuye igihugu gifite ubuyobozi bwiza, buha buri muturage amahirwe. Abanyarwanda turi hanze y’igihugu dukwiye kugira uruhare rugaragara mu iterambere ry’igihugu cyacu, dushingiye ku buyobozi bwiza bwa Perezida Kagame.”
Major Joseph Niyongabo Kabanda, wari intumwa ya RDF muri iki gikorwa, yavuze ko igitera umusirikare wese imbaraga zo kurwanira igihugu cye ari urukundo aba agifitiye no kukirwanira ishyaka.
Yavuze ko ahanini byatewe n’akababaro banyuzemo no kubona agahinda Abanyarwanda bakomeje guhura na ko biyemeza kugaruka mu gihugu cyababyaye. Nubwo inzira z’ibiganiro ubutegetsi bwari buriho butigeza buzemera biyemeje kwitanga kandi ngo byatanze umusaruro.
Mu butumwa Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga muri Sénégal yageneye Abanyarwanda bwatanzwe na Ambasaderi Stephan Slyvain Sambou, yavuze ko ari iby’agaciro kuri bo kwifatanya n’u Rwanda, anavuga ko iyo tariki idakwiye kwibagirana mu matwi y’Abanyarwanda n’Abanyafurika cyane ko muri iki gihugu basobanukiwe amateka ya Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi.
Mu bandi batanze ubutumwa harimo Minisitiri w’UbubanyI n’Amahanga wa Mali, Abdoulaye Diop, kimwe n’uwari uhagarariye Guinée-Bissau bavuze ko nubwo Abanyarwanda banyuze mu bihe bikomeye ariko baranzwe n’ubutwari, kandi ko bazakomeza kwagura imikoranire n’u Rwanda, bitewe n’uko ubu ari urugero rwiza rw’igihugu gifite politiki ihamye.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Sénégal, Jean Pierre Karabaranga yasabye Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga kugira uruhare mu bikorwa biteza igihugu imbere.
Urubyiruko na rwo rwakurikiye ibiganiro byatanzwe kugira ngo rubashe kumenya amateka y'uko urwanda rwabohowe.
Major Joseph Niyongabo Kabanda, wari intumwa ya RDF muri iki gikorwa, yavuze ko igitera umusirikare wese imbaraga zo kurwanira igihugu cye ari urukundo aba agifitiye no kukirwanira ishyaka.
Dr Abdallah Utumatwishima yitabiriye iki gikorwa.
Kubera ko guhurira hamwe abantu ari benshi bitoroshye ikoranabuhanga ryifashishijwe muri iki gikorwa.
Benshi bakurikiye iki gikorwa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga kubera ibihe isi irimo by'icyorezo cya Covid-19.
Habinshuti Antoinette Tony wayoboye ibiganiro.
Rwiyemezamirimo ukiri muto,Mammy Ingabire Muziga.
Abanyarwanda mu Burengerazuba bwa Afurika bibutse urubyiruko rwazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo mu bihugu by’Uburengerazuba bwa Afurika birimo Sénégal, Mali, Gambie, Cap-Vert na Guinée Bissau, bibutse ku nshuro ya 27 urubyiruko rwishwe muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994; basaba abakiri bato kwigira ku ngabo za FPR Inkotanyi zayihagaritse.
Ni umuhango wabaye ku wa 26 Kamena 2021, ukorwa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga mu rwego rwo kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Covid-19.
Abatanze ubutumwa barimo Jean Pierre Karabaranga, Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Sénégal, Mali, Gambia, Cap-Vert na Guinea Bissau; Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Ubushakashatsi n’Ububikoshakiro muri Komisiyo y’Igihugu yo kurwanya Jenoside (CNLG), Dr Jean Damascėne Gasanabo; Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Rwanda Airports Company, Charles Habonimana n’abandi.
Uyu muhango kandi witabiriwe n’umuhanzi w’icyamamare muri Sénégal, Ismaël Lô; Umunya- Sénégal wanditse inyandiko zitandukanye zamagana abahakana n’abapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, Amadou Tidiane Fall n’abandi benshi barimo Abanyarwanda n’abanyamahanga.
Abitabiriye basobanuriwe amateka mabi yaranze u Rwanda kuva mu 1959 kugeza kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi; amateka yaranzwe no kwigisha ivangura n’amacakubiri mu Banyarwanda bikozwe n’ubutegetsi bubi bwagiye busimburana.
Hagaragajwe uko Jenoside yateguwe n’ingengabitekerezo yayo igacengezwa mu Banyarwanda igihe kirekire, ndetse ikanageragezwa mu bihe bitandukanye kugeza ishyizwe mu bikorwa mu 1994, aho Abatutsi basaga miliyoni bishwe mu gihe cy’iminsi ijana gusa.
Abatanze ibiganiro kandi basobanuye ko urubyiruko rwagize uruhare rukomeye mu ishyirwa mu bikorwa rya Jenoside kubera inyigisho mbi rwahawe; kandi no mu gihe nyirizina cya Jenoside hari umubare munini w’urubyiruko rwishwe bituma igihugu kibura ubwenge n’imbaraga byagombye kugiteza imbere.
Abitabiriye gahunda yo kwibuka urubyiruko rwishwe muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bashimiye urubyiruko rwari mu ngabo zari iza FPR Inkotanyi zari ziyobowe na Perezida Kagame, rwitanze rutizigama, rugahagarika Jenoside yakorerwaga Abatutsi rukabohora igihugu.
Urubyiruko rukaba rwasabwe gufatira urugero kuri ubwo butwari bwaranze izo ngabo.
Urubyiruko rwitabiriye ibiganiro rwihaye umukoro wo guhangana n’abagifite ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside, abayihakana n’abayipfobya, rusaba ko abakomeje kwijandika muri ibyo bikorwa bakoresheje ikoranabuhanga bakurikiranwa bakabihanirwa by’intangarugero.
Rwasabye kandi ko hakorwa ubuvugizi kugira ngo icyaha cyo gupfobya no guhakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi no gukwirakwiza ingengabitekerezo yayo gishyirwe mu mategeko y’ibindi bihugu.
Ikindi rwasabye ni uko amahanga akurikirana abakidegembya hirya no hino mu bihugu bitandukanye kandi barasize bahekuye u Rwanda mu 1994.
Abanyarwanda bo mu Burengerazuba bwa Afurika bifatanyije n'inshuti zabo mu kwibuka urubyiruko rwazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Me Gisagara Richard uba mu Bufaransa na we yitabiriye iki gikorwa cyo kwibuka urubyiruko rwazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Umubyeyi Beata Mairesse atanga ibitekerezo muri iki gikorwa.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Sénégal, Jean Pierre Karabaranga, yashimye abagize uruhare mu migendekere myiza yo kwibuka abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Jessica Mwiza na we yitabiriye umuhango wibukiwemo urubyiruko rwazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Ubushakashatsi n’Ububikoshakiro muri Komisiyo y’Igihugu yo kurwanya Jenoside (CNLG), Dr Jean Damascėne Gasanabo, yatanze ishusho y'uburyo Jenoside yateguwe ikanashyirwa mu bikorwa.
Umunyamakuru wa IGIHE i Burayi, Karirima A. Ngarambe yatanze ibitekerezo muri iki gikorwa yayoboye.
Abanyarwanda baba muri Guinea Bissau bibutse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi (Amafoto).
Abanyarwanda baba muri Guinea Bissau bifatanyije n’inshuti zabo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 27 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, yahitanye ubuzima bw’inzirakarengane zisaga miliyoni imwe mu gihe cy’amezi atatu gusa.
Uyu muhango wabaye muri iki cyumweru, ku wa 24 Kamena 2021. 
Witabiriwe n’abantu batandukanye barimo Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Urubyiruko na Siporo muri Guinea Bissau, Namil Pinto Morgado n’abahagarariye Ambasade z’ibihugu bya Nigeria, Mali, Gambia, Afurika y’Epfo, Guinea Conakry, abahagarariye Umuryango w’Ubumwe bwa Afurika n’Umuryango w’Ubumwe bw’u Burayi.
Abawitabiriye bafashe umunota wo kuzirikana abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, hanacanwa urumuri rw’icyizere cy’ahazaza. 
Banaganirijwe ku buryo umugambi wa Jenoside wateguwe, ukanashyirwa mu bikorwa.
Perezida w’Umuryango w’Abanyarwanda baba muri Guinea Bissau, Moise Sande, yagarutse ku mateka y’u Rwanda mbere ya Jenoside yaranzwe na politiki mbi yo gucamo ibice abaturage bigishwa amacakubiri n’ivangura, guheza Abatutsi mu mashuri no mu mirimo, ubwicanyi mu bihe bitandukanye kugera kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yagaragaje ko nyuma ya Jenoside hashyizwe ingufu mu kubungabunga umutekano w’Abanyarwanda n’ibyabo, uburenganzira bwa muntu, ubumwe n’ubwiyunge by’Abanyarwanda n’ibikorwa by’iterambere bigamije imibereho y’Abanyarwanda n’iterambere rirambye.
Ijambo ry’Umuyobozi wari uhagarariye Guverinoma ya Guinea Bissau ryibanze ku gushima ubuyobozi bwiza bw’igihugu burangajwe imbere na Perezida Kagame.
Yavuze ko kuri ubu u Rwanda ari intangarugero ku Mugabane wa Afurika n’ubwo rwaciye mu mateka mabi ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Abitabiriye uyu muhango kandi banasangijwe ubutumwa bw’urubyiruko bwibanze ku gukangurira abantu bose kwamagana abagifite ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside, abayihakana n’abayipfobya.
Ibihe byo kwibuka abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 byahuriranye n’icyorezo cya COVID-19 cyatumye uburyo byakorwagamo buhinduka. 
Mu bihugu byinshi byakozwe hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga mu gihe abantu bake aribo babashaga kugera aho ibikorwa byabereye.
Abanyarwanda baba muri Guinea Bissau bibutse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Abanyarwanda baba muri Guinea Bissau bifatanyije n’inshuti zabo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 27 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Abayobozi n’abakozi ba EAC bahuriye mu bikorwa byo kwibuka Jenoside ku nshuro ya 27.
Abayobozi b’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba (EAC) n’abo mu zindi nzego ziwushamikiyeho, bahuriye mu gikorwa cyo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 27, Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, ku wa Gatanu, ku kicaro cy’uyu muryango i Arusha muri Tanzania.
Ku rwego rwa EAC, ibikorwa byo kwibuka byari byabaye ku ya 7 Mata, umunsi icyunamo gitangiriraho ariko Ubunyamabanga bw’uyu muryango bwemeza ko mu gihe cy’iminsi ijana (100) yo kwibuka hakomeza gutegurwa ibikorwa byo kwibuka ari na ko hategurwa ibiganiro bihuje inzego zitandukanye, bakanaganira ku cyakorwa mu kurwanya abapfobya Jenoside.
Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa EAC, Dr Peter Muthuki, yavuze ko m minsi 100 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yamaze, Abatutsi barenga miliyoni bavukijwe ubuzima bwabo isi yose irebera ntacyo ikora ngo iyihagarike, ariko ko igihe kigeze ngo buri wese ashimangire ko itazongera kubaho ukundi mu Rwanda n’ahandi mu karere no kw’isi.
Dr. Peter Muthuki yasabye abitabiriye kwibuka ko buri wese afite uruhare rwo gushikama mu ngamba zo kurwanya ipfobya rya Jenoside ashishikariza abagize uwo muryango gusubiza amaso inyuma, bakarebera hamwe ibihungabanya amahoro n’umutekano mu Karere maze hakabaho ubufatanye mu guteza imbere kubana mu mahoro.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Tanzania, Gen. Maj Charles Karamba yashimiye Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’Umuryango w’Afurika y’Iburasirazuba kuba warateguye igikorwa cyo kwibuka, agaragaza ko ari ngomba kwibuka ku rwego rw’uyu muryango nkuko byemejwe n’inama y’abakuru b’ibihugu biwugize mu mwaka wa 2014.
Amb. Karamba yavuze ko hari abakoze Jenoside bakomeje kwidegembya mu bihugu bitandukanye birimo n’ibyo ku mugabane wa Afurika ndetse no mu Karere u Rwanda ruherereyemo ariko ko bakwiye gufatwa bagashyikirizwa ubutabera.
Perezida w’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko y’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, Martin Ngoga, yavuze ko ubu ibikorwa by’ipfobya rya Jenoside bigeze ku rwego rwo gutanga ibisobanuro by’impamvu ngo yayiteye nyamara ari umugambi utegurwa igihe kirekire ukanashyirwa mu bikorwa, akaba ari na ko byagenze mu Rwanda.
Igikorwa cyakomeje hatangwa ibiteketerezo no gusubiza ibibazo byabajijwe n’abitabiriye bashimangiye ko igikorwa cyo kwibuka kigomba kujya gitegurwa buri mwaka kandi bigakorwa hakiri kare, ndetse hakanatangwa ibikaniro bitandukanye mu rwego rwo kwibuka no gusubiza agaciro Abatutsi bishwe muri Jenoside.
Martin Ngoga yunamira abazize Jenoside ku kimenyetso cy'urwibutso i Arusha.
Amb. Major Gen Charles Karamba Uhagarariye U Rwanda muri Tanzania.
Perezida w'Inteko y'Umuryango wa Afurika y'Iburasirazuba, Martin Ngoga.
Amb. Dan K. Kazungu Uhagarariye Kenya muri Tanzania.
Bazivamo Christophe, Umunyamabanga Wungirije wa EAC.

Abanyarwanda batuye muri Queensland-Australia basabwe kutajenjekera ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside.
Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki ya 12 Kanama 2021, Abanyarwanda batuye muri Leta ya Queensland muri Australia bibutse ku nshuro ya 27 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, umuhango witabiriwe n’abagera ku 150.
Uyu muhango wabereye mu nzu ndangamuco iri mu Majyepfo y’Umujyi wa Brisbane muri Logan, wabimburiwe n’urugendo rwo Kwibuka rwabereye muri Brisbane, aho hanacanywe n’urumuri rw’icyizere hagafatwa n’umunota wo kwibuka inzirakarengane zazize Jeonoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Mu butumwa yagejeje ku bitabiriye uyu muhango, Aimable Harusha, Umunyamabanga w’Ihuriro ry’Abanyarwanda baba muri Queensland yibukije abari aho ko bagomba kwibuka kandi birinda icyabasubiza mu mahano yagwiririye u Rwanda.
Ati “Tugomba kuzirikana inzirakarengane zazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, bikadufasha no kwibuka kandi twubaka ejo hazaza. Twirinde icyadusubiza muri ayo mahano yabaye. Twibuke ko kurwanya twivuye inyuma abagerageza gupfobya no guhakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 ari inshingano zacu.”
Muri uyu muhango kandi urubyiruko rw’Abanyarwanda batuye muri Queensland bakinnye umukino wahimbwe na Joyce Uwizeyimana utuye muri ako gace. Umukino wigishaga ukanasobanurira abakiri bato bafite byinshi basanzwe bibaza kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Mu nshuti z’u Rwanda zari muri uyu muhango ni Anne Hillsong wo mu Itorero rya Hillsong wavuze ko Abanyarwanda banyuze mu bihe bikomeye kandi bigoye ariko ko hari ibyiringiro ko ejo ari heza.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Singapore ari na we uhagarariye u Rwanda muri Australia, Uwihanganye Jean De Dieu, mu butumwa bwe yibukije Abanyarwanda kugira ibanze umukoro wo kwigisha no gusobanura amateka ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yagize ati “Ni inshingano za buri wese gusobanura no kwigisha amateka ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi kugira ngo twime urwaho abarajwe ishinga no kuyihakana no kuyipfobya. Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ishyize imbere Ndi Umunyarwanda kandi ibijeje ubufatanye nk’uko yiyemeje kurwanya uwo ariwe wese ushaka gusubiza Abanyarwanda mu icuraburindi.”
Ambasaderi Uwihanganye yavuze ko kwibuka bizahoraho mu rwego rwo gufasha abakiri bato kumenya ububi bwa Jenoside n’ingaruka ziri mu kujenjekera uwo ari we wese ushaka gutuma yongera kubaho.
Umuhango wo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 muri Queensland Australia watangijwe n'urugendo rwo Kwibuka.
uyu muhango witabiriwe n'Abanyarwanda n'inshuti zabo bagera ku 150.
Abana n'urubyiruko batuye Queensland bakinnye umukino usobanura amateka ya Jenoside.
Abanyarwanda batuye Queensland muri Australia basabwe kugendera kure ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside.
Aimable Harusha yibukije Abanyarwanda ko bagomba kwibuka kandi birinda icyabasubiza mu mahano yagwiririye u Rwanda.
Beretswe na filime igaruka ku mateka ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Ambasaderi Nduhungirehe yatanze impapuro zimwemerera guhagararira u Rwanda muri Estonia (Amafoto).
Ambasaderi Nduhungirehe Olivier yashyikirije Perezida wa Estonia, Kersti Kaljulaid impapuro zimwemerera guhagararira inyungu z’u Rwanda muri iki gihugu.
Uyu muhango wabaye kuri uyu wa Kane, tariki 3 Kamena 2021. Ambasaderi Nduhungirehe yakiriwe na Perezida Kersti ahagana Saa 12:15 z’amanywa, ari zo 11:15 z’igitondo mu Rwanda.
Amb. Nduhungirehe yahaye Perezida wa Estonia, Kersti Kaljulaid ubutumwa bw’indamukanyo ya mugenzi we Perezida Paul Kagame w’u Rwanda.
Ibiganiro bagiranye byibanze ku mubano w’ibihugu byombi, bishimira ibyagezweho kugeza ubu. 
Barebeye hamwe uko umubano n’ibikorwa byakomeza kurushaho kwiyongera mu ngeri zitandukanye zirimo gukomeza gukorana mu bijyanye n’ikorana buhanga, ubucuruzi, ishoramari n’ibindi.
Perezida Kersti Kaljulaid yongeye kwishimira uko umubano w’ibihugu byombi uhagaze, anashimangira ko igihugu cye cyitguye gukomeza kuwubungabunga ku buryo nta kizawuhungabanya.
Ambasaderi Nduhungirehe yatanze impapuro zo guhagararira Estonia mu gihe asanzwe ahagarariye u Rwanda mu Buholandi.
Estonia n’u Rwanda bihuriye kuri byinshi kandi bifite amahirwe akomeye mu gukorana mu by’iterambere ryo gushaka ibisubizo hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga n’imikoreshereze yaryo muri gahunda za Leta kimwe no mu zindi gahunda.
Umubano w’ibihugu byombi umaze gushinga imizi ndetse bigaragarira mu guhura kwa Perezida Kagame na mugenzi we Kersti Kaljulaid.
Aba bakuru b’igihugu baheruka guhura ku wa 18 Gashyantare 2018 ubwo bari i Munich mu Budage mu Nama yiga ku Mutekano ku Isi ‘Munich Security Conference’.
Ibi biganiro byabaye nyuma y’uko tariki ya 16 Ugushyingo 2017, Perezida Kersti yasuye u Rwanda aturutse muri Ethiopia. 
Rwari uruzinduko rwe rwa mbere muri Afurika kuva yatorerwa kuyobora iki gihugu giherereye mu Majyaruguru y’u Burayi ku wa 10 Ukwakira 2016.
Icyo gihe byatangajwe ko igihugu cye kiri gushaka uko cyakwagura imikorere hamwe n’ibindi harebwa cyane ku hari amahirwe.
Estonia iherereye mu Majyaruguru y’u Burayi, ifite ubuso bwa kilometero kare 45,336, ikaba ituwe n’abaturage 1,294,455 nk’uko ibarura ryo mu 2011 ribigaragaza. 
Iza mu bya mbere mu bihugu byo mu Majyaruguru y’u Burayi mu mikoreshereze y’ikoranabuhanga muri gahunda zitandukanye.
Ambasaderi Nduhungirehe yatanze impapuro zimwemerera guhagararira u Rwanda muri Estonia.
Ambasaderi w'u Rwanda muri Estonia, Nduhungirehe Olivier, yakiriwe mu cyubahiro gikwiye uhagarariye igihugu mu kindi.
Ambasaderi Nduhungirehe Olivier yashyikirije Perezida wa Estonia, Kersti Kaljulaid impapuro zimwemerera guhagararira u Rwanda muri iki gihugu.
Perezida wa Estonia, Kersti Kaljulaid na Ambasaderi Nduhungirehe Olivier bafashe ifoto y'urwibutso.
Nyuma yo gutanga impapuro zimwemerera guhagararira u Rwanda muri Estonia, Nduhungirehe yagiranye ibiganiro byihariye na Perezida Kersti.
Minisitiri Mbabazi yasabye urubyiruko rw’Abanyarwanda mu Buholandi kurushaho kuba inkomezamihigo.
Minisitiri w’Urubyiruko n’Umuco, Rosemary Mbabazi, yasabye urubyiruko rwo mu Buholandi gukomeza kuba inkomezamihigo no gutanga umusanzu warwo mu kubaka u Rwanda na Afurika bifite icyerekezo.
Ibi yabivuze mu kiganiro yagiranye n’urubyiruko rw’u Rwanda rubarizwa muri icyo gihugu kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 29 Gicurasi 2021.
Iki kiganiro cyabaye hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga cyatanzwemo ibiganiro n’abarimo Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Buholandi, Olivier Nduhungirehe, Umuyobozi w’Umuryango ugamije kubohora Afurika (Pan African Movement, PAM) Ishami ry’u Rwanda, Musoni Protais, ikiganiro cyayobowe na Solange Umwari akaba ari n’Umuyobozi wungirije w’umuryango w’Abanyarwanda mu Buholandi, hari kandi na Sado Mubyeyi watanze ikiganiro ku bumenyi afite nk’urubyiruko rutuye mu Buholandi.
Insanganyamatsiko yacyo yagiraga iti “Uruhare rw’urubyiruko rw’u Rwanda rutuye mu muhanga mu kubaka u Rwanda na Afurika twifuza.
Minisitiri Rosemary wari umushyitsi mukuru muri iki kiganiro, yibukije urubyiruko rwo mu Buholandi kuzirikana igihugu cyabo cyababyaye igihe bari mu muhanga, ababwira ko igiti cyidafite imizi cyuma bityo bakwiye guhora bazirikana u Rwanda.
Ati “Murasabwa gukoresha ubwenge bwanyu, roho, impano n’imbaraga mufite kugira ngo mwubake u Rwanda twifuza.”
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Ambasaderi Nduhungirehe yavuze ko imwe mu mpamvu Ambasade yateguye iki kiganiro ari ukugira ngo hizihizwe isabukuru y’imyaka 58 Umuryango w’Ubumwe bwa Afurika ubayeho ndetse hazirikanwe ubutwari abakurambere ba Afurika bagize mu kugerageza kuyiteza imbere.
Yongeyeho ati “Muri iki kiganiro harimo ingingo eshatu, harimo ingingo y’urubyiruko, ingingo ijyanye no gukunda igihugu, hakabamo n’ingingo ijyanye no guteza imbere Afurika.”
“Ibi bintu bitatu birajyanye kuko abaturage b’u Rwanda n’abaturage ba Afurika abenshi ni urubyiruko. Urwo rubyiruko rero ruba rugomba kugira uruhare mu kubaka ibihugu byabo.”
Ambasaderi Nduhungirere yagarutse ku kiganiro cya Min. Mbabazi wasabye urubyiruko rujya kwiga mu mahanga, guharanira ko ubwenge bagiye guhaha bwifashishwa mu kuzamura igihugu cyabo.
Min. Mbabazi yagize ati “Ni ngombwa ko urubyiruko rujya mu mahanga kurahura ubwenge ariko rukibuka iwabo, Igiti kitakigira imizi kirazima. “
Amb. Nduhungirehe yavuze ko banaganiriye ku mahirwe ahari ku Banyarwanda batuye mu mahanga n’aho bashobora kubona ayo mahirwe.
Yavuze ko amahirwe ahari ari uko Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ishishikajwe n’iterambere rigizwemo uruhare na bose, bitandukanye na Leta za mbere ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ati “Hari Abanyarwanda bari mu mahanga batagifite uburyo bwa hafi bubahuza n’igihugu nkuko byagagaragaye mubyo twavuyemo, twigobotoye byashize, ariko twebwe nka Guverinoma y’u Rwanda uyu munsi, twahisemo abanyarwanda bose babyifuza kuko ni uburenganzira bwabo kubaha agaciro kuko ari abanegihugu tugomba kubegera ngo dufatanye kubaka igihugu.”
“Bitandukanye n’uko byari bimeze kera mbere ya Jenoside aho umunyarwanda wo hanze y’igihugu atarebanaga na Leta , bumvaga ari umwanzi.”
Biri no mu nshingano za Ambasade z’u Rwanda kwegera abanyarwanda bose aho bari hose.
Umuyobozi w’Umuryango ugamije kubohora Afurika (Pan African Movement, PAM) Ishami ry’u Rwanda, Musoni Protais, yagarutse ku ndangagaciro z’u Rwanda zirimo ubumwe umurimo no gukunda igihugu, ahamagarira urubyiruko gukora rutizigamye, bagaharanira gukemura ibibazo bitakemuwe n’abandi kandi bihora bituma Afurika idatera imbere nk’indi migabane, birimo intambara, inzara, ivangura n’imiyoborere.
Ambasaderi Nduhungirehe yavuze ko ibiganiro nk’ibi bifasha abana b’abanyarwanda bavukiye mu muhanga cyangwa n’ababayeyo igihe kinini kwibona mu Rwanda ndetse bagahabwa agaciro nk’abandi bakumva ko nabo bafite inshingano mu kubaka igihugu kavukire cyabo.
By’umwihariko yatangaje ko iki ikiganiro n’urubyiruko rwo mu Buholandi cyari kigamije kwerekana uruhare Abanyarwanda batuye mu Buholandi bashobora kugira mu kubaka u Rwanda na Afurika kandi ko biteze impinduka nyuma yacyo.
Ni ikiganiro cyari gifunguye kandi kiyobowe n’urubyiruko ubwabo, cyatangiwemo ibitekerezo n’urubyiruko rwari rwatumiwe rwaba abo mu Buholandi cyangwa abandi bo hirya no hino bifuje kugikurikira kuri Facebook, YouTube na Webex imbonankubone. Urubyiruko rwahawe ibisubizo by’ibibazo bibazaga mu buryo burambuye.
Amb Nduhungirehe yavuze ko ikiganiro bagiranye n'urubyiruko rwo mu Buholandi kigamije kwerekana uruhare rwabo mu kubaka u Rwanda na Afurika.
Minisitiri Rosemary Mbabazi yasabye urubyiruko rwo mu mahanga kuba inkomezabigwi bubakira ku byagezweho mu kubaka u Rwanda rw'ejo hazaza.
Musoni Protais yibukije abateraniye muri icyo kiganiro indangagaciro z'u Rwanda, abasaba gukosora ibibazo bikigaragara muri Afurika bituma idatera imbere nk'indi migabane.
Sado Mubyeyi ni umwe mu baganirije urubyiruko rw'Abanyarwanda baba mu Buholandi.
Umwari Solange niwe wayoboye ibiganiro.
Abatanze ikiganiro basabye urubyiruko kugira uruhare mu kubaka u Rwanda na Afurika.
Urubyiruko rw’Abanyarwanda mu Buholandi rugiye kumarwa amatsiko mu kubaka u Rwanda na Afurika rwifuza.
Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Buholandi ku bufatanye n’Umuryango w’Abanyarwanda muri icyo gihugu, bateguye ikiganiro cyo kwigisha urubyiruko rw’Abanyarwanda ruba muri icyo gihugu uko rwatanga umusanzu warwo mu kubaka Igihugu na Afurika rwifuza.
Ni ikiganiro kizaba ku wa 29 Gicurasi 2021 mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga, cyitabirwe na Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Buholandi, Olivier Nduhungirehe, Minisitiri w’Urubyiruko n’Umuco, Mbabazi Rosemary, Umuyobozi wa Pan African Movement Ishami ry’u Rwanda, Musoni Protais, n’umutumirwa Mubyeyi Sado.
Insanganyamatsiko yacyo iragira iti “Uruhare rwacu nk’Urubyiruko mu kubaka u Rwanda ndetse n’Afurika twifuza.”
Mu kiganiro IGIHE yagiranye n’umuyobozi wungirije wa Diaspora Nyarwanda mu Buholandi ari nawe uzayobora icyo kiganiro, Umwari Solange yavuze ko kizibanda ku gusobanura uko urubyiruko rw’Abanyarwanda batuye muri icyo gihugu bashobora kwihutisha gahunda y’ubumwe, gukunda Igihugu na Afurika muri rusange.
Hazaganirirwamo uburyo bwo gutanga umusanzu ku iterambere ry’imibereho myiza n’ubukungu mu Gihugu cyabo no ku gushyira hamwe ku mugabane wabo, ndetse bakaba indorerwamo y’isura nziza y’u Rwanda mu Buholandi.
Yakomeje ati “Abo batumirwa bazadusobanurira icyo guhirimbanira iterambere rya Afurika bivuze, uruhare rw’urubyiruko ni uruhe, ni iki twakwigezaho,ni iki twageza ku gihugu,? Ni iki dushobora gushishikariza abantu batazi Igihugu cyacu?”.
Yakomeje avuga ko urubyiruko ruzerekwa uko rushobora gusobanurira abanyamahanga u Rwanda, bakaba baza kuhasura bafite amakuru ahagije y’uko bakwakirwa, ibiciro by’amahoteli n’ibindi.
Uretse kuratira abanyamahanga u Rwanda, hari n’Abanyarwanda baba mu Buholandi batazi uko babasha kugera mu Rwanda n’inzira byanyuramo babaye babyifuza, ahanini bitewe n’uko ari ho bavukiye cyangwa akaba ari ho baba kuva bahungirayo ubwo habaga Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Muri icyo kiganiro bazasobanurirwa byose kuko abo bayobozi bazaba bacyitabiriye bazasubiza ibibazo byabo.
Icyo kiganiro kandi kizaba mu gihe hazaba hizihizwa imyaka 58 ishize hashinzwe Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe.
Biteganyijwe ko ikiganiro kizatangira saa Cyenda kirangire saa Kumi n’imwe z’igicamunsi ku masaha y’i Kigali. Kizakorwa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga rya WebEx, gicishwe kuri You Tube na Facebook live.
Uburyo bwo gukurikirana inama kuri YouTube:
Kwibuka27: IBUKA yasabye u Buholandi ubufasha mu kubaka urwibutso rwa Jenoside.
Umuryango uharanira inyungu z’abarokotse Jenoside, Ibuka mu Buholandi, wasabye iki gihugu ubufasha mu kubaka urwibutso rwazajya rwifashishwa mu bikorwa byo kwibuka rukaba n’ikimenyetso gitanga ubutumwa ku mateka ashaririye u Rwanda rwanyuzemo mu 1994.
Ku wa 7 Mata ubwo u Rwanda n’inshuti zarwo batangiraga iminsi ijana yo kuzirikana inzirakarengane zazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Buholandi nayo yateguye umuhango wo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 27.
Uyu muhango wabaye hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus. Abawukurikiye bibukijwe kwibuka biyubaka kandi barwanya ingengabitekerezo n’abapfobya Jenoside.
Nyuma yo gufata umunota wo kuzirikana abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, hatanzwe ibiganiro bitandukanye byagarukaga ku kwibuka no kurwanya Jenoside.
Umuyobozi wa Ibuka mu Buholandi, Safari Christine, yashimiye abacitse ku icumu uburyo babashije kurenga amateka bakongera kugira icyezere cy’ubuzima kandi bakabaho.
Ati “Usanga abarokotse bariyubatse ndetse babayeho, iki ni igikorwa cy’indashyikirwa cyagezweho.”
Safari yakomeje asaba Leta y’u Buholandi kubafasha kubaka urwibutso rwa Jenoside bakajya babasha kurukoresha mu gihe cyo kwibuka.
Ati “Turasaba leta y’u Buholandi ko yazadufasha kubaka urwibutso twajya tujya kwibukiramo, ndetse turasaba buri wese kudufasha kurwanya abapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.”
Mu batanze ibiganiro harimo Perezida w’Urwego rwasigariyeho Inkiko Mpuzamahanga Mpanabyaha, IRMCT, Agius Carmel, wibukije Abanyarwanda bose ko badakwiye gucibwa intege n’abapfobya Jenoside.
Ati “Abantu bose ku Isi bari kwibuka inzirakarengane zazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, nubwo hari abapfobya ndetse bakanahakana jenoside ubona ko bikibangamiye ubumwe n’ubwiyunge ariko ntibikuraho ukuri kwabaye kuri jenoside.”
Ku ruhande rw’Umunyamabanga Mukuru muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga mu Buholandi, Paul Huijts, yagarutse ku kiganiro cyigisha abana amateka y’ibyabaye mu 1994 ndetse avuga ko igihugu cye kitazahishira abakoze jenoside.
Ati “Mu myaka 25 ishize u Buholandi bwagerageje gufasha u Rwanda mu bijyanye n’ubutabera, twagerageje guhugura urubyiruko kuri byo kuko ahazaza hari mu biganza byarwo. Navuga ko u Buholandi butazigera buha umutekano abasize bakoze Jenoside.”
Mu butumwa yageneye abari bitabiriye uyu muhango, Ambasaderi Olivier Nduhungurihe, yasabye Abanyarwanda n’abatuye Isi muri rusange kwirinda amacakubiri n’ikindi cyose cyaganisha kuri jenoside.
Ati “Ndasaba buri wese kwibuka yiyubaka, turwanya ivanguraruhu, ivangurakarere, ivanguramoko, no kwirinda ibyaha byose bijyanye n’ivangura bishobora kugeza abantu kuri jenoside.”
Ibihe byo kwibuka abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 byahuriranye n’icyorezo cya COVID-19 cyatumye uburyo byakorwagamo buhinduka.
Uwari uhagarariye Minisiteri y'Ububanyi n'Amahanga y'u Buholandi, Paul Huijts yavuze ko igihugu cye kitazigera gihishira abasize bakoze Jenoside mu Rwanda.
AU yifatanyije n’u Rwanda kunamira abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Umuyobozi wa Komisiyo y’Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe, Moussa Faki Mahamat hamwe n’Intumwa ihoraho y’u Rwanda muri AU akaba n’Ambasaderi warwo muri Ethiopia, Hope Tumukunde Gasatura, bifatanyije n’Abanyarwanda kunamira inzirakarengane zazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994; bibutsa ko ayo mateka adakwiye gusubira ukundi kandi hakwiye kwimakazwa umuco wo guhana abayagizemo uruhare.
Babitangaje kuri uyu wa 7 Mata 2021, mu muhango wo gutangiza iminsi 100 yo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ku nshuro ya 27, wabaye hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga.
Mu butumwa yatanze, Faki Mahamat yavuze ko Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ari yo nkuru ya mbere ibabaje yabereye ku Mugabane wa Afurika, nyuma y’ubucuruzi bw’abacakara n’ubukoloni.
Ati “Abarenga miliyoni bishwe mu buryo bw’indengakamere, hakoreshejwe imihoro, amashoka n’ubuhiri. Mu minsi irenga 100, abagabo, abagore, abana, abakuze yewe n’impinja bakorewe ibiteye ubwoba no kubivuga, bazira kuba barisanze ari Abatutsi gusa.”
Yavuze ko hazamara igihe kirekire hibazwa impamvu yatumye “ibyo bikorwa by’ubugome bugoye kubwiyumvisha” biba ku bantu bari bamaze ibinyejana basangiye ururimi, iyobokamana ndetse baturanye.
Ambasaderi Hope Tumukunde yibukije abitabiriye uwo muhango ko Jenoside itatewe n’ihanurwa ry’indege ya Habyarimana Juvénal nk’uko abenshi mu bayihakana n’abayipfobya bakunze kubikwirakwiza ahubwo “yamaze igihe kirekire itegurwa na guverinoma.”
Yagize ati “Ntabwo yatangijwe n’ihanurwa ry’indege cyangwa urwo rupfu, ahubwo byatangiranye n’ingengabitekerezo y’urwango, gucamo abantu ibice, ivangura, guheza bamwe muri gahunda runaka, kugabanya umubare w’abitabira ibikorwa ibi n’ibi no kwitandukanya na bo.”
“[Hari] ingengabitekerezo y’ubwoko yo gusobanura Abatutsi no kubatandukanya n’abatari bo, imvugo zihembera urwango, kubambura ubumuntu, kuvuga ko bagomba kwicwa n’ibindi.”
Tumukunde yavuze ko ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside yatangiye gukwirakwizwa mu Banyarwanda kuva mu 1957 humvikanishwa ko Abatutsi nta burenganzira bafite bwo kubaho.
Nyuma y’iyo myaka Guverinoma zagiye zijyaho zakomeje gushyigikira urwo rwango rw’Abatutsi, bimwa uburenganzira bwo kwiga, bagenda bicwa abandi barahunga bata Urwababyaye kugeza mu 1994 ubwo “bishwe hagamijwe kubamaraho.”
Ni cyo gihe ngo Afurika Yunze Ubumwe ihangane n’ibikorwa byaganisha kuri Jenoside
Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 yabaye amahanga arebera, ibihugu byitwa ko ari ibihangange n’imiryango mpuzamahanga ntibyagira icyo bikora ngo biyihagarike; kugeza ubwo FPR Inkotanyi yabohoje igihugu ku wa 4 Nyakanga uwo mwaka ikarokora abari basigaye.
Ambasaderi Tumukunde yavuze ko igihe kigeze ngo Afurika Yunze Ubumwe ikumire ibyaha by’urwango na Jenoside byaba cyangwa bigasubira ahari ho hose kuri uyu mugabane mbere y’uko biba.
Yakomeje ati “AU ikwiye kugira uruhare mu kurwanya ivangura, gushyirwa mu moko, gutandukanya abantu no kubasumbanya hashingiwe ku moko, kuko ari byo bifumbirira ibyaha by’urwango n’ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside bigakomeza gukura.”
Yavuze ko kwibuka kwa AU muri uyu mwaka ari amahirwe yo kurushaho kongera imbaraga mu guhangana n’ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside haba mu nzego z’igihugu, akarere no ku mugabane; hakanabaho guhuriza hamwe imbaraga mu kurwanya abayihakana himakazwa ubutabera no kurwanya umuco wo kudahana.
Ibyo bikubiyemo no kugeza imbere y’ubutabera abagize uruhare muri Jenoside, abayipfobya n’abayihakana bihishahisha hirya no hino mu bihugu bya Afurika, cyane ko abenshi banashyiriweho impapuro zo gutabwa muri yombi.
Faki Mahamat yatangaje ko ibyabaye ku Rwanda mu myaka 27 ishize byagatumye Afurika irushaho kwirinda ko byazasubira ukundi, hirindwa iby’amoko.
Ku rundi ruhande, u Rwanda rushimirwa intambwe rwateye rwiyubaka nyuma y’amahano yarubayemo, ubu rukaba ari intangarugero mu nzego zitandukanye nk’ umutekano, guteza imbere abagore, kuzamura ubukungu n’ibindi.
Ni ibintu byabagariwe no kwimakaza gahunda y’ubumwe n’ubwiyunge yomoye ibikomere by’abarokotse ndetse bakababarira ababiciye, bagahuriza ku mugambi wo guteza imbere igihugu cyabo.
Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe wifatanya n’u Rwanda kunamira inzirakarengane zazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi kuva mu 2010.
#Kwibuka27: Abanyarwanda baba muri Sénégal bamaganye abagiha rugari abasize bakoze Jenoside.
Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri Sénégal inakurikirana inyungu z’u Rwanda mu bihugu bya Mali, Gambia, Cap Vert na Guinea-Bissau ifatanyije n’Abanyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda batuye muri iki gihugu bibutse ku nshuro ya 27 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda mu 1994.
Iyo gahunda yabereye kuri “Place du Souvenir Africain” ahari ikimenyetso cyo kwibuka inzirakarengane za Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Umuhango watumiwemo abahagarariye abandi mu rwego rwo kubahiriza ingamba zo kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus, waranzwe no gucana urumuri rw’icyizere, gushyira indabo ahari ikimenyetso cyo kwibuka inzirakarengane zazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, ubuhamya n’ubutumwa bwa bamwe mu bayobozi bitabiriye iyo gahunda.
Perezida w’Umuryango w’Abanyarwanda baba muri Sénégal, Patrick Karamaga, watanze n’ubuhamya nk’uwacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, yagarutse ku mateka mabi yo gukwirakwiza urwango mu Banyarwanda yahereye mu mashuri y’abana bato.
Yashimye by’umwihariko ingabo zari iza FPR Inkotanyi zahagaritse Jenoside yakorerwaga Abatutsi, zikabohora igihugu, anasaba ko Abanyarwanda bakomeza gutahiriza umugozi umwe mu guteza imbere igihugu, kandi bagakomera ku bumwe bwabo..
Ambasaderi wa Gabon muri Sénégal, Michel Regis Onanga Ndiaye, wavuze mu izina ry’Abahagarariye Ibihugu n’Imiryango Mpuzamahanga muri Sénégal, yagarutse ku mwanzuro w’Inteko Rusange y’Umuryango w’Abibumbye mu 2018 yemeje ko itariki ya 7 Mata ya buri mwaka ari Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wo kuzirikana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda mu 1994.
Yamaganye abagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bakihishahisha hirya no hino bakurikiranwa n’ibihugu bihishemo kimwe n’abahakana n’abapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yagaragaje ko nyuma y’imyaka 27 Jenoside ihagaritswe, Abanyafurika bose batewe ishema n’ibyiza u Rwanda rwagezeho muri icyo gihe, muri gahunda yo kubaka ubumwe bw’Abanyarwanda na gahunda z’iterambere muri rusange.
Ndiaye yagarutse ku ijambo Perezida Paul Kagame yavuze mu gihe hibukwagwa ku nshuro ya 25 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi aho yagize ati “Mu 1994 nta cyizere cyariho, hari umwijima gusa ariko uyu munsi hari urumuri, twapfutse ibikomere, ibyo byatumye turushaho kuba umwe kandi ku buryo buhoraho. U Rwanda rwabaye umuryango umwe.”
Mu bandi batanze ubuhamya harimo Abanya- Sénégal barimo Mabousso Thiam, washakanye n’Umunyarwandakazi wagaragaje uko na we itotezwa ry’Abatutsi na Jenoside yabakorewe byamugizeho ingaruka zikomeye kuko Jenoside yahitanye benshi mu bo mu muryango yashatsemo n’inshuti nyinshi.
Yagaragaje ko ubu u Rwanda ari igihugu cyubashywe, cyihesheje agaciro kandi cyagaruriye Abanyarwanda icyizere cyo kubaho.
Undi watanze ubuhamya ni Eugénie Rokhaya Aw N’diaye, wabaye mu Rwanda akaba yagarutse ku kababaro n’agahinda abagore batewe na Jenoside yabagize abapfakazi ndetse ikanahitana abana babo. Yagarutse ku butwari bwabo ndetse n’uruhare rwabo mu kubaka umuryango Nyarwanda nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Uwari uhagarariye Guverinoma ya Sénégal, Habib Leon Ndiaye, usanzwe ari Umunyamabanga Mukuru muri Minisiteri y’Umuco n’Itangazamakuru yagaragaje ko Guverinoma ya Sénégal yifatanyije n’Abanyarwanda muri iki gihe bibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yashimye uko Abanyarwanda bishatsemo ibisubizo nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi kandi agaragaza ko Sénégal izakomeza gushimangira umubano mwiza uri hagati y’ibihugu byombi.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Sénégal, Jean Pierre Karabaranga, yashimye cyane umubano uri hagati y’ibihugu byombi, anashima ko icyo gihugu cyanahaye ahari ikimenyetso cyo kwibuka abishwe muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yasabye abantu bose gukomeza kwamagana abakirangwa n’imvugo n’ibikorwa byo guhakana no gupfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi kimwe n’abakwirakwiza ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside barimo bamwe mu Banyarwanda basize bahekuye u Rwanda na bamwe mu banyamahanga babibafashamo.
#Kwibuka27: Abanyarwanda bo mu Buyapani bibutse Jenoside, hashimwa iterambere rimaze kugerwaho.
Mu gihe u Rwanda rwinjiye mu minsi 100 yo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 27 abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, Abanyarwarwa baba mu Buyapani binyuze muri Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri icyo gihugu ku bufatanye n’inshuti zabo batangije ibikorwa byo kwibuka.
Uyu muhango wabaye hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga, witabiriwe n’abasaga 200 barimo abahagarariye ibihugu byabo mu Buyapani, abahagarariye Guverinoma y’u Buyapani, abarimu ba za Kaminuza n’abashakashatsi, abanyamakuru, abikorera, abayobozi b’ibigo by’ubucuruzi, Abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo.
Guverinoma y’u Buyapani yari ihagarariwe na Minisitiri wungirije ushinzwe Ububanyi n’Amahanga akaba n’Umudepite mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko, Konosuke Kokuba, wagarutse ku bufatanye buri hagati y’u Rwanda n’u Buyapani muri iki gihe Isi yibuka abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yongeye kugaragaza urukundo afitiye Abanyarwanda, abihanganisha mu Kinyarwanda aho yagize ati “turi kumwe”.
Konosuke yihanganishije Abanyarwanda ku nzikaregane zatakaje ubuzima muri Jenoside, anashima imbaraga za Perezida Paul Kagame n’imiyoborere ihamye yagaragaje.
Uyu muyobozi yagarutse ku rugendo rw’iterambere u Rwanda rwagezeho mu myaka 27 ishize, aho yagaragaje ubushake bwa Perezida w’u Rwanda mu kuruteza imbere, no kurugeza ku mwanya wa kabiri mu bihugu bibungabunga ibidukikije Munsi y’Ubutayu bwa Sahara no mu iterambere mu ikoranabuhanga.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Buyapani, Erneste Rwamucyo, yavuze ko kwibuka bigamije gufasha Abanyarwanda kwivana mu bibazo byasizwe na Jenoside, baharanira kwiteza imbere bubaka igihugu cyabo.
Yashimangiye umuco wo guhaguruka no kurwanya Jenoside n’ingengabitekerezo yayo, ivangura ry’amoko n’andi macakubiri kugira ngo amahano nk’ayagwiririye u Rwanda atazongera kuba ukundi.
Ambasaderi Rwamucyo yasobanuye intera y’iterambere u Rwanda rumaze kugeraho nyuma y’ihagarikwa rya Jenoside n’uruhare ntangarugero u Rwanda rwagezeho rwiyubaka.
Abitabiriye uyu muhango beretswe amashusho y’ukuntu Jenoside yateguwe n’uko yakozwe, ububabare n’ubutwari bw’abarokotse n’ukuntu u Rwanda rukomeje kwikura muri ayo magorwa no kwiteza imbere.
Ambasade y’u Rwanda yijeje ko hazakomeza ibindi bikorwa bigamije kwifatanya n’Abanyarwanda mu minsi 100 yo kwibuka harimo kwigisha Abayapani amateka y’u Rwanda n’uko Jenoside yakozwe, inabashishikariza kumenya uko u Rwanda rukomeje kwiyubaka no kwiteza imbere nyuma y’ayo marorerwa.
Minisitiri wungirije ushinzwe Ububanyi n'Amahanga mu Buyapani, Kokuba Konosuke yashimye aho u Rwanda rugeze rwiyubaka.
Kwibuka27: Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa bahawe umukoro ngo Jenoside itazongera.
Abanyarwanda batuye mu Bushinwa n’abadipolomate bahagarariye imiryango mpuzamahanga itandukanye, bibutse ku nshuro ya 27 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 7 Mata 2021.
Iki gikorwa cyabereye ku Cyicaro cya Ambasade y’u Rwanda i Beijing. Cyaranzwe no gucana urumuri rw’icyizere nk’ikimenyetso cy’uko Abanyarwanda bavuye mu mwijima w’icuraburindi bakajya mu mucyo utanga icyizere. Abacyitabiriye banafashe umunota wo kwibuka bazirikana inzirakarengane zahitanwe na Jenoside.
Abari bitabiriye uwo muhango barebye filime mbarankuru ivuga ku byo u Rwanda rwanyuzemo mu gihe cya Jenoside ndetse na filime mbarankuru kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abayahudi.
Umujyanama muri Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Bushinwa, Virgile Rwanyagatare, yavuze ko kwibuka ari ugusubiza agaciro abakambuwe ndetse ko bifasha kubyutsa umutima w’igihugu watakaye ubwo Abanyarwanda bicaga bagenzi babo.
Ati “Kwibuka Jenoside ni kimwe mu bikorwa bikomeye byo kugarura roho y’igihugu cyacu. Ni kimwe mu byafashije u Rwanda guhangana n’abashakaga kurusubiza inyuma, ahubwo rutangira urugendo rushya rwo kwiyubaka mu mahoro n’umutekano, ubuyobozi bwiza ndetse no mu iterambere ry’ubukungu.”
Rwanyagatare yagarutse ku kuntu amahanga yatereranye u Rwanda mu gihe Abatutsi barimo bicwa, aho Umuryango w’Abibumbye wavanye mu Rwanda ingabo zawo zari zishinzwe kubungabunga amahoro, aho kuzisaba guhagarika ubwicanyi.
Yakomeje agira ati “Nubwo ariko byagenze gutyo, ubu amahanga arajwe inshinga no kurwanya Jenoside nubwo hakiri byinshi byo gukora birimo no kurwanya abahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 […] abayihakana ni abakoze Jenoside n’ababashyigikiye, abashakashatsi n’abanyamakuru bafite aho bahuriye bya hafi n’abakoze amahano mu Rwanda.”
Habintwari D’Artagnan warokotse jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, yatanze ubuhamya bw’ibyo yabayemo, agaruka ku kuntu jenoside yamutwaye abo mu muryango we harimo na papa we ndetse n’abana batanu bavukanaga.
Yatanze inama agira ati “Ni iby’ingenzi nk’ikiremwamuntu muri rusange kumenya ko Isi dutuyemo uyu munsi ari iyacu, ariko ejo izaba itakiri iyacu gusa tukibuka ko izaba ari iy’abana bacu. Ndatekereza ko iki ari igihe cyo gutekereza ku murage dushaka guha abana bacu.”
Uhagarariye Umuryango w’Abibumbye mu Bushinwa, Siddharth Chatterjee, na we wari witabiriye uyu muhango yunamiye abishwe muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ati “Mu izina rya Loni mu Bushinwa, nunamiye abagabo, abagore n’abana bishwe muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda ndetse nifatanyije n’abayirokotse babuze ababo.”
Abandi bayobozi bitabiriye uwo muhango harimo uhagarariye Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga ndetse n’uwari uhagarariye Umuryango w’Abibumbye.
Koreya y’Epfo: Abanyarwanda basabwe kongera imbaraga mu guhashya udutsiko tw’abahakana Jenoside.
Abanyarwanda baba muri Koreya y’Epfo n’inshuti z’u Rwanda bifatanyije kuri uyu wa Gatatu, tariki 7 Mata 2021, kwibuka ku nshuro ya 27 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, basabwa imbaraga mu guhashya udutsiko tw’abagishaka guhakana no gupfobya iyo Jenoside.
Iki gikorwa cyakozwe hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga kubera ibihe Isi irimo byo kwirinda icyorezo cya Covid-19.
Icyo gikorwa cyayobowe na Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri icyo gihugu, Yasmin Amri Sued, cyahurije hamwe abantu basaga ijana na makumyabiri, barimo abayobozi batandukanye ndetse n’Abanyarwanda batuye mu bihugu bya Koreya y’Epfo na Cambodia.
Abandi bitabiriye icyo gikorwa harimo Kim Gunn, Minisitiri wungirije ushinzwe ibya Politiki muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga ya Koreya y’Epfo, abahagarariye ibihugu byabo n’imiryango mpuzamahanga muri icyo gihugu ndetse na Ambasaderi Colin Keating watanze ikiganiro nk’inararibonye.
Ambasaderi Keating yahoze ahagarariye igihugu cye cya Nouvelle Zelande mu Muryango w’Abibumbye ndetse no mu Kanama gashinzwe Amahoro n’Umutekano ku Isi, mu gihe Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yakorwaga mu Rwanda mu 1994.
Igikorwa cyo kwibuka cyabimburiwe no gucana urumuri rw’icyizere, aho Ambasaderi Carlos Victor Boungou, uhagarariye Gabon muri Koreya y’Epfo, akaba ari na we Ambasaderi umaze igihe kinini muri icyo gihugu, yasabye abitabiriye uwo muhango bose gucana ururimo rw’icyizere bari bateguye buri umwe aho yaherereye hose.
Minisitiri Kim Gunn yavuze ko mu izina rya Guverinoma ya Koreya, igihugu cye cyifatanyije n’Abanyarwanda muri ibi bihe byo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 27 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda. Yongeraho ko igihe nk’iki cyo kwibuka gihabwa uburemere bukomeye mu gihugu cye kigeze gusenyuka, kikanabura abacyo babarirwa muri za miliyoni, ubu kikaba cyarongeye kwiyubaka.
Kim Gunn yavuze ko igihe nk’iki ari icyo gushimangira ingamba zo guharanira ko Jenoside atakongera kubaho aho ariho hose ku Isi.
Yatanze urugero ko bikorwa by’ivanguraruhu bikorerwa abirabura ndetse n’Abanya-Aziya, aboneraho gusaba abitabiriye uwo muhango kwamagana bivuye inyuma ibyo bikorwa by’ivangura kugira ngo ibyabaye mu Rwanda mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bitazongera kubaho ukundi.
Ambasaderi Colin Keating yasobanuye uburyo Umuryango w’Abibumbye wateshutse ku nshingano zawo zo gutabara u Rwanda n’Abatutsi bari barimo guhigwa no kwicwa mu gihugu. Yavuze ko Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 yateguwe igashyirwa mu bikorwa na leta yariho icyo gihe.
Yatanze umukoro ku bantu bose kwifatanya n’Abanyarwanda mu rugamba rwo kurwanya abahakana Jenoside yo mu 1994 yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda ndetse no guhora baharanira ko ibyabaye mu Rwanda bitazongera kubaho.
Ambasaderi Colin Keating yavuze ko bishimishije kubona u Rwanda kuri ubu rufite umutekano usesuye, ubu rutera imbere, kandi rugira uruhare mu kugarura amahoro n’ahandi ku Isi.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Koreya y’Epfo, Yasmin Amri Sued, yashimiye abitabiriye uyu muhango wo kwifatanya n’Abanyarwanda kwibuka Jenoside.
Yavuze ku mateka ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda kuva mu itegura ryayo kugeza mu ishyirwa mu bikorwa, bigizwemo uruhare n’ubuyobozi bubi bwari buriho.
Ambasaderi Amri Sued yavuze ko Jenoside yo mu 1994 yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda yaje guhagarikwa n’Abanyarwanda batabaye igihugu, bagizwe n’ingabo zahoze ari iza RPA zari ziyobowe na Perezida Paul Kagame.
Yavuze ko guhera ubwo u Rwanda ruharanira ubumwe mu gihugu himakazwa indangagaciro z’ubunyarwanda, ubwiyunge, ubutabera, gukorera hamwe, kwishakamo ibisubizo no guharanira iterambere rirambye.
Ambasaderi Amri Sued yasabye abahagarariye ibihugu byabo n’imiryango mpuzamahanga kurwanya bivuye inyuma udutsiko tugenda twaguka hirya no hino tw’abapfobya n’abahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda.
Yavuze ko utwo dutsiko tugizwe n’abaharanira guhindura amateka ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, baharanira kugira abere abayikoze no gusiga icyasha abayikorewe, abarokotse ndetse n’abayihagaritse.
Yongeraho ko bamwe muri bo bashigikiwe n’utundi dutsiko twa bamwe mu banyamahanga babatiza umurindi muri ibyo bikorwa by’ihakana n’ipfobya bya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Yasabye abitabiriye uwo muhango kurwanya bivuye inyuma iyo ngengabitekerezo mbi ya Jenoside n’amacakubiri.
Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 yahitanye Abatutsi basaga miliyoni mu minsi ijana.
Abanyarwanda baba muri Singapore bibutse ku nshuro ya 27 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri Singapore, Australie,Nouvelle-Zélande, na Indonésie yateguye umuhango wo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 27 inzirakarengane zazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, umuhango wabaye kuri uyu wa 7 Mata 2021, mu gutangiza iminsi 100 yo kwibuka abarenga miliyoni bavukijwe ubuzima bazira uko bavutse.
Ni umuhango wabaye hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga hirindwa icyorezo cya COVID-19, witabirwa n’abayobozi ba Ambasade, Abanyarwanda baba muri ibyo bihugu n’inshuri z’u Rwanda.
Hafashwe umunota wo guha icyubahiro inzirakarekane zazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, hacanwa urumuri rw’icyizere nk’ikimenyetso cy’ahazaza heza;hanerekanwa filime mbarankuru ngufi igaragaza uko Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yabaye yarateguwe.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Singapore Uwihanganye Jean de Dieu, yihanganishije abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, avuga ko imbaraga n’umurava byabo n’inzira y’ubwiyunge no kubabarirana “byomoye ibikomere binagira uruhare mu rugendo rwo kongera kubaka u Rwanda.”
Yibukije ko mu bihe byo kwibuka ari bwo abakwirakwiza amakuru y’ibinyoma, abapfobya n’abahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi biyongera, ahamagarira abitabiriye uwo muhango gushikama bagahangana nabo.
Yakomeje ati “Ibihe byo kwibuka ni amahirwe yo kwibutsa Isi ko gushyira hamwe kw’ibihugu byose ari yo nzira yonyine izageza imbere y’ubutabera abakekwaho uruhare muri Jenoside[yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994]; bacyihishahisha hirya no hino mu bihugu bitandukanye. [Ibyo] bizatuma abagizweho ingaruka nayo babona ubutabera, ndetse birinde kuba hari ahandi hazaba Jenoside mu Isi.”
Ni ku nshuro ya Kabiri u Rwanda rwinjira mu minsi 100 yo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 Isi igihanganye n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus aho ibikorwa byinshi byo kwibuka bizakorwa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga.
Mu Rwanda, uwo muhango watangirijwe ku Rwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali ruri ku Gisozi, aho Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame yacanye urumuri rw’icyizere. Witabiriwe n’abantu bake, abandi Banyarwanda bari mu Gihugu no hanze bawukurikiranira mu ngo zabo biciye ku itangazamakuru no ku ikoranabuhanga ritandukanye.
Amb. Mutsindashyaka yatanze kopi z’impapuro zimwemerera guhagararira u Rwanda i Brazzaville.
Ambasaderi Mutsindashyaka Théoneste yashyikirije Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga wa Congo-Brazzaville, Jean-Claude Gakosso, kopi z’impapuro zimwemerera guhagararira u Rwanda muri icyo gihugu.
Uyu muhango wabaye ku wa Gatatu w’iki cyumweru, tariki ya 31 Werurwe 2021. Wabaye hubahirizwa amabwiriza yo kwirinda Coronavirus arimo kwambara neza agapfukamunwa no guhana intera.
Nyuma yo gutanga impapuro zimwemerera guhagararira u Rwanda muri Repubulika ya Congo, Ambasaderi Mutsindashyaka Théoneste yagiranye ibiganiro byihariye na Minisitiri Jean-Claude Gakosso.
Aba bombi baganiriye ku mubano mwiza umaze igihe kirekire hagati y’ibihugu byombi ndetse n’izindi ngeri zitandukanye zihuriweho n’ibihugu byombi.
Mutsindashyaka azwi cyane muri politiki y’u Rwanda kuko yabaye Umuyobozi w’Umujyi wa Kigali, Guverineri w’Intara y’Iburasirazuba n’Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Uburezi.
Kuva mu 2013 yari Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umuryango ushinzwe kurwanya ikwirakwiza ry’Intwaro nto n’iziciriritse mu Karere k’Ibiyaga Bigari, mu Ihembe rya Afurika no mu bihugu bihana imbibi RECSA (Regional Centre on Small Arms).
Mutsindashyaka yemerejwe nka Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Congo mu Nama y’Abaminisitiri yateranye ku wa 14 Kanama 2020. Yasimbuye Amb Dr Habyalimana Jean Baptiste.
U Rwanda na Congo bifitanye umubano wihariye mu bya dipolomasi ndetse kuva muri Kanama 2016 ruhafite ambasade.
Mu 2011, u Rwanda na Congo byasinyanye amasezerano y’ubufatanye n’imikoranire mu bwikorezi bw’indege, ubucuruzi, ubukerarugendo, imiturire, imicungire y’impunzi, ingufu, umutekano, ubutabera, kurengera ibidukikije, uburobyi, ikoranabuhanga, itumanaho n’ibindi.
Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri Congo yanahawe ubushobozi bwo guhagararira inyungu z’u Rwanda mu bihugu bitandatu bihuriye mu Muryango w’Ubukungu bwa Afurika yo Hagati CEEAC, aribyo Cameroun, Gabon, Guinée Equatoriale, Tchad, Repubulika ya Centrafrique na CEEAC ubwayo.
Kuva mu Ukwakira 2018, Repubulika ya Congo yorohereje Abanyarwanda bajyayo, guhabwa viza bageze ku mipaka no ku bibuga by’indege.
U Rwanda na Congo bifitanye umubano mwiza, buri cyose gifite ugihagarariye mu kindi. Ubuhahirane hagati yabyo kandi bunoroshywa n’ingendo za RwandAir.
Ambasaderi Mutsindashyaka Théoneste na Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga wa Congo-Brazzaville, Jean-Claude Gakosso, banagiranye ibiganiro byihariye.
Ibuka France igiye gusuzuma raporo nshya ku ruhare rw’u Bufaransa muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Umuryango uharanira inyungu z’abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, Ishami rikorerera mu Bufaransa, watangaje ko wakiriye ibyavuye mu bushakashatsi bushya ku ruhare rw’icyo gihugu mu mateka mabi y’u Rwanda ndetse ko uzagira icyo ubivugaho nyuma yo kubisuzuma.
Ku wa 26 Werurwe 2021 nibwo hasohowe iyo raporo yakozwe n’abashakashatsi bayobowe na Prof Vincent Duclert bashyizweho na Perezida w’u Bufaransa, Emmanuel Macron.
Mu itangazo rigenewe abanyamakuru, Ibuka France yavuze ko ishimira ibyakozwe n’abashakashatsi, abanyamateka n’abanyamakuru batandukanye mu kugaragaza amakuru n’ubumenyi bijyanye na Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi kuva mu 27 ishize.
Yavuze ko ubushakashatsi ku mateka ari ikintu kidapfa gushyirwaho akadomo n’umwanzuro wa politiki, bityo ko “yifatanyije n’abazakomeza kwandika no gukuraho urujijo kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi”.
Ibuka France yakomeje iti “Iki ni ikintu gikomeye cyane kizadufasha kugera ku zindi ntego zacu zirimo ubutabera no gushyigikira abarokotse Jenoside.”
Uwo muryango watangaje ko nyuma y’uko imyanzuro y’iyo raporo ishyizwe ahagaragara, ugiye kuyisuzuma ukazagire icyo uyivugaho.
U Bufaransa bwashinjwe kenshi kugira uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi no gukingira ikibaba abayigizemo uruhare ntibakurikiranywe n’ubutabera, ahanini bishingiye ku mubano icyo gihugu cyari gifitanye n’ubutegetsi bw’u Rwanda mu gihe yabaga.
Col Rutabana yatanze kopi z’inyandiko zimwemerera guhagararira u Rwanda muri Uganda.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Uganda Col Joseph Rutabana yatanze kopi z’impapuro zimwemerera guhagararira u Rwanda muri icyo gihugu.
Izo kopi zashyikirijwe Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’amahanga wa Uganda, Sam Kutesa kuri uyu wa Kane nkuko Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri icyo gihugu yabitangaje ibinyujije kuri Twitter.
Muri Nzeri umwaka ushize nibwo Inama y’Abaminisitiri yagize Col Rutabana Joseph Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Uganda asimbuye Gen Maj (Rtd) Frank Mugambage wari umaze imyaka 11 ari ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri icyo gihugu.
Ambasaderi Rutabana yari asanzwe ari ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Israel.
Guhera mu 2017 umubano w’u Rwanda watangiye kuzamo agatotsi ubwo abanyarwanda batangiraga gutotezwa muri Uganda bikozwe n’inzego zaho z’umutekano, bamwe bagafungwa cyangwa bagatoteza binyuranyije n’amategeko.
Kuva icyo gihe ni nabwo u Rwanda rwatangiye gushinja Uganda gukorana n’abashaka kuruhungabanyiriza umutekano, bahabwa rugari muri icyo gihugu n’ububasha bwo kugirira nabi abanyarwanda badashyigikiye ibyo bikorwa.
Umubano w’ibihugu byombi wakomeje kuzamba kugeza ubwo muri Kanama 2019 ku buhuza bwa Angola na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, ibihugu byombi byasinye amasezerano agamije kubyutsa umubano no guhosha ibibazo byari bimaze iminsi hagati y’ibihugu byombi.
Muri Kamena na Nyakanga 2020, Uganda yagiye yoherereza u Rwanda bamwe mu baturage barwo bari bamaze igihe bafungiwe muri icyo gihugu mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko, mu mugambi wo gukomeza guhosha ibibazo bihari.
Nubwo gutabwa muri yombi mu gihiriri ku banyarwanda bari muri icyo gihugu byagabanyutse, biracyakorwa ndetse hari abakijugunywa ku mupaka nyuma y’igihe bafunzwe mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko muri Uganda.
Mbere y’umwaka wa 2017 umubano w’u Rwanda na Uganda wagaragariraga cyane mu bucuruzi hagati y’ibihugu byombi bwiyongeraga umunsi ku munsi. Imibare ya Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu yo mu mezi atandatu ya mbere ya 2016, igaragaza ko ubucuruzi bw’ibihugu byombi bwari bwiyongereye ku kigero cya 26.9%, ugereranyije n’amezi atandatu ya mbere ya 2015.
U Budage: Abanyarwanda bizihije Umunsi Mpuzamahanga w’Abagore hakomozwa ku ruhare rwabo mu iterambere.
Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Budage iherereye i Berlin yizihije Umunsi Mpuzamahanga w’Abagore mu muhango witabiriwe n’ingeri zitandukanye, harimo abadepite, abahanzi n’Abanyarwanda batuye mu Rwanda no mu Budage.
Ubusanzwe uyu munsi wizihizwa ku tariki 8 werurwe, ariko Abanyarwanda baba mu Budage bawizihije tariki 20 Werurwe 2021. Ni umuhango wabaye hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga nk’imwe muri gahunda zashyizweho mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Umujyanama wa mbere muri Ambasade y’u Rwanda i Berlin, wari uhagarariye Ambasaderi, Nshimiyimana Benedicto, yavuze ko agaciro k’umugore mu Rwanda no ku Isi muri rusange kamaze kugera ku ntambwe ishimishije ariko hakwiye kongerwamo ingufu abagore bakagaragara mu nzego z’ubuyobozi ari benshi.
Ati “N’ubwo intambwe yatewe ishimishije, dushingiye ku ngero z’inkuru ebyiri zivugwa kuri ubu muri politiki, ari zo kuba Amerika yishimira kubona Visi Perezida w’umugore nyuma y’imyaka 245 y’ubwigenge na Tanzania bishimira kubona Perezida w’umugore nyuma y’imyaka 59 y’ubwigenge. Dukwiye kwihutisha ingamba zatuma uburinganire n’ubwuzuzanye bigerwaho mu gihe cya vuba.“
Mukangango Marie uhagarariye itsinda ry’abari n’abategarugori muri Diaspora y’u Rwanda mu Budage we yagarutse ku ruhare Abanyarwandakazi bahatuye bagira mu iterambere ry’u Rwanda.
Yagize ati “ Hari umushinga wakozwe n’abari n’abategarugori uherutse gutahwa mu Rwanda mu kwezi kwa gatatu uyu mwaka. Icyo gihe hakusanyijwe Miliyoni icyenda z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda yagenewe Koperative Igisubizo Gitara iri mu Karere ka Nyaruguru. Uyu mushinga ukaba ugenewe gutera inkunga ubworozi bw’amatungo magufi ku miryango 90 iri mu Kagari ka Coko, Umurenge wa Cyahinda.”
Ni umuhango witabiriwe kandi n’Umudepite uhagarariye abagore mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’u Rwanda, Uwineza Beline, wavuze ku ntambwe igihugu cyateye mu kubahiriza ihame ry’uburinganire n’ubwuzuzanye.
Ati “Umugore yahawe uburenganzira n’uruhare ku mutungo, nk’ubutaka n’ibindi, hemejwe uburinganire bw’ibitsina byombi mu nzego zose, ndetse hemezwa ko kuri 30% mu nzego zose z’ubuyobozi bw’igihugu hakwiye kugaragaramo Abanyarwandakazi. ”
“Ingamba igihugu cyafashe mu kurushaho guteza imbere uburinganire n’ubwuzuzanye mu Rwanda tuzikesha ubuyobozi bw’igihugu bwiza no kubongerera ubushobozi mu kwitinyuka kuko bashoboye.”
Uyu muhango witabiriwe n’abahanzikazi b’Abanyarwanda barimo Audia Intore, uririmba indirimbo gakondo, Sonia Singh Mwumvaneza na Donatha Kankindi wavuze umuvugo utaka ubwiza, umutima mugari, inkingi y’umuryango utekanye n’ubutwari bw’umutegarugori.
Ingabo z’u Rwanda ziri muri Centrafrique zambitswe imidali y’ishimwe.
Ingabo z’u Rwanda ziri mu butumwa bw’Umuryango w’Abibumbye bwo kugarura amahoro muri Centrafrique zambitswe imidali y’ishimwe kubera ubwitange n’umurava uziranga mu kazi kazo.
Igikorwa cyo gutanga imidali y’ishimwe ku ngabo z’u Rwanda cyabereye mu kigo cya Socatel M’poko, ahari icyicaro cyazo mu Mujyi wa Bangui, ku wa Gatanu, tariki ya 19 Werurwe 2021.
Umuyobozi w’Ingabo za MINUSCA, Brig Gen Driss Okaddour, yashimye umusanzu w’ingabo z’u Rwanda mu kugarura amahoro n’umutekano by’umwihariko ku wa 27 Ukuboza 2020 ubwo habaga amatora y’Umukuru w’Igihugu n’abagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko.
Yagize ati “Akazi kanyu gahabwa agaciro n’abanyamuryango ba MINUSCA n’igihugu cyatwakiriye ari na bo bungukira bwa mbere muri izo nshingano zo kubungabunga amahoro. Sinakwibagirwa ubwitange n’umuhate wanyu ubwo inyeshyamba zateraga Umujyi wa Bangui. Umuyobozi wanyu yambwiye ko ibintu biza kugenda neza kandi mwahise musubiza igitero inyuma.’’
U Rwanda ruri ku mwanya wa gatatu mu bihugu bifite ingabo nyinshi mu bikorwa by’Umuryango w’Abibumbye bigamije kubungabunga amahoro muri Repubulika ya Centrafrique (MINUSCA), aho abasirikare n’abapolisi barwo barenga 1389.
Mu matora y’Umukuru w’Igihugu yabaye ku wa 27 Ukuboza 2020, u Rwanda rwoherejeyo izindi ngabo 300 zo gufasha gucunga umutekano mu bihe by’amatora nyuma y’uko hari imitwe y’inyeshyamba yashakaga guhungabanya ayo matora.
Ingabo z’u Rwanda ziri muri Batayo ya Karindwi (Rwabatt7) zoherejwe i Bangui ku wa 6 Werurwe 2020; zakoze ibikorwa bitandukanye birimo kurinda Perezida wa Centrafrique no kubungabunga umutekano mu duce dutandukanye two mu Murwa Mukuru.
Izi ngabo zanatangije ibikorwa byo gukumira imirwano muri Bangui, gukora uburinzi bwo guhagarika ubwicanyi, kurinda abasivili gihugu ndetse ibi byose byiyongeraho ibikorwa bitandukanye birimo no guha abaturage amazi meza.
Umuyobozi wa Rwabatt7, Lt Col JB SAFARI, yashimye umuhate w’ingabo mu gihe cy’umwaka zimaze ziri mu nshingano.
Yagize ati “Twishimiye gutanga umusanzu wacu mu rugendo rwo kugarura amahoro muri Centrafrique.’’
Centrafrique imaze igihe iri mu bibazo by’umutekano ariko byongeye gukara mu mpera z’umwaka ushize ubwo hategurwaga amatora ya Perezida.
Imitwe y’inyeshyamba irimo UPC yari yiyemeje kuyadurumbanya ariko ingabo za Loni zirimo iz’u Rwanda zirahagoboka.
Amatora yagenze neza ndetse Perezida Touadera yashimiye umusanzu w’ingabo z’u Rwanda mu kugira ngo amatora agende neza.
Muri Centrafrique, u Rwanda rufite ingabo zirimo abakobwa n’abagore 38 bakora mu mirimo itandukanye ariko bagahuriza ku ntego imwe yo kurinda abasivili.
USA: Ishimwe w’imyaka 17 yatawe muri yombi ashinjwa kwica mugenzi we.
Ishimwe Eric uba mu Mujyi wa Nashville muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yatawe muri yombi na polisi y’icyo gihugu ashinjwa ubwicanyi bukoreshejwe intwaro.
WKRN yatangaje ko Ishimwe yafashwe n’inzego z’umutekano ku wa Gatatu w’iki Cyumweru, biturutse ku rupfu rwa Niyibizi Kevin wasanzwe mu rugo rwo kwa Ishimwe yishwe arashwe mu gituza.
Inzego z’umutekano zavuze ko Ishimwe yabajijwe impamvu yarashe mugenzi we w’imyaka 16, asobanura ko bari barimo gukinisha imbunda Niyibizi yari yazanye, maze birangira Ishimwe akoze mu mbarutso imbunda yerekeye nyakwigendera aba ahasize ubuzima.
Ishimwe w’imyaka 17 yahise ajyanwa mu kigo ngororamuco aho akurikiranyweho icyaha cyo kwica umuntu.
Bivugwa ko uyu musore Ishimwe afite inkomoko mu Rwanda.
Abanyarwanda baba muri Sénégal bizihije Umunsi Mpuzamahanga w’Abagore.
Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri Sénégal ifatanyije n’Abanyarwanda baba mu bihugu bya Mali, Gambia, Guinée-Bissau na Cap Vert n’inshuti z’u Rwanda bizihije Umunsi Mpuzamahanga w’Abagore.
Uyu munsi usanzwe wizihirwa tariki ya 8 Werurwe 2021, ibirori byawo byabaye ku wa 13 Werurwe 2021, mu muhango wabaye hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga rya WebEx unatambuka kuri Televiziyo Isango Star no ku zindi mbuga nkoranyambaga zirimo YouTube na Twitter.
Abatanze ibiganiro barimo Umugenzuzi Mukuru w’Iyubahirizwa ry’ihame ry’Uburinganire n’Ubwuzuzanye mu Rwanda (GMO), Rwabuhihi Rose; Umuyobozi uhagarariye UN Women mu Rwanda, Fatou Lo; Umuyobozi w’Umuryango uharanira guteza imbere Uburinganire no kurwanya ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina (RWAMREC), Rutayisire Fidèle; Ngeruka Fabiola ukorera muri UNFPA Mali, Agnès Ammeux ukorera Enabel muri Guinée-Bissau na Dr Mukeshimana Angelique wiga Ubuvuzi muri Kaminuza ya Havre mu Bufaransa.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Sénégal, Karabaranga Jean Pierre, yagarutse ku butumwa bugusha ku nsanganyamatsiko yo kwizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga w’Abagore uyu mwaka igira iti “Munyarwandakazi, ba ku ruhembe mu Isi yugarijwe na COVID-19”.
Abatanze ibiganiro bikije by’umwihariko ku rwego umugore agezeho mu kwiteza imbere, uruhare afite mu iterambere ry’igihugu ndetse n’ibibazo bahura nabyo mu mibereho ya buri munsi n’ibisubizo bikwiye kubifatirwa.
Ambasaderi Karabaranga yibukije ubutumwa bwa Perezida Kagame ubwo uwo munsi wizihizwaga.
Icyo gihe abinyujije ku rukuta rwa Twitter, yagize ati ““Uyu munsi ni ukwibuka ko uburinganire butareba abagore gusa. 
Nta terambere ryabaho hatabaye ubwitabire n’amahirwe angana kuri bose. Buri wese muri twe afite uruhare mu kurwanya ubusumbane kandi ihezwa nta mwanya rifite mu gihe kiri imbere.”
Abatanze ikiganiro bagarutse ku ntambwe ifatika u Rwanda rwateye mu byiciro birimo uburezi, ubuzima n’ubuvuzi, ubukungu, imiyoborere n’inzego z’ubuyobozi, umutekano n’ubutabera. Bavuze ko ubwiyongere bw’abagore mu nzego zose, bikwiye kwishimirwa no guterwa imbaraga Kandi bigakomeza.
Mu nzego z’ubuyobozi u Rwanda rwakoze amavugurura atandukanye atuma ruza ku myanya ya mbere ku Isi mu kugira umubare munini w’abagore mu nzego zifata ibyemezo, nk’aho mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko bangana na 61%, muri Guverinoma bagera kuri 50 %.
Itegeko Nshinga u Rwanda rugenderaho kuri ubu naryo riha abagore uburenganzira bwo kugira 30% ry’imyanya ifata ibyemezo.
Ambasaderi Karabaranga yibukije ko ibi byose byashobotse kubera ubuyobozi bwiza bwa Perezida Paul Kagame yubatse kuva igihugu kivuye mu icuraburindi rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Yakomeje ati “Kuva mu 1962 u Rwanda rubona ubwigenge kugeza mu 1994, umugore n’umwana w’umukobwa nta gaciro bahabwaga haba mu miryango yabo ndetse no muri politiki y’igihugu. Nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi Guverninoma y’Ubumwe bw’igihugu yashyizweho na FPR ni yo yashyize mu bikorwa politiki yo guha agaciro abagore, kubateza imbere, kubashyigikira muri byose kuko n’ubundi byari muri gahunda ya politiki ya FPR kuva yavuka.’’
U Rwanda kandi rwashyizeho gahunda nyinshi zakozwe zijanye no gufasha abagore mu kwiteza imbere muri rusange.
Abitabiriye ibi biganiro bagaragaje ko iki cyiciro gikeneye kwigwaho byihariye hagamijwe kumenya ibibazo abagore bahuye nabyo mu gihe cya Coronavirus mu buryo bwimbitse n’uko byakemuka kandi abafatanyabikorwa ba Leta bakabyitabira ari benshi.
Hibukijwe kandi ko Umunyarwandakazi kuva kera yagaragaje ubushobozi, ubwitange no kwihangana mu bihe bikomeye nko mu rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu ku buryo bitanga icyizere ko n’ubundi abagore bazashobora kuva mu bibazo batewe na Coronavirus cyane cyane ko Leta ibari inyuma kandi ibashyigikiye muri byose.
Umuyobozi wa Diaspora Nyarwanda muri Sénégal, Karamaga Patrick, yashimye ko umugore yahawe umwanya mu nzego zitandukanye.
Ati “U Rwanda rwateye imbere ariko ntabwo turagera aho dushaka kugera. Bitangirira mu rugo, ku mwana muto, ko umwana w’umukobwa agomba kwiga.’’
Abitabiriye ibiganiro batanze icyifuzo ko muri Diaspora ibiganiro bijyanye n’uburinganire byashyirwamo ingufu cyane cyane mu miryango kugira ngo urubyiruko rwo Rwanda rw’ejo ruzashobore gusigasira ibyagezweho.
Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri Sénégal ifatanyije n’Abanyarwanda baba mu bihugu bya Mali, Gambia, Guinée-Bissau na Cap Vert n’inshuti z’u Rwanda bizihije Umunsi Mpuzamahanga w’Abagore.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Sénégal, Karabaranga Jean Pierre, yibukije ko umugore yahawe ijambo kubera ubuyobozi bwiza bwa Perezida Paul Kagame.
Umugenzuzi Mukuru w’Iyubahirizwa ry’ihame ry’Uburinganire n’Ubwuzuzanye mu Rwanda (GMO), Rwabuhihi Rose, yagaragaje ko hari amategeko igihugu cyashyizeho aha ijambo umugore.
Urubyiruko rw’u Rwanda dufite amahirwe, kwinjira nta gukomanga- Uwineza Aline Nelly.
Rwiyemezamirimo Uwineza Aline Nelly yagaragaje ko urubyiruko rwo mu Rwanda rufite amahirwe adasanzwe yarushyiriweho, arufasha kwiteza imbere.
Yabigarutseho mu buhamya yatanze ubwo Abanyarwanda batuye mu bihugu bya Scandinavia bizihizaga Umunsi Mpuzamahanga w’Abagore, wateguwe na Ambasade y’u Rwanda ifite Icyicaro muri Suéde ifatanyije n’Umuryango w’Abanyarwanda batuye mu gace k’Ibihugu byo mu Majyaruguru y’u Burayi bya Suède, Danemark, Norvège na Finlande.
Uyu munsi ubusanzwe wizihizwa ku wa 8 Werurwe buri mwaka, Abanyarwanda batuye muri Scandinavia, bawizihije ku wa 13 Werurwe 2021.
Witabiriwe na Minisitiri w’Uburinganire n’Iterambere ry’Umuryango (MIGEPROF), Prof. Jeannette Bayisenge; Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Suède, Nkulikiyinka Christine; rwiyemezamirimo Uwineza Aline n’Umuhanzi Masamba Intore.
Amb. Nkulikiyinka Christine yavuze ko ubushobozi bw’abagore bukwiye gushingirwaho mu kubaka ahazaza heza.
Ati “Kuba abagore bashoboye ngira ngo ntibishidikanywaho, ni yo mpamvu bakwiye kugira uruhare mu iterambere ryo ku giti cyabo, imiryango n’iryu Rwanda aho batuye hose.’’
Yabibukije ko bakwiye guhora bazirikana ko nubwo bari mu mahanga bakwiye kugira u Rwanda ku mutima, bakamenya ibiruberamo ndetse bakabigiramo uruhare.
Yakomeje ati “Muri ibi bihugu byo mu Burayi bw’Amajyaruguru bamaze gutera intambwe ishimishije mu buringanire, nubwo nabo bagifite izindi ntambwe zo gutera. Abanyarwandakazi baba ino, bafite amahirwe yo kwigira ku byiza babona ngo bashobore nabo kwiyubaka ariko badataye umuco wacu.’’
Minisitiri Bayisenge yashimiye abateguye uyu munsi kuko kubikora ugashyirwa mu bikorwa ubwabyo ari iby’agaciro gahambaye.
Yakomeje ati ‘‘Ni ibintu byiza cyane byerekana ko mushaka guhura mukaganira ku cyabateza imbere nk’abagore kandi nk’Abanyarwanda muri rusange. Icyo mbifurije kandi nabasaba ni uko mwagumana indangagaciro zizakomeza kubaranga nk’Abanyarwanda, mugakomeza gukunda iwanyu, igihugu cyanyu, mukagira ubumwe bwo pfundo ryo gukorera hamwe no kumvikana, mukanakunda umurimo.’’
Mu buhamya bwe, Uwineza Aline yavuze ko urubyiruko rwashyiriweho amahirwe adasanzwe arufasha kwiteza imbere.
