Buri mwaka tariki 18 Gicurasi Isi yizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe Ingoro Ndangamurage, hazirikanwa umuco, amateka n’imibereho gakondo by’abatuye Isi.
U Rwanda narwo rwifatanya n’amahanga mu kwizihiza uwo munsi ushimangira agaciro ko guhererekanya amateka no guteza imbere umuco ufatwa nk’umusingi w’imibereho y’igihugu.
Urwa Gasabo rubarizwa mu Muryango Mpuzamahanga w’Ingoro Ndangamurage (ICOM) uhuriyemo abanyamuryango basaga 44 000 bakora mu ngoro ndangamurage 20 000 zo mu bihugu 138.
Muri uyu mwaka, uyu munsi wahawe insanganyamatsiko ivuga ku kugira “Ingoro ndangamurage zigamije uburinganire, ubudasa no kudaheza’’.
Kuri iyi nshuro iki gikorwa cyateguwe mu buryo bwihariye aho hazifashishwa ikoranabuhanga bitewe n’ingamba zashyizweho zo guhangana n’ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Ni muri urwo rwego Ingoro ndangamurage zo mu bihugu binyamuryango bya ICOM zasabwe kucyizihiza hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga.
Ikigo cy’Ingoro z’Igihugu z’Umurage w’u Rwanda (INMR) cyizizihiza ibi birori hafungurwa ku mugaragaro imurika rishya mu Ngoro y’Ubugeni n’Ubuhanzi iherereye i Kanombe, ku wa 18 Gicurasi 2020.
Iri murika ry’ibihangano by’ubugeni ryahawe insanganyamatsiko ivuga iti “Ubutumwa bw’abanyabugeni b’Abanyarwandakazi: Uburinganire kuri bose.
Ni insanganyamatsiko yari yagenwe ku Munsi Mpuzamahanga w’Abari n’Abategarugori [yasubitswe kubera ingamba zo guhangana na Coronavirus], ariko inahurirana n’iyatanzwe na ICOM uyu mwaka wa 2020.
Iyo urebye mu byiciro bitandukanye bibarizwamo abari n’abategarugori mu Rwanda, usanga baragize uruhare mu bikorwa by’iterambere ry’ubukungu n’imibereho myiza y’abaturage nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994; ariko basigara inyuma mu bijyanye n’ubugeni bitewe n’impamvu zirimo ubushobozi buke, kubura amahugurwa ahagije mu bijyanye n’ubugeni n’izindi mbogamizi zo mu buzima busanzwe.
Ushingiye no ku bihangano bimuritse mu Ngoro y’Ubugeni n’Ubuhanzi y’i Kanombe “Hari icyuho kinini hagati y’ibihangano by’abagore n’abagabo.
Ibi ntibisobanuye ko badashoboye, bafite impano muri bo kuko na bake bari muri uwo mwuga bakora ibihangano byiza cyane, bimwe muri byo bifite ubwiza burenze ibya basaza babo.
Imurika rizakorwa nk’uburyo bwo gukora ubukangurambaga mu bari n’abategarugori, binyuze mu butumwa bukubiye mu nsanganyamatsiko y’imurika no mu bihangano byabo byateguwe kandi bizamurikwa, bakangurirwa kwigirira icyizere, gutinyuka no kugaragaza impano bafite mu by’ubugeni.
Iri murika ryateguwe hagamijwe gufasha abahanzikazi bato no kubaharurira inzira zo kungukira mu bikorwa byabo; gufasha abanyabugeni b’abagore gutegura ibikorwa byo kumurika ibihangano byabo; kwerekana agaciro ko gushora mu bushobozi bw’umugore no kubafasha kugeza imishinga yabo ku rwego mpuzamahanga, byanafasha abandi kubigiraho.
Rizahuza abanyabugeni b’abari n’abategarugori 35 bo mu bihugu bitandatu birimo u Rwanda, Amerika, u Bufaransa, u Bubiligi, Serbia na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo.
INMR yateguye iri murika ifatanyije n’Ikigo Ndangamuco cy’Abadage Goethe Institut-Kigali.
Ibyo bigo byombi byafashije abari n’abategarugori b’abanyabugeni mu kuritegura, kubaha amahugurwa n’ubushobozi bwo gukora ibihangano byabo no gutunganya imurika riboneye.
Umuhango wo kwizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga w’Ingoro Ndangamurage uzanyuzwa kuri murandasi (Webex) ku wa 18 Gicurasi 2020 saa Cyenda.
Abifuza kuwukurikirana baziyandikisha bohereza ubutumwa kuri [email protected] cyangwa bakandikira ikigo banyuze ku mbuga nkoranyambaga.
Biteganyijwe ko umukozi w’Ingoro ndangamurage azasobanurira abazakurikira iki gikorwa ibijyanye n’imurika, ababwira ubutumwa bukubiye mu bihangano bigize imurika nkuko bigenda mu gihe bari gusura bisanzwe.
U Rwanda rufite Ingoro z’Umurage umunani zimuritse umurage n’amateka by’igihugu ku mibereho y’abagituye, imyemerere, imyidagaduro, imyambarire, imiziro n’imiziririzo, amateka yacyo.
Nyuma ya gahunda ya Guma mu rugo yashyizweho mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19, ibikorwa byo gufungura imiryango ku basura ingoro ndangamurage byarasubukuwe ku wa 5 Gicurasi 2020.
Imihango n’imigenzo yakorwaga n’Abanyarwanda mu kwirukana ibiza n’ibyorezo
Mu bihe byo ha mbere mu Rwanda iyo hadukaga ibiza by’umwuzure n’amapfa n’ibyorezo by’indwara z’abantu n’amatungo bikayogoza igihugu, habagaho imihango n’imigenzo yakorwaga kugira ngo ibyo byorezo bigende.
Mu bihe byo ha mbere mu Rwanda iyo hadukaga ibiza by’umwuzure n’amapfa n’ibyorezo by’indwara z’abantu n’amatungo bikayogoza igihugu, habagaho imihango n’imigenzo yakorwaga kugira ngo ibyo byorezo bigende.
Imihango yakorwaga ahanini yabaga ishingiye ku biteganywa n’Ubwiru, umwuga w’Ubupfumu, Ubuvubyi Ubuhennyi, Ubuhoryo n’Ubuhaditsi.
Igitabo “Imizi y’u Rwanda" cyanditswe n’Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, inzobere mu muco, amateka n’Ubuvanganzo, havugwamo ko buri cyorezo cyateraga u Rwanda, habaga hari uburyo bwateguwe bwo kucyohera cyangwa kukirukana bakoreshejwe imwe muri iyo migenzo n’imihango yashyizwe u Rwanda rwahangwaga.
Inzira ya Kivu: Ni inzira yabagamo urwunge rw’imihango yakorwaga mu gihe mu gihugu habaga hateye umwuzure ukangiza byinshi mu gihugu.
Bakoraga imihango yo kwirunka uwo mwuzure.
Inzira ya Muhekenyi: Ni inzira yabagamo urwunge rw’imihango yakorwaga mu gihe habaga hateye ibyonnyi n’indwara z’amatungo, bityo hagakorwa imihango n’imigenzo yo kuyohera.
Nyuma y’imihango y’ibwami ijyanye n’ubwiru bwo kohera ibiza n’ibyorezo, hakurikiragaho abahanga gakondo mu kuvura icyateye icyo cyorezo no kucyohera ntikizagaruke.
Bamwe muri bo bakoraga iyo mihango, ni aba bakurikira:
Abavubyi: Mu Rwanda rwo ha mbere, abavubyi bari bafite umumaro uhanitse mu mibereho myiza y’abaturage cyane cyane mu buhinzi .
Umwuga wabo gakondo wari uwo kuvuba imvura ikagwa iyo yabaga yahagamye, no kuyohera ikagenda iyo yabaga yaciye ibintu.
Iyo habaga hateye amapfa cyangwa se umwuzure, icyo gihe nibwo abavubyi nk’inzobere mu kumanura imvura bahagurukaga bagakora imihango yo kuyimanura ikagwa, amapfa akagenda.
Iyo yabaga yaciye ibintu hakaba umwuzure, nabwo bakoraga imihango yo kuyohera.
Abahoryo: Abahoryo nabo ni bamwe mu banyamihango b’ibwami bagiraga uruhare runini ku gukurikirana ibihingwa mu murima no kuvura ibyonnyi by’indwara zabaga zadutse mu myaka.
Barahagurukaga bagakora imihango yo kuvuma ibyo byonnyi no kuvuguta imiti yo kubyamurura ku butaka bw’u Rwanda.
Abahaditsi: Ni bamwe mu banyamihango b’ibwami bari bagiraga uruhare runini ku gukurikirana indwara z’amatungo zabaga zadutse mu bworozi bw’I Rwanda.
Icyo gihe nibwo Abahaditsi barahagurukaga bagakora imihango yo kuvuguta imiti yo kubyamurura mu Rwanda.
Abahennyi: Abahennyi nabo bari bamwe mu banyamihango b’ibwami bifashishwaga mu kuvura indwara z’ibyorezo zibasiye abantu no kuvuma ababisha banga u Rwanda.
Iyo habaga hateye ibyorezo by’indwara, icya mbere bakoraga ni ukumenya inkomoko yabyo, basanga ari ibirogano bagahenera uwabikoze akaba ikivume, basanga ari icyorezo cy’inzaduka bakagishakira amasubyo yo kucyohera.
Nibo batangaga amasubyo yo kuvura amahumane, ibinyoro, ubushita n’izindi.
Mu kwamurura no kohera ibyozezo by’indwara z’abantu n’amatungo, Abanyarwanda bifashishaga kandi amazi y’ubuhoro, yeza igihugu agakiza ubwandure akamurura ibiza by’indwara n’umuze byazengereje igihugu.
Bigaragaza ko kuva kera Abanyarwanda bari bafite ubuhanga n’ubushobozi bifashishaga mu guhashya umwanzi w’ubuzima bwabo n’ibyabo.
Ni abantu bakoresheje ubwenge bw’umwimerere mu kwirwanaho bahagarara ku buzima bwabo ngo butaganzwa n’ibyorezo by’indwara n’ibiza by’amapfa n’imyuzure.
Gukena Afurika yabihisemo: Ibidasanzwe mu gitabo gishya cya Apôtre Mutabazi
Apôtre Mutabazi Kabarira (Brain) yasohoye igitabo "African Poverty is a Choice" cyinjira mu mizi y’ubukene bwa Afurika n’inkomoko yabwo n’uburyo Abanyafurika babwivanamo baramutse babishatse.
Apôtre Mutabazi Kabarira (Brain) yasohoye igitabo "African Poverty is a Choice" cyinjira mu mizi y’ubukene bwa Afurika n’inkomoko yabwo n’uburyo Abanyafurika babwivanamo baramutse babishatse.
Iki gitabo cyagiye hanze mu minsi ishize, gikubiyemo ingingo zitandukanye zigaragaza ibyahejeje Afurika mu bukene, uko ibindi bihugu byabashije kwiteza imbere n’uburyo buri munyafurika abigize ibye akiheraho, uyu mugabane warenga indi yose mu bukire.
Apôtre Mutabazi mu gitabo cye "African Poverty is a Choice" avuga ko ikibazo gikomeye Abanyafurika bafite ari uko bataramenya aho ikibazo bafite gituruka, bagashaka buri gihe guhirikira ibibazo ku bandi, batarebye bo ubwabo icyo bakora ngo bikemuke.
Yagize ati “Buri muntu afite ubushobozi buri muri we n’impano arusha abandi bantu, ariko abantu benshi babaho ubuzima bwo kutayimenya no kutayikoresha mu mwuzuro wayo, ari nacyo kibazo Afurika ifite, ntabwo bajya bizera ubushobozi bifitemo.
“Usanga Umunyafurika yarageze ahantu yiyakira.
Umuntu akavuga ngo njye ndi umucuruzi ukomeye, nzajya njya kurangura mu Bushinwa nze mbicuruze bagenzi banjye njye hariya ngagare kandi aho uvuye kubirangura ababikora bavukiye icyenda nk’ayo wavukiye.
Mutabazi yagaragaje ko abantu benshi batekereza ko ubukene bwa Afurika buterwa n’ubuyobozi, nyamara we iyo asesenguye avuga ko ubuyobozi atari cyo kibazo kuko nta wakoze ibifitiye Afurika inyungu ngo asubizwe inyuma.
Ati “Abantu benshi baravuga ngo muri Afurika haba igitugu, ibyo nzapfa ntabyemeye.
Muri politiki wenda harimo gukanira kandi nabyo bifite impamvu kuko Abanyafurika kubera inzara bafite barashonje kandi bararakaye.
Ikibazo ni uko barakariye umuntu utari we.
Yavuze ko abayobozi icyo bashinzwe ari ugushyiraho imirongo migari no gufasha abagize igitekerezo kizima ariko badashinzwe gutekerereza umuntu.
Mutabazi yagaragaje ko ikibazo kiri ahantu hatandukanye harimo n’uburezi, aho umwarimu atanga bike ku munyeshuri cyangwa se umwanya munini bakawumara biga ibyo batazakoresha mu buzima.
Mu gitabo "African Poverty is a Choice" kandi Mutabazi anenga uburyo abanyabwenge ba Afurika basa nk’aho ntacyo bayimariye, aho barangiza kuminuza bakaza baje gusaba akazi aho gukoresha ibyo bize bafasha Afurika kuvumbura no gukemura ibibazo bihari.
Yanenze na Guverinoma za Afurika uburyo zifata abitwa ko ari abahanga (aba- génies) bagashyirwa mu myanya y’ubuyobozi itabafasha gushyira mu bikorwa ibyo bize.
Kuri we asanga mu buyobozi, abahanga badakwiriye kurenga 30 %, abandi bakajya gukora ibyo bize.
Ku bitwaza abakoloni ngo nibo bahejeje Afurika inyuma, Apôtre Mutabazi yabihakanye avuga ko ibyo biri mu nyungu zabo nta kosa ririmo, ahubwo ikosa riri ku banyafurika batamenya icyo bakeneye ngo babikumire.
Ati “Inzira abanyafurika turi gucamo ngo tuve mu bukene, si iyo ibihugu biri kudutera inkunga byaciyemo.
U Burayi na Amerika bizahora iteka bihari kugira ngo biduhe intwaro nituvuga ko turambiwe abayobozi twita abanyagitugu ariko nituvuga ko dukeneye Kaminuza ya Harvard cyangwa MIT ngo bayitwubakire, n’aho wababwira ko ari ku ideni bazakubwira ngo cira birarura.
Mutabazi kandi yerekana ko Abanyafurika ubwabo bakomeza kudakoresha ubushobozi bifitemo, aho atanga urugero rw’umuntu wumva ko akomeye akajya kurangura mu mahanga, nyamara atabasha gukopera ibyo ajya kurangura ngo umunsi umwe nawe azabikorere mu gihugu cye, mu gihe ariyo nzira ibihugu byinshi nk’u Bushinwa n’u Buyapani byagiye bikoresha ngo bitere imbere.
Ikindi atangaho inama kizavana Afurika mu bukene, ni ukudatekereza amafaranga mbere y’ibindi byose kuko bituma badashyira umwanya ku byagira akamaro k’igihe kirekire.
Ati “Ibintu bituma abantu bakena ni uguhora iteka batekereza babanjirije ku mafaranga.
Inzira izana ubukire, reba ikibazo wiyumvemo ko ufite ubushobozi bwo kugikemura ugikemure wishyurwe amafaranga ariko nuhita utekereza amafaranga, uzashaka inzira y’ubusamo yo guhita uyabona.
Itangazamakuru, abamenyekanisha Afurika n’ibiyikorerwamo ndetse n’abadipolomate, Mutabazi abashinja kudakoresha imbaraga ngo ibyakorewe muri Afurika bimenyekane nk’uko ahandi bikorwa, agasaba ko bikosorwa niba dushaka ko Afurika iva mu bukene.
Apôtre Mutabazi yashinze ikigo "INVENT AFRICA" kigamije gutanga inama n’ubujyanama ku mishinga n’ibindi.
Bategura inama zigamije gufasha abantu gukuza no kubyaza umusaruro ibitekerezo bibarimo n’ibindi.

RALC yasohoye igitabo gikubiyemo ingamba zo guteza imbere isoko ry’ibihangano nyarwanda
Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco, RALC yasohoye igitabo gikubiyemo ingamba zizafasha abahanzi bo mu Rwanda guteza imbere isoko ry’ibihangano byabo.
Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco, RALC yasohoye igitabo gikubiyemo ingamba zizafasha abahanzi bo mu Rwanda guteza imbere isoko ry’ibihangano byabo.
Iki gitabo kigamije gufasha abahanzi mu ngeri zitandukanye kubyaza umusaruro impano zabo, bikava ku rwego rwo hasi bikajya ku rwego rw’igihugu na mpuzamahanga.
Nubwo gisohotse uyu mwaka, cyarangije kwandikwa umwaka ushize.
Umwanzuro wo kwandika iki gitabo cyiswe ‘Marketing Strategies for the Promotion of Cultural and Creative Industries in Rwanda’, waje nyuma yo kubona ko hari Abahanzi nyarwanda benshi bakora ibihangano byiza ariko ntibirenge umutaru cyangwa ngo bibabyarire inyungu.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Agateganyo wa RALC, Nsanzabaganwa Modeste, yabwiye IGIHE ko bizeye umusaruro ku bahanzi n’ibihangano byabo nyuma yo gushyira hanze icyo gitabo.
Ati “Hari impano y’umuhanzi, akajya mu nganzo agahanga ariko hakavuka ikibazo cy’icyo akoresha ibyo bihangano.
Iyo agize Imana umuntu umwe cyangwa babiri barabibona bakabireba cyangwa kabyumva ariko kugira ngo azazamure bya bihanganano abishyire ku isoko ry’igihugu cyangwa mpuzamahanga, bikaba ikibazo kandi ari ibintu ubona bishobora gukundwa.
“Nibwo twavuze ngo reka twegeranye inyandiko zikubiyemo inama zajya zifasha kugira ngo igihangano kizamuke kigere ku rwego rw’igihugu na mpuzamahanga.
Umuhanzi ntahange avuga ngo ndahangira gusa aho ndi mu mudugudu, ahange ahangira isi yose.
Ku isi hose, ubuhanzi bwinjiza miliyari ibihumbi bibiri z’amadolari buri mwaka, bugatanga akazi ku bantu miliyoni zisaga 29.
Nsanzabaganwa yavuze ko ikibazo kigikomereye abahanzi nyarwanda ari uburyo bwo gutunganya no kumenya kubyaza umusaruro ibihangano byabo.
Ati “ Twasanze ikintu umuhanzi ashoboye neza ari uguhanga, inganzo arayifite, agahanga ukabona koko ari mu nganzo ariko kugira ngo iyo mpano izagere ku bantu benshi bashoboka, ari rya koranabuhanga, kubitunganya, kubicuruza mu buryo bugezweho […] aho hantu hose haracyarimo ikibazo.
RALC ifite gahunda yo gushyira icyo gitabo no mu zindi ndimi zikoreshwa mu Rwanda nk’Ikinyarwanda, Igifaransa n’Igiswayire kugira ngo kizarusheho kugirira Abanyarwanda n’abaturarwanda benshi akamaro.
Iki gitabo kigaragaza ibibazo byihariye bya buri cyiciro cy’ubuhanzi mu Rwanda n’ingamba zafasha mu kubikemura.
Kije gikurikira izindi ntambwe nyinshi Inteko imaze gutera mu guteza imbere ubuhanzi n’inganda ndangamuco mu Rwanda zirimo gufasha abahanzi kwibumbira hamwe, gutera inkunga ibikorwa by’ubuhanzi n’ibindi.
Iki gitabo kigaragaza ishusho y’inganda ndangamuco mu byiciro bitandukanye birimo muzika, sinema, ubugeni n’ubukorikori, ikinamico, urwenya, imbyino, ubwiza n’imideri, ubwanditsi n’ubusizi.
RALC yashishikarije Abanyarwanda muri rusange, by’umwihariko abahanzi, kugira inyota yo gusoma iki gitabo kuko kirimo amakuru menshi yabafasha gutera imbere ku rwego mpuzamahanga; bityo ubuhanzi n’inganda ndangamuco bikabasha gutunga ababikora n’ababishoramo imari mu buryo burambye.
Ibyo bizatuma barushaho kugira uruhare mu guteza imbere ubukungu bw’Igihugu.
Kugeza ubu iki gitabo kiboneka mu isomero rya RALC no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco ikoresha hamwe no ku rubuga rwa murandasi rw’Inteko (www.
Vuba aha icyo gitabo kizashyirwa mu masomero anyuranye mu gihugu kugira ngo kibagereho kigere kuri benshi.
Imiryango yahamije ibigwi mu mateka y’u Rwanda: Igicumbi cy’umuryango w’umwami Ndoba
Mu mateka y’abakurambere mpangarwanda, hari imiryango yagiye ihamya ibigwi n’ibirindiro, ikagira amavugwa ku bw’ibigwi n’ibirindiro babaga barakoreye igihugu, hagati mu muryango mugari bakomokamo.
Mu mateka y’abakurambere mpangarwanda, hari imiryango yagiye ihamya ibigwi n’ibirindiro, ikagira amavugwa ku bw’ibigwi n’ibirindiro babaga barakoreye igihugu, hagati mu muryango mugari bakomokamo.
Ni imiryango yagiye igira amaboko akomeye kubera kugira imiryango migari igizwe n’abantu benshi kandi bagwije ubugabo igitinyiro n’ubuhangange.
Muri iki gice tukaba tugiye kubatekerereza amateka y’igicumbi cy’umuryango mugari ufite inkomoko ku mwami Ndoba, iki kikaba ari igice gikurikiraho mu bindi bizakurikiraho mu kubatekerereza imbumbe y’imiryango migari yabayemo ibihangange ikanagira n’inzu zikomeye mu mateka y’u Rwanda.
Nk’uko tubikesha igitabo “Iyororoka ry’Abanyarwanda, inkomoko y’imiryango migari ’’ dukesha Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, inzobere mu Busizi, umuco n’amateka y’u Rwanda, tugiye kwinjira mu muryango mugari w’abakomoka kwa Ndoba, mu mavu n’amavuko yawo n’inzu z’ibihangange zawukomotseho.
Ndoba ni mwene Ndahiro Ruyange rwa Yuhi Musindi, umwami wo mu mu muryango mugari w’Abanyiginya na Monde ya Gahutu, ukomoka mu muryango mugari w’Abega, yategetse ahasaga mu wa 1213 kugeza mu wa 1246.
Ni umwami wa 5 mu bami 28 bategetse u Rwanda, akaba n’umwami wa 5 mu Berekeza 34 b’umushinga wo kubaka u Rwanda.
Umwami Ndoba ni umwe mu Bami b’u Rwanda bagize inzu z’imiryango nyinshi ugereranyije n’abandi bami, akaba ari na we wagize inzu z’imiryango ntabarika mu bami bose bamubanjirije n’abamuherutse.
Ndoba, yakomotsweho n’inzu z’imiryango zigera kuri 13 zabaye ibihangange mu mu muryango mugari w’Abanyiginya kugeza ubwo aya mateka yandikwaga na n’ubu akivugwa.
Yagize n’imimaro myinshi mu bigaragara mu gushyira mu bikorwa umushinga wo kubaka u Rwanda.
Amateka atugaragariza ko Umwami Ndoba ya Ndahiro, yabyaye abana benshi, biganjemo Abahungu 11 aribi Mujiji, Mugunga, Mukobwa, Muturagara, Munyiga, Nyamuhanzi, Mupfumfu, Cyambwe, Biharage, Cyoba na Neza.
Aba bagabo b’Intarumikwa, nibo babaye inkomoko y’inzu z’imiryango zo kwa Ndoba zikomoka mu muryango mugari w’Abanyiginya.
Inzu z’imiryango zikomoka kwa Ndoba ni:
Abanyiginya b’ABAJIJI bakomoka kuri MUJIJI wa NDOBA ;
Abanyiginya b’ABENEMUGUNGA bakomoka kuri MUGUNGA wa NDOBA;
Abanyiginya b’ABAKOBWA bakomoka kuri MUKOBWA wa NDOBA;
Abanyiginya b’ABATURAGARA bakomoka kuri MUTURAGARA wa NDOBA;
Abanyiginya b’ABENEMUNYIGA bakomoka kuri MUNYIGA wa NDOBA;
Abanyiginya b’ABENENYAMUHANZI bakomoka kuri NYAMUHANZI ya NDOBA;
Abanyiginya b’ABENEMUPFUMFU bakomoka kuri MUPFUMFU wa NDOBA
Abanyiginya b’ABENECYAMBWE bakomoka kuri CYAMBWE cya NDOBA
Abanyiginya b’ABENEBIHARAGE bakomoka kuri BIHARAGE bya NDOBA
Abanyiginya b’ABENECYOBA bakomoka kuri CYOBA cya NDOBA
Abanyiginya b’ABENENEZA bakomoka kuri NEZA ya NDOBA
Abanyiginya b’ABENEGAHAYA bakomoka kuri GAHAYA ka RWASA rwa TURAGARA ,
Abanyiginya b’ABATARE bakomoka kuri KAREMERA NTARE RUSATSI rwa SINZI wa NYAMUHANZI wa NDOBA.
Abakomoka muri iyi miryango bararumbutse cyane muri uru Rwanda, ku buryo babumbye hafi kimwe cya kabiri cy’abakomoka mu muryango mugari w’Abanyiginya.
Ngaho iyo mwama mukuru wa Ndoba mu mizi yanyu mikuru ( Urabe wumva muntu w’i Rwanda, ibyo nibyo bisekuruza by’iwanyu mu muryango wo kwa Ndoba).
Tariki 15 Gicurasi: Umunsi umwanditsi n’umunyamateka Mgr Alexis Kagame yaboneyeho izuba
Iyo aza kuba akiriho, tariki 15 Gicurasi 2020 Musenyeri Alexis Kagame wahawe akazina ka Semateka aba yujuje imyaka 108 avutse.
Iyo aza kuba akiriho, tariki 15 Gicurasi 2020 Musenyeri Alexis Kagame wahawe akazina ka Semateka aba yujuje imyaka 108 avutse.
Musenyeri Alexis Kagame, yabaye umuhanga udasanzwe, umwanditsi n’umunyamateka ukomeye, akibukirwa ku bitabo byuje ubuhanga yanditse n’ibisigo birimo Indyoheshabirayi, Inganji Karinga, Umuririmbyi wa Nyiribiremwa, Isoko y’Amajyambere n’ibindi.
Yavutse kuwa 15 Gicurasi 1912 i Kiyanza mu Buliza, ubu ni mu murenge wa Ntarabana mu Karere ka Rulindo mu Majyaruguru.
Mu myaka 69 y’ubuzima bwe, Kagame yasize umusanzu ukomeye asiga u Rwanda na Afurika bamumenye nk’umunyamateka, umuhanga mu ndimi n’umuhanga mu byo gutekereza (filozofiya).
Ubuzima bwe mu buto
Kagame yakuze ari umuhanga haba mu bitekerezo no mu mivugire, yaje kuba inshuti ya hafi y’umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa waje no kumuha uburenganzira bwo gukusanya ibitekerezo by’Abiru ngo abyandikemo igitabo.
Yatangiye kwiga mu Ishuri rya Leta Mbiligi Gatolika mu Ruhengeri mu 1925, icyo gihe yari afite imyaka 13.
Yaharangije nyuma y’imyaka itatu mu 1928, asaba kujya mu iseminari nto i Kabgayi mu karere ka Muhanga mu 1929, aharangiriza mu 1933.
Yakomeje mu iseminari nkuru ari umuhanga mu buryo budasanzwe, kugeza abaye umupadiri mu 1941.
Alexis Kagame nk’umwanditsi
Mu 1943 nibwo Kagame yasohoye igitabo cye cya mbere cyagarukaga ku mateka y’u Rwanda yise Inganji Karinga, gikurikirwa n’ibindi byinshi bigaruka no ku busizi, agenda ahuza imyemerere gakondo n’ubuzima bwa gikirisitu, ingingo yanditseho cyane.
Alexis Kagame kandi yagiye akora inyingo nyinshi zirebana n’ubusizi nyabami.
Musenyeri Kagame yifashishije ibyiciro biboneka mu rurimi rw’Ikinyarwanda agaragaza ubuhanga bw’Abanyafurika mu mitekerereze, mu bushakashatsi bwamuhesheje impamyabushobozi y’ikirenga mu bya filozofiya muri Kaminuza ya Mutagatifu Gregoire i Roma, igitabo gishingiye ku iyigandimi nyarwanda, yise “La philosophie Bantu-Rwandaise de l’être", hari mu 1956.
Agarutse mu Rwanda, yatangiye kwigisha mu iseminari asohora n’ibitabo byinshi, bitari ku mateka y’u Rwanda gusa, ahubwo bigera no ku rurimi rw’Ikinyarwanda.
Mu 1959 nyuma y’itanga ry’Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa, ingoma ya Cyami yatangiye gusa n’ivaho, ariko Alexis Kagame we kubera ibitekerezo bikomeye yari afite ntiyagira ikindi kibazo, ahubwo ahabwa kujya kwigisha muri Kaminuza Nkuru y’u Rwanda ubwo yashigwaga mu 1963.
Icyo gihe kandi yari n’umwarimu muri Kaminuza y’Igihugu ya Zaire i Lubumbashi, ubu ni muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, aho yigishaga amateka ya Afurika y’iburasirazuba n’iyo hagati.
Kuwa 5 Nyakanga mu 1979 yahawe na leta impeta y’ishimwe ubwo yagirwaga “Officier de l’ordre national des Grands lacs", ndetse amaze kugirwa igisonga cya Musenyeri muri diyosezi ya Butare muri 1980, Papa Yahani Pawulo wa II yamugize Musenyeri w’icyubahiro ku ya 4 Nyakanga 1981, aba Musenyeri atyo nubwo atari umwepisikopi nk’abo tuzi ubu.
Kuwa 2 Ukuboza 1981 nibwo Musenyeri Alexis Kagame yitabye Imana aguye mu bitaro by’i Nairobi muri Kenya aho yari yagiye kwivuza, ndetse umurambo we leta yishingira kuwuzana mu Rwanda kubera agaciro yari afite mu gihugu.
Kagame yabaye mu Nama y’Ubuyobozi bwa Rwanda-Urundi kuva muri 1956 kugeza ku bwigenge bw’u Rwanda.
Uretse ibihembo mpuzamahanga, kuwa 3 Nzeri 2014, Musenyeri Alexis Kagame yashyikirijwe igihembo n’Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco cyiswe “Igihembo Cya Akademi", cyashyizweho hagamijwe gushima abantu bakora ibikorwa by’indashyikirwa mu kubungabunga ubusugire n’iterambere by’ururimi n’umuco by’u Rwanda.

U Rwanda rwakajije ingamba mu gukumira ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, aho nk’abantu baba mu Rwanda bari mu mahanga bemerewe gutaha ariko bagera mu gihugu bagahita bashyirwa mu kato k’iminsi irindwi bari ahantu hateganyijwe biyishyurira serivisi zose, indi minsi irindwi bakayimara bari mu kato mu ngo zabo ariko nabwo bakurikiranwa n’inzego z’ubuzima.

Abashakashatsi bagaragaje ibibi byo kwambikwa udupfukamunwa abana bari munsi y’imyaka ibiri
Abashakashatsi bo mu ishyirahamwe ry’abavuzi b’abana mu Buyapani, bagaragaje ko nubwo muri iki gihe abantu bose bambara udupfukamunwa kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, atari byiza kutwambika abana bari munsi y’imyaka ibiri.
Abashakashatsi bo mu ishyirahamwe ry’abavuzi b’abana mu Buyapani, bagaragaje ko nubwo muri iki gihe abantu bose bambara udupfukamunwa kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, atari byiza kutwambika abana bari munsi y’imyaka ibiri.
Aba baganga baburiye ababyeyi bababwira ko ari bibi kwambika udupfukamunwa abana bato kuko dutuma bagorwa no guhumeka, kugaragaza impinduka mu isura ndetse no kugaragaza ibyo batekereza cyangwa ibyiyumviro byayo.
Agapfukamunwa kandi ngo kongerera umwana ibyago byo gututubikana ndetse kakaba katuma ibihaha bye bidakora neza.
Umwana kandi ashobora kunanirwa guhumeka by’umwihariko nk’igihe yarutse mu gapfukamunwa.
Abashakashatsi bagaragaje ko abana bafite ibyago bike byo kwandura Coronavirus bityo atari ngombwa ko abari munsi y’imyaka ibiri bambikwa udupfukamunwa.

Abanduye COVID-19 muri Kenya bageze ku 1214; uko mu bindi bihugu bihana imbibi n’u Rwanda byifashe
Abantu 1214 nibo bamaze kwandura COVID-19 muri Kenya nyuma y’uko iyi mibare yiyongereye kuri iki cyumweru kubera abantu bashya 22 bagaragaweho iki cyorezo bituma iki gihugu kiba icyibasiwe cyane muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba.
Abantu 1214 nibo bamaze kwandura COVID-19 muri Kenya nyuma y’uko iyi mibare yiyongereye kuri iki cyumweru kubera abantu bashya 22 bagaragaweho iki cyorezo bituma iki gihugu kiba icyibasiwe cyane muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba.
Abo 22 bagaragaweho Coronavirus bari hagati y’imyaka 24 na 73, muri bo 17 ni abagabo mu gihe batanu ari abagore.
Umubare munini ni abaturuka i Nairobi.
Abamaze gukira iki cyorezo muri iki gihugu ni 383 mu gihe abamaze gupfa bo biyongereyemo umuntu umwe bakagera kuri 51.
Mu bindi bihugu byo mu Karere, u Rwanda rumaze kugira abantu 327 banduye na 237 bakize.
Tanzania yo imaze ibyumweru bibiri idatangaza amakuru mashya kur iyi ndwara ariko imibare iheruka ku wa 8 Gicurasi yagaragazaga ko abanduye ari 509 mu gihe abapfuye bari 21 naho abakize ari 183.
Mu Burundi naho imibare iheruka ku wa 18 Gicurasi, igaragaza ko abantu 42 aribo banduye Coronavirus, umwe agapfa naho abakize bari 20.
Muri Uganda ho abamaze kwandura ni 198, abakize ni 68, nta n’umwe urapfa.
Muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo ho imibare y’abamaze kwandura ni 2141, abapfuye ni 63 mu gihe abamaze gukira ari 317, bituma kiba igihugu cyibasiwe cyane n’iki cyorezo mu bihana imbibi n’u Rwanda.

Afurika y’Epfo yatangiye kugerageza uko urukingo rw’igituntu rwakwifashishwa mu kurwanya Coronavirus
Laboratwari yo muri Afurika y’Epfo yatangiye igerageza ryo kureba niba urukingo rusanzwe rukoreshwa mu guhashya indwara y’igituntu rwanifashishwa mu guhangana na Coronavirus.
Laboratwari yo muri Afurika y’Epfo yatangiye igerageza ryo kureba niba urukingo rusanzwe rukoreshwa mu guhashya indwara y’igituntu rwanifashishwa mu guhangana na Coronavirus.
Itsinda ryo muri Afurika y’Epfo riherutse gutangiza igerageza rya mbere muri Afurika, aho abakozi 250 bafite ibyago biri hejuru byo kwandura bahawe urukingo rwa Bacille Calmette-Guérin (BCG).
Ubu harimo kurebwa niba baba bafite ubwirinzi kuri Coronavirus kurenza abatararuhawe.
Iri gerageza biteganyijwe ko rizamara umwaka umwe, rizakorerwa ku bagera ku 3000 bo mu nzego z’ubuzima muri Afurika y’Epfo.
Ibyavuyemo by’ibanze bizamenyekana mu mezi atandatu uhereye igihe ryatangirijwe.
Igitekerezo cyo kugerageza ko BCG yahangana na Coronavirus ntabwo cyatangiriye muri Afurika y’Epfo, kuko uru rukingo rusanzwe rukoreshwa muri Afurika havurwa igituntu ndetse rukaba rwaranageragejwe mu Buholandi na Australie, harebwa ko wavura Coronavirus.
Muri Afurika y’Epfo, abana bategetswe guhabwa uru rukingo rw’igituntu, bivuze ko uruterwa biba ari inshuro ya kabiri, mu gihe mu Buholandi na Australie biba ari ubwa mbere.
Abo bashakashatsi bo mu Bufaransa nabo baherutse kugaragaza ko bateganya gukoresha urukingo rwa Bacille Calmette-Guérin (BCG) mu guhangana na Coronavirus, ariko bakabanza kurupimira ku bantu.
Mu kiganiro kuri Televiziyo ya LCI yo mu Bufaransa, Umuyobozi w’Ishami ry’Ubuvuzi mu Bitaro bya Cochin i Paris, Prof Jean Paul Mira n’Umushakashatsi mu Kigo gishinzwe Ubuzima n’Ubushakashatsi mu by’Ubuvuzi mu Bufaransa (Inserm), Prof Camille Locht, batanze igitekerezo cy’uko igeragezwa ry’urwo rukingo ryabanza gukorerwa muri Afurika.
Camille Locht yagize ati ‘‘Hari aho byagaragaye ko Bacille Calmette-Guérin (BCG) ifite ubushobozi bwo guhangana n’indwara z’ubuhumekero nk’igituntu, ibicurane nk’uko byagaragajwe mu nyigo zitandukanye.
Abakize COVID-19 biyongereyeho icumi bagera kuri 237, babiri nibo banduye mu 1400 bapimwe
Imibare mishya ya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yagaragaje ko ubwandu bushya bwa Coronavirus mu Rwanda kuri iki Cyumweru ari abantu babiri bituma umubare w’abamaze kwandura iki cyorezo uba 327 naho abakize bagera kuri 237 nyuma y’icumi bakize.
Imibare mishya ya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yagaragaje ko ubwandu bushya bwa Coronavirus mu Rwanda kuri iki Cyumweru ari abantu babiri bituma umubare w’abamaze kwandura iki cyorezo uba 327 naho abakize bagera kuri 237 nyuma y’icumi bakize.
Kuri iki Cyumweru tariki ya 24 Gicurasi, hafashwe ibipimo 1400 bya Coronavirus, muri bo, abantu babiri nibo basanganywe iki cyorezo.
Ibipimo byose bimaze gufatwa bimaze kugera ku 58477 byagaragayemo abantu 327 banduye.
Ibipimo byafashwe uyu munsi ni byinshi ugereranyije n’ibyari byafashwe ku munsi w’ejo kuko bwo hari hapimwe abantu 1109.
Kugeza ubu umubare munini w’ubwandu bwa COVID-19 mu Rwanda uturuka ku bantu baba baturutse mu mahanga, aho biganjemo abatwara amakamyo baturuka mu bihugu bihana imbibi n’u Rwanda.
Nko kuri uyu wa Gatandatu, abantu bane basanzwemo Coronavirus ni abashoferi b’amakamyo yambukiranya imipaka, bahise bakurikiranwa bacyinjira mu gihugu.
U Rwanda rukomeje gukaza ingamba mu gukumira ikwirakwira ry’iki cyorezo, aho nk’abantu baba mu Rwanda bari mu mahanga bemerewe gutaha ariko bagera mu gihugu bagahita bashyirwa mu kato k’iminsi irindwi bari ahantu hateganyijwe biyishyurira serivisi zose, indi minsi irindwi bakayimara bari mu kato mu ngo zabo ariko nabwo bakurikiranwa n’inzego z’ubuzima.
Ni mu gihe ubu kwambara agapfukamunwa byamaze kuba ibwirizwa rusange ku muntu wese ugiye mu ruhame ari nako abantu basabwe kwirinda kujya mu kivunge ahubwo n’aho bari bakaba batandukanye ku buryo amahirwe yo kwanduzanya aba ari make.

Ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko hydroxychloroquine yongerera abarwaye Coronavirus ibyago byo gupfa
Ubushakashatsi bushya bwagaragaje ko nubwo hakomeje kuvugwa ibyo kuvura Coronavirus hakoreshejwe imiti ya hydroxychloroquine uvura Malaria cyangwa Chloroquine, nta nyigo iragaragaza ko ikora neza, ahubwo ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko biteza ibyago birimo urupfu.
Ubushakashatsi bushya bwagaragaje ko nubwo hakomeje kuvugwa ibyo kuvura Coronavirus hakoreshejwe imiti ya hydroxychloroquine uvura Malaria cyangwa Chloroquine, nta nyigo iragaragaza ko ikora neza, ahubwo ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko biteza ibyago birimo urupfu.
Mu bushakashatsi bwatangajwe kuri uyu wa Gatanu mu kinyamakuru cy’ibijyanye n’ubuvuzi, The Lancet, abashakashatsi bagaragaje ko abantu barembye cyane kubera COVID-19 bavuwe hakoreshejwe hydroxychloroquine na chloroquine, ibyago byo gupfa byiyongereye kimwe n’ihinduka ry’imiterere y’umutima, ibizwi nka ‘arrhythmia’.
Abashakashatsi bagenzuye abarwayi 96 000 bo mu bitaro 671 byo ku migabane itandatu y’Isi, bashyizwe mu bitaro hagati ya tariki 20 Ukuboza 2019 na 14 Mata 2020 kubera Coronavirus.
Abashyizwe mu bushakashatsi bari baravuye mu bitaro basezerewe cyangwa bapfuye mbere ya tariki 21 Mata 2020.
Muri abo harimo 65.
9% bo muri Amerika ya Ruguru, 17.
3% bo mu Burayi, 7.
9% bo muri Aziya, 4.
6% bo muri Afurika, 3.
7% bo muri Amerika y’Epfo na 0.
6% bo muri Australia.
Mu basaga ibihumbi 96 bari mu bitaro, abagera kuri 11.
1% baguye mu bitaro.
Hafatwaga abantu nibura mu masaha 48 bageze kwa muganga bagahabwa umuti wa chloroquine wonyine cyangwa chloroquine na Macrolide (umuti ukoreshwa mu kurwanya udukoko mu mubiri cyangwa antibiotique zirimo Clarithromycin, Azithromycin, Fidoximycin na Erythromycin); hydroxychloroquine yonyine cyangwa hydroxychloroquine hamwe na Macrolide; abatarahawe umuti n’umwe muri iyo ine.
Mu igenzura havanwemo abahawe imiti nyuma y’amasaha yarengaga 48 bageze mu bitaro cyangwa se bakayihabwa barembye cyane bashyizwe ku mwuka kimwe n’abarwayi bahawe umuti wa remdesivir.
Abashakashatsi bagize bati “Ibyavuyemo by’ibanze ni uko abantu baguye mu bitaro no kugira ibibazo by’ugutera k’umutima.
Mu gihe cyakorewemo ubushakashatsi hashyizwe mu bitaro abantu 96 032 bari bujuje ibisabwa mu bushakashatsi, barimo 14 888 bahawe imiti.
Abantu 1868 bahawe chloroquine, 3783 bahabwa chloroquine na macrolide, 3016 bahabwa hydroxychloroquine, naho 6221 bahabwa hydroxychloroquine na macrolide.
Abandi 81144 bo bakurikiranwe ku bundi buryo.
Imibare yerekanye ko mu bantu bavurwaga, abagera ku 10 698 bangana na 11.
1% bapfuye, bitandukanye n’abandi bitabwagaho batari ku miti kuko bo hapfuye 9.
Ubushakashatsi bukomeza buti “Nta kimenyetso na kimwe twabonye cy’inyungu yo gukoresha hydroxychloroquine cyangwa chloroquine yaba ikoreshejwe yonyine cyangwa se ikoreshejwe hamwe na macrolide.
Inyigo zabanje zakorwaga ku bantu bake cyane cyangwa inyigo nto zitarangira.
Ubwo buryo uko ari bune basanze bufitanye isano n’umubare munini w’abantu baguye mu bitaro.
Nibura umurwayi umwe muri 11 mu itsinda ryitabwagaho mu bundi buryo yaguye mu bitaro.
Nyamara mu bahabwaga imiti, umwe mu barwayi batandatu wahawe chloroquine cyangwa hydroxychloroquine yonyine yaguye mu bitaro.
Naho umurwayi umwe muri batanu bavuwe hakoreshejwe chloroquine yongeweho antibiotic yarapfuye, mu gihe umurwayi umwe muri bane bavuwe hakoreshejwe hydroxychloroquine yongeweho antibiotic yapfuye.
Muri ubwo bushakashatsi, Umuganga w’indwara z’umutima wo mu Bitaro bya Kaminuza ya Zurich, Dr.
Frank Ruschitzka, yavuze ko habuze ibimenyetso bigaragaza ibyiza by’iyo miti, ariko ubushakashatsi burakomeje.
Yakomeje ati “Ariko, ubu dushingiye ku nyigo yacu tuzi ko amahirwe yo kuba iyi miti yafasha umuntu urwaye COVID-19 ari make.
Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko abantu bahawe hydroxychloroquine, ibyago byo gupfa byiyongereyeho 34 naho ibyago by’indwara z’umutima byiyongeraho 137 ku ijana.
Ku bahawe hydroxychloroquine hamwe na antibiotique, ibyago byo gupfa byiyongereyeho 45 ku ijana naho iby’indwara z’umutima byiyongeraho 411 ku ijana.
Ni mu gihe abahawe chloroquine ibyago byo gupfa byiyongereyeho 37 ku ijana naho iby’indwara z’umutima byiyongeraho 256 ku ijana naho abafashe chloroquine na antibiotic, ibyago byo gupfa byiyongereyeho 37 ku ijana maho ibyago by’indwara z’umutima bizamukaho 301 ku ijana.

Leta yatangiye gupima Coronavirus mu bamotari mbere y’uko basubira mu muhanda
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangiye gupima abamotari icyorezo cya Coronavirus, mbere y’uko tariki 1 Kamena 2020 igera ngo basubukure umurimo wabo wo gutwara abagenzi.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangiye gupima abamotari icyorezo cya Coronavirus, mbere y’uko tariki 1 Kamena 2020 igera ngo basubukure umurimo wabo wo gutwara abagenzi.
Inama y’Abaminisitiri yo ku wa 18 Gicurasi 2020 yemeje ko ingendo zihuza Intara n’Umujyi wa Kigali zizongera gusubukurwa ku wa 1 Kamena, ndetse ko ari na wo munsi moto zitwara abantu zizemererwa kongera gukora.
Mu gihe habura iminsi ibarirwa ku ntoki ngo moto zongere gutwara abagenzi, kuri uyu wa Kabiri bamwe mu bamotari bapimwe Coronavirus, kugira ngo hirindwe ko bazaba intandaro yo gukwirakwiza iki cyorezo.
Minisitiri w’Ubuzima Dr Ngamije Daniel, yavugiye kuri televiziyo y’igihugu ko igituma abamotari bari gusuzumwa ari uko bizwi ko bazahura n’abantu benshi, bityo akaba ari ngombwa ko hamenywa uko bahagaze mbere yo gutangira imirimo yabo.
Ati “Turashaka rero kugira itsinda risaga nka 1000 banyanyagiye mu mujyi ahangaha, buri gihe tuzajya dusuzuma turebe muri bo niba nta wanduye kuko bazaduha amakuru niba nta cyorezo cyaba kiri mu baturage, kuko ukuntu bagenda bahura n’abantu babatwara, nihagira umumotari wandura bizaduha amakuru y’uko hari ikibazo kiri mu baturage".
Yakomeje agira ati “Twabasuzumye, ubu twabifashe nk’igipimo fatizo muri kiriya cyiciro cy’abamotari, tuzabikurikirana buri gihe kugira ngo turebe uko icyorezo cyaba gihagaze mu Mujyi wa Kigali ndetse n’ahandi.
Minisitiri Ngamije avuga ko gusuzuma abamotari kandi bigamije kumenya uko ubwandu buhagaze muri bo, aho hafashwe ibipimo bimwe hagendewe ku myaka, aho batuye, ku buryo bizatanga ishusho y’uko icyorezo cyaba gihagaze mu bamotari.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda, CP Kabera Jean Bosco, yavuze ko hari umuco abamotari bakwiye kujyana ku itariki ya 1 Kamena 2020, wo gukaraba intoki, kwambara agapfukamunwa no kubahiriza intera.
Ati “Bagomba kumva ko uwo muti wo gukaraba intoki bawufite, icya kabiri ni uguhana intera.
kumva ko bagomba kwambara agapfukamunwa.
Nibajyane umuco wo kumva ko amasaha yashyizweho ntarengwa yo kuba bavuye mu muhanda ari umuco".
Umuyobozi wa Ferwacotamo, Ngarambe Daniel, yavuze ko abamotari biteguye yaba mu buryo bazahagarara neza muri metero imwe, gukaraba ndetse no kugendana umuti wo gukaraba ‘alcohol’, ku buryo umugenzi ashobora gukaraba ndetse ugapuriza muri casque.
Ati “Ibyo byose turi kubitegura ku buryo uzatega moto azaba yumva ko ubwirinzi buhari kandi ntagire impungenge ko ashobora kwandura ari kuri moto, kubigisha uburyo bashobora kuzaba bafite agapfukamunwa n’umugenzi utagafite ntibamutware".
Ngarambe yavuze ko hari uburyo buzakoreshwa mu kwishyura moto bwa ‘cashless’, aho hari uburyo bwo gushyira mubazi kuri moto ku buryo izajya yereka umugenzi amafaranga agiye kwishyura noneho hagakoreshwa ikoranabuhanga umuntu adafata amafaranga mu ntoki.

Ibipimo bimaze gufatwa ni 60 443.

Abahanga bagaragaje ko abari munsi y’imyaka 20 baba bafite amahirwe make ari ku kigero cya 56% yo kwandura Coronavirus kurusha abarengeje iyo myaka.
Umwarimu muri UCL Great Ormond Street Institute, Ishuri ryigisha Ubuzima bw’Abana, Russell Viner, yatangaje ko ibimenyetso bigaragaza ko “abana ari itsinda ritekanye" kuko bafite ikigereranyo kiri hasi cyo kwandura Coronavirus ndetse ko n’amahirwe yo kwicwa nayo ari make cyane.
Abashakashatsi bagenzuye inyandiko z’amapaji ibihumbi bitandatu zakoreweho ubushakashatsi kuri iyi ndwara, zirimo zimwe zatangajwe mu binyamakuru bitangarizwamo ubushakashatsi ku ndwara, zirimo 18 zivuga by’umwihariko ku bana n’uburyo babasha guhangana n’iyi virus.
Icyenda muri izo nyandiko zo zakoze ubushakashatsi bwimbitse bugaragaza uburyo iyi ndwara iherekanywa umuntu ku wundi.
Bumwe muri ubwo bushakashatsi bugaragaza ko mu ngo 31, eshatu zonyine arizo byagaragaye ko abazibamo banduye bandujwe n’abana.
Bayern Munich yegukanye igikombe cya Shampiyona y’u Budage ku nshuro ya munani yikurikiranya
Igitego cyatsinzwe na rutahizamu Robert Lendawoski, cyafashije Bayern Munich gutsinda Werder Bremen 1-0, yegukana igikombe cya shampiyona y’icyiciro cya mbere mu Budage ‘Bundesliga’ ku nshuro ya munani yikurikiranya.
Igitego cyatsinzwe na rutahizamu Robert Lendawoski, cyafashije Bayern Munich gutsinda Werder Bremen 1-0, yegukana igikombe cya shampiyona y’icyiciro cya mbere mu Budage ‘Bundesliga’ ku nshuro ya munani yikurikiranya.
Robert Lewandowski yatsinze iki gitego ku munota wa 43 ku mupira yaherejwe na Jérôme Boateng.
Bayern Munich yatsindaga umukino wa 11 yikurikiranya, yagize amanota 76 mu mikino 32 ndetse ishyiramo ikinyuranyo cy’amanota 10 hagati yayo na Borussia Dortmund isigaranye imikino itatu.
Muri uyu mukino wabereye mu muhezo kubera amabwiriza yo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, Bayern Munich yawusoje ari abakinnyi 10 nyuma y’uko Alphonso Davies yahawe amakarita abiri y’umuhondo yavuyemo ikarita itukura.
Igitego cya Lewandowski cyamufashije kugeza ibitego 31, byinshi byatsinzwe n’umunyamahanga mu mwaka umwe wa shampiyona y’u Budage.
Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang kuri ubu ukinira Arsenal, yabitsinze akinira Borussia Dortmund mu mwaka w’imikino wa 2016/17.
Uyu mwaka w’imikino wa 2019/20, Bayern Munich yari yawutangiranye ibihe bikomeye, aho yigeze gutsindwa na Eintracht Frankfurt ibitego 5-1, ikagera ku mwanya wa kane irushwa amanota ane na Borussia Monchengladbach yayoboye shampiyona mu ntangiriro.
Ibi byatumye umutoza Niko Kovač yirukanwa nyuma y’amezi 16, asimburwa Hansi Flick wahawe ikipe by’agateganyo mbere yo gusinya amasezerano nk’umutoza mukuru kugeza muri Mata 2023.
Bayern Munich izakina kandi umukino wa nyuma w’Igikombe cy’Igihugu izahuriramo na Bayer Leverkusen tariki ya 4 Nyakanga i Berlin, mu gihe muri UEFA Champions League izahura na Chelsea mu mukino wa 1/8 wo kwishyura, ni nyuma y’uko yari yatsinze umukino ubanza ku bitego 3-0.
Igikombe cya Afurika cya 2021 gishobora gusubikwa
Gusubika imikino ya nyuma y’Igikombe cya Afurika cya 2021 ni imwe mu ngingo izigwaho mu nama y’Impuzamashyirahamwe y’Umupira w’Amaguru muri Afurika (CAF) izaterana mu cyumweru gitaha ku wa 30 Kamena nyuma y’uko amarushanwa menshi asubitswe bitewe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi.
Gusubika imikino ya nyuma y’Igikombe cya Afurika cya 2021 ni imwe mu ngingo izigwaho mu nama y’Impuzamashyirahamwe y’Umupira w’Amaguru muri Afurika (CAF) izaterana mu cyumweru gitaha ku wa 30 Kamena nyuma y’uko amarushanwa menshi asubitswe bitewe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi.
Bteganyijwe ko Igikombe cya Afurika (CAN 2021) kizabera muri Cameroun kuva tariki ya 9 Mutarama kugeza ku ya 6 Gashyantare ariko birasa naho bishobora guhinduka bitewe n’uko igihe gikomeje kugabanuka.
Kugeza ubu hamaze gukinwa iminsi ibiri gusa mu matsinda yo gushaka itike yo gukina iri rushanwa ndetse byitezwe ko umupira w’amaguru uhuza ibihugu utazasubukurwa mbere y’Ukwakira kuri uyu mugabane bitewe na COVID-19.
Komite Nyobozi ya CAF izaterana mu cyumweru gitaha, ku wa Kabiri, hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga ry’amashusho, niyo izemeza ikizakorwa ndetse ishyireho uburyo bwo gusoza amarushanwa abiri ahuza amakipe kuri uyu mugabane.
Icyemezo FIFA yafashe ku wa Kane cyo gukuraho imikino mpuzamahanga yagombaga kuba muri Nzeri uretse mu Burayi na Amerika y’Epfo, cyasize CAF isigaranye amatariki make yo gusoza imikino yo gushaka itike ya CAN 2021 izahuza amakipe 24.
Haracyasigaye imikino ine muri buri tsinda nubwo ishobora gukinwa mu Ukwakira n’Ugushyingo, ariko byaba bivuze ko itangira ry’imikino yo gushaka itike y’Igikombe cy’Isi cya 2022 ryaba risubitswe.
Hari kandi umutwaro gukina Igikombe cya Afurika muri Mutarama bishobora gushyira ku marushanwa y’imbere mu bihugu kuko byasaba ko amenshi ahagarara bitewe n’uburyo uyu mwaka w’imikino wa 2019/20 wangijwe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Umwe mu bayobozi ba CAF wasabye ko amazina ye atatangazwa, yabwiye Ibiro Ntaramakuru by’Abongereza (Reuters) ko “CAN ishobora kwigizwa inyuma ho amezi 12", ni mu gihe Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa CAF, Abdelmounaim Bah, mu cyumweru gishize yabwiye itangazamakuru ko uburyo bwiza bushoboka ari uko CAN 2021 izaguma ku matariki yemejwe.
CAF Champions League na CAF Confederation Cup ni amarushanwa yahagaze ageze muri ½ ndetse Impuzamashyirahamwe y’Umupira w’Amaguru muri Afurika igomba gushaka uburyo asozwamo mu gihe kuri ubu ingendo z’indege zafunzwe n’ibikorwa b’imikino bikaba bitemerewe gukorwa ahenshi kuri uyu mugabane.
CAF igomba kandi gufata icyemezo niba CHAN 2020 yagombaga kubera muri Cameroun muri Mata izakurwaho burundu.
Hazafatwa kandi icyemezo ku Gikombe cya Afurika cy’Abagore cyagombaga kuba mu Ugushyingo ariko kugeza ubu imikino yo gushaka itike ikaba itararangiye.
Kuri iri rushanwa, birasa naho rishobora gukurwaho kuko CAF itarabona igihugu kizaryakira nyuma y’uko Congo yari kuryakira, yakuyemo ubusabe bwayo muri Nyakanga umwaka ushize.
Amagaju FC yihaye intego yo kuzamuka, yatangiye guhuza abakunzi bayo yifashishije umwambaro w’abafana
Ubuyobozi bw’Ikipe ya Amagaju FC buvuga ko mu rwego rwo guhuriza hamwe abakunzi bayo, bwatumije hanze umwambaro w’abafana kugira ngo babashe gutera inkunga ikipe yabo ndetse bibafashe kumenya neza aho baherereye.
Ubuyobozi bw’Ikipe ya Amagaju FC buvuga ko mu rwego rwo guhuriza hamwe abakunzi bayo, bwatumije hanze umwambaro w’abafana kugira ngo babashe gutera inkunga ikipe yabo ndetse bibafashe kumenya neza aho baherereye.
Ku wa Gatandatu w’icyumweru gishize nibwo Amagaju FC yo mu Cyiciro cya Kabiri, yatangije igikorwa cyo kugurisha imyambaro y’abafana, ubundi kidakunze kugaragara mu makipe yo mu Rwanda.
Umuyobozi w’Ikipe y’Amagaju, Mukiza Emile, yabwiye IGIHE ko kuva batangije iki gikorwa, abamaze gusaba uyu mwambaro basaga 50 ndetse bakomeje kwiyongera.
Ati “Ni imyambaro twatumijeho hanze mbere ya COVID-19 kugira ngo tubashe guha ingufu za fan club [amatsinda y’abafana] zacu kuko hari abantu baba bakurikira ikipe ariko ntaho bahurira nayo.
Ni uburyo buzafasha ikipe busanga ubwo kugura ikarita y’umunyamuryango.
“Ngira ngo ni ubwa mbere Ikipe y’Amagaju igize umwambaro w’abafana kuko wasangaga buri umwe ashaka akambaro k’umuhondo akaba ariko yambara.
Ntabwo tureba agaciro k’umwambaro ahubwo biradufasha kumenya abo bafana niba ari 500 tumenye aho bari, nishira tuzatumiza n’iyindi.
Imyambaro Amagaju FC yatumije harimo ifite agaciro k’ibihumbi 10 Frw, ibihumbi 50 Frw n’ibihumbi 100 Frw.
Yabaye ikipe ya gatatu mu Rwanda ifite umwambaro umwe uhuriweho n’abafana bose, nyuma ya Kiyovu Sports na AS Muhanga zo mu Cyiciro cya Mbere.
Amagaju FC afite intego yo kugaruka mu Cyiciro cya Mbere
Hashize umwaka umwe Amagaju FC isubiye mu Cyiciro cya Kabiri, ariko muri uyu mwaka w’imikino yisanze mu makipe azakina Playoffs.
Mukiza yabwiye IGIHE ko nubwo iyi kipe nayo yagezweho n’ingaruka z’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, batangiye kuvugana n’abakinnyi ndetse bari kubakurikirana kugira ngo imikino nisubukurwa bazabe biteguye.
Ati “Twabanaga n’abakinnyi, tubakurikiranira hamwe, COVID ije baguma mu rugo, ariko ubu turi kubakurikirana kuva mu byumweru bitatu bishize.
Twaganiriye n’umutoza atubwira ko hari imyitozo ishoboka ku mukinnyi ku giti cye, abaha gahunda buri munsi, n’abafite ibibazo bitandukanye bakamubwira.
Muri uyu mwaka w’imikino wa 2019/20, Amagaju FC yasoje imikino yo mu itsinda A ari ku mwanya wa gatanu n’amanota 13, ariko azakina Playoffs kubera ko Aspor Ltd ya gatatu itujuje ibyangombwa biyemerera kuzamuka mu cyiciro cya mbere.
Victor Osimhen yegukanye igihembo cy’umukinnyi mwiza w’Umunyafurika muri Shampiyona y’u Bufaransa
Umunya-Nigeria Victor Osimhen ni we wegukanye igihembo cyitiriwe umunya-Cameroun Marc-Vivien Foé witabye Imana mu 2003 aguye mu kibuga.
Umunya-Nigeria Victor Osimhen ni we wegukanye igihembo cyitiriwe umunya-Cameroun Marc-Vivien Foé witabye Imana mu 2003 aguye mu kibuga.
Igihembo cyitiriwe Marc-Vivien Foé cyashyizweho na RFI mu 2009 mbere yo gufatanya na France 24 kugitegura mu 2011, gihabwa umukinnyi w’Umunyafurika witwaye neza kurusha abandi mu bakina muri shampiyona y’icyiciro cya mbere mu Bufaransa ‘Ligue 1’.
Ku majwi 284, Umunya-Nigeria Victor Osimhen ukinira Lille LOSC ni we wegukanye icy’uyu mwaka wa 2020 ahigitse Umunya-Algèrie Islam Slimani wa AS Monaco n’umunya-Maroc Yunis Abdelhamid wa Stade de Reims.
Uyu rutahizamu w’imyaka 21 n’amezi atandatu, usimbuye Umunya-Côte d’Ivoire Nicolas Pépé wegukanye iki gihembo mu mwaka ushize, yabaye umukinnyi muto w’Umunyafurika witwaye neza muri Ligue 1.
Ibitego 13 yatsinze mu mwaka ushize w’imikino akanatanga imipira ine yavuyemo ibitego kuri bagenzi be mu mikino 27, byamuhesheje kugira amanota 284 arushije Islam Slimani w’imyaka 32 na Yunis Abdelhamid w’imyaka 32.
Victor Osimhen yabaye umukinnyi wa gatanu wa Lille wegukanye iki gihembo mu nshuro 12 kimaze gutangwamo, nyuma ya Gervinho (2010, 2011), Vincent Enyeama (2014), Sofiane Boufal (2016) na Nicolas Pépé (2019).
Abantu 79 barimo abanyamakuru, abakurikirana umupira cyane n’abahoze ari abakinnyi nibo batoye uhabwa igihembo cy’uyu mwaka wa 2020, aho buri wese yahitagamo abakinnyi batatu.
Uwa mbere yahabwaga amanota atanu, uwa kabiri atatu mu gihe uwa gatatu yahabwaga inota rimwe.

Rutahizamu Songa Isaïe yafashe icyemezo cyo gutandukana na Police FC nyuma y’imyaka itanu yari amaze ayikinira.
Rutahizamu Songa Isaïe yafashe icyemezo cyo gutandukana na Police FC nyuma y’imyaka itanu yari amaze ayikinira.
Songa Isaïe, impanga ya Muganza Isaac ukinira Gasogi United, yageze muri Police mu mpeshyi ya 2015 avuye muri AS Kigali.
Uyu mukinnyi wari usigaje umwaka umwe ku masezerano yari afitanye na Police FC, yatangaje ko yamaze gutandukana nayo kuko atabonaga umwanya uhagije wo gukina.
Ati “Ntabwo nkiri umukinnyi wa Police FC.
Mu myaka itanu twabanye sinahava ntashimiye buri umwe wanshyigikiye yaba abafana banjye n’aba Police FC, kuko igihe kiragera ugashaka uko wahindura, ukareba n’uko ahandi hameze.
Songa Isaïe yakundaga kuba muri ba rutahizamu batsinze ibitego byinshi gusa ntiyahiriwe mu mwaka ushize w’imikino, aho yakinaga rimwe na rimwe asimbuye.
Mu mwaka w’imikino wa 2014/15 ni we watsinze ibitego byinshi (14) ubwo yakiniraga AS Kigali.
Songa Isaïe yakiniye SEC Ademy na Isonga FC mbere yo kwerekeza muri APR FC yakiniye mu mwaka w’imikino wa 2013/14 nyuma ikamurekura.
We n’impanga ye, Muganza Isaac, bombi batangiye guhamagarwa mu Ikipe y’Igihugu ‘Amavubi’ muri Werurwe 2015 ubwo u Rwanda rwiteguraga guhura na Zambia mu mukino wa gicuti.
Uko LeBron James yabaye umunyamigabane mu ikipe ya Liverpool
LeBron James ufite izina rikomeye muri Shampiyona ya Basketaball muri Amerika, NBA, ni umwe mu bifatanyije na Liverpool kwishimira igikombe cya Premier League yegukanye ku wa Kane.

LeBron James ni umwe mu bakinnyi bakomeye muri NBA.
Yegukanye igikombe cy’iyi shampiyona inshuro eshatu mu gihe yatowe nk’umukinnyi w’umwaka (MVP) inshuro enye.
Umutungo we awukomora mu kwamamariza sosiyete zitandukanye zirimo Nike ndetse n’abandi bafatanyabikorwa nka Beats Electronics.
Ni ryari LeBron James yatangiye gukorana na Liverpool?
Uyu mukinnyi wa LA Lakers muri NBA, yatangiye gukorana na Liverpool mu 2011 ubwo yaguraga 2% by’imigabane bifite agaciro ka miliyoni 5.
28£ binyuze muri sosiyete ya Fenway Sports Group (FSG) ndetse kuri ubu bivugwa ko kazamutse kakaba kageze kuri miliyoni 26£.
Ibi byabaye ubwo yakiniraga Miami Heat, atangira gukorana na sosiyete ya FSG yari yaraguze Liverpool ubundi yari ifitwe na George Gillett na Tom Hicks- ibi ni byo byatumye na we agiramo imigabane mito.
Ubwo aya makuru yajyaga ahagaragara, LeBron James yagize ati “Nshimishijwe no gukorana n’abashinze FSG [John Henry na Tom Werner].
Aba bagabo, kimwe nanjye, bafite umuhamagaro wo gukora muri siporo.
Icyo gihe, LeBron James yagereranyije Liverpool n’amakipe arimo Dallas Cowboys, New York Yankees na Manchester United yari mu afite agaciro kari hejuru ku isoko icyo gihe.
Kugera ku mukino wa nyuma wa UEFA Champions League mu 2018 no kwegukana iri rushanwa mu 2019, byazamuye agakiro ka Liverpool nk’uko byagaragajwe n’urubuga rwa Forbes.
Nubwo atari kenshi ajya ku mikino yayo, LeBron James yagiye Anfield ubwo iyi kipe yakinaga na Manchester United mu 2011.
James yatambagijwe stade ya Liverpool ahura n’abakinnyi Luis Suárez na Steven Gerard ndetse na Kenny Dalglish waherukaga kuyihesha igikombe cya shampiyona mu 1990.
Abakinnyi ba FC Barcelone bashwanye n’umutoza Quique Setién nyuma yo gutakaza umwanya wa mbere
Abakinnyi ba FC Barcelone bateranye amagambo n’umutoza Quique Setién mu rwambariro nyuma y’uko banganyije na Celta Vigo ibitego 2-2, bigatuma iyi kipe itakaza icyizere cyo gusubirana umwanya wa mbere.
Abakinnyi ba FC Barcelone bateranye amagambo n’umutoza Quique Setién mu rwambariro nyuma y’uko banganyije na Celta Vigo ibitego 2-2, bigatuma iyi kipe itakaza icyizere cyo gusubirana umwanya wa mbere.
Ku nshuro ya kabiri, FC Barcelone yananiwe gutsinda Celta Vigo iri mu makipe ashobora kumanuka mu cyiciro cya kabiri, bituma Real Madrid ifata umwanya wa mbere ishyizemo ikinyuranyo cy’amanota abiri nyuma y’uko itsinze Espanyol igitego 1-0 ku Cyumweru.
Ubwo umukino wari urangiye, Luis Suárez watsindiye FC Barcelone ibitego byombi ku wa Gatandatu, yabwiye abanyamakuru ko abatoza ari bo bo kunengwa kubera uko ikipe yitwara iri hanze, ikaba yaratsinze imikino ibiri gusa muri itandatu iheruka kuhakinira.
Ati “Ntekereza ko ariyo mpamvu abatoza baba bahari ngo basesengure ibintu nk’ibi.
Twe tuba turi hano ngo dutange ibyo dufite byose mu kibuga.
Hanze y’ikibuga cyacu, turi gutakaza amanota y’ingenzi tutigeze dutakaza mu yindi myaka y’imikino.
Abakinnyi ba FC Barcelone ntibishimiye ibyemezo byagiye bifatwa n’umutoza Quique Setién mu mukino wa Celta Vigo nk’uko ikinyamakuru Marca cyo muri Espagne cyabitangaje.
Marca yavuze ko uburakari bwabaye bwinshi ubwo abakinnyi bageraga mu rwambariro ndetse banenga umutoza ko yashyizemo Antoine Griezmann agasimbura Suárez watsinze ibitego bibiri, ubwo haburaga iminota 10 ngo umukino urangire.
Ikindi ni uburyo umutoza Setién yakuyemo umukinnyi ukiri muto, Riqui Puig, wasimbuwe na Arthur Melo wifuzwa na Juventus, ubwo hari hasigaye iminota ine, bikarangira Celta Vigo ihise ibishyura.
Marca ivuga ko kandi atari ubwa mbere abakinnyi ba FC Barcelone bahanganye n’umutoza Setién kubera ibyemezo by’imikinire ndetse bikaba bikomeje guteza umwuka utari mwiza muri iyi kipe.
Kimwe mu byatumye Ernesto Valverde yirukanwa agasimbuzwa Quique Setién muri Mutarama, ni ukutitwara neza no kuba ikipe yarinjizwaga ibitego kenshi.
Real Madrid yaraye iyoboye shampiyona ya Espagne n’amanota 71 nyuma yo gutsindirwa igitego 1-0 na Casemiro imbere ya Espanyol, ishyiramo ikinyuranyo cy’amanota abiri hagati yayo na FC Barcelone mu gihe hasigaye imikino itandatu.
FC Barcelone izagaruka mu kibuga ku wa Kabiri ihura na Atlético Madrid mu gihe Real Madrid izahura na Getafe ku itariki ya 2 Nyakanga.
Arjen Robben wari warasezeye yatunguranye atangaza ko agiye gukinira ikipe yakuriyemo

Nyuma y’umwaka umwe asezeye gukina umupira w’amaguru, uwahoze ari rutahizamu wa Chelsea, Real Madrid na Bayern Munich, Arjen Roben, yatangaje ko agiye kugaruka mu kibuga akinira FC Groningen yakinnyemo akiri muto.
Arjen Robben w’imyaka 36, yasezeye gukina umupira w’amaguru muri Nyakanga 2019 nyuma yo kwegukana ibikombe 30 mu makipe yose yakiniye.
Gusa yizeye kugaruka mu kibuga mu mwaka w’imikino wa 2020/21 kugira ngo afashe FC Groningen yagizweho ingaruka n’ihagarikwa ry’umupira w’amaguru kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.

Perezida Kagame yabajijwe ikipe yafana Arsenal FC iramutse ihuye na Paris Saint-Germain
Perezida Paul Kagame yahishuye ko Arsenal FC na Paris Saint-Germain ziramutse zihuye mu gihe zombi zihuriye kuba zamamaza ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda, nta kipe yabogamiraho ahubwo byaba ari 50 kuri 50.
Perezida Paul Kagame yahishuye ko Arsenal FC na Paris Saint-Germain ziramutse zihuye mu gihe zombi zihuriye kuba zamamaza ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda, nta kipe yabogamiraho ahubwo byaba ari 50 kuri 50.
Kuva mu 2018, Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB) cyatangiye gukorana na Arsenal mu bufatanye bugamije guteza imbere ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda mu gihe mu mpera z’umwaka ushize wa 2019 aribwo u Rwanda rwagiranye ubufatanye nk’ubu n’ikipe ya Paris Saint-Germain yo mu Bufaransa, ariko bwo bukibanda cyane no kumenyekanisha ibikorerwa mu Rwanda.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na Jeune Afrique, Perezida Kagame usanzwe ari umukunzi wa Arsenal, yabajijwe ikipe yashyigikira aya makipe yombi aramutse ahuye.
Mu gusubiza, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko yakwifata ntagire uruhande abogamiraho kuko bimeze nko kumubaza uwo yahitamo gushyigikira hagati ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n’u Bushinwa.
Ati “Nakomeza kutabagoma.
Hamwe n’indoro y’umukunzi w’umupira w’amaguru nyawe nkabasha kubona amakosa tekiniki (y’imikinire) ku mpande zombi kandi nkishimira ibyo bakora neza bose.
Ni nko kumbaza guhitamo hagati y’u Bushinwa na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika: Ntabwo nahitamo.

Ati "Aya masezerano twayabonyemo inyungu nyinshi kandi biri gutanga umusaruro, haba ku ikipe ya Paris Saint Germain na Arsenal FC kandi turabyishimiye.
Mu ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka wa 2020, RDB yatangaje ko mu mwaka wa mbere u Rwanda rukorana na Arsenal, rwinjije miliyoni 33£ mu gihe rwari rwiteze kubona miliyoni 28£ ndetse gukorana n’iyi kipe yo mu Bwongereza byongereye umubare wa ba mukerarugendo basura u Rwanda.

Amakosa akorwa n’abakinnyi bo mu Rwanda mu gusinya amasezerano
Siporo by’umwihariko umupira w’amaguru ni kimwe mu bushabitsi bugezweho bwunguka amafaranga menshi mu gihe gito ku bafite impano bagize amahirwe yo guhirwa n’amaguru bakinisha cyangwa uko bitwara mu kibuga.
Siporo by’umwihariko umupira w’amaguru ni kimwe mu bushabitsi bugezweho bwunguka amafaranga menshi mu gihe gito ku bafite impano bagize amahirwe yo guhirwa n’amaguru bakinisha cyangwa uko bitwara mu kibuga.
Umunya-Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo ukinira Juventus yo mu Butaliyani, aherutse kwinjiza miliyoni 105$ hagati ya Kamena 2019 na Kamena 2020.
Ibi byamushyiraga ku mwanya wa kane mu byamamare 100 byinjije amafaranga menshi ku Isi muri icyo gihe mu gihe ari we uyoboye abakina umupira w’Amaguru kuri urwo rutonde.
Amafaranga uyu mukinnyi yinjije ni ayo yakoreye mu ikipe akinira, ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi akora n’abafatanyabikorwa yamamariza.
Mu Rwanda ntabwo abakinnyi baho baragera ku rwego rwo kwinjiza amafaranga menshi bayakuye mu bucuruzi cyangwa kwamamaza ariko agaciro kabo ku isoko kari kuzamuka umunsi ku munsi.
Nubwo ari uko bimeze ariko usanga amakosa abakinnyi bo mu Rwanda cyane ab’imbere mu gihugu bakora mu gihe cyo gusinya amasezerano, ariyo atuma badashobora gutera imbere kuko arengera inyungu z’amakipe kurusha uko bo yabarengera nka bamwe mu bagize uruhare rwo kugira ngo amasezerano akorwe.
Ingero ni nyinshi nk’aho Mutebi Rachid yashatse kuva muri Gicumbi FC yibwira ko asoje amasezerano, akabwirwa ko agifite undi mwaka umwe.
Byabaye ngombwa ko yongera gukina undi mwaka mu ikipe yo mu Majyaruguru nubwo yifuzwaga na Bugesera FC na Kiyovu Sports icyo gihe.
Kuri ibi hiyongeraho kuba bamwe mu bakinnyi akenshi iyo bageze mu mwaka wa nyuma w’amasezerano bavunika, amakipe akanga kubavuza kuko aba bona agiye kubatakazaho amafaranga menshi kandi ashobora kuba atakibafite mu mibare yabo.
Hari kandi n’abifuzwa n’andi makipe, ugasanga mu masezerano harimo ingingo zituma batabona ubwinyagamburiro bwo kugenda.
Abakinnyi batandukanye baganiriye na IGIHE bagaragaje ko kuba akenshi baba bakeneye amafaranga (ubukene), guhindura ikipe bajya mu yisumbuye ku yo bari barimo no kutamenya gusoma kuri bamwe (amasezerano ari mu ndimi batazi) biri mu bituma bakora ikosa ryo gusinya amasezerano adafite ikintu kinini azabafasha mu gihe bahuye n’ikibazo.

Ati “Abakinnyi bamwe bigize abanyamanyanga.
Bumva ko byose babyikorera bakirengagiza ko bakeneye abajyanama [abahuza] kandi usanga n’abakinnyi bakomeye i Burayi babafite, hari n’abagira batatu.
Iyo bagezeyo babaha amasezerano bakareba umushahara n’igihe amasezerano azarangirira gusa.
“Byose byakagombye gukorwa hubahirijwe amategeko ya FIFA kuko habaho amasezerano y’igurwa ry’umukinnyi hagati y’amakipe n’ amasezerano y’umurimo hagati y’umukinnyi n’ikipe.
Twe usanga abakinnyi benshi bigira aba free-agent [bakigurisha ubwabo].
Mu ntangiriro z’uku kwezi, Rutanga Eric wari wasinyiye Police FC na Kimenyi Yves wasinyiye Kiyovu Sports, babwiwe na Rayon Sports ko nta rupapuro rubarekura izabaha kuko basinyiye ayo makipe batabanje gusesa amasezerano bari bafitanye nayo.
Ni mu gihe ubwo aba bombi basinyaga muri Kamena (kuri Rutanga) na Nyakanga (kuri Kimenyi) 2019, bari basabye ko mu masezerano yabo hashyirwamo ingingo ivuga ko nibigera tariki ya 30 Kanama batarahabwa amafaranga yose bemerewe, amasezerano ashobora guta agaciro.
Uretse umubare utari muto w’abakinnyi bavunitse bari hafi gusoza amasezerano yabo bagatereranwa n’amakipe, abandi bikabaviramo gusezera ruhago burundu, hari n’abadahabwa ibyo bagombwa n’amakipe ku gihe, basaba ko abarekura ngo bagende, nabyo bikananirana.

FERWAFA niyo igomba kubikoraho.
Hari ibirego byinshi nk’ibi biri muri FERWAFA kandi ntabwo babikemuye.

Ati “Amategeko ya FIFA akurikizwa n’abakina umupira bose.
Amasezerano ni hagati y’umukinnyi n’ikipe kandi agomba kuba ashingiye ku mategeko.
Iyo hari ibyo batumvikanyeho barabidushyikiriza hanyuma tukabafasha kubikemura.

Ati “Ubundi amasezerano ategurwa n’impande zombi.
Uwayateguye ashobora kuyategura urundi ruhande rugasanga hari ibitanoze, hakarebwa uburyo binozwa mbere y’uko asinywa.
Bibaho cyane, nagiye mbibona ku bakinnyi bamwe tugura.
Niyo mpamvu ushobora gusanga amasezerano y’umukinnyi runaka atandukanye n’ay’undi.
“Hari abakinnyi baza ntibasome byose, akirebera ku mafaranga: umushahara n’ayo agurwa, ntarebe ati ‘ese ninkenera kuva muri iyi kipe bizagenda gute?

Imikino isoza UEFA Champions League izakinirwa hamwe mu gihe cy’iminsi 12 gusa
Imikino isigaye ngo irushanwa rya UEFA Champions League rihuza amakipe akomeye i Burayi rirangire, byitezwe ko izakinirwa mu Mujyi wa Lisbon, muri Kanama mu gihe cy’iminsi 12.
Imikino isigaye ngo irushanwa rya UEFA Champions League rihuza amakipe akomeye i Burayi rirangire, byitezwe ko izakinirwa mu Mujyi wa Lisbon, muri Kanama mu gihe cy’iminsi 12.
Umurwa mukuru wa Portugal uzakira imikino ya ¼ , ½ n’umukino wa nyuma, yose izakinwa hagati ya tariki ya 12 n’iya 23 Kanama uyu mwaka.
Imikino yose isigaye izajya ikinwa ari umwe (nta mukino wo kwishyura) mu byiciro bitandukanye, izabera ku bibuga bibiri byo muri Lisbon- Estadio da Luz na Estadio Jose Alvalade.
Byitezwe ko iyi gahunda yo gukina imikino isigaye nk’irushanwa rito, izemezwa na Komite Nyobozi ya UEFA mu nama izaba ku wa Gatatu tariki ya 17 Kamena 2020.
Imikino ya ¼ izaba hagati ya tariki ya 12 n’iya 15 Kanama, iya ½ ibe hagati ya tariki y 18 n’iya 19 Kanama mu gihe umukino wa nyuma uzaba tariki ya 23 Kanama.
Uburyo imikino ine isigaye ya 1/8 izakinwa na byo bigomba kwemezwa.
Manchester City yagombaga kwakira Real Madrid mu mukino wari kuba tariki ya 17 Werurwe nyuma y’uko yari yatsindiye muri Espagne ibitego 2-1.
Bayern Munich yari yatsinze Chelsea ibitego 3-0, Juventus itsindwa na Lyon igitego 1-0 mu gihe FC Barcelone yari yanganyije na Napoli igitego 1-1.
Amakipe ya Paris Saint-Germain, Atalanta, Atlético Madrid na RB Leipzig yari yamaze kubona itike ya ¼.
Umujyi wa Istanbul wagombaga kwakira umukino wa nyuma wa UEFA Champions League uyu mwaka, ushobora guhabwa uw’umwaka utaha.
Nta cyemezo kirafatwa ku irushanwa rya Europa League ry’uyu mwaka, ariko byitezwe ko naryo rizakinwa muri ubu buryo, rigasorezwa mu Mujyi wa Frankfurt cyangwa uwa Düsseldorf mu Budage.
Ku bijyanye n’irushanwa ry’umwaka utaha w’imikino, UEFA iri kwiga uburyo imikino y’amatsinda yatangira mu Ukwakira hagati mu gihe ubusanzwe habaga hari gusozwa imikino ibanza yo mu matsinda.

Umunyezamu wa Tanzania Prisons, Jeremiah Kasubi na Aishi Manula urinda izamu rya Simba SC bagize uruhare rukomeye mu gutuma uyu mukino urangira nta gitego kiwubonetsemo.
Kunganya byatumye Simba SC igira amanota 79 mu mikino 32, yegukana igikombe harimo ikinyuranyo cy’amanota 19 mu gihe hasigaye imikino itandatu.
Ni ku nshuro ya gatatu yikurikiranya iyi kipe yegukanye iki gikombe mu gihe ari ku nshuro ya 21 yegukanye shampiyona ya Tanzania, irushwa inshuro eshanu na Yanga SC igifite inshuro 26.
Kuri Kagere Meddie, ni igikombe cya kabiri cya shampiyona yegukanye ari kumwe na Simba SC nyuma yo kuyigeramo mu mwaka w’imikino wa 2018/19, avuye muri Gor Mahia FC yo muri Kenya.
Biteganyijwe ko Simba SC izashyikirizwa igikombe mu mikino iri imbere bitewe n’ibiganiro bizahuza ubuyobozi bwayo n’abayobora Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru muri Tanzania (TFF).

Hatangajwe igihe Shampiyona ya NBA izasubukurirwa ikinwa mu buryo bwihariye
Shampiyona ya Basketball muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika (NBA) ikunzwe kurusha izindi ku Isi, yatangaje ko izasubukurwa tariki ya 30 Nyakanga nyuma y’uko ihagaze guhera muri Werurwe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.

Kuri iki Cyumweru tariki ya 27 Kamena nibwo hashyizwe ahagaragara imikino izakinwa hagati ya tariki ya 30 Nyakanga n’iya 14 Kanama 2020.
Amakipe 22 azitabira isubukurwa rya NBA, azakina imikino umunani (kuri buri imwe) izabera ku bibuga bya ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex i Walt Disney World Resort muri Florida.
Imikino ibiri izabimburira indi ku wa Kane tariki ya 30 Nyakanga ni uzahuza Utah Jazz na New Orleans Pelicans, ndetse n’uzahuza LA Clippers na Los Angeles Lakers mu gihe bukeye bwaho, tariki ya 31 Nyakanga, hazaba imikino itandatu irimo uwo Boston Celtics izakinamo na Milwaukee Bucks naho Houston Rockets ihure Dallas Mavericks.
Muri iri subukurwa rya NBA, buri munsi hazajya hakinwa imikino igera kuri irindwi ku bibuga bitatu bitandukanye byo muri ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Buri kipe izabarwa nk’iyakiriye imikino ine ndetse yongere kugirwa nk’iyakiniye hanze mu yindi mikino ine.
Ubwo NBA yasubikwagwa tariki ya 11 Werurwe, hari hasigaye imikino 259 mu mwaka usanzwe w’imikino ariko hazakinwa 88 gusa.
Amakipe 22 azakina iyi mikino ni umunani yari aya mbere muri buri gace (conference) [ni ukuvuga ane muri buri gace] kongeraho andi atandatu (atanu yo mu Burengerazuba n’imwe yo mu Burasirazuba) hagendewe ku manota yari afite.
Iyi mikino izasozwa tariki ya 14 Kanama mu gihe biteganyijwe ko hazabaho play-in izahuza ikipe ya munani n’iya cyenda muri buri gace hagati ya tariki ya 15 n’iya 16 Kanama mu gihe byaba bibaye ngombwa.
Iya Play-offs yitabirwa n’amakipe umunani ya mbere muri buri gace, izatangira tariki ya 17 Kanama 2020 ikageza mu Ukwakira.

Inama ya Komite Nyobozi y’Impuzamashyirahamwe y’Umupira w’Amaguru ku Mugabane w’Uburayi (UEFA) yabaye kuri uyu wa Gatatu, yanzuye ko amarushanwa yayo ya Champions League na Europa League azasubukurwa mu ntangiriro za Kanama nyuma y’uko ahagaritswe muri Werurwe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
UEFA yemeje ko aya marushanwa yombi ahuza amakipe akomeye i Burayi, azasozwa akinwa mu buryo bw’Igikombe cy’Isi.
Hemejwe ko imikino isigaye kugira ngo irushanwa rya Champions League rirangire izakinirwa mu Mujyi wa Lisbon.
Umurwa mukuru wa Portugal uzakira imikino ya kimwe cya kane, iya kimwe cya kabiri n’umukino wa nyuma, yose izakinwa hagati ya tariki ya 12 n’iya 23 Kanama uyu mwaka mu gihe imikino ya kimwe cy’umunani yo kwishyura yari isigaye, izakinirwa aho yagombaga kubera cyangwa muri Portugal kuri Estádio do Dragão y’i Porto na Estádio D.
Afonso Henriques y’i Guimarães hagati ya tariki ya 7 n’iya 8 Kanama.
Imikino yose isigaye muri kimwe cya kane na kimwe cya kabiri izajya ikinwa ari umwe (nta mukino wo kwishyura), izabera ku bibuga bibiri byo muri Lisbon- Estadio da Luz na Estadio Jose Alvalade.
Champions League yakomwe mu nkokora na Coronavirus kuva tariki ya 11 Werurwe, ubwo imikino ya kimwe cy’umunani yari igeze hagati.
Manchester City yagombaga kwakira Real Madrid mu mukino wo kwishyura wari kuba tariki ya 17 Werurwe nyuma y’uko yari yatsindiye muri Espagne ibitego 2-1.
Bayern Munich yari yatsinze Chelsea ibitego 3-0, Juventus itsindwa na Lyon igitego 1-0 mu gihe FC Barcelone yari yanganyije na Napoli igitego 1-1.
Amakipe ya Paris Saint-Germain, Atalanta, Atlético Madrid na RB Leipzig yari yamaze kubona itike ya kimwe cya kane.
Umujyi wa Istanbul (Atatürk Olympic Stadium) wagombaga kwakira umukino wa nyuma wa UEFA Champions League uyu mwaka, wahawe kwakira uw’umwaka utaha.
Europa League izakinirwa mu Budage
UEFA yemeje ko kandi irushanwa rya Europa League naryo rizakinwa muri ubu buryo bumeze nk’Igikombe cy’Isi, aho guhera muri kimwe cya kane imikino izabera mu Budage mu Mijyi ya Cologne, Duisburg, Düsseldorf na Gelsenkirchen muri Kanama, haba umukino umwe.
Imikino yo kwishyura yari isigaye nayo izakinirwa aho yagombaga kubera cyangwa mu Budage mu gihe Inter Milan na Getafe, Seville FC na AS Roma zitakinnye umukino n’umwe, zizahura inshuro imwe (nta mukino wo kwishyura uzabaho).
Umujyi wa Gdańsk wo muri Pologne wagombaga kwakira umukino wa nyuma w’uyu mwaka, wahawe kwakira uw’irushanwa ry’umwaka utaha.
Europa League yahagaze tariki ya 12 Werurwe, izasubukurwa tariki ya 5 n’iya 6 Kanama haba imikino yo kwishyura (ahabaye imikino ibanza) mu gihe umukino wa nyuma uzakinwa tariki ya 21 Kanama 2020.
Siporo zikorwa abantu bategeranye zakomorewe: Ni ryari amakipe ashobora gutangira imyitozo?
Inama y’Abaminisitiri yateranye ku wa Kabiri tariki ya 16 Werurwe yafatiwemo umwanzuro uvuga ko ibikorwa bya siporo zikorerwa hanze abantu bategeranye zemerewe gukomeza.
Icyakora siporo ikorerwa mu nyubako z’imyidagaduro irabujijwe.
Inama y’Abaminisitiri yateranye ku wa Kabiri tariki ya 16 Werurwe yafatiwemo umwanzuro uvuga ko ibikorwa bya siporo zikorerwa hanze abantu bategeranye zemerewe gukomeza.
Icyakora siporo ikorerwa mu nyubako z’imyidagaduro irabujijwe.
Imyanzuro y’iyi nama ivuga ko "Amabwiriza arambuye kuri iyi ngingo azatangwa na Minisiteri ya Siporo.
" Ni amabwiriza yitezweho kureba niba ashobora gutanga umurongo nk’amakipe ashobora gukoramo imyitozo, abakinnyi bategeranye, mbere y’uko imikino imwe n’imwe yazasubukurwa.
Tariki ya 15 Werurwe 2020 nibwo ibikorwa byose by’imikino byahagaritswe mu Rwanda, umunsi umwe nyuma y’uko Minisiteri y’Ubuzima itangaje ko hari umurwayi wa mbere wa Coronavirus wabonetse mu gihugu.
Tariki ya 5 Gicurasi, Minisiteri ya Siporo yagiranye inama na Komite Olempike n’abahagarariye imikino, hemezwa ko hafi imikino ishobora gusubukurwa ari muri Nzeri mu gihe imyitozo yatangira muri Kanama.
Ku wa 4 Kamena Minisiteri ya Siporo yatangaje ko guhera ku wa 8 Kamena, imikino ikorwa abantu bategeranye irimo uwo kunyoga igare, gutwara imodoka, Tennis, Golf, kugenda n’amaguru (Hiking) n’imikino ngororamubiri ishobora gusubukurwa ariko hakurikizwa amabwiriza yo kwirinda.
Amwe mu bwiriza yari yashyizweho yarimo kuba nk’abasiganwa ku maguru bagomba guhana intera mu gihe bakorera muri Stade Amahoro n’ahandi haba inzira y’abasiganwa no kuba buri wese akoresha ibikoresho bye ku bajugunya.
Muri Tennis hemejwe ko buri mukinnyi azajya azana imipira ye, akaba ariyo akina (ashobora gufata mu ntoki) itari iye akayitanga kuri mugenzi we akoresheje ikirenge cyangwa racket, kuba abakinnyi batemerewe guhinduranya ibibuga no gusiga intera ya metero eshatu hagati yabo (Tennis ikinwa na babiri ntiyemewe).
Hari n’abibajije impamvu umukino wa Cricket utabamo kwegerana, utigeze ushyirwa mu yemerewe gusubukura.
