Ingagi zo mu Rwanda zikomeje kororoka mu buryo budasanzwe
Ingagi zo muri Pariki y’Ibirunga zikomeje kororoka umunsi ku wundi aho muri iki cyumweru ku munsi umwe, ebyiri zabyaye ndetse bigaragaza ikinyuranyo gikomeye hagati y’iyabyaye ikiri nto n’iyabyaye ikuze.
Ingagi zo muri Pariki y’Ibirunga zikomeje kororoka umunsi ku wundi aho muri iki cyumweru ku munsi umwe, ebyiri zabyaye ndetse bigaragaza ikinyuranyo gikomeye hagati y’iyabyaye ikiri nto n’iyabyaye ikuze.
Mu ngagi zabyaye harimo iyitwa Mudakama y’imyaka 33 yabyaye umwana wa mbere mu muryango mushya wa Urugwiro.
Iyi ngagi imaze kugira abana batanu, bose baracyariho ariko baba mu miryango itandukanye.
Umwana yaherukaga ni uwiswe Abasore wavutse mu myaka itanu ishize.
Ubusanzwe ingagi ishobora kubyara buri myaka ine ariko Mudakama yo yabyariye imyaka irindwi, igihe kinini kurusha ikiba cyitezwe.
Abagenzura ingagi bagaragaza ko bishoboka ko se w’umwana wabyawe na Mudakama yaba ari Urugwiro, ariko ko hakenewe ko bizemezwa neza n’amakuru azatangazwa nyuma kuko Mudakama yakunze guhindura imiryango.
Indi ngagi yabyaye muri iyi minsi, ni iyitwa Ubufatanye ifite imyaka 16, ikomoka mu muryango wa Musilikale.
Ni mu gihe umwana wayo uheruka ari uwari ufite imyaka ibiri n’igice.
Nubwo Ubufatanye ikiri nto, yarumbukiwe n’urubyaro aho ubu imaze kubyara gatatu mu gihe kitarenga imyaka itandatu.
Abandi bana bayo bose baba mu muryango wa Musilikale ubu ugize ingagi 21.
Ikigega Dian Fossey Gorilla Fund cyatangaje aya makuru, cyavuze ko bitangaje “kubona ikinyuranyo kiri hagati y’aba babyeyi bombi, bitwibutsa ko kimwe natwe, buri ngagi irihariye.
Ubwiyongere bw’ingagi bujyanye n’ubushakashatsi Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yatangiye mu kureba uburyo ubuso bwa Pariki y’Igihugu y’Ibirunga bwakongerwa kugira ngo zibone aho ziba hisanzuye.
Magingo aya, iyi pariki iri ku buso bwa hegitari 16,027.
Ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko imibare y’ingagi ziri mu birunga kugeza muri Kamena 2016 zari 604 zivuye kuri 480 zabaruwe mu 2010.
Iyi mibare ntirimo iziri mu Ishyamba rya Bwindi muri Uganda kuko ho ubushakashatsi bugikorwa.
Ibarura ryaho mu 2011 ryari ryerekanye ko harimo ingagi zigera kuri 400.
Bivuze ko ubu ingagi zibarurwa muri iki gice zirenga 1000.
Abakora mu bukerarugendo bagiriwe inama yo kugabanya ibiciro mu kureshya abakiliya b’imbere mu gihugu
Urwego rw’ubukerarugendo mu Rwanda rwanzuye kwerekeza amaso ku isoko ry’imbere mu gihugu mu rwego rwo kwizahura no guhangana n’ingaruka ruzasigirwa n’icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Urwego rw’ubukerarugendo mu Rwanda rwanzuye kwerekeza amaso ku isoko ry’imbere mu gihugu mu rwego rwo kwizahura no guhangana n’ingaruka ruzasigirwa n’icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Urwego rw’ubukeraugendo mu Rwanda ni rumwe mu zari zifashe cyane ubukungu bw’igihugu.
Benshi mu bakiliya barwo akenshi babaga ari abanyamahanga ariko ingamba zashyizweho zo kwirinda coronavirus zishobora gukoma mu nkokora urwo rwego, kuko abakerarugendo mpuzamahanga bizatwara igihe ngo batangire kugaruka.
Gahunda yo kuzahura ubukungu iri gutegurwa n’urwego rw’ubukerarugendo n’amahoteli mu Rwanda, iragaragaza ko imbaraga nyinshi zigiye gushyirwa mu bukerarugendo bw’imbere mu gihugu guhera muri Gicurasi 2020 kugeza mu Ukuboza 2021.
Ishami ry’Umuryango w’abibumbye ryita ku bukerarugendo, rivuga ko umubare w’abakerarugendo mpuzamahanga ushobora kuzagabanyuka ku kigero kiri hagati ya 60 na 80%.
Urugaga rw’Abikorera mu Muryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, East African Business Council, EABC) rugaragaza ko muri EAC nibura miliyari eshanu z’amadolari yagombaga kwinjizwa n’ubukerarugendo azagabanuka mu 2020 kubera icyo cyorezo, mu gihe abakerarugendo bagera kuri miliyoni 6.
2 bagombaga kuza gusura akarere bashobora kugabanuka.
Izo mbogamizi zose zizagira ingaruka ku rwego rw’ubukerarugendo rw’imbere mu gihugu, ariyo mpamvu hakenewe kuvugurura ibiciro kugira ngo byorohere Abanyarwanda.
Gahunda yo kuzahura urwego rw’ubukerarugendo iri gutegurwa, igira iti “Nubwo bimwe mu bikorwa by’ubukerarugendo bisanzwe bihendutse kandi hari igabanyirizwa ku bantu b’imbere mu gihugu, hakenewe irindi gabanywa ry’ibiciro.
Nk’ibiciro byo gusura ingagi byari biri hejuru cyane cyane ku baturage b’imbere mu Rwanda, mu korohereza no gushishikariza benshi kubyitabira kugabanya ibiciro birakenewe.
Muri iyo nyigo nshya kandi irashishikariza guteza imbere abantu bagiye mu bukerarugendo bukozwe mu matsinda, bakagabanyirizwa.
Aho harimo kandi no kugabanyirizwa ku bashaka gusura ibice runaka nyaburanga mu bihe byihariye by’umwaka.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB) kizakorana n’Ishami ry’Ubukerarugendo mu rugaga rw’abikorera mu Rwanda, kugira ngo hanozwe inyigo yakurikizwa mu kugabanya ibihombo urwego rw’ubukerarugendo ruri guhura nabyo.
Amahoteli kandi aragirwa inama yo kugabanyiriza ibiciro abayagana b’abanyarwanda, abaturutse mu bihugu byo mu Muryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba n’abo mu bihugu bigize Umuryango w’Ubumwe bwa’Afurika.
Iyo nyigo ivuga ko hari amahoteli amwe kugira ngo areshye abakiliya b’imbere mu gihugu, bizaba ngombwa ko agabanya igiciro ku kigero cya 80 %.
Imbaraga kandi zizashyirwa mu bukangurambaga bugamije kureshya abakerarugendo b’imbere mu gihugu ariko hatirengagijwe ireme ry’isura y’u Rwanda mu ruhando mpuzamahanga.
Raporo y’Ishami ry’Ubukerarugendo mu Rugaga rw’Abikorera, PSF, igaragaza ko muri Werurwe bwagize igihombo cya miliyari 34.
9 Frw, bivuye ku nama zasubitswe n’ibindi bikorwa by’ubukerarugendo byahagaritswe, kubera ingamba zafashwe mu gukumira ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Burera: Inkomoko ya Kanyirarebe, izina ry’agasozi kitiriwe umurwayi wo mu mutwe
Agasozi ka Kanyirarebe gaherereye mu Karere ka Burera, Umurenge wa Gahunga, kakaba gahuriweho n’utugari tubiri aritwo Buramba na Nyangwe.
Agasozi ka Kanyirarebe gaherereye mu Karere ka Burera, Umurenge wa Gahunga, kakaba gahuriweho n’utugari tubiri aritwo Buramba na Nyangwe.
Abatuye kuri aka gasozi bavuga ko habaga igiti kinini cyane cy’inganzamarumbu cy’umunyinya cyari cyaritsemo inyoni zitandukanye, gusa ngo nta bantu benshi bari bahatuye , igice kinini cyari kigizwe n’ibihuru.
Nk’uko abantu bakuze batuye kuri aka gasozi babisobanura, bavuga ko inkomoko y’izina Kanyirarebe ryaturutse ku mugore wabanaga n’ubumuga bwo mu mutwe witwaga Nyirarebe, waje aturuka mu Gihugu cy’abaturanyi cya Uganda mu gace ka Bufumbira, maze aruhukira munsi y’icyo giti ahubaka akazu k’ibyatsi agaturamo.
Magayane Silas uri mu kigero cy’imyaka 93, yavuze ko ahagana mu 1925, iki giti yakibonaga ndetse n’akazu k’ibyatsi kari karubatswe n’uwo murwayi wo mu mutwe witwaga Nyirarebe arakazi.
Yagize ati " Nkiri muto icyo giti cyari kuri aka gasozi, uwo Nyirarebe wari umurwayi wo mu mutwe nanjye nibuka ko namubonye yari yarubatse akazu k’ibyatsi munsi y’icyo giti.
Nta muntu yahutazaga, n’abaturage baramukundaga kuko banamushyiraga ibiryo muri ako kazu akahaba gutyo, yaje kuhasazira arapfa, aka gasozi gafata izina gutyo hitwa ku Kanyirarebe".
Maniraguha Ladislas w’imyaka 48 y’amavuko na we yemeza ko izina Kanyirarebe yavutse akarisanga gusa aza gusobanurirwa ko ryavuye kuri Nyirarebe wari ufite uburwayi bwo mu mutwe.
Ati “Batubwiraga ko ryaturutse ku mugore witwaga Nyirarebe wari ufite uburwayi bwo mu mutwe wigeze gutura munsi y’igiti kinini cyari gihari, batubwiraga ko yatungwaga n’ibiryo abaturage bamuhaga, rero umuco w’ubugwaneza n’urukundo byarangaga abakurambere bacu natwe barawuturaze, turangwa n’urugwiro n’imibanire myiza n’abatugana tukabakirana urwo rugwiro"
Kuri ubu ku Kanyirarebe harangwa n’ibikorwaremezo bitandukanye birimo umuriro w’amashanyarazi, inzu z’ubucuruzi, izo guturamo n’ibindi bikorwa byinshi by’iterambere.
Abaturage baho batunzwe cyane n’ubuhinzi bw’ibirayi bakuramo amafaranga abatunga mu buzima bwabo bwa buri munsi, abandi bagakora ubucuruzibw’ibintu bitandukanye.
Tour Eiffel yafunguriwe ba mukerarugendo nyuma y’igihe ifunzwe kubera Coronavirus
Ibikorwa bitandukanye mu Burayi bikomeje gufungurwa bijyanye n’ingamba zigezweho mu gukumira icyorezo cya Coronavirus, aho kuri iyi nshuro u Bufaransa bwakomoreye abakeneye gusura Tour Eiffel.
Ibikorwa bitandukanye mu Burayi bikomeje gufungurwa bijyanye n’ingamba zigezweho mu gukumira icyorezo cya Coronavirus, aho kuri iyi nshuro u Bufaransa bwakomoreye abakeneye gusura Tour Eiffel.
U Bufaransa buri mu bihugu byahungabanyijwe cyane na Coronavirus, aho habarwa abantu 29 731 bishwe n’iki cyorezo na 161 348 bacyanduye, gusa ubukana bwacyo bukomeje kugabanuka, ari nako ibikorwa byinshi bisubukurwa.
Kwemerera abantu kongera gusura aha hantu nyaburanga ni kimwe mu bimenyetso by’isubukurwa ryitondewe ry’ibikorwa, hagamijwe ko ibikorwa byinjiza amafaranga byongera gukora ariko ubuzima bw’abaturage bukabungwabungwa.
Uburyo bwo guhana intera hagati y’umuntu n’undi n’ikoranabuhanga ryifashishwa mu gushakisha abahuye n’umuntu ufite Coronavirus, ni byo bihanzwe amaso.
Tour Eiffel ni hamwe mu hantu hasurwa cyane na ba mukerarugendo mu Murwa Mukuru Paris, mu gihe ahandi hasurwa cyane nk’Inzu Ndangamurage ya Louvre, yo igifunzwe kugeza ku wa 6 Nyakanga.
Mu rwego rwo kurinda abasura uyu munara muremure cyane muri Paris, ibyuma bizamura abantu kuri uyu munara ureshya na metero 324 birafunzwe, abantu basabwa kuzamuka bakoresheje ingazi, ndetse ahantu habiri muri hatatu abantu bashobora guhagarara bari kuri uyu munara niho hafunguwe gusa.
Nk’uko urubuga rusangwaho amakuru ya Tour Eiffel rubigaragaza, abantu bemerewe kuzamuka ingazi 674 bakagera ku nyubako ya kabiri.
Byongeye, kugira ngo hirindwe ko abantu bahura, bazamukira ku ruhande rumwe bakamanukira ku rundi.
Gusura uyu munara abantu basabwa kwishyura amayero 10.
40 cyangwa amadolari ya Amerika $11.
Umuyobozi Mukuru w’uyu munara, Patrick Branco Ruivo, avuga ko kuva ibikorwa byafungwa muri Werurwe abantu ntibemererwe kuhasura, Tour Eiffel yahombye miliyoni $30, igihe imaze ifunzwe kikaba ari cyo cya mbere kirekire ifunzwe nyuma y’Intambara ya Kabiri y’Isi.
Mu gusura uyu munara uganwa na miliyoni z’abantu mu bihe bisanzwe, kwambara agapfukamunwa n’amazuru ni itegeko ku bahasura bose bafite guhera ku myaka 11 kuzamura, kandi abantu bagomba guhagarara bahanye intera.
Abagana hoteli na za restaurant bagiye kujya bandikwa
Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Iterambere, RDB, cyashyizeho amabwiriza agiye kuzajya yifashishwa n’abafite Hotel na Restaurant, aho bategetswe kuzajya bandika umwirondoro w’umuntu wese ubagannye nka bumwe mu buryo bushobora koroshya kubona amakuru mu kurwanya icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Iterambere, RDB, cyashyizeho amabwiriza agiye kuzajya yifashishwa n’abafite Hotel na Restaurant, aho bategetswe kuzajya bandika umwirondoro w’umuntu wese ubagannye nka bumwe mu buryo bushobora koroshya kubona amakuru mu kurwanya icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Aya mabwiriza yashyizweho mu rwego rwo gukaza ingamba mu kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Hotel na Restaurant ni zimwe muri serivisi zemerewe gufungura ibikorwa nyuma y’iminsi 43 zifunze, ariko zisabwa ko zajya zifunga saa moya z’ijoro.
RDB yatangaje ko mu rwego rwo gukomeza gukumira ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19 “abayobozi b’ama-hotel, ama-restaurant n’ahandi hafatirwa amafunguro n’ibyo kunywa, basabwa guhita batangira kujya bandika umwirondoro w’ababagana.
Hazajya handikwa amazina yombi y’umuntu, nimero ya telefoni, isaha n’umunota yinjiriye aho hantu n’akarere atuyemo.
Umwirondoro uzajya ubikwa mu buryo bw’ibanga gusa RDB ivuga ko “aho bizaba ngombwa uzakoreshwa mu gushaka amakuru ajyanye na COVID-19".
Urwego rw’ama-hotel no kwakira abantu, ni zimwe mu zashegeshwe bikomeye n’ingamba zo gufunga ibikorwa mu kwirinda icyorezo cya COVID-19, ndetse bisaba ingufu nyinshi mu kuzahura ubukungu bwarwo.
Raporo y’Ishami ry’Ubukerarugendo mu Rugaga rw’Abikorera, PSF, igaragaza ko muri Werurwe bwagize igihombo cya miliyari 34.
9 Frw, bivuye ku nama zasubitswe n’ibindi bikorwa by’ubukerarugendo byahagaritswe.
Iyi raporo igaragaza ko nibura uru rwego ruzakenera miliyari 29.
9 Frw mu kugoboka ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo no kwakira abantu, mu gihe cy’umwaka wose nyuma ya Coronavirus.
Ni rumwe mu nzego leta yiyemeje gufasha binyuze mu kigega kigiye gutangira, aho ba nyir’ibi bikorwa bazafashwa kuvugurura amasezerano y’inguzanyo bari bafite muri banki, ndetse bakoroherezwa kubona amafaranga yo kongera kuzahura ibikorwa byabo.
Kugeza ubu, abantu 285 nibo bamaze kwandura indwara ya COVID-19, abamaze gukira ni 150.
Mu 2018, u Rwanda rwasuwe n’abakerarugendo miliyoni 1.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB) cyatangaje ko mu mwaka wa 2018, u Rwanda rwasuwe n’abakerarugendo miliyoni 1.
7, baka bariyongereyeho 8 % ugereranyije na 2017.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB) cyatangaje ko mu mwaka wa 2018, u Rwanda rwasuwe n’abakerarugendo miliyoni 1.
7, baka bariyongereyeho 8 % ugereranyije na 2017.
Kuri uyu wa Kabiri, RDB yatangaje ko abanyamahanga bakomeje kubona u Rwanda nk’ahantu heza ho gusura.
Umuyobozi Mukuru mu Kigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere RDB, ushinzwe ubukerarugendo, Belise Kaliza yavuze ko uko kwiyongera ari ikimeneyetso cy’uko imbaraga zashyizwe mu kumenyekanisha u Rwanda nk’ahantu ho gusura zirimo gutanga umusaruro.
Kaliza yavuze ko mu 2018 RDB yagurishije amatike 15 130 yo gusura ingagi mu birunga, bikaba byarinjije miliyoni 19.
2 z’amadolari.
Ni ubwiyongere bungana na 25% ugereranyije na 2017.
Abakerarugendo b’abanyamerika nibo baje imbere mu gusura cyane u Rwanda no gukoresha amafaranga menshi, kuko impuzandengo yabo igaragaza ko nibura umunyamerika wasuye u Rwanda yahakoreshaga ibihumbi 12 by’amadolari (asaga miliyoni 11 Frw).
Mu bandi bakoresheje amafaranga menshi mu Rwanda harimo Abashinwa, aho umwe yabarirwaga kuhasiga amadolari 1 0 84 n’abanya-Nigeria bakoresheje hafi amadolari 1490 buri umwe.
Mu bijyanye no gusurwa kwa Pariki z’Igihugu, Kaliza yavuze ko Pariki y’Akagera yasuwe n’abakerarugendo 51 724 mu mwaka wa 2018, hakaba hariyongereyeho 17 % ugereranyije na 2017.
Nyungwe yasuwe n’abantu 15 665, bakaba bariyongereyeho 9 % .
Muri rusange, amafaranga yinjijwe na Pariki zose asaga miliyoni 20 z’amadolari, avuye kuri miliyoni zisaga 18 mu 2017.
Ubukerarugendo bw’imbere mu gihugu, guhera mu 2010 abanyarwanda bitabira ubukerarugendo biyongereyeho hejuru ya 200 %.
Guhera mu 2017 kugeza mu 2018, biyongereyeho 21.
RDB itangaza ko byatewe n’ubukangurambaga burimo ubwa Tembera u Rwanda bwakozwe mu myaka ibiri ishize.
Guverinoma yihaye intego ko mu 2024 inyungu u Rwanda ruvana mu bukerarugendo igomba kwikuba kabiri ikagera kuri miliyoni $800 zivuye kuri miliyoni $404 yinjiye mu mwaka ushize, ndetse u Rwanda rukaba ku isonga mu bihugu ba mukerarugendo benshi bifuza gusura.
RDB yavuze ku mpinduka zimaze kugaragara nyuma y’imyaka ibiri ibiciro byo gusura ingagi bikubwe kabiri
Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB, Clare Akamanzi, yavuze ko nyuma y’imyaka ibiri ibiciro byo gusura ingagi bikubwe kabiri, amafaranga yinjira mu bukerarugendo avuye mu gusura ingagi yiyongereye, nubwo imibare y’abantu bazisura bo bagabanyutse.
Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB, Clare Akamanzi, yavuze ko nyuma y’imyaka ibiri ibiciro byo gusura ingagi bikubwe kabiri, amafaranga yinjira mu bukerarugendo avuye mu gusura ingagi yiyongereye, nubwo imibare y’abantu bazisura bo bagabanyutse.
Yabigarutseho kuri uyu wa Kane mu kiganiro n’itangazamakuru, nyuma y’itahwa rya Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House, imwe mu nyubako yitezweho kuzajya yakira ba mukerarugendo bo ku rwego rwo hejuru, yubatse munsi y’Ikirunga cya Sabyinyo.
Ni imwe mu nyubako izajya yakira abasura u Rwanda bashaka no gusura ingagi.
Muri Gicurasi 2017 nibwo RDB yatangaje ko u Rwanda rwakubye kabiri igiciro cy’abajya gusura ingagi, kiva ku madolari 750 kigera ku 1500$ ku bantu bose kandi kigahita gitangira gukurikizwa.
Hanashyizweho ko icyiciro gishya aho umuntu uzajya asura umuryango wose w’ingagi azajya yishyura 15 000$.
Nyuma y’itangazwa ry’ibyo biciro, abantu bavuze byinshi ko Abanyarwanda batazajya babasha kwishyura ayo mafaranga, ariko baza gushyirirwaho gahunda zihariye zibafasha kwitegereza ibyiza igihugu cyabo gifite.
Nyuma y’imyaka ibiri, Akamanzi avuga ko imibare y’abasura ingagi yagabanyutse, nubwo mu bijyanye n’amafaranga avamo, yo yazamutse.
Yagize ati “Impamvu ni uko tuzi ko dufite ingagi, kandi ntabwo ari inyamaswa zihora zibyara buri gihe, bivuga ko tugomba kuzibungabunga neza cyane.
Bivuze ko kugira ngo umuntu ashobore kubona ingagi, bigomba gusaba amafaranga menshi, kubera ko amafaranga naba make abantu benshi bazajya kuzireba kandi ntabwo ari byiza mu kuzibungabunga.
“Niyo mpamvu kugira ngo turebe ko abantu bake bashoboka ariko bashobora kwishyura, kugira ngo dushobore kubona ya mafaranga nubwo ari abantu bake bajyayo.
Bivuze ko kuva igihe twongereye ibiciro by’ingagi, amafaranga tubona ubu ngubu aruta amafaranga twabonaga mbere yuko twongera igiciro no mu bihe ba mukerarugendo baba ari bake.
Akamanzi yavuze ko mu mwaka wa mbere ibiciro bimaze kuzamurwa, abantu basura ingagi bagabanyutse cyane ariko ubu batangiye kwiyongera ndetse n’amafaranga ubu aboneka mu basura ingagi yabaye menshi nubwo umubare w’abantu wagabanyutse, ariko ntiyatangaje umubare.
Yakomeje ati “Umubare w’abantu bagura impushya ntabwo ari munini cyane nka kwa kundi ariko bigenda byiyongera, ariko nubwo amafaranga ari menshi kuko twakubye kabiri (ibiciro), ubu turashaka ko twakira ba mukerarugendo benshi bashoboka kuko nubwo bagenda biyongera, nitugurisha impushya zose tukarenza n’izo twagurishaga mbere, tuzabona amafaranga menshi kurusha ayo tubona ubu.
“Nubwo tutagurisha impushya zose twagurishaga mbere, amafaranga yariyongereye ariko n’umubare w’impushya tugurisha ugenda wiyongera.
Bivuze ko nitugurisha impushya zose, amafaranga azaba menshi kurusha ayo tubona ubu ngubu.
Icyo navuga ni uko icyemezo cyafashwe ngo twongere ibiciro cyari icyemezo cyiza nubwo abantu benshi bibazaga ibibazo byinshi ariko turareba ku mibare ko byabaye ibintu byiza.
Akamanzi yavuze ko u Rwanda rukeneye abantu 96 bashobora kureba ingagi ku munsi kuko rufite imiryango 12 y’ingagi zisurwa.
Buri muryango uba ukeneye gusurwa n’abantu umunani ku munsi.
Ingagi zo mu birunga ni nke ku Isi, hasigaye izigera kuri 880 gusa, u Rwanda rukagiramo 62% yazo.
Muri Kamena 2016 zari 604 zivuye kuri 480 zabaruwe mu 2010.
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda igenera abaturiye hafi ya za pariki 10% by’inyungu iva mu bukerarugendo.
U Rwanda rufite intego yo kwinjiza miliyoni $800 avuye mu bukerarugendo mu 2024, mu gihe mu wa 2017 bwinjije miliyoni $438.
Inkuru wasoma: U Rwanda rwazamuye ibiciro byo gusura ingagi mu birunga
Perezida Kagame yafunguye ku mugaragaro Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House (Amafoto)
Perezida Paul Kagame aherekejwe na Madamu Jeannette Kagame, yafunguye ku mugaragaro Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House, inyubako yo ku rwego rwo hejuru izajya yakira ba mukerarugendo, yuzuye mu Karere ka Musanze, munsi y’ibirunga.
Perezida Paul Kagame aherekejwe na Madamu Jeannette Kagame, yafunguye ku mugaragaro Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House, inyubako yo ku rwego rwo hejuru izajya yakira ba mukerarugendo, yuzuye mu Karere ka Musanze, munsi y’ibirunga.
Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House igizwe n’inyubako zigezweho zubatse mu Karere ka Musanze mu Murenge wa Nyange, ku birenge by’Ikirunga cya Sabyinyo, aho uba unitegeye ibirunga bya Gahinga na Muhabura.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko ari ibyishimo mu kwifatanya n’abandi muri iki gikorwa, ashimira Luke Bailes washinze Singita Group, ku murimo ukomeye amaze gukora kugeza ubwo ikigo cye gifunguye ibikorwa mu Rwanda.
Ati “Iki ni igikorwa gikomeye ku kurengera ibidukikije muri Afurika n’iterambere ry’urwego rwo kwakira abantu kuri uyu mugabane.
Yavuze ko Singita ifite izina rikomeye mu bijyanye n’amahoteli, ku buryo u Rwanda rwishimiye kwakira iri zina mu yandi asanzwe mu gihugu.
Yanashimye amahitamo y’ibikoresho byifashishijwe mu kuyubaka byavuye mu Rwanda, uburyo bwifashisha ingufu z’izuba bwahubatswe n’imbaraga zashyizwe mu kwita ku gace iyi nyubako iherereyemo.
Yashimangiye ko kimwe na Singita, u Rwanda rushaka kwakira neza abarugana, aho gutanga serivisi nziza bigomba kuba ku isonga.
Yakomeje ati “Ndanasaba abantu batuye hano gukora cyane kugira ngo bahuze n’ibikenewe n’iyi Lodge, kugira ngo bizajye bigurishwa hano.
Uwashinze Singita, Luke Bailes, yashimiye Perezida Kagame n’abandi bose batumye Singita ibasha gufungura inyubako mu Rwanda, bityo inzozi zayo zigahinduka impamo nyuma y’imyaka itanu y’imirimo inyuranye muri iki gihugu.
Yakomeje ati “Dushimishijwe no kugira uruhare mu kurengera ibidukikije ndetse no gutanga umusanzu mu rwego rwo kwakira abantu mu Rwanda.
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB, Clare Akamanzi, yavuze ko u Rwanda rukomeje kwakira ba mukerarugendo batandukanye kandi bakeneye n’ibintu binyuranye, bityo Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House ari inyongera nziza ku byiza u Rwanda rufite bifasha ba mukerarugendo barusura.
Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House yubatswe ahantu hahoze igishanga cyari urwuri, ariko ubu hashibutse umushinga ukomeye w’ubukerarugendo ugizwe n’inzu umunani zubatswe mu buryo zirengera ibidukikije.
Zirimo zirindwi zagenewe umuntu umwe cyangwa uherekejwe kuko buri imwe ifite uburiri bumwe, uruganiriro rwagutse n’ibindi byangombwa nkenerwa, hakaba indi imwe yiswe Kataza House yo igizwe n’ibyumba bine byo kuraramo.
Yubatswe n’ibikoresho byinshi byakorewe mu Rwanda, ibyinshi ni ibiboneka i Musanze birimo amakoro n’imigano.
Ibiciro byaho byihagazeho nubwo bihindagurika bitewe n’ibihe, nk’uyu munsi uwakwifuza kuharara ari wenyine yakwishyura $1750 ku ijoro rimwe, uyavunje mu mafaranga y’u Rwanda nibura ni miliyoni 1.

Kurara muri Kataza House byo bishobora kugera ku 8000$ ku ijoro rimwe ku bantu babiri, barengaho bikaba $15 000 ku ijoro.
Muri Singita Kwitonda kandi biteganywa ko iminsi mike umuntu ashobora kwemererwa kuhamara ari itatu.
Muri icyo giciro haba hakubiyemo n’ibintu byose umuntu akenera mu ijoro, birimo ibyo kurya no kunywa byose bihaboneka.

Ramada, sosiyete ikomeye mu by’amahoteli ishobora kwinjira ku isoko ry’u Rwanda
Sosiyete y’Abarabu ikora ibijyanye n’imicungire y’amahoteli, Ramada, ishobora gutangira gukorera mu Rwanda aho bivugwa ko yafungura hotel y’ibyumba 154.
Sosiyete y’Abarabu ikora ibijyanye n’imicungire y’amahoteli, Ramada, ishobora gutangira gukorera mu Rwanda aho bivugwa ko yafungura hotel y’ibyumba 154.
Ramada ni yo sosiyete ikomeye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu mu bijyanye n’imicungire y’amahoteli, ariko igenzurwa n’indi yitwa Wyndham Hotels and Resorts.
Kugeza mu Ukuboza 2018, yari ifite amahoteli 811 afite ibyumba 114,614 mu bihugu 63 zikora mu izina rya Ramada.
Mu 2018 nibwo byatangiye kuvugwa ko Ramada iteganya gutangira ibikorwa mu Rwanda, igafungura hotel ifite ibyumba 154.
Amakuru agera kuri IGIHE, ni uko hari ibiganiro byabayeho hagati y’abashinzwe ishoramari ry’amahoteli mu Rwanda n’iyi sosiyete harebwa uburyo yatangira gukorera mu Rwanda, gusa igihe izatangirira ntikiratangazwa.
Kuva mu 2013, mu Rwanda hatangiye kwinjira amazina akomeye mu by’amahoteli bijyanye n’uko igihugu cyari gishyize imbere gushaka kuba igicumbi cy’inama.
Abashoramari bakomeye mu by’amahoteli babengutse u Rwanda nk’icyerekezo cyiza cy’ubukerarugendo ntibazuyaza kuhagaba amashami.
Aha twavuga Rezidor Hotel Group ifite Raddison blue, Hotel y’inyenyeri eshanu ifite ibyumba 292, ibyumba by’inama birimo icyakira abantu basaga 2500, ibiro byo gukoreramo n’ibindi.
Ikigo Marriot Hotels International gifite Kigali Marriot Hotel iri ku rwego rw’inyenyeri eshanu, ari na yo Marriot ya mbere yubatswe mu bihugu byo munsi y’ubutayu bwa Sahara.
Ifite amagorofa atanu, ibyumba 254 byo kuraramo, ikaba ishobora gucumbikira abantu bagera kuri 320, ibyumba 10 byo gukoreramo inama kuva ku byakira abantu 50 kugera kuri 650, na parikingi y’imyanya 120.
Hari kandi Park Inn by Radisson nayo ya Rezidor Hotel Group, hoteli y’inyenyeri enye iherereye mu Kiyovu ahahoze Hotel Kiyovu, ifite ibyumba 161, birimo iby’inama, uburiro n’ibindi; ikagira akabyiniro, ubwogero, ahaparikwa imodoka, aho gukorera imyitozo ngororamubiri, sauna n’ibindi bigezweho.
Hari n’ikigo gikomeye Hilton Hotels and Resorts cyitegura kugura Hoteli Ubumwe Grande iherereye hagati mu Mujyi wa Kigali, ikazahita ihindura izina ikitwa DoubleTree by Hilton Kigali City Centre, ndetse n’umubare w’ibyumba byayo ukazamuka bikarenga 153.
Ikigo gikomeye mu by’amahoteli muri Afurika, Protea Hotels Group, gifite umushinga wo kubaka hoteli ikomeye mu Karere ka Rusizi ‘Protea Kivu Marina Resort Hotel’.
Andi mazina akomeye y’amahoteli ari mu Rwanda ni nka Golden Tulip, Onomo Hotel, Serena Group of Hotels, Marasa, One&Only na Swiss International Hotels & Resort imenyerewe i Burayi, Aziya na Amerika.
Mu itongo kwa Richard Kandt! Igicumbi cy’ubushakashatsi, icumbi ry’abamisiyoneri ryasinyiwemo amasezerano akomeye (Amafoto)
Dr Richard Kandt, umuvumbuzi uzwi cyane mu mateka y’u Rwanda no mu Karere ka Afurika y’Uburasirazuba yageze mu Rwanda mu 1898 aje mu bikorwa by’ubushakashatsi birimo gushakisha isoko y’uruzi rwa Nile.
Dr Richard Kandt, umuvumbuzi uzwi cyane mu mateka y’u Rwanda no mu Karere ka Afurika y’Uburasirazuba yageze mu Rwanda mu 1898 aje mu bikorwa by’ubushakashatsi birimo gushakisha isoko y’uruzi rwa Nile.
Nyuma yo kuzenguruka u Rwanda umwaka wose, yaje kwiyemeza kubaka inzu y’ibyatsi yo kubamo i Shangi, aho yakorega ubushakashatsi, akayakiriramo n’abashyitsi barimo umumisiyoneri wa mbere wanahasomeye misa yabaye iya mbere y’abazungu.
Uru rugo rwasinyiwemo n’amasezerano akomeye aho Ababiligi bifuzaga ko umupaka wa Congo unyuzwa mu ishyamba rya Nyungwe, icyari Cyangugu cyose kibaka umutungo wa RDC.
Uru rugo ruherereye mu Karere ka Nyamasheke mu Murenge wa Shangi, Kandt, yaje kuruvamo ajya kuba i Kigali mu 1907, ubwo yagirwaga Rezida w’u Rwanda.
Kuwa 7-10 Kanama 2019, Umunyamakuru wa IGIHE kimwe n’abafite ibigo bifasha ba mukerarugendo mu Rwanda, basuye ahahoze urugo rwa Kandt, mu rugendo rugamije gutangiza inzira nshya y’ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku muco n’amateka.
Uru rugendo ikigo gishinzwe Ingoro z’Umurage w’u Rwanda n’Umushinga w’Abadage wita ku iterambere (GIZ) byabageneye, rwabumburiwe no gusura inkima zo mu birunga Kandt yakozeho ubushakashatsi, rukomereza i Shangi aho yabanje gutura.
Uretse ibyo bikorwa bishushanya urugendo rwa Kandt, banasuye ibindi bice nyaburanga byabyazwa umusaruro n’abafasha abakerarugendo birimo ahahoze urugo rw’Umwami Kigeli IV Rwabugiri, ingoro y’ibidukikije i Karongi, ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku burobyi n’ibindi.
Aho i Shangi uyu munsi wahagereranya n’itongo rya Richard Kandt kuko uretse kuba kwinjiramo bigoranye, n’iyo nzu bivugwa ko yahubatse utayihabona uretse ibisigazwa by’amateka yayo birimo ibiti by’imbuto, ikawa n’ibindi by’imitako byahatewe mu gihe cy’Abakoloni.
Kugera kuri uru rugo uturutse ku muhanda wa Kaburimbo mu Murenge wa Ruharambuga mu gasanteri ka Shangazi, uhabona icyapa kikuyoborayo kikugargariza ko kuhagera ugenda kilometero 10.
Winjirira mu muhanda w’igitaka ubona ukoze neza ariko uko ugenda usatira aho iyi nzu yari yubatse niko ugera ku bice bidakoze neza.
Ku marembo hari icyapa cyashyizweho n’Ikigo gishinzwe ingoro z’igihugu, kigaragaza ko ari kamwe mu duce tubitse amateka dushobora gusurwa n’abakerarugendo.
Ukihagera ubona hameze nko mu ishyamba ritarimo ibiti byinshi ariko ibirimo bikuze cyane, bikikijwe n’urugo rufite amarembo yubakishije imbaho ariko rufite akaryango gato gahora gafunze, bigaragara ko hinjirwa na nyiraho cyangwa undi wabanje kubisabira uburenganzira.
Ntabwo imodoka wabona uko uyigezamo.
Urakomanga ugategereza ko abasore bahakora baza kukubaza ikikugenza bakaguha uburenganzira bwo kujyamo, bivuze ko hari n’ubwo bashobora kubukwima bitewe n’impamvu runaka.
Ukinjira, imbere harimo agahanda gafite nka metero ebyiri gakikijwe n’ibiti by’imikindo bivugwa ko byatewe ku ngoma y’Abakoloni.
Ugenda nka metero 50 ukagera ku nzu zimaze igihe zubatswe mu 1930, mu gihe u Rwanda rwagenzurwaga n’Ababiligi ariko bigaragara ko mu gihe cyazo zari mu zigezweho.
Haruguru yazo aho bivugwa ko Kandt yari yarubatse iyo nzu y’ibyatsi harisanzuye nta kintu giteyemo uretse ibyatsi cyimeza.
Gusa hari uruhande ubonamo ikawa bigaragara ko zatewe cyera ariko zidakoreye.
Hepfo y’izo nzu ziteye irangi ry’umweru ridaheruka kuvugurwa n’amabati y’ubururu ashaje zirimo na sima, hari umwanya mugari ukikijwe n’ibiti by’inganzamarumbo.
Kubera ibimera birimo n’indabo zizikikije bihari, hahora hahereye.
Hirya gato, ka gahanda kinjiramo gakikijwe n’imikindo karakomeza kugera ku mazi y’ikiyaga cya Kivu, harimo urugendo nk’urwa metero 800, bivuga ko yari inzira Kandt n’abandi bahabaye banyuragamo bagiye cyangwa bavuye mu bwato.
Izo nzu iriho imitako itandukanya ifoto ya Richard Kandt, ay’umwami Yuhi V.
Musinga ari kumwe n’umwe mu Badage bari mu Rwanda icyo gihe n’andi asobanura bimwe mu bikorwa byahabere.
Ubwo butaka bubarizwamo iryo tongo uyu munsi ntabwo burajya mu maboko ya Leta, ni ah’umuzungu witwa Sett Manfred, Umudage wo mu muryango wa Dr Richard wamuzunguye, ndetse aza kuhagura na Leta mu 1989.
Mu itongo ry’aho Kandt yabaga uyu munsi ntabwo inzu y’ibyatsi yabagamo wayihabona.
Ni isambu nini bivugwa ho yarengaga hegitari 10 izitije ibiti by’ubwoko butandukanye birimo ibimaze imyaka isaga 100.
Dr Kandt yubatse iyi nzu y’ibyatsi iherereye i Shangi, ruguru gato y’ikiyaga cya Kivu ku wa 24 Werurwe 1899, nyuma yo kuvumbura isoko y’uruzi rwa Nile, mu ishyamba rya Nyungwe.
Igicumbi cy’ubushakashatsi
Umushakashatsi mu kigo cy’igihugu cy’ingoro z’Umurage, Mugabowagahunde Maurice, yavuze ko muri uru rugo ariho Kandt yakoreraga ubushakashatsi butandukanye.
Yasobanuye ko ariho yicaraga agakubira mu nyandiko ibintu bitandukanye yabonye bishya birimo ibijyanye n’isoko y’uruzi rwa Nil yabonye mu ishyamba rya Nyungwe, ishusho y’ikiyaga cya Kivu yashushanyije nyuma yo kukizenguruka n’amaguru n’ibindi.
Mugabowagahunde ati “Ubushashatsi bwose yabukoraga ataha hano kugera igihe bamugiriye umuyobozi w’umujyi wa Kigali mu 1907, ajya kubayo.
Yahakiriye abamisiyoneri bahasomera misa ya mbere
Mugabowagahunde yavuze ko Abamisiyoneri binjiye bwa mbere mu Rwanda baturutse i Bujumbura mu Burundi, bakagirwa inama yo kubanza kwiyegereza Richard Kandt wari uhamenyereye.
Ati “Abamisiyoneri ba mbere baza baturutse i Bujumbura mu Burundi, bayobowe na Musenyeri Joseph Hirth bamubwiye ko kugira ngo ahite ajya kureba umwami agomba kubanza kuvugana na Kandt wari uhamenyereye, akamubwira uko yabyitwaramo.
Muri icyo gihe Musenyeri Joseph Hirth yari ategereje kugirwa inama na Kandt, we na bagenzi be b’abamisiyoneri basomeye misa ya mbere i Shangi mu rugo rwa Kandt, yitabiriwe n’abaturage bacye.

Nyuma yaho Ababiligi baje kongera gushaka ko umupaka wimuka, ukava aho u Rwanda rugabanira na Congo, ugaca muri Nyungwe iki gice [Cya Cyangugu] kikajya muri Congo, Richard Kandt arabyanga.

MTN yatangaje ibiciro bishya byo kohererezanya amafaranga kuri telefoni
MTN Rwanda yatangaje ibiciro bishya byo kohererezanya amafaranga kuri telefoni nyuma y’uko hari hashize amezi atatu iyi serivisi itangirwa ubuntu mu Rwanda mu kwimakaza ikoreshwa ry’ikoranabuhanga hirindwa ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
MTN Rwanda yatangaje ibiciro bishya byo kohererezanya amafaranga kuri telefoni nyuma y’uko hari hashize amezi atatu iyi serivisi itangirwa ubuntu mu Rwanda mu kwimakaza ikoreshwa ry’ikoranabuhanga hirindwa ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda (BNR) yaraye itangaje ko ikiguzi cyo guherekanya amafaranga hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga kigiye gusubizwaho ndetse kigomba gutangira kubahirizwa kuva tariki ya 22 Kamena 2020.
Mu biciro bishya MTN yatangaje, ni uko mafaranga ari munsi ya 1000 Frw, umuntu azajya acibwa 20 Frw.
Naho ku mafaranga ari hagati ya 1001 Frw na 10000 Frw ikiguzi ni 100 Frw.
Ku mafaranga ari hagati ya 10001 Frw na 150000 Frw, uwohereza azajya acibwa amafaranga 250 Frw.
Ku mafaranga ari hagati ya 150001 Frw na 2000000 Frw, ho ikiguzi ni 1500 Frw.
MTN Rwanda yatangaje ko ku zindi serivisi zirimo nko kugura umuriro w’amashanyarazi, amafaranga yo guhamagara, kwishyura lisansi, parikingi, ifatabuguzi rya televiziyo na Yego Moto ho nta mafaranga azajya acibwa umukiliya.
Umubare w’amafaranga yehererekanyijwe mu Rwanda hifashisijwe ikoranabuhanga hagati ya Mutarama na Mata 2020, wageze kuri miliyari 40 Frw; bivuze ko yiyongereye ku kigero cya 450% avuye kuri miliyari 7.
2 Frw zahererekanyijwe mu cyumweru cya mbere cya Mutarama 2020.
Nk’uko bigaragara muri raporo yakozwe n’ikigo insight2impact ku bufatanye na RURA, mu cyumweru cya mbere cya gahunda ya Guma mu Rugo umubare w’abahererekanya amafaranga mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga wageze kuri miliyoni 1.
2, uvuye ku bantu 600 000 mu cyumweru cyari cyabanjirije Guma mu Rugo.
Mu cyumweru cya nyuma cya Mata 2020, abantu miliyoni 1.
8 bahererekanyije amafaranga mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga mu Rwanda.
Guhera tariki 9 Werurwe kugeza tariki 15 Werurwe, hahererekanyijwe miliyari 10.
7 Frw ariko mu cyumweru cyarangiye tariki 22 Werurwe amafaranga yahererekanyijwe mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga yari ageze kuri miliyari 24 Frw.
Ikoranabuhanga rya Tap&Go rigeze kure rinozwa ngo risakazwe mu gihugu hose
Mu nama y’abaminisitiri yateranye tariki 30 Mata 2020, igamije kongera kwiga ku Cyorezo cya COVID-19 n’ingamba zo gukomeza kukirwanya ngo kidakwirakwira mu Rwanda, harimo umwanzuro wafashwe ko abantu bakangurirwa gukomeza gukoresha ikoranabuhanga igihe cyose bishoboka, haba mu kwishyurana no gukoresha serivisi z’imari.
Mu nama y’abaminisitiri yateranye tariki 30 Mata 2020, igamije kongera kwiga ku Cyorezo cya COVID-19 n’ingamba zo gukomeza kukirwanya ngo kidakwirakwira mu Rwanda, harimo umwanzuro wafashwe ko abantu bakangurirwa gukomeza gukoresha ikoranabuhanga igihe cyose bishoboka, haba mu kwishyurana no gukoresha serivisi z’imari.
Serivizi zo gutwara abantu mu modoka niho hakunze kugaragara cyane ihererekanya ry’amafaranga, gusa mu Mujyi wa Kigali ho byaracitse kuko abakoresha imodoka rusange bashyiriweho amakarita azwi nka Tap&Go aho umuntu ayishyira ku modoka akagenda, ikibazo kikaba kikigaragara cyane ku modoka zikora ingendo mu Ntara.
Urwego Ngenzuramikorere RURA, rwavuze ko iyi gahunda y’ikoranabuhanga imaze kugezwa hamwe na mu gihugu ariko bagikomeje kuyinoza kugira ngo abantu bareke guhererekanya amafaranga hirindwa icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RURA, Lt Col Patrick Nyirishema, yabwiye itangazamakuru ati “No mu Ntara iryo koranabuhanga ryarahageze gusa iki cyorezo cyaje bitarakwirakwiza mu ngendo zose, gusa nk’ubu abantu bagana mu Majyaruguru mu nzira zijya i Musanze, Rubavu cyangwa se ujya i Huye uvuye i Kigali birakora, muri make ahantu hamwe na hamwe mu gihugu rirakoreshwa, turimo kureba uko ryakwirakwizwa n’ahandi ritaragera kugira ngo aho bagikoresha amafaranga biveho.
Yavuze ko uburyo ryateganyijwe ari uko bigenda bitandukanaho gato n’uko bimeze mu Mujyi Kigali.
Ati “Ubundi ingendo zo mu Ntara uko ziteye ni uko umuntu agura itike akava wenda i Kigali akajya i Musanze, turimo kureba uko byahuzwa n’irikoreshwa i Kigali, ariko hakaba hanabaho gukoresha telefoni ku buryo nayo yajya ikora nk’ikarita kandi iryo koranabuhanga tumaze kurigera kure.
Niba umuntu ashaka kujya nk’i Rubavu azajya afata telefone ye ashake Porogaramu ya Tap&Go yinjiremo hanyuma ufungure konti akoresheje amazina na nimero za telefone, abone aho kugurira itike bitewe n’aho agiye.
Yongeyeho ati “Twagiye kwinjira mu cyorezo cya Coronavirus hari byinshi bimaze gukorwa nubwo byose byari bitarajya ahagaragara, ubu twongeye kubisubukura kugira ngo tubyihutishe, icyo twifuza ni uko mu minsi iri imbere abantu bava mu gukoresha amafaranga mu ntoki.
Yavuze ko ibi bitazakorwa gusa ku modoka ahubwo RURA iteganya ko mu gihe moto zizaba zitangiye gukora, harebwa uko abantu bazajya bakoresha amatelefoni bakishyura.
Hashize imyaka irenga ine mu Rwanda hatangiye uburyo bwo kwishyura ingendo hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga rizwi nka Tap&Go.
Ryakemuye byinshi, rinanoza imitangire ya serivisi mu gutwara abantu.
Instagram ishobora guca kuri Twitter mu kuba isoko y’amakuru
Urubuga nkoranyambaga rwa Instagram rwitezweho guca kuri Twitter mu kuba isoko y’amakuru ku bakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga, nk’uko byasohowe muri Raporo Reuters Institute Digital News.
Urubuga nkoranyambaga rwa Instagram rwitezweho guca kuri Twitter mu kuba isoko y’amakuru ku bakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga, nk’uko byasohowe muri Raporo Reuters Institute Digital News.
Iyo raporo ivuga ko mu mwaka utaha wa 2021, Instagram izaba iri ku mwanya wa mbere mu kuba urubuga nkoranyambaga rushakirwaho amakuru cyane ku isi.
Urwo rubuga rwazanye uburyo bwinshi butuma abarukoresha barutindaho, nk’uburyo usangiza abandi inkuru shya (stories) na IGTV ituma abantu bashobora gusangira amashusho maremare kurusha uko byari bisanzwe.
Raporo yerekanye ko kuri ubu, 11 % by’abakoresha Instagram baba bagiye gushakaho amakuru mu gihe ababigenza gutyo kuri Twitter ari 12 %.
Bagaragaza ko bibiri bya gatatu by’abantu bakoresha telefone bashaka amakuru bayakura ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, ari nabyo bitanga icyizere ko umubare wabo uzagenda wiyongera.
Nko muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, mu bantu bari hagati y’imyaka 18 na 24, abagera kuri 26 % muri Mata uyu mwaka bifashishije Instagram bashaka amakuru kuri Coronavirus.
Ni mu gihe abashatse amakuru mu gihe nk’icyo bifashishije Snapchat ari 14 % naho TikTok ni 11 %.
Mu bakoreweho isuzuma, 26 % bavuze ko bizera amakuru kuri coronavirus bakura kuri Facebook na Twitter.
Ibigo bikomeye bifite imbuga nkoranyambaga byakajije uburyo bwo kugenzura amakuru abitangazwaho hagamijwe kugabanya ibihuha no gutuma ababishakaho amakuru barushaho kubyizera.
Facebook yatangije ihahiro ku mbuga zayo zitandukanye
Urubuga nkoranyambaga rwa Facebook rwatangaje ko rwashyizeho uburyo bw’iguriro rizajya rifasha abacuruzi kwamamaza no kugurisha ibicuruzwa byabo mu buryo bworoshye, mu gihe abenshi bahejejwe mu rugo n’icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Urubuga nkoranyambaga rwa Facebook rwatangaje ko rwashyizeho uburyo bw’iguriro rizajya rifasha abacuruzi kwamamaza no kugurisha ibicuruzwa byabo mu buryo bworoshye, mu gihe abenshi bahejejwe mu rugo n’icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Ibi ngo bizafasha ibigo bito n’ibiciriritse kureshya abakiliya babyo aho baherereye hose, bagure ibicuruzwa bitandukanye bifashishije uburyo bwa “Facebook Shops".
Mark Zuckerberg uyobora Facebook yavuze ko gukora iduka hifashishijwe Facebook ari ubuntu ku bigo byose bibyifuza kuko ikigamijwe ari ukwamamaza ibicuruzwa bitandukanye.
Yongeyeho ko iduka runaka niryaguka rikagira agaciro nk’ak’ikigo kinini mu bucuruzi, na bo bazunguka amafaranga kuko abantu bakoresha Facebook bagura ibicuruzwa bazaba biyongereye.
Ibigo bito n’ibiciriritse bizakoresha ‘Facebook Shops’ bizaba bifite uburyo bwo kwishyura amatangazo yamamaza, azabifasha gukurura abaguzi batandukanye bakerekeza ku iduka ryabo mu buryo bworoshye haba kuri Facebook na Instagram.
Biteganyijwe ko ubu buryo bw’iduka ryo kuri internet Facebook izanabushyira ku zindi mbuga nkoranyambaga zayo za Messenger na WhatsApp, ku buryo bizongera n’igihe abakoresha izo mbuga nkoranyambaga bamara bazikoresha.
Byitezwe ko abazashaka kugurira ibintu bitandukanye kuri Facebook bazajya babona amoko menshi y’ibintu bigezweho kandi bakaba banakwishyura ibyo bahashye bitabasabye kujya ku zindi mbuga za internet.
Imikorere yagutse y’iri hahiro Facebook yatangije izaba iri gukora neza mu mezi abiri ari imbere, aho ibigo bisaga miliyoni 160 bizaba byamaze gushyirwaho neza.
Facebook ivuga ko iri koranabuhanga rizafasha cyane ibigo byari bitangiye guhungabana kubera Coronavirus kandi rikazarushaho gukoreshwa cyane muri iki gihe Isi iri kwitabira isoko ryo kuri internet.
Kwamamaza hakoreshejwe video z’ako kanya ni bumwe mu buryo buzabyazwa umusaruro muri iri soko rya Facebook kuko abantu basaga miliyoni 800 bareba video zo kuri Facebook na Instagram buri munsi.
Airtel yatangije ‘Application’ ya mbere ihuriza hamwe serivise zose isanzwe itanga
Mu rugendo rukomeje rwo kurushaho gufasha abanyarwanda, by’umwihariko abakiriya ba yo, Airtel-Rwanda yatangije porogaramu ya telefone izajya ifasha abakiriya ba yo bose kurushaho gukoresha serivisi ibagezaho bitabasabye kuva aho bari cyangwa ngo bagire undi bitabaza.
Mu rugendo rukomeje rwo kurushaho gufasha abanyarwanda, by’umwihariko abakiriya ba yo, Airtel-Rwanda yatangije porogaramu ya telefone izajya ifasha abakiriya ba yo bose kurushaho gukoresha serivisi ibagezaho bitabasabye kuva aho bari cyangwa ngo bagire undi bitabaza.
Iri koranabuhanga rikubiye muri porogaramu yiswe ‘My Airtel App’, rifasha urikoresha kuryoherwa na serivisi zose zitangwa na Airtel bitamugoye na gato kandi ziri ahantu hamwe.
Serivise ziri muri ‘My Airtel App’ zirimo izo “kugura ama-inite, internet, kwishyura ibyo ukeneye byose nk’amazi, amashanyarazi, ifatabuguzi rya televiziyo, […] kohereza amafaranga haba mu Rwanda no mu mahanga, byose bigakorwa hifashishijwe ikarita ya banki cyangwa Airtel Money.
Umukiriya wa Airtel kandi azaba ashobora kureba uko ibikorwa byo kwishyura byagenze no kugenzura ibyakorewe kuri simukadi ye ya Airtel byose yinjiriye ahantu hamwe.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Airtel Rwanda, Amit Chawla, yavuze ko ibihe bidasanzwe isi irimo byo guhangana n’ingaruka za COVID-19 byatumye habaho impinduka zikomeye by’umwihariko mu bucuruzi n’ibindi bikorwa bihuza bantu benshi, bityo ko izo mpinduka zikwiye kubyazwa amahirwe, abantu bagaterana imbere na zo.
Ati “ Twashyizeho iyi porogaramu nyuma y’igihe kinini dukora ubushakashatsi ku byo abakiriya bakunze gukenera, tumaze no kumva neza ko bakeneye urubuga bakoreraho ibintu byose, bitabatwaye umwanya kandi bakabikora ku buryo buboroheye.
Yakomeje avuga ko gukoresha iyi porogaramu nshya bizarushaho gufasha abakiriya ba Airtel Rwanda kumenyera serivise zifashisha ikoranabuhanga rikomeje gushyirwa imbere mu bikorwa bitandukanye mu Rwanda.
Ati “Gukoresha iyi porogaramu yo kwihereza biroroshye, birizewe kandi bizorohereza abakiriya ba Airtel gukora ibintu byinshi harimo kureba ama inite bafite kuri telephone zabo, interineti bafiteho, ayo bafite kuri Airtel Money, banabashe kongeramo ama inite, kureba no kugura pack zihari zitandukanye.
‘My Airtel App’ ikora igihe cyose (24/7), izanafasha abayikoresha gukurikirana buri gihe ibibera kuri konti za bo za banki na Airtel Money bitabagoye na gato, ndetse ikaba idasaba kuba umuntu afite internet mu gihe ari kuyikoresha.
Umutekano w’iyi ‘Application’ wizewe ku rwego rwo hejuru kuko itemerera undi muntu kuba yakoresha imyirondoro yawe agamije kwiba amafaranga ufite kuri konti iyo ari yo yose cyangwa gukora ikindi kintu cyabangamira umukiriya wa Airtel uyikoresha.
Ibi kandi bijyana n’uko telefone zose zigaragaweho kuba imiterere ya zo yakorohereza abajura kwiba uyikoresha, itemera kuyijyamo.
Akarusho kandi ni uko kugura ama-inite ukoresheje iyi ‘application’ biguhesha uburenganzira bwo guhabwa inyongera ndetse koherereza undi muntu byo bikaguhesha ubwasisi bwa 5% by’ama-inite yose wohereje.
Iyi application izorohereza abajyaga bagorwa no gufata mu mutwe za kode zitandukanye mu kugura cyangwa gukoresha serivise za Airtel kuko buri kimwe cyose cyorohejwe muri ‘My Airtel App’.
Ubuyobozi bwa Airtel Rwanda buvuga ko gukoresha iyi application bizarushaho kugabanya guhura kw’abantu muri ibi bihe byo guhangana na COVID-19.
Umuntu ukeneye gukoresha iyi porogaramu ya ’My Airtel App’ ajya muri ’Play Store’ kubakoresha telefoni za ’Android’ cyangwa ’App Store’ ku bakoresha iOS; ukandika mu ishakiro "My Airtel", hakaza ifite amagambo ya ’Airtel Africa’, ubundi ukayishyira muri telefone yawe nk’uko bikorwa ku zindi porogaramu.
Umaze kuyishyiramo, urayifungura, ukuzuzamo nomero yawe, ubundi ugakurikiza amabwiriza ajyanye n’ibyo bagusaba.
Mu gutangaza ku mugaragaro imikorere y’iyi porogaramu, Airtel Rwanda yaboneyeho no gushimira uburyo abanyarwanda muri rusange bari kwitwara muri ibi bihe byo guhangana na COVID-19, ndetse yongera kubasaba kurushaho kubahiriza amabwiriza yashyizweho na Minisiteri y’Ubuzima muri ibi bihe bidasanzwe.
Ishyirwa hanze ry’ububasha bwo kwihereza bwahawe abakiriya ba Airtel ni kimwe mu bikorwa bigaragaza umuhati wa Airtel mu kugeza ku mukiriya serivise nziza zijyanye n’ikoranabuhanga no kubaha ubushobozi bwo kwicungira ibikorwa byose byo ku murongo wabo wa Airtel, nta wundi bitabaje.

MTN Rwanda igiye guhagarika internet ya ’4G unlimited’
Ikigo cy’Itumanaho MTN Rwanda cyatangaje ko guhera ku wa 1 Nyakanga kizahagarika kugurisha internet ya 4 G umuntu yajyaga akoresha ikarangira gusa bijyanye n’itariki yahawe, izwi nka 4G unlimited internet.
Ikigo cy’Itumanaho MTN Rwanda cyatangaje ko guhera ku wa 1 Nyakanga kizahagarika kugurisha internet ya 4 G umuntu yajyaga akoresha ikarangira gusa bijyanye n’itariki yahawe, izwi nka 4G unlimited internet.
Iki kigo cyatangaje ko ariko abakiliya bari bayiguze bazakomeza kuyikoresha, kugeza iminsi 30 bahawe ubwo bayiguraga, irangiye.
Ni internet iyo umuntu yayiguze, yayikoreshaga yisanzuye nta mpungenge z’uko ishobora gushira ibyo ashaka gukora bitarangiye.
Mu butumwa yashyize ahagaragara, MTN Rwanda yakomeje iti "Ariko, nugura iyo internet yawe mbere y’iyo tariki yavuzwe, ushobora kuyikoresha kugeza irangiye nyuma y’iminsi 30 uhereye igihe wayiguriye.
MTN Rwanda yatangaje ko izindi bundle za 4G zizakomeza kugurwa abantu bakanze *345# nk’uko bisanzwe, bagakurikiza ibisabwa.

Amazon yangiye Polisi ya Amerika gukoresha ikoranabuhanga ryayo rihuza amasura
Sosiyete ya Amazon yanze kwemerera Polisi ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kwifashisha porogaramu yayo, ikoreshwa mu guhuza isura y’umuntu n’ifoto iri mu mwirondoro we.
Sosiyete ya Amazon yanze kwemerera Polisi ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kwifashisha porogaramu yayo, ikoreshwa mu guhuza isura y’umuntu n’ifoto iri mu mwirondoro we.
Ni ikoranabuhanga ryari risanzwe rikoreshwa n’ibigo bitandukanye mu gihe bari mu iperereza ku muntu runaka, bashaka guhuza isura bafashe n’iy’umuntu bakeka.
Imikorere y’iyo porogaramu yari isanzwe ikemangwa ariko byarushijeho mu minsi ishize ubwo umwirabura George Floyd yicwaga anizwe n’umupolisi.
Hari amajwi yakomeje kwiyongera asaba ko Polisi ibuzwa kongera gukoresha iyo porogaramu kuko yibasira abirabura cyane kurusha abazungu.
Amazon ihagarikiye Polisi nyuma y’icyumweru sosiyete IBM nayo ihagaritse porogaramu yayo ku bayikoresha bashaka kumenya abantu bari mu kivunge ndetse n’abashaka kumenya umuntu bashingiye ku ibara ry’uruhu rwe.
Amazon yatangaje ko yahagaritse ikoreshwa rya porogaramu yayo kugira ngo Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ya Amerika ibanze ishyireho amategeko y’uburyo iryo koranabuhanga rizajya rikoreshwa.
Iyo sosiyete yatanze igihe kingana n’umwaka kugira ngo Inteko ibe yatoye itegeko ryerekena uburyo bwiza iyo porogaramu yajya ikoreshwa ntawe ibereye.
Icyakora, Amazon yatangaje ko ku miryango n’ibigo birwanya icuruzwa ry’abantu bazemererwa gukoresha iryo koranabuhanga.
Porogaramu ya Rekognition ikoresha ubuhanga buhambaye (Artificial Intelligence, AI) ikabasha guhuza ifoto yafashwe n’andi mafoto ajyana n’imyirondoro y’umuntu aba abitse mu ikusanyamakuru rya Leta.
Ni Porogaramu ishobora gushakisha ifoto imwe mu mafoto menshi ikayihuza n’iyafashwe ako kanya.
Icyakora abanenga iryo koranabuhana bavuga ko rikunze kwibeshya ku masura y’Abirabura rikabahuza n’abo badasa nabo, ugereranyije n’uko rimenya abazungu.
IBM yo yahagaritse ikoreshwa rya porogaramu yayo ivuga ko itizeye ikoranabuhanga ry’inzego zishinzwe umutekano kuko rishobora kwibeshya, ngo keretse babanje kurisuzuma.
Hatangiye gukoreshwa ikoranabuhanga ryitezweho kugoboka abarimu 10 000 bahagaritswe mu kazi
Impuguke mu ikoranabuhanga zikorera Ikigo kizwi nka Loxotech zatangiye gukoresha urubuga ruzafasha abanyeshuri gukomeza amasomo yabo mu bihe bya COVID-19 ariko rikaba ryanatanga akazi ku barimu ibihumbi 10 biganjemo abamaze gusezererwa n’ibigo bakoreraga kubera kubura ubushobozi.
Impuguke mu ikoranabuhanga zikorera Ikigo kizwi nka Loxotech zatangiye gukoresha urubuga ruzafasha abanyeshuri gukomeza amasomo yabo mu bihe bya COVID-19 ariko rikaba ryanatanga akazi ku barimu ibihumbi 10 biganjemo abamaze gusezererwa n’ibigo bakoreraga kubera kubura ubushobozi.
Iri koranabuhanga ryitezweho gutanga igisubizo ku kibazo cyatangiye kugaragara nyuma y’aho Inama y’Abaminisitiri yo ku wa 30 Mata 2020 igamije kwiga ku cyorezo cya COVID-19 n’ingamba zo gukomeza kukirwanya, ifashe umwanzuro ko amashuri azakomeza gufunga kugeza muri Nzeri.
Aya makuru akimenyekana abanyeshuri batangiye kwibaza niba batagiye kudindira mu masomo yabo ndetse biba intandaro yo kubura akazi ku barimu bo mu mashuri yigenga kuko ibigo bakorera byahise bibahagarika.
Kuva aba barimu bahagarikwa ntibasibye kugaragaza ko iki cyemezo cyagize ingaruka ku mibereho yabo.
Mu rwego rwo kuziba icyuho, hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga Loxotech yashyizeho urubuga rwitwa Homeskull.
Binyuze kuri uru rubuga abarimu bazajya biyandikisha ubundi basabwe gutanga imyirondoro yabo igaragaza aho bigishije, nyuma yo kugenzurwa n’ikipe ifite ubumenyi buhagije mu burezi bigenwe niba bahabwa akazi cyangwa batagahabwa.
Ku banyeshuri bifuza guhabwa aya masomo nabo bazajya bafungura konti kuri uru rubuga, ubundi batange amafaranga runaka azanifashishwa mu kwishyura abarimu.
Amasomo azajya atangirwa kuri uru buga ni ayo mu mashuri abanza n’ayisumbuye ariko umwana akazajya aba afite uburenganzira bw’umubare runaka w’amasomo ashaka kwiga.
Umwe mu bashinze uru rubuga Nshizirungu Olivier avuga ko ruzaba isoko y’akazi ku barimu.
Yagize ati “Dushobora guha akazi abarimu ibihumbi 10, mu gihe abana baba bamaze kubyitabira, ntabwo tuzafata abarimu 10 000 bose ngo tubahere akazi icyarimwe abana bose bataramara kuza ku rubuga, uko bazajya biyongera niko tuzajya twongera n’umubare w’abarimu"
Nshizirungu akomeza avuga ko uru rubuga rutaje gusimbura amashuri asanzwe.
Yakomeje agira ati “Ni ubufasha turi gutanga ntabwo uru rubuga ruje gusimbura amashuri yari asanzwe, icyo rugiye gukora ni ugufasha abana kwiga kugira ngo bazajye gusubira mu mashuri bataratakaye.
Uru rubuga ruzanafasha abanyeshuri bifuza gukomeza amasomo yabo muri ibi bihe bya COVID-19 ariko bakaba bafite imbogamizi zo kubona abarimu cyane ko batabasanga mu rugo kuko bitemewe.
Kuri Nshizirungu yemeza ko ubu buryo buzaba bufite umwihariko “ku rubuga rwacu umwana azajya agira ubushobozi bwo kwiga arebana na mwarimu hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga kandi amubaze ibibazo byose ashaka kumubaza ndetse mu gihe umwana azaba atabyumvise amashusho yafashwe azajya yibika abashe kongera kuyareba.
Yakomeje avuga hazajya hagenzurwa uburyo umwarimu yigisha “Mu gihe tubonye ko hari abarimu batari gutanga ibyo abanyeshuri babitezeho tuzabasaba kwikosora n’ibinanirana bibe byabaganisha mu gukurwaho.
Nshizirungu avuga ko ubu buryo buzorohereza abana bazaba bagiye gukora ibizamini bya Leta kuko amasomo yose bazaba barahawe azabikwa ahantu hamwe bakazajya babasha kuyasubiramo uko babishaka.
Abarimu bazahabwa akazi ko kwigisha binyuze kuri uru rubuga bazajya babona umushahara udashobora kujya munsi y’ibihumbi 150 Frw ariko unashobora kwiyongera bitewe n’umubare w’amasomo n’abanyeshuri yigisha.
Mu gihe gito uru rubuga rumaze rutangiye abanyeshuri 50 n’abarimu 15 batangiye kurukoresha.
U Bushinwa bwohereje mu kirere rocket izamura ibyogajuru mu mushinga wabwo wo kugera ku kwezi
U Bushinwa bugeze kure umugambi wabwo wo kubaka mu isanzure igice gikorerwamo ubushakashatsi kikanagenzura ibyogajuru ndetse no kugera ku kwezi, aho ku wa Kabiri bwohereje mu kirere " Chang-Zheng 5B", rocket ishobora kuzamura ibyogajuru yikoreye toni 22.
U Bushinwa bugeze kure umugambi wabwo wo kubaka mu isanzure igice gikorerwamo ubushakashatsi kikanagenzura ibyogajuru ndetse no kugera ku kwezi, aho ku wa Kabiri bwohereje mu kirere " Chang-Zheng 5B", rocket ishobora kuzamura ibyogajuru yikoreye toni 22.
Iki gikorwa cyabereye mu Majyepfo y’Igihugu mu gace kitwa Wenchang.
Chang-Zheng 5B ifite moteri icumi ndetse ireshya na metero 53.
7 n’umubyimba wa metero eshanu.
Ni nini kurusha Ariane 6 iri hafi koherezwa n’ibihugu by’u Burayi kuko yo ishobora gutwara toni 21,6.
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu nibwo Chang-Zheng 5B, izagaruka ku Isi aho izagwa mu Burasirazuba bw’u Bushinwa.
Ibi biri muri gahunda u Bushinwa bufite ko mu 2022 buzaba bwamaze kubaka mu isanzure station ishobora kugenzura ibyogajuru, umushinga witwa Tiangong-3.
Mu 2021 nibwo u Bushinwa buzatangira kohereza mu kirere ibikoresho byo kubaka iyo station.
Iyi rocket u Bushinwa bwohereje mu kirere, izafasha kandi mu mushinga wa Chang’e 5 wo kugera ku kwezi mu mpera za 2020.
U Bushinwa kandi buri kwiga uburyo bwatangira kugerageza amahirwe yo kugera ku mubumbe wa Mars.
Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika nicyo gihugu cyonyine kugeza ubu cyabashije kohereza abantu ku kwezi.
Netflix igiye guhagarika konti z’abantu bamaze igihe batayikoresha kandi bishyura
Urubuga rwa Netflix rwerekanirwaho amashusho binyuze kuri internet rwatangaje ko rugiye gutangira guhagarika konti z’abakiliya barwo bigaragara ko bamaze igihe kirenga umwaka nta kintu bareba kandi bishyura.
Urubuga rwa Netflix rwerekanirwaho amashusho binyuze kuri internet rwatangaje ko rugiye gutangira guhagarika konti z’abakiliya barwo bigaragara ko bamaze igihe kirenga umwaka nta kintu bareba kandi bishyura.
Netflix yerekana ibiganiro byo mu bihugu bitandukanye biciye kuri internet birimo nka filime mbarankuru n’iz’ubundi bwoko, ariko bigasaba kubanza kuba umufatabuguzi.
Kuba umufatabuguzi wa Netflix, umuntu asabwa amafaranga ari hagati y’amadolari arindwi na $ 14 ku kwezi bitewe n’icyiciro ashaka kubarizwamo.
Akurwa kuri konti ye yatanze yiyandikasha bwa mbere.
Ubuyobozi bwa Netflix bwatangaje ko bwasanze hari abantu bakurwaho amafaranga buri kwezi nyamara badaheruka kugira icyo bareba kuri urwo rubuga.
Bwatangaje ko konti zigaragaza kumara umwaka zitanga amafaranga ariko nta kintu zireba zigiye guhagarikwa.
Ni umwanzuro ugamije gufasha abakiliya bibagiwe ko biyandikishije kuri Netflix, kudasesagura amafaranga yabo.
Abakiliya bamaze umwaka batareba amashusho kuri Netflix ariko bishyura, bazandikirwa bamenyeshwe, babazwe niba bagikeneye kubana na Netflix.
Mu gihe uwabajijwe adasubije, konti ye izahagarikwa.
Uzashaka kongera kuba umukiliya azabisaba konti ye ikangurwe.
Netflix yatangaje ko abantu bangana na 0.
5 % by’abakiliya bayo aribo babarizwa muri icyo cyiciro cy’abishyura batareba.
Netflix irebwa mu bihugu 190 hirya no hino ku Isi, aho ifite abakiliya basaga miliyoni 182.
Yabonye abayikoresha bashya bagera kuri miliyoni 16 muri ibi bihe bya Coronavirus.
Australie yaciye agahigo mu kugira internet yihuta kurusha izindi ku Isi
Abashakashatsi bo muri Australie baciye agahigo ko gukoresha internet yihuta kurusha izindi ku Isi, aho iyo babonye ishobora gukoresha nibura terabyte 44.
2 mu isegonda.
Abashakashatsi bo muri Australie baciye agahigo ko gukoresha internet yihuta kurusha izindi ku Isi, aho iyo babonye ishobora gukoresha nibura terabyte 44.
2 mu isegonda.
Itsinda ryo muri Kaminuza yitwa Monash, Swinburne na RMIT niryo ryakoze ubwo bushakashatsi.
Ryifashishije agakoresho gato bashyize mu muyoboro ukoreshwa mu guhanahana amakuru mu itumanaho rikoreshwa mu Mujyi wa Melbourne.
Ako gakoresho bagashyize ku muyoboro usanzwe ukoreshwa n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu muri Australie gishinzwe umuyoboro wa internet, aba ariwo wakoreraho ubushakashatsi.
Aba bahanga bavuze ko mu gihe cy’imyaka ibiri cyangwa itatu, bene ako gakoresho kazaba kaboneka ku buryo kakoreshwa mu bushakashatsi hanyuma mu gihe cy’imyaka itanu kagatangira gucuruzwa.
Magingo aya, Singapore niyo icuruza internet yihuta kurusha izindi zose aho umuturage ashobora kugura internet imuha megabyte (mbps) 197.
3 mu isegonda.
Ubusanzwe muri Australie, ikigereranyo cy’uburyo internet yihuta kiri kuri mbps 43.
4, igenda gahoro nibura inshuro 1000 ugereranyije n’iyo aba bashakashatsi babonye mu igerageza ryabo.
Iyo internet babonye, ihesha umuntu uri kuyikoresho ubushobozi bwo kuba yamanura (download) filimi nibura 1000 zifite amashusho ya HD mu gihe cy’isegonda.
Nko mu Bwongereza ho, umuyoboro mugari wa internet uvuduka ku kigero cya mbps 64.
Ako gakoresho bifashishije kugira ngo babone iyi internet, kari mu bwoko bumwe n’akifashishwa mu miyoboro migari ya internet (fibre-optique) hirya no hino ku Isi.
Ibyavuye muri ubu bushakashatsi, byatanze isura y’uko mu gihe kiri imbere internet izaba imeze hirya no hino ku Isi.
Twitter yatangiye igerageza ku buryo bushya bwo gutangaza ikintu hifashishijwe amajwi
Urubuga nkoranyambaga rwa Twitter rwatangiye kugerageza uburyo bushya uretse kuba abantu basangiza abandi amagambo n’amafoto muri tweet, noneho bashobora gushyiraho ijwi ryabo.
Ni uburyo bwatangiranye ariko n’abakoresha Twitter kuri iOS.
Urubuga nkoranyambaga rwa Twitter rwatangiye kugerageza uburyo bushya uretse kuba abantu basangiza abandi amagambo n’amafoto muri tweet, noneho bashobora gushyiraho ijwi ryabo.
Ni uburyo bwatangiranye ariko n’abakoresha Twitter kuri iOS.
Ubuyobozi bw’uru rubuga, kuri uyu wa Gatatu bwatangaje ko rimwe na rimwe iyo umuntu ashaka kugira icyo atangaza kuri Twitter hari ubwo inyuguti 280 zishobora kuba zidahagije, uburyohe bw’ikiganiro bugatakarira mu gusoma no gusemura ikivugwa.
Bukomeza buti "Rero guhera uyu munsi turimo kugerageza uburyo bushya buzatuma umuntu ashobora gukora byinshi igihe yifashisha Twitter – ugakoresha ijwi ryawe.
Inzira izajya ikoreshwa mu gutangaza tweet ukoresheje ijwi ntaho itaniye no gukoresha amagambo.
Bizajya bisaba kujya ahandikwa, ukabona akantu gashya kongewemo gafite ishusho y’imirongo igaragaza amajwi.
Ukanzeho hahita haza ifoto ukoresha kuri twitter n’ahantu ho gufatira amajwi ahagana hasi, ukahakanda ugatangira gufata ijwi ushaka gutangaza.
Muri ubu buryo bushya, ubutumwa utangaza mu buryo bw’amajwi buba bufite amasegonda atarenga 140, ni ukuvuga iminota ibiri n’amasegonda makumyabiri.
Umuntu ashobora gukomeza kuvuga, ku buryo iyo amasegonda yagenwe arangiye bitifunga, ahubwo hirema urukurikirane rw’amajwi rimwe munsi y’irindi (thread) hakurikijwe uburebure ntarengwa bwashyizweho, bigakora tweets zitarenga 25.
Iyo usoje ukanda ahanditse “Done", ubundi bakagusubiza aho watangiriye handitse “Tweet", ugasangiza abagukurikira ibitekerezo ariko noneho wifashishijwe amajwi.
Twiter yakomeje iti "Abantu bazabona ubutumwa bwawe aho barebera ibyo abandi batangaje (tweets).
Igihe ushaka kubwumva, ukanda mu ifoto.
Ni uburyo bwatangiye kwifashishwa ku bakoresha iPhone kuko zubakiye kuri porogaramu ya iOS.
Ijwi rifungukira ahagana hasi, ugakomeza kuryumva n’igihe waba urimo gusoma ibindi byatangajwe kuri Twitter cyangwa igihe unavuye muri iyi application ya Twitter kuri iOS ukaba ugiye mu bindi, kereka urihagaritse.
Twitter yakomeje iti "Gukora Tweets zo mu majwi biraza kugaragara ku bantu bake bakoresha Twitter kuri iOS mu ntangiriro, ariko mu byumweru biri imbere buri wese ukoreha iOS azaba ashobora gutangaza ubutumwa binyuze mu ijwi.
Buri wese azaba ashobora kubwumva no gusubiza.
Kuri iyi nshuro ariko bizaba bishoboka gusa gukoresha ijwi nka tweet, ntabwo birashoboka ko ukoresha ijwi mu gusubiza ku byo undi yatangaje (reply) cyangwa kubisakaza wongeyeho igitekerezo cyawe (Retweet with Comment).
Ubuyobozi bwa Twitter buvuga ko hari ibintu umuntu atabasha kuvuga cyangwa gusobanura akoresheje amagambo yanditse, ku buryo yizera ko kwifashisha amajwi bizatuma abantu barushaho gusabana.
Ni uburyo buzafasha cyane nk’abakeneye kubara inkuru zabo, abanyamakuru bashaka gutangaza inkuru zishyushye cyangwa umuntu uwo ari we wese ubonye icyo akeneye kubwira abandi mu buryo bw’amajwi .
DStv igiye kongera Amazon na Netflix kuri dekoderi yayo nshya
MultiChoice Group Ltd yo muri Afurika y’Epfo yasinyanye amasezerano na Netflix Inc na Amazon.
com Inc, azatuma ibyo bigo binyuza serivisi zabyo z’amashusho kuri dekoderi nshya ya DStv, bikazatuma abantu bishyura ifatabuguzi risanzwe rya televiziyo bakareba Netflix na Amazon Prime Video.
MultiChoice Group Ltd yo muri Afurika y’Epfo yasinyanye amasezerano na Netflix Inc na Amazon.
com Inc, azatuma ibyo bigo binyuza serivisi zabyo z’amashusho kuri dekoderi nshya ya DStv, bikazatuma abantu bishyura ifatabuguzi risanzwe rya televiziyo bakareba Netflix na Amazon Prime Video.
Ni icyemezo cyatangajwe ku wa Gatatu, mu gihe icyo kigo gicuruza amashusho ya televiziyo mu buryo bw’ifatabuguzi umuntu yishyura (Pay-TV) gikomeje kwagura ibikorwa byacyo.
Impinduka ubu buryo buzagira ku biciro by’ifatabuguzi rya Multi-Choice rigurwa buri kwezi zizatangazwa mu byumweru biri imbere.
Gusa biteganywa ko icyo kigo kizajya kibona komisiyo, ku mafaranga azinjizwa aturutse ku bafatabuguzi ba ziriya serivisi ebyiri zigiye kwiyongera kuri dekoderi za MultiChoice.
Ubusanzwe abantu barebaga Netlix na Amazon mu buryo bwa internet, umuntu akishyura ifatabuguzi ubundi akareba uko abyifuza.
MultiChoice Group Ltd ivuga ko kongera muri serivisi zayo izindi ebyiri mpuzamahanga z’amashusho, bigaragaza ubushake bwayo bwo gukomeza kuba igihangange mu kugira urunyurane rw’amashene.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa MultiChoice, Calvo Mawela, yavuze ko bamaze igihe baha abafatabuguzi serivisi bareba, ku buryo byagaragaye ko uburyo bakoramo butanga umusaruro.
Yakomeje ati "Uko uru rwego rugenda rutera imbere, dutekereza ko ubu turi mu mwanya mwiza wo kungukira ku mpande ebyiri – isoko rya Pay-TV rikomeje gukura muri Afurika n’amahirwe arimo gukura yo gucuruza amashusho kuri internet (over-the-top, OTT), aho serivisi za OTT no gushyira hamwe amashene bishobora gutanga umusaruro.
Multi-Choice kandi irimo kwitegura gushyira ku isoko serivisi za DStv ariko noneho zidakoresha igisahani ngo umuntu agerweho n’amashusho meza, uburyo buzashyirwa ahagaragara mu minsi iri imbere.
Icyo kigo ubu kimaze kugira abafatabuguzi miliyoni 19.
5, ndetse mu 2015 cyatangije uburyo bw’ifatabuguzi, aho umuntu areba amashusho akeneye yifashishije internet, Showmax, bukomeje kuganwa na benshi.
Mu mwaka ushize kuri serivisi za MultiChoice za DStv na GOtv hiyongereyeho abafatabuguzi 900.
Ibyo utamenye ku ntambwe yagejeje u Rwanda mu kwifashisha “Robots" zihariye mu kuvura COVID-19
Akazuba, Ikirezi, Mwiza, Ngabo na Urumuri nizo Robots ziri gufasha u Rwanda mu kurwanya ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Urugendo rwaganishije kuri iyi ntambwe ruratangaje kandi rwarihuse bidasanzwe.
Akazuba, Ikirezi, Mwiza, Ngabo na Urumuri nizo Robots ziri gufasha u Rwanda mu kurwanya ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Urugendo rwaganishije kuri iyi ntambwe ruratangaje kandi rwarihuse bidasanzwe.
Mu kwezi gushize, u Rwanda rwongeye guca agahigo ruba kimwe mu bihugu bya Afurika byifashisha “Robots" mu kuvura icyorezo cya COVID-19 ariko izarwo zihariye kurusha izindi ziri ku mugabane.
Intambwe yaganishije kuri iki gikorwa ihera mu Ukwakira 2019 mu Budage ahabereye Rwanda Day.
Umugabo w’Umubiligi, Fabrice Goffin, ufite sosiyete ikora porogaramu zikoresha “Robots" yitwa Zora Bots, yarahagurutse ageza igitekerezo cye kuri Perezida Kagame, amubwira ko yifuza kuzaza gukorera mu Rwanda ndetse mu buryo bwo gutebya, amusaba ko yamuha itike y’indege imuzana i Kigali.
Nyuma y’ibyumweru bibiri, yahise aza mu Rwanda ahura n’inzego zitandukanye zifite uburezi n’ikoranabuhanga mu nshingano.
Igitekerezo cye ntabwo cyari ugukorera Robots mu Rwanda, ahubwo yashakaga kugurisha u Rwanda porogaramu zikoresha za Robots kugira ngo zitangire kwifashishwa mu mashuri, ku buryo abana b’abanyarwanda bagira ubushobozi bwo kuzikorera bo ubwabo, bigendanye n’ibikenewe ku isoko.
Kugira ngo wumve neza imikorere ya Zora Bots, yigereranye na Microsoft ikora porogaramu za Windows zifasha imashini gukora.
Icyo gihe Goffin yabwiye IGIHE ati “Ni twe twenyine ku Isi dufite software ishobora gukora muri robots zose".
Coronavirus ikigaragara mu Rwanda bwa mbere ku wa 14 Werurwe, hatangiye gutekerezwa uburyo bwakwifashishwa mu kurwanya iki cyorezo mu gihugu, ikoranabuhanga naryo ritekerezwaho.
Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye rishinzwe Iterambere, UNDP, ryahise ritekereza ku ikoreshwa rya Robots, ryerekeza amaso kuri Zora Bots rimusaba ko yakora izakwifashishwa mu Rwanda mu kurwanya Coronavirus.
Yabwiye IGIHE ati “Nyuma y’aho Coronavirus igaragariye mu Burayi, nibwo twatangiye kuvugana, ni ukuvuga hari mu cyumweru cya gatatu cya Werurwe.
Bansabye kubabwira ikoranabuhanga ryakwifashishwa mu kurwanya Coronavirus muri Afurika, ntabwo bigeze bavuga ngo turashaka Robots ikora gutya, baravuze bati turashaka kurinda abaturage mu Rwanda n’ahandi muri Afurika, ndababwira nti turi isosiyete ikora ibijyanye na Robots ku Isi, dutangira kuvugana tubaha izi Robots.
Izi robots zifite ubushobozi bwo gufata ibipimo abantu bari hagati ya 50 na 150 mu munota umwe, zikareba niba nta we ufite ibimenyetso by’iyi ndwara nk’umuriro.
Zishobora komekwaho akandi gakoresho umuntu yageranya n’isahani, zigatwara mu cyumba cy’umurwayi ibiryo bipima nk’ibiro bitatu.
Zinifashishwa kandi mu gufata amakuru y’abarwayi no kumenyesha umuganga igihe hari ibimenyetso bidasanzwe umurwayi agize.
Zishobora kuba zakwifashishwa nko ku mipaka n’ahandi hantu hanyura abantu benshi ku buryo zitanga amakuru mu buryo bworoshye, ku bantu bose bahanyuze.
Nyuma y’uko izi robots zigeze mu Rwanda, hahise hatangira ibiganiro bigamije kuzigeza n’ahandi nko muri Uganda, Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo ndetse na Kenya.
Robots imwe yageze mu Rwanda ifite agaciro k’ibihumbi 30 by’amadolari ya Amerika.
Ati “Nizeye ko n’ahandi zizahagera kuko ni ingenzi cyane.
COVID-19 ntabwo izagenda vuba, ishobora kwiyongera, ibihugu byose bikwiye kwirinda kugira ngo iki cyorezo kidakwirakwira kandi ikoranabuhanga ni bumwe mu buryo bwo kubikora.
Imikorere yazo nyuma ya Coronavirus
Izi robots zijya kuzanwa mu Rwanda, hanatekerejwe ku cyo zamarira igihugu mu gihe iki cyorezo cyaba kitakiri imbogamizi.
Ni imwe mu ngingo zari zikubiye mu busabe bwa UNDP bw’ibyo iryo koranabuhanga rikwiye kuba ryujuje.
Goffin ati “Baravuze bati nyuma ya Coronavirus, izi robots ntabwo zizabikwa.
Ni n’uburyo bwiza bwo gukoresha amafaranga kuko ugomba kuvuga uti ’iki gikoresho kirakenewe uyu munsi ariko nyuma tuzagikenera mu bundi buryo.
Icyo ni cyo cyiza cy’izi robots, kuko ntabwo zipima umuriro gusa ngo zinarebe ko abantu bambaye udupfukamunwa, ahubwo zifite ubundi bushobozi bwinshi.
Urugero rw’aho zishobora kwifashishwa ni mu bijyanye n’ubukerarugendo, aho zishobora kuzajya zifashishwa mu gusobanurira abantu ibijyanye n’ahantu runaka bari gusura, zikabikora kandi mu ndimi zose kuko zifite ubushobozi bwo gutanga amakuru mu ndimi 40.
Ati “No mu bitaro zakomeza gukoreshwa mu gutanga serivisi, ibaze hari nk’umuntu w’Umudage waje kwivuza kandi abamwakira batavuga ikidage, robots zamufasha neza.
Ni robots zihariye ugereranyije n’iziri ahandi
Mu bihugu byinshi ku Isi muri iki gihe bifashisha Robots mu buvuzi cyane mu kurwanya Coronavirus, hari nk’izigira uruhare mu gusukura mu bitaro, mu gupima umuriro n’ibindi.
Urugero hari nka Robots ziboneka mu bitaro byo mu Bushinwa, zifashishwa mu gupima umuriro, ariko iziri mu Rwanda zikoranye ikoranabuhanga ritandukanye n’izo zose kuko rizibashisha kugenzura amasura y’abantu.
Ati “Birasa n’imashini nk’iyo wabona mu Bushinwa ariko ubwenge n’ubushobozi buri hejuru mu Rwanda kurusha ahandi hose ku Isi kugeza ubu.
Ni zo ziteye imbere kurusha izindi zose wabona ku Isi.
“Urugero nk’izo zo mu Bushinwa, zipima umuriro gusa ariko porogaramu twakoresheje, irihariye, wayigereranya na Microsoft kuri mudasobwa, ibashisha robots kugira indimi nyinshi, kugenzura amasura y’abantu, kubika amakuru menshi n’ibindi.
Porogaramu yifashishwa muri izi Robots yitwa ZBOS, nta yindi sosiyete iyikora ku Isi cyangwa se ikora igiye kumera kimwe nayo.
Bene izi robots zatangiye gukoreshwa mu Burayi hashize icyumweru kimwe mu Rwanda ziri mu kazi mu bitaro.
Goffin yishimira ubufasha yaherewe mu Rwanda kuva mu mpera za 2019 yarugeramo, aho avuga ko ahantu hose yakomangaga, yahabwaga karibu kandi agasobanura umushinga we ukakirwa.
Kubera Coronavirus, umushinga we wo kwifashisha ikoranabuhanga rya Robots mu burezi bw’u Rwanda yabaye awugaritse ariko ateganya ko iki cyorezo nikirangira, ibiganiro bizongera gusubukurwa.
Ikiganiro Fabrice Goffin yagiranye na IGIHE ubwo yasuraga u Rwanda mu 2019
Ikigo cyo mu Rwanda cyegukanye igihembo mu irushanwa mpuzamahanga rya drones
Ikigo cya Leapr Labs cyo mu Rwanda cyegukanye igihembo mu irushanwa ryo kugurutsa drones ryiswe Lake Kivu Challenge (LKC) ryabereye ku nkombe z’Ikiyaga cya Kivu mu Karere ka Karongi, ku wa 8-14 Gashyantare 2020
Ikigo cya Leapr Labs cyo mu Rwanda cyegukanye igihembo mu irushanwa ryo kugurutsa drones ryiswe Lake Kivu Challenge (LKC) ryabereye ku nkombe z’Ikiyaga cya Kivu mu Karere ka Karongi, ku wa 8-14 Gashyantare 2020
U Rwanda rwabaye igihugu cya mbere muri Afurika cyakiriye iri rushanwa ry’Isi mu kugurutsa drones ryerekanye ikoranabuhanga rigezweho mu iterambere ryo kuzitwara.
Amarushanwa yo kugurutsa drones yateguwe na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ifatanyije na Africa Drone Forum.
Ishami ry’Ikigega Mpuzamahanga cy’u Bwongereza kigamije Iterambere (DFID) na Banki y’Isi.
Yari agamije kumenyekanisha serivisi nshya, amakuru agezweho mu kohereza no kwakira ibintu bitandukanye, guhanga imirimo n’amahirwe yo kwihutisha iterambere, no kubaka ubumenyi bujyanye n’imirimo yo mu kinyejana cya 21.
Ibigo 10 byo mu bihugu birindwi nibyo byitabiriye LKC.
Amarushanwa yari mu byiciro bitatu birimo icya drones zakoreshwaga mu gutwara umuzigo zikawugeza ahantu zikagaruka, kujya gufata ikintu kiri ahantu ukakijyana ahandi n’icyo gusesengura amakuru drone yafashe iri mu kirere.
Irushanwa ryabereye ku nkombe za Kivu aho drones zahagurukiraga zigana ku Kirwa cya Bugarura mu ntera y’ibilometero 20.
Nko mu cyiciro cya Emergency Delivery, drones yasabwaga gutwara umuzigo wa 500ml ikawugezayo udahungabanye.
Mu byegukanye ibihembo harimo Leapr Labs cyo mu Rwanda, cyatsindiye £15 000, akabakaba miliyoni 17 Frw.
Leapr Labs yegukanye igihembo mu cyiciro kijyanye no gusesengura amakuru, Data Analysis Special Award.
Umuyobozi wa Leapr Labs, Tuyihimbaze Serge, yabwiye IGIHE ko igihembo batsindiye cyaberetse ko hari urwego bariho ku ruhando mpuzamahanga.
Yagize ati “Gutsinda twabikesheje gukorana n’abandi, twungukiye mu bufatanye twagize, abenjeniyeri bacu ubumenyi n’ubunararibonye bari bafite bwari buhagije ku buryo dutsinda.
Biradutera imbaraga, twishimiye ko ariya marushanwa yaduhaye ibiruta igihembo birimo ubufatanye n’ibindi bigo bya drones.
Leapr Labs yatsinze nyuma yo guhigika ibigo byari bihanganye mu gusesengura amakuru yafashwe na drone.
Ati “Indege yabaga iri mu kirere ikareba mu Kiyaga cya Kivu igashobora gutandukanya ubwato n’ibindi bintu.
Bafataga nk’umutwaro bakawushyira mu ishyamba ku buryo drone iri mu kirere imenya aho uri, ikanatanga amakuru ashobora gutuma umuntu awugeraho (GPS Coordinates).
Twatsinze mu cyiciro cyo gufata amakuru yafashwe na drones tukayasesengura tukerekana aho ubwato cyangwa umuzigo uherereye.
Mu gutanga amanota hibanzwe ku gukoresha igihe neza no gutanga amakuru ya nyayo ku buryo umuntu byamworohera kugera ku kintu cyavuzwe.
Leapr Labs ni ikigo kigitangira ariko gifite intego yo kwaguka no guteza imbere ikoranabuhanga rya drones mu Rwanda.
Tuyihimbaze yavuze ko hakenewe ingengo y’imari nini izafasha mu gushyira imbaraga mu mishinga itandukanye irimo ijyanye n’ubuhinzi n’ibindi.
Yagize ati “Turashaka kubaka ubushobozi ku bijyanye na software, na hardware aho twashobora kubaka drones.
Kubigeraho bizasaba gushaka urubyiruko rufite impano.
Dukorana na AIMS, Carnegie Melllon na Kaminuza y’u Rwanda.
Turi gushaka abafatanyabikorwa batandukanye.
Icya gatatu ni ukubona ibigo bikora drones, abari gukora ubushakashatsi ngo tubashe kugera ku ntego yacu.
Umuhango wo gutanga ibihembo ku bigo byitwaye neza muri Lake Kivu Challenge wabaye hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga ry’amashusho kubera ingamba zafashwe mu kwirinda Coronavirus.
Minisitiri w’Ikoranabuhanga na Inovasiyo mu Rwanda, Paula Ingabire, yashimiye ibigo byitabiriye irushanwa ryo kugurutsa drones.
Yagize ati “Lake Kivu Challenge ntigamije gusa gushimira abatsinze, ahubwo ni n’uburyo bwo kunoza imikoranire mu rwego rw’ubwikorezi bwa drones no gukorana n’abafatanyabikorwa mu kuzana ibisubizo bitandukanye muri Afurika.
Ibyiciro n’uko ibigo byahembwe muri Lake Kivu Challenge:
Ibigo byatsinze birimo n’ibyahawe ‘Safety Awards’, bizafashwa kubona ikoranabuhanga ry’ubwirinzi rya Iris Automation.
Birimo Wingcopter cyo mu Budage (£5,000) na Avy cyo mu Buholandi (£5,000).
Lake Kivu Challenge yabaye nyuma y’Inama Nyafurika kuri drones ‘‘Africa Drone Forum’’, yahuje abasaga 1000 ku wa 5-7 Gashyantare 2020 biga ku mikoreshereze yazo muri Afurika.

MTN yashyizeho uburyo bworoshye bwo kwishyura abamotari n’ibihembo ku bazabukoresha cyane
Sosiyete y’itumanaho MTN Rwanda yatangaje ko guhera kuwa 3 Kamena 2020, itangira korohereza abamotari kwishyurwa hifashishijwe uburyo bwa MoMoPay, mu gushyigikira ingamba za Leta y’u Rwanda zo gukoresha ikoranabuhanga mu guhererekanya amafaranga, hirindwa coronavirus.
Sosiyete y’itumanaho MTN Rwanda yatangaje ko guhera kuwa 3 Kamena 2020, itangira korohereza abamotari kwishyurwa hifashishijwe uburyo bwa MoMoPay, mu gushyigikira ingamba za Leta y’u Rwanda zo gukoresha ikoranabuhanga mu guhererekanya amafaranga, hirindwa coronavirus.
Ubu buryo kandi MTN Rwanda ibutangije nyuma y’amabwiriza yatanzwe n’Urwego Ngenzuramikorere, RURA rusaba abamotari bose kwishyurwa hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga.
Binyuze muri MoMoPay, abagenzi bazajya babasha kwishyura abamotari amafaranga y’urugendo mu buryo bworoshye kandi bwizewe.
Gukoresha ubwo buryo birasaba gukanda *182*8*1#, ugashyiramo kode umumotari akoresha kuri MoMoPay ubundi ushyiremo amafaranga y’urugendo ugiye kumwishyura wemeze.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi muri MTN Rwanda, Chantal Kagame yavuze ko MTN Rwanda yiyemeje kuba ku isonga mu guteza imbere ihererekanya ry’amafaranga ryifashishije ikoranabuhanga no gukumira icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Yagize ati “Twishimiye gufasha abamotari kwakira amafaranga yabo bifashishije MoMoPay.
Mu gihe twubahiriza ingamba zashyizweho na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, twiyemeje kugendana na gahunda y’igihugu yo kudahererekanya amafaranga mu ntoki.
MTN Rwanda yatangaje ko mu gukomeza gushishikariza abamotari gukoresha ubwo buryo bishyurwa, hagiye kujya hatangwa ibihembo kabiri mu cyumweru ku bahiga abandi mu kubukoresha.
Ibihembo bazahabwa bizaba birimo moto nshyashya, casques, kugabanyirizwa ibiciro ku bikomoka kuri peteroli moto zabo zikoresha kuri sitasiyo za lisansi n’ibindi.
MTN Rwanda kandi yiyemeje gufasha abamotari kubona udupfukamunwa tuzajya dutangirwa kuri sitasiyo za lisansi zitandukanye zikorana na MTN mu mujyi wa Kigali.
MTN Rwanda kandi mu bufatanya na banki ya NCBA, yiyemeje gutanga inguzanyo ku bakiliya bayo muri ibi bihe byo kwirinda icyorezo hifashishijwe MoKash, mu bo iyo nguzanyo igenewe harimo n’abamotari.
Ku bari barafashe inguzanyo bakananirwa kuyishyura mu gihe cy’iminsi 30 yagenwe, MTN Rwanda na NCBA babakuriyeho amande y’ubukererwe ndetse bongererwa indi minsi 30 yo kuba bishyuye.
Umukiliya utabashije kwishyura ideni rye mu minsi 60 cyangwa 90, ntabwo azajya agabanyirizwa ingano y’amafaranga yemerewe kuguza nkuko byari bisanzwe.
Mu gihe kandi inguzanyo ntarengwa igiye kugabanywa, umukiliya azajya ahabwa iminsi 30 yo kwitegura.
MoKash ni uburyo bwo kubitsa, kubikuza no kugurizwa buboneka kuri MTN Rwanda ukanze *182*5#).
Inguzanyo yo kuri MoKash yishyurwa mu gihe cy’iminsi 30, hiyongereyeho inyungu ya 9 %, naho uwabikijeho amafaranga yungukirwa 7 % ku mwaka.

Sosiyete y’Ikoranabuhanga mu gukora za porogaramu za telefoni na mudasobwa, Sensor Tower yagaragaje ko porogaramu ya Zoom ari yo yamanuwe cyane (download) kuri internet mu kwezi gushize kwa Kane.
Zoom ni porogaramu y’ikoranabuhanga yatangiye kwifashishwa cyane ubwo icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyakazaga umurego kuko yafashije benshi kuganira mu buryo bw’amashusho hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga.
Abantu miliyoni 131 bamanuye Zoom mu kwezi gushize, barimo 18 % bayimanuye bari mu Buhinde mu gihe 14 % bayimanuye bari muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Porogaramu ya TikTok nayo ikoresha uburyo bw’amashusho mu kuganira yaje ku mwanya wa kabiri kuko yamanuwe n’abantu basaga miliyoni 107 ku Isi.
Uburyo bwo kuganira hifashishijwe amashusho nibwo bwatoranyijwe n’ibigo bimwe na bimwe ku Isi kugira ngo aho gukomeza akazi bari mu ngo bishoboka, bagakomeze nta nkomyi.
Izi porogaramu zagiye zifasha benshi gukomeza gukurikirana imikorere y’abakozi babo hatabayeho guhurira mu nama nkuko byari bisanzwe.
Ku rutonde rwa porogaramu zamanuwe cyane kandi harimo Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram na Messenger.
Izindi porogaramu zifashishwa mu kuganira hifashishijwe amashuho nka Google Meet na Microsoft Team nazo zigaragara ku rutonde rwa porogaramu zamanuwe cyane ariko mu myanya ya nyuma.
Hakozwe agapfukamunwa korohereza abantu kurya batagakuyemo

Ba rwiyemezamirimo bo mu gihugu cya Israel bakoze ubwoko bw’udupfukamunwa two kwifashisha mu kwirinda Coronavirus, ariko tutabuza abatwambaye kuba bagira icyo barya.
Ni agapfukamunwa kameze nk’utundi twose ariko gafite umwanya hasi ushobora kunyuzwamo ibiryo mu gihe umuntu ari ku meza.
Uwo mwanya ufungurwa iyo umuntu agiye kurya, yarangiza akongera akawufunga cyangwa ukifunga.
Asaf Gitelis, Umuyobozi w’ikigo Avtipus Patents and Inventions cyakoze utwo dupfukamunwa, yavuze ko hari udufungurwa mu buryo busanzwe hakoreshejwe intoki n’utundi twifungura iyo ikanya cyangwa ikiyiko cyegereye umunwa, dukoze mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga.
