Smartphone nziza zihendutse wagura
Muri iyi nkuru ntabwo turi buvugemo telefoni wagura nk’ibihumbi 100 Frw, ahubwo turavuga kuri ba bandi bajyana cyane n’ibigezweho, bakagura nka iPhone runaka igura amafaranga ashobora no kugera kuri miliyoni y’u Rwanda, kuri bo, igura icya kabiri cyayo ihendutse kubi.
Muri iyi nkuru ntabwo turi buvugemo telefoni wagura nk’ibihumbi 100 Frw, ahubwo turavuga kuri ba bandi bajyana cyane n’ibigezweho, bakagura nka iPhone runaka igura amafaranga ashobora no kugera kuri miliyoni y’u Rwanda, kuri bo, igura icya kabiri cyayo ihendutse kubi.
Izi telefoni zose ni nshya ku isoko, uraza gusangamo izasohotse muri uyu mwaka kandi zifite ikoranabuhanga rijyanye n’igihe ku buryo ku mbuga za internet zigurishirizwaho telefoni ushobora kuzisanga ku mafaranga make kandi zikiri nshya.
iPhone SE (2020)
Niba ukunda iPhone, nta kabuza iPhone SE yasohotse muri uyu mwaka, wayitunga wishimye.
Ubwoko bwa mbere bw’iyi telefoni, bwashyizwe ku isoko mu myaka ine ishize.
Inshya yaje ivuguruye kurusha iyo ya mbere.
Ifata amafoto meza kurusha iya mbere ndetse ntishobora kwangirika mu gihe yaba iguye mu mazi, ikindi ni uko yo ishobora gushyirwamo umuriro mu buryo nziramugozi.
Gusa iyi yo ntabwo ifite aho ushobora gushyira écouteur ahubwo umuntu akoresha zimwe za nziramugozi.
Niba ushaka kugura iPhone nshya, iPhone SE (2020), ntukwiriye kuyirata kuko iranahendutse.
Ubu iri kugura $399 asaga gato ibihumbi 375 Frw.
Samsung Galaxy A51
Telefoni za Samsung ni zimwe mu zikunzwe na benshi kuko zibasha gufata amafoto meza kurusha ubundi bwoko bwinshi.
Uyu mwaka mu zagiye ku isoko harimo na Galaxy A51 ifite camera enye, ikoresha igikumwe mu kuyifungura.
Iyi telefoni yazanye n’ubwoko bushobora kwakira ikoranabunga rya 5G (ritaratangira gukora mu Rwanda).
Ntabwo ihenze kuko ihagaze $399 asaga gato ibihumbi 375 Frw naho ijyamo 5G yo asaga ibihumbi 460 Frw.
Google Pixel 3A XL
Ntabwo ari abanyarwanda benshi wasanga batunze telefoni za Google, ariko ni zimwe mu nziza zigezweho ku isoko by’umwihariko mu bijyanye no gufata amashusho kuko zirusha nyinshi mu zikunzwe zikaba zanarusha ubushobozi yewe na camera zimwe na zimwe.
Mu masaha y’ijoro, iyi telefoni ifite ubushobozi bwo gufata amafoto meza ndetse ishobora no gufata amashusho y’agatangaza.
Ifite bateri nziza cyane ya 3700-mAh kuko umuriro ushobora kumaramo amasaha arenga 24.
Niba ukeneye amafoto yo gukoresha ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zawe, Pixel 3A XL yabigukorera neza mu gihe waba uyiguze biragusaba kwishyura nibura $479, asaga gato ibihumbi 450 Frw.
Motorola Moto G Stylus
Hari benshi baheruka za Motorola za kera ku mwaduko wa telefoni mu Rwanda, batazi ko uru ruganda rwiyuburuye rukagera aho rukora izigezweho.
Niba warakunze Motorola ya kera, igihe ni iki kugira ngo unaryoherwe n’inshya igezweho.
Motorola Moto G Stylus ifite camera eshatu, ububiko bwa 128GB ndetse na bateri ishobora kumaramo umuriro igihe kigera ku minsi ibiri kuko ifite ubushobozi bwa 4,000mAh.
Ntabwo bigusaba menshi kugira ngo uyitunge ugereranyije n’izo tumaze kubona hejuru, ishakemo nibura $300 ni ukuvuga asaga gato ibihumbi 280 Frw.
Samsung Galaxy A50
Samsung Galaxy A50 ni indi telefoni ya Samsung watunga niba ukunda ubwoko bw’izi za “A".
Yagiye ku isoko umwaka ushize ariko iracyari telefoni nziza ku isoko n’ubu ndetse irahendutse ugereranyije n’uko yagiye hanze igura.
Ifite camera eshatu, ikoresha igikumwe mu kuyifungura, ndetse ikirahure cyayo ni kimwe kigaragaza ibintu neza kuko gikoranye ikoranabuhanga rya LED rimenyerewe kuri za écran nini zigezweho.
Ku madolari 250 ni ukuvuga asaga gato ibihumbi 235 Frw urabasha gutunga telefoni igezweho kandi ya make.
Motorola Moto G Power
Motorola G Power irahendutse ugereranyije na G Stylus kuko yo ushobora kuyibona ku $250 asaga gato ibihumbi 235 Frw.
Ifite batiri nziza cyane irambamo umuriro kuko ifite ubushobozi bwa 5,000-mAh.
Iyi batiri yakozweho igeragezwa, bigaragaza ko umuriro ushobora kumara nibura iminsi ine.
Ubwo niba udakunda kwirirwa ucometse telefoni, nakubwira iki.
Ikindi cyiza cyayo ni uko ifite camera eshatu zituma ubona amashusho meza.
Motorola Moto Z4
Moto Z4 yashyizwe ku isoko muri Gicurasi umwaka ushize ariko ntiyakundwa cyane nubwo ari imwe muri telefoni nke zikoresha 5G.
Irambisha umuriro kurusha nyinshi muri telefoni za iPhone na Samsung ndetse ifite camera ifata amafoto meza kuko ifite megapixel 48.
Igura $499 ni ukuvuga asaga ibihumbi 465 Frw.
Samsung Galaxy S9
Ni imwe muri telefoni nziza Samsung yakoze uhereye mu buryo igaragara ndetse n’uburyo ibasha kwihanganira amazi.
Ishobora kujyamo umuriro mu buryo nziramugozi ndetse ifite ikirahure cyiza cyigoronzoye gikoranywe ikoranabuhanga rya LED.
Ufite $450, ni ukuvuga asaga ibihumbi 420 Frw wayibikaho.
Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu zigiye kohereza icyogajuru kuri Mars
Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu zigiye kohereza kuri Mars icyogajuru cya mbere kizahaguruka ku Isi ku wa 14 Nyakanga 2020, mu butumwa bwahawe izina ryitwa “Hope" cyangwa se “Icyizere" mu Kinyarwanda.
Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu zigiye kohereza kuri Mars icyogajuru cya mbere kizahaguruka ku Isi ku wa 14 Nyakanga 2020, mu butumwa bwahawe izina ryitwa “Hope" cyangwa se “Icyizere" mu Kinyarwanda.
Icyogajuru kizajya kuri Mars muri ubu butumwa, byitezwe ko kizakora urugendo rw’ibilometero miliyoni 493 kugira ngo kigere kuri uyu mubumbe.
Nibura igihe cya hafi kizagererayo ni muri Gashyantare umwaka utaha.
Ni umushinga umaze igihe kuko watangiye gutegurwa mu 2014, abahanga bazagenzura urwo rugendo batangira kwitoza, ndetse n’icyogajuru gitangira guteranywa, hakorwa n’amasuzuma atandukanye hitegurwa ibibazo by’ikirere bishobora kuzavuka mu nzira.
Intego y’ingenzi ni ukugera kuri Mars hanyuma abahanga mu by’isanzure bakagenzura ibijyanye n’ikirere cyaho.
Barashaka kuzamenya impamvu kuri uyu mubumbe haba ikibazo cy’umwuka wa hydrogène na oxygène mu gihe uyu mubumbe ufite byinshi uhuriyeho n’isi dutuye.
Ibizava muri ubwo bushakashatsi bizahabwa ibigo 200 bikora ubushakashatsi mu by’isanzure birimo na NASA, kugira ngo bizitabweho mu zindi ngendo zigana kuri uyu mubumbe.
Icyogajuru kizoherezwa kuri Mars kizaba gifite camera zakozwe n’Abayapani zifite ubushobozi buhambaye bwo gufata amakuru n’amashusho y’umukungugu ugaragara kuri Mars.
Kizaba gifite kandi irindi koranabuhanga rihambaye ryakozwe n’abahanga bo muri Kaminuza ya leta ya Arizona muri Amerika, rizifashishwa mu gufata ibipimo by’umwuka biri hejuru n’ibiri hasi bigaragara kuri uyu mubumbe.
Bwa mbere mu myaka icyenda, icyogajuru cyagiye mu isanzure gihagurukiye ku butaka bwa Amerika
Icyogajuru cyakozwe na Sosiyete y’Umuherwe Elon Musk yitwa SpaceX cyoherejwe mu isanzure gitwaye abanyamerika babiri bakora mu kigo gishinzwe ubumenyi mu by’isanzure NASA, ruba urugendo rwa mbere iyi sosiyete ikoze itwara abantu mu isanzure.
Icyogajuru cyakozwe na Sosiyete y’Umuherwe Elon Musk yitwa SpaceX cyoherejwe mu isanzure gitwaye abanyamerika babiri bakora mu kigo gishinzwe ubumenyi mu by’isanzure NASA, ruba urugendo rwa mbere iyi sosiyete ikoze itwara abantu mu isanzure.
Hari hashize imyaka icyenda nta cyogajuru gihagurutse ku butaka bwa Amerika kijyanye abanyamerika ku isanzure, gusa ubu byashobotse nyuma y’icyo gihe kinini cyari gishize.
Muri iyi myaka yose yari ishize [kuva mu 2011], abanyamerika bajyaga ku isanzure bakoresheje ibyogajuru by’Abarusiya ndetse akaba ariho banakoreraga imyitozo, ni ibintu byatwaye Amerika miliyoni 86 z’amadolari.
Iki cyogajuru cyagombaga kuba cyaroherejwe mu isanzure ku wa Gatatu w’icyumweru gishize gusa biza gusubikwa nyuma yo kubona ko mu kirere harimo imirabyo gahunda ishyirwa kuri uyu wa Gatandatu.
Cyohererejwe muri Leta ya Florida ahari ikigo kimwe mu icumi bya Nasa bigenzura ibijyanye n’isanzure cyitwa Kennedy Space Center.
Kohereza iki cyogajuru bitumye Amerika itera indi ntambwe mu rugendo ruganisha ku kuba ba mukerarugendo bashobora kujya ku isanzure.
Iki cyogajuru cyari gitwaye Robert Behnken w’imyaka 49 na Douglas Hurley wa 53.
Bazamara mu isanzure amasaha 19.
Cyahagurutse 21:20 z’ijoro kuri uyu wa Gatandatu ku isaha y’i Kigali.
Iki cyogajuru kiri mu mushinga wa SpaceX witwa Dragon 2, cyari kimaze imyaka 15 gikorwa.
Twitter yasibye konti zisaga 170 000 zakoreshwaga mu icengezamatarwa ry’u Bushinwa, u Burusiya na Turikiya
Sosiyete ya Twitter yatangaje ko yamaze gusiba konti zisaga ibihumbi 170 zakwirakwizaga ubutumwa bukubiyemo amatwara y’u Bushinwa, Turikiya n’u Burusiya.
Sosiyete ya Twitter yatangaje ko yamaze gusiba konti zisaga ibihumbi 170 zakwirakwizaga ubutumwa bukubiyemo amatwara y’u Bushinwa, Turikiya n’u Burusiya.
Hari konti 23,750 zasibwe zakoreshwaga cyane muri ubwo buryo n’izindi 150 000 zafashaga mu kugeza ubwo butumwa kuri benshi.
Twitter yatangaje ko muri konti zasibwe, izifite aho zihuriye n’icengezamatwara ry’u Burusiya zigeze ku gihumbi mu gihe iza Turikiya zigera ku 7340.
Ibyari biri kuri izo konti byasibwe ariko bishyirwa mu bubiko bwa Twitter ku buryo byakwifashishwa mu bushakashatsi.
Umwaka ushize, Twitter nabwo yavumbuye konti z’u Bushinwa zakoreshwaga mu icengezwamatwara ubwo habaga imyigaragambyo muri Hong Kong.
Twitter yatangaje ko uburyo bakoresheje bavumbura izo konti umwaka ushize aribwo bwakoreshejwe no muri iki gihe.
Konti zasibwe, Twitter ivuga ko zakwirakwizaga icengezamatwara rishimagiza ibyo u Bushinwa buri gukora muri Hong Kong, ibitekerezo by’u Bushinwa kuri Coronavirus no kuri Taiwan.
Ubusanzwe ibyandikwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zirimo Twitter, YouTube na Facebook biragenzurwa cyane mu Bushinwa.
Twitter yatangaje ko konti zasibwe zijyanye na Turikiya ari izabaga zigamije kugaragaza neza isura ya Perezida Recep Tayyip Erdogan mu gihe iz’u Burusiya zasibwe ari izabaga zigamije gucengeza imyumvire n’ingengabitekerezo y’ishyaka riri ku butegetsi muri icyo gihugu no kwibasira abatavuga rumwe na Leta.
My Airtel app: Uburyo bworoshye bwo kwishyura serivisi nyinshi ukoresheje telefone yawe
Telefone zigezweho za smartphones zabaye gikoresho nkenerwa cya ngombwa ku batuye isi hafi ya bose.
Ni benshi bamaze kumva ko badashobora kubaho batayifite ngo ubuzima bwabo bugende uko babyifuza.
Telefone zigezweho za smartphones zabaye gikoresho nkenerwa cya ngombwa ku batuye isi hafi ya bose.
Ni benshi bamaze kumva ko badashobora kubaho batayifite ngo ubuzima bwabo bugende uko babyifuza.
Igitangaje, ntabwo ari benshi bifashisha icyo gikoresho nkoranabuhanga mu gihe bishyura amafaranga ya internet ituma icyo gikoresho gikora, turacyahata inzira amaguru tujya mu maduka kugura ama-inite yo gukoresha, tukirirwana amafaranga mu mufuka hato akaba yanakwibwa ngo tugiye guhaha.
Airtel iri guhindura iyo migirire ya kera, itangiza uburyo bwa MyAirtel app aho serivisi hafi ya zose ushobora kuzishyurira kuri telefone yawe bitabaye ngombwa ko uva aho uri.
Serivise ziri muri ‘My Airtel App’ zirimo izo kugura ama-inite, internet, kwishyura ibyo ukeneye byose nk’amazi, amashanyarazi, ifatabuguzi rya televiziyo, kohereza amafaranga haba mu Rwanda no mu mahanga, byose bigakorwa hifashishijwe ikarita ya banki cyangwa Airtel Money.
Iyi porogaramu ya telefone ikumenya guhera ku munsi wa mbere ukiyikoresha, ibiri kuri nimero yawe ya telefone ibimenya uko biri kose ku buryo igihe ugiye kuyikoresha bitakugora.
Iyi porogaramu ibika ibyo wayikoreyeho bitewe n’icyo wishyuye cyangwa waguze, icyo wohereje n’ibindi, ku buryo iyo wongeye kugira icyo ukoraho wakoreyeho ubushize, ikwereka ibisigaye.
Urugero niba uguze megabytes zo gukoresha kuri internet, zishira uzireba ku buryo utajya mu ihurizo ryo kwisanga internet yashize.
Ni uburyo bukorwa mu kanya gato kurusha kubikorera kuri internet.
Hari n’uburyo bwo kwiyoherereza inyemezabwishyu y’icyo umaze kugura ukoresheje iyo porogaramu.
Iyi porogaramu ya MyAirtel app ikomeje gushimwa na benshi batangiye kuyikoresha.
Ntabwo ari ngombwa gukoresha ubundi buryo bwo kwishyura urenze telefone yawe, manura iyo porogaramu ubuzima bworohe.
‘My Airtel App’ ikora igihe cyose (amasaha 24 ku minsi 7), inafasha abayikoresha gukurikirana buri gihe ibibera kuri konti za bo za banki na Airtel Money bitabagoye na gato, ndetse ikaba idasaba kuba umuntu afite internet mu gihe ari kuyikoresha.
Umutekano w’iyi ‘Application’ wizewe ku rwego rwo hejuru kuko itemerera undi muntu kuba yakoresha imyirondoro yawe agamije kwiba amafaranga ufite kuri konti iyo ari yo yose, cyangwa gukora ikindi kintu cyabangamira umukiliya wa Airtel uyikoresha.
Akarusho kandi ni uko kugura ama-inite ukoresheje iyi porogaramu biguhesha uburenganzira bwo guhabwa inyongera ndetse koherereza undi muntu byo bikaguhesha inyongera ya 5% by’ama-inite yose wohereje.
Iyi porogaramu izorohereza abajyaga bagorwa no gufata mu mutwe za kode zitandukanye mu kugura cyangwa gukoresha serivise za Airtel, kuko buri kimwe cyose cyorohejwe muri ‘My Airtel App’ igisigarana.
Umuntu ukeneye gukoresha iyi porogaramu ajya muri ’Play Store’ kubakoresha telefoni za ’Android’ cyangwa ’App Store’ ku bakoresha iOS; ukandika mu ishakiro "My Airtel", hakaza ifite amagambo ya ’Airtel Africa’, ubundi ukayishyira muri telefone yawe nk’uko bikorwa ku zindi porogaramu.
Umaze kuyishyiramo, urayifungura, ukuzuzamo nomero yawe, ubundi ugakurikiza amabwiriza ajyanye n’ibyo bagusaba.
Facebook yavuguruye uburyo igaragara mu korohereza abayikoresha
Urubuga nkoranyambaga rwa Facebook rwongereye ibishya mu mikorere n’uburyo rugaragara, hagamijwe kurushaho korohereza abantu bagera muri miliyari ebyiri baruhuriraho.
Urubuga nkoranyambaga rwa Facebook rwongereye ibishya mu mikorere n’uburyo rugaragara, hagamijwe kurushaho korohereza abantu bagera muri miliyari ebyiri baruhuriraho.
Nyuma y’amezi y’igeragezwa, Facebook yongereye ibishya mu buryo igaragarira abayikoresha nk’uko yabitangaje ku wa Gatanu.
Izo mpinduka zirimo uburyo Facebook yafungukaga kuri mudasobwa bwatangiye kugeragezwa muri Werurwe, ariko mbere ho umuntu yemererwaga gusubira ku buryo amenyereye, akanatanga igitekerezo ku buryo bushya.
Mu bishya kandi harimo uburyo umuntu ashobora guhitamo ko paji ya Facebook yijima bizwi nka Dark Mode, igihe abona afite urumuri rwinshi kandi akeneye kuruhura amaso.
Ni uburyo bwari busanzwe ku zindi mbuga nka Twitter.
Facebook yatangaje ko yari ikeneye gukora impinduka mu buryo uru rubuga rugaragarira abarukoresha.
Yagize iti “Tumaze gukura cyane uhereye ubwo Facebook yashingwaga mu myaka 16 ishize, twubatse ibishya ku rubuga, tubasha gukorana n’ibikoresho bitandukanye by’ikoranabuhanga na porogaramu nshya ndetse dutangira gukoresha indimi amagana.
Mu minsi ishize twibanze cyane mu guhindura uburyo Facebook ikoreshwa kuri telefoni igendanwa, ariko tuza gusanga iyo kuri mudasobwa yarasigaye inyuma.
Byari bikenewe kuyijyanisha n’ibihe.
Ikindi gishya ni uburyo umuntu ashobora kubaka amatsinda abantu bahuriramo, paji za Facebook no kwamamaza byihuse kurusha mbere.
Ubu buryo kandi butanga amahitamo yo kubanza gusuzuma neza ibintu wanditse, mbere y’uko ubitangaza.
Facebook yatangaje ko igikeneye ibitekerezo by’abantu mu kurushaho kunoza ubu buryo, ku buryo abatishimiye imiterere mishya bashobora gukomeza gutanga ibitekerezo banyuze ahagenerwa imikorere rya konti yabo ya facebook.
Google Chrome igiye gutangira gukumira amatangazo yamamaza amara internet n’umuriro by’abakiliya bayo
Sosiyete ya Google yatangaje ko igiye gutangiza uburyo bwo gukumira amatangazo yamamaza ku bakoresha porogaramu ya Google Chrome basura imbuga zitandukanye.
Sosiyete ya Google yatangaje ko igiye gutangiza uburyo bwo gukumira amatangazo yamamaza ku bakoresha porogaramu ya Google Chrome basura imbuga zitandukanye.
Amatangazo azibandwaho akaba ari akoresha internet nyinshi n’umuriro mwinshi wa telefone cyangwa mudasobwa by’abakiliya.
Google yatangaje ko ubwo buryo buzatangira gukoreshwa muri Kanama uyu mwaka.
Iyo sosiyete yatangaje ko baje kuvumbura ko hari amatangazo yamamaza aza iyo umuntu ari kureba ibintu runaka kuri internet, agatwara umuriro mwinshi wa telefone ye cyangwa ama-inite ya telefone nyirayo atabizi.
Google ivuga ko akenshi ayo matangazo abayakoze baba batarayakoze neza ku buryo akoresha umuriro mwinshi cyangwa internet nyinshi.
Yatangaje ko bihombya umukiliya ukoresha Google Chrome kuko ama-inite ye ashobora gushira atayakoresheje cyangwa umuriro wa telefone ye ugashira atabizi.
Amatangazo azajya akumirwa ku bakoresha Google Chrome ni ashobora gukoresha internet ya megabit 4 cyangwa se ashobora kwiharira 27 % bya internet yose yakoreshejwe n’amatangazo yamamaza.
Google chrome ni isiakiro rya Internet ryatangijwe mu 2008, rihanganye n’andi mashakiro nka Internet Explorer na Firefox yari yarabanje mu kibuga.
Chrome yakomeje guhatana iza kwigarurira benshi mu bakoresha internet.
Kugeza mu mpera za 2019, telefone miliyari eshanu ku isi zari zirimo porogaramu ya Google Chrome.
Kurangiza imanza za cyamunara n’inyandiko mpesha byatangiye gukorerwa mu ikoranabuhanga (Video)
Minisiteri y’Ubutabera yatangije uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga buzajya bwifashishwa mu kurangiza imanza za cyamunara n’inyandiko mpesha, bwitezweho gukemura byinshi mu bibazo byajyaga bigaragara mu kurangiza izi manza, birimo gutinda kwa zo, uburiganya n’ibindi byaturukaga k’uregwa, urega cyangwa umuhesha w’inkiko.
Minisiteri y’Ubutabera yatangije uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga buzajya bwifashishwa mu kurangiza imanza za cyamunara n’inyandiko mpesha, bwitezweho gukemura byinshi mu bibazo byajyaga bigaragara mu kurangiza izi manza, birimo gutinda kwa zo, uburiganya n’ibindi byaturukaga k’uregwa, urega cyangwa umuhesha w’inkiko.
Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru cyo kuri uyu wa Gatatu, tariki ya 13 Gicurasi 2020, cyari kigamije gusobanura byimbitse ibijyanye n’iteka rya Minisitiri ryerekeye uburyo bwo guca imanza hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga; Minisiteri y’Ubutabera yasobanuye ibizahinduka mu mirangirize y’imanza za cyamunara n’inyandiko mpesha [inyandiko itegeka ko umuntu ahabwa umutungo runaka].
Umuyobozi Mukuru Ushinzwe Serivisi yo Kwegereza Ubutabera abaturage muri MINIJUST, Urujeni Martine, yavuze ko gutangira gukoresha iri koranabuhanga bifitiye akamaro impande zitandukanye zifite aho zihuriye n’ubutabera, haherewe ku muturage.
Kuva iri teka ritangajwe, hashyizweho urubuga rwa internet ruzajya rwifashishwa n’abahesha b’inkiko bose, abaturage bafite imitungo byanzuwe n’urwego rubifitiye ububasha cyangwa habarabayeho ubwumvikane hagati y’impande ebyiri ko izatezwa cyamunara, n’izindi nzego zizajya zikurikirana ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’imyanzuro y’imanza zishingiye ku mitungo itezwa cyamunara.
Urujeni yavuze ko zimwe mu mpinduka zazanywe n’iri koranabuhanga ari uko nta rubanza rwa cyamunara cyangwa inyandiko mpesha bizongera kurangizwa bidakorewe mu ikoranabuhanga, kandi ko hari n’uburyo bwateganyijwe igihe habayeho ikibazo muri iryo koranabuhanga.
Ati "Bizihutisha irangizamanza n’inyandiko mpesha; ubundi hari hari ibibazo bitandukanye byaturukaga ku mpande zose, ugasanga uregwa, urega cyangwa umuhesha w’inkiko […] umwe muri bo agize uruhare mu kudindira kw’irangizarubanza.
Yakomeje avuga ko bizongera umucyo mu guca urubanza, aho umuhesha w’inkiko azaba afite inzira zose zifashishwa mu kurangiza urubanza mu buryo bukwiye, byose bikorewe mu ikoranabuhanga.
Bizafasha kandi inzego zitandukanye gukurikirana no kugenzura imikorere y’abahesha b’inkiko ku buryo bukurikije amategeko.
Umwanditsi Mukuru mu Kigo cy’Iterambere, RDB, Richard Kayibanda, ashimangira ko iri koranabuhanga rishya rizagura isoko muri cyamunara kuko buri wese azagira uburenganzira bungana n’ubwa mugenzi we mu kugura umutungo aho yaba ari hose.
Ati "Bizanakemura ikibazo cy’abakomisiyoneri bajyaga bateza akavuyo ku munsi wa cyamurana, bikanica isoko rimwe na rimwe ku buryo hari n’aho cyamunara yasubikwaga.
Mu byo umuntu unyuze muri iri koranabuhanga azajya asabwa kugira ngo yemererwe gupiganwa muri cyamunara, harimo ko azajya atanga ingwate ingana na 5% y’agaciro k’umutungo upiganirwa; akayasubizwa igihe atawegukanye, mu gihe kitarenze iminsi itatu, uwawegukanye we akazajya ayaheraho yishyura igiciro cyose.
Ingwate ya 5% iteganyijwe ku mitungo ifite agaciro gahera kuri miliyoni eshanu kuzamura, mu gihe umutungo ufite agaciro kari munsi yayo nta ngwate itangwa.
Ibindi byitezwe ko bizahindurwa n’ikoranabuhanga mu kurangiza imanza za cyamunara n’inyandiko mpesha harimo gukurikirana uburyo imanza zirangizwa mu gihugu hose ku buryo bwizewe, harebwa umusaruro bitanga.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Imisoro n’Amahoro na cyo kizabasha gukurikirana neza itangwa ry’umusoro ku bahesha b’inkiko, hashingiwe kuri raporo y’imirimo bakoze.
RDB ivuga ko gutangizwa kw’iri koranabuhanga bizunganira gahunda yo kurushaho guteza imbere ishoramari no gukora ubucuruzi binyuze mu mucyo.
Iteka rya Minisitiri ryerekeye uburyo bwo guca imanza hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga, riteganya ko mu gihe hatatanzwe byibura 75% by’agaciro k’umutungo utezwa cyamunara; nyir’umutungo cyangwa ikigo cy’imari gicunga uwo mutungo bafite uburenganzira bwo gusaba ko cyamunara ihagarikwa, hagashakwa ubundi buryo cyangwa ikimurwa.
Sobanukirwa uko internet ya 5G izahindura ubuzima bwa muntu
Umunsi ku wundi, ikoranabuhanga rikomeje guhindura ubuzima bw’abatuye Isi, ndetse ubu umuyoboro wa internet yihuta ya 5G niwo uhanzwe amaso nk’ugiye kugira uruhare rukomeye mu guhindura ubuzima bw’abantu.
Umunsi ku wundi, ikoranabuhanga rikomeje guhindura ubuzima bw’abatuye Isi, ndetse ubu umuyoboro wa internet yihuta ya 5G niwo uhanzwe amaso nk’ugiye kugira uruhare rukomeye mu guhindura ubuzima bw’abantu.
Ni umuyoboro ugereranywa nk’intambwe nshya ndetse na none nk’itafari rizaganisha ku rugendo ruhindura buri kimwe, uhereye ku buvuzi bwifashishije ikoranabuhanga nk’aho umuganga ashobora kubaga umuntu kandi batari kumwe, ikoranabuhanga mu modoka, mu buzima busanzwe ku buryo waba uri ku kazi ugacana imbabura wasize mu rugo n’ibindi bizwi nka Internet of Things.
Ni byinshi, ariko wakwibaza impamvu abantu muri iki gihe bashishikariye 5G! Ni iki cyayo cyiza gitandukanye n’ibisanzwe cyangwa se ni ibiki izahindura mu buzima bwa muntu?
Mu Kinyarwanda cyoroshye, 5G wayisobanura nk’icyiciro cya gatanu cy’ikoranabuhanga ryihutisha amakuru kurusha ibisanzwe.
Gusa iyo tuvuze kwihuta bisobanurwa kwinshi.
Nko muri Amerika, sosiyete y’itumanaho ya Verizon iherutse gukora igerageza kuri 5G, isanga ishobora kwihuta nk’igihe umuntu amanura ibintu (download), akabona gigabits 1.
0 ku isegonda (1.
Ni ukuvuga ngo ni nk’inshuro ziri hagati y’icumi na 100 z’umuvuduko usanzwe, ndetse ni umuvuduko mwinshi utanabona no ku miyoboro ya fibre optique, bisobanuye ko uyifashishije ushobora kumanura kuri internet ibintu amagana ku muvuduko wo hejuru.
Ntabwo ari umuvuduko gusa.
Niba uri kuri internet ugakanda ku kintu runaka ugiye gusoma, hari umwanya bifata kugira ngo rwa rupapuro wakanzeho rufunguke (mu cyongereza bizwi nka Latency).
Ubusanzwe bishobora kumara milliseconde 20 [mu isegonda rimwe harimo milliseconde 1000) kugira ngo rwa rupapuro rufunguke, ariko kuri 5G ni munsi ya milliseconde imwe.
Bifate nk’aho ari nk’igihe bitwara kugira ngo telefoni yawe itere umurabyo mu gihe uri gufotora.
Ikindi cyiza cyayo ni uko yo ifite ubushobozi bwo kuba wacomekaho ibikoresho byinshi by’ikoranabuhanga kurusha ibyo washyira kuri internet isanzwe, ukayifashisha mu rugo wenda ucometseho firigo yawe ikaza kuguha amakuru ko ibintu birimo harimo ibyakonje cyane cyangwa se ibigiye kubora n’ibindi.
Wumvise ibyo ikora, uhita wibaza ku giciro cyayo.
Ubu mu Rwanda ntabwo ihari wenda ku buryo twarebera ku bintu byo hafi yacu, ariko nko muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, sosiyete z’itumanaho ziri kwishyuza nibura amadolari 10 yiyongera ku yari asanzwe yishyurwa n’umuntu ku kwezi; uru ni urugero rwa Verizon.
Kugira ngo ukoreshe 5G bisaba ko uba ufite igikoresho kiyakira, ntabwo ari ikibonetse cyose.
Urugero nka telefoni, nyinshi ziri gusohoka zigezweho zakira 5G, kimwe n’uko hamaze iminsi hasohoka izakira 4G.
Umwaka ushize Sumsung yashyize ku isoko Samsung Galaxy S10 ishobora kwakira 5G.
Ikindi ni uko telefoni nyinshi zashyizwe ku isoko mu ntangiriro z’umwaka ushize usanga zikoresha ikoranabuhanga rizifasha kwakira no gutanga amakuru ryakozwe na Qualcomm, [Snapdragon X50], rizibashisha no kwakira 5G.
Uyu mwaka byitezwe ko hazashyirwa ku isoko telefoni nyinshi zakira 5G kurusha ushize.
Hasobanuwe impamvu Internet ya 4G Unlimited ikoreshwa muri telefoni igiye kuvanwa ku isoko
Hashize iminsi ibigo byagurishaga internet ya 4G Unlimited biha ubutumwa abakiliya babyo ko bigiye guhagarika kugurisha iyo Internet muri za telefone zabo.
Hashize iminsi ibigo byagurishaga internet ya 4G Unlimited biha ubutumwa abakiliya babyo ko bigiye guhagarika kugurisha iyo Internet muri za telefone zabo.
Tariki 8 Kamena Ikigo cy’Itumanaho MTN Rwanda cyatangaje ko guhera ku wa 1 Nyakanga kizahagarika kugurisha internet ya 4G Unlimited umuntu yajyaga agura agakoresha ikarangira mu gihe runaka.
4G Unlimited ni internet yatangwaga mu gihe runaka nk’icyumweru cyangwa ukwezi, umukiliya akishyura ubwo akaba azi ko icyo cyumweru cyangwa ukwezi azabimara ataguze indi.
Ikigo cy’abanya-Koreya, KTRN Rwanda ari nacyo rukumbi cyemerewe kuranguza internet ya 4G mu Rwanda, cyatangaje ko guhera tariki 1 Nyakanga 2020 internet ya 4G Unlimited muri za telefone itazongera kuboneka ku isoko.
Umuyobozi Mukuru ushinzwe ikoranabuhanga n’itumanaho muri KTRN Rwanda, Elijah Iragaba, yatangaje ko izo mpinduka zigamije gukemura ikibazo cy’ireme rya internet batangaga ku bakoresha telefone zigezweho.
Yavuze ko ubusanzwe internet ya 4G Unlimited yatangwaga muri za telefone nubwo yari ihendutse, mu ikorwa ryayo hari imwe mu mipaka yashyizweho ku bijyanye n’uburyo yihuta mu gihe habayeho kuyisangira n’abandi (tethering) cyangwa kuyivana kuri telefone ngo ikoreshwe no kuri mudasobwa.
Iragaba yavuze ko iyo abakiliya bayifashishaga mu bindi bitari telefone, yagendaga gahoro bigatuma babyinubira.
Ati “ (4G unlimited) yakorewe gukoreshwa muri za telefone ariko hari abantu bajyaga bayisangiza ngo bayikoreshe no ku bindi bikoresho nka mudasobwa zo mu biro bigatuma babona internet ifite ireme ritari ryiza kuko hari ibyo iyo internet itagomba kurenza.
Byatumaga rero binuba.
Iragaba yijeje ko ubu internet ya 4G isanzwe yavuguruwe irimo ibyo abakiliya bakeneye byose kandi ihendutse kurushaho.
Icyakora, ibyo byumvikanisha ko ubu umukiliya azajya agura internet ya 4G agahabwa ingano runaka bitewe n’amafaranga yishyuye, igashira bitewe n’uburyo yayikoresheje.
Bivuze ko ushobora kugura internet ya 5000 Frw, wayikoresha gahoro ikaba yamara igihe kinini, wayikoresha cyane igashira vuba ariko umuvuduko wo ugakomeza kuba wa wundi.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe Ikoranabuhanga mu Rwego Ngenzuramikorere (RURA), Gahungu Charles, yavuze ko KTRN yabamenyesheje ukwinuba abakiliya bari bafite, bakavuga ko uko byari bimeze mbere byicaga isura ya internet ya 4G muri rusange.
Internet ya 4G Unlimited yakoreshwaga ni iyo mu bwoko bwa ‘Speed-based’ igenda ku muvuduko umwe bitewe n’igihe umukiliya yahawe kuyimarana, ubu hasigaye Internet yo mu buryo bwa ‘volume-based’ ishira bitewe n’uko yakoreshejwe.
Abakoreshaga Google Play Music bahawe uburyo bwo kwimukira kuri YouTube Music
Google Play Music yatangaje ko izafunga imiryango yayo mu mpera z’uyu mwaka, ariko abari abakiliya bayo bashyiriweho uburyo bwo kuvana ibyo bari bafite kuri Google Play Music bakabyohereza kuri YouTube Music yayisimbuye.
Google Play Music yatangaje ko izafunga imiryango yayo mu mpera z’uyu mwaka, ariko abari abakiliya bayo bashyiriweho uburyo bwo kuvana ibyo bari bafite kuri Google Play Music bakabyohereza kuri YouTube Music yayisimbuye.
Kubera kunanirwa guhangana ku isoko rya porogaramu zumvirwaho imiziki, Google Play Music yahisemo gukuramo akayo karenge.
Mu butumwa buherutse kunyuzwa ku rubuga rwa Youtube, Google Play yatangaje ko abayikoreshaga bemerewe kohereza ibintu byabo bari bayifiteho ku bubiko bwa YouTube Music.
Hashyizweho uburyo, aho uwari usanzwe afite indirimbo ze yashyize kuri Google Play Music azajya yinjiramo akabona ahantu hamusaba kuba yakohereza indirimbo ze kuri YouTube Music.
Yaba ibyo yamanuye kuri internet, umuziki, ibyo yakunze cyangwa atakunze n’ibindi bizahita byoherezwa ako kanya kuri YouTube Music, ku buryo ibyo yari asanzwe abona azakomeza kubibona uko byakabaye.
Google Play Music ntabwo yigeze ihirwa cyane mu isoko ryo gucuruza no gucuranga umuziki kuko sosiyete Spotify ariyo iza imbere kuko yihariye 36 % by’isoko ryose, igakurikirwa na Apple Music yihariye 18 % mu gihe Google Play Music iza mu myanya y’inyuma kuko yihariye 5 %.
Nubwo nyuma y’iminsi isaga 40 ibikorwa bimwe na bimwe byongeye gufungurwa, ingaruka z’igihe igihugu cyamaze ibikorwa bimwe bidakora ziracyagaragara.
Prof Alfred Bizoza umwarimu muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda afatanyije na Simeon Sibomana, bakoze isesengura rigamije kugaragaza ingaruka z’ubukungu Covid-19 izagira ku Rwanda n’ingamba zafatwa mu kwirinda ko igihombo kiba kinini cyane.
Abo bashakashatsi bagaragaje ko Covid-19 izagira ingaruka zikomeye ku bucuruzi bufite aho buhuriye n’ibyoherezwa n’ibivanwa hanze cyane cyane ubudashingiye ku biribwa ndetse n’urwego rw’ubukerarugendo n’amahoteli.
Bagaragaje ko kugeza mu 2022, ubucuruzi bw’ibyo u Rwanda rwohereza cyangwa ruvana mu mahanga buzagabanyukaho miliyoni $ 1729 ni ukuvuga igabanyuka rya 17.
7 % by’umusaruro mbumbe wa miliyoni $9,781.
13 u Rwanda rufite kuri ubu.
Prof Bizoza yabwiye IGIHE ko kugira ngo babone iryo gabanyuka, bagendeye ku mibare y’ubucuruzi mpuzamahanga bw’u Rwanda mu myaka itatu ishize, bahuza n’imibare y’Umuryango Mpuzamahanga wita ku bucuruzi (WTO) igaragaza ko ubucuruzi mpuzamahanga buzagabanyuka ku kigero kiri hagati ya 13 na 32 % kubera ingaruka za Covid-19.
Izi nzobere zivuga ko icyo gihombo gishobora kwiyongera cyangwa kikajya munsi bitewe n’igihe COVID-19 izamara ndetse n’ingamba Leta izafata zigamije kuzahura ubukungu.
Prof Bizoza na Sibomana berekanye ko bitewe n’uburyo ibihugu by’abafatanyabikorwa b’u Rwanda mu bucuruzi nabyo byibasiwe na Covid-19, buri kwezi rushobora kujya ruhomba hagati ya miliyoni $ 8.
9 na miliyoni 22.
05 y’ibyoherezwaga hanze.
Hashobora kuzagaragara kandi igihombo cya buri kwezi cya miliyoni ziri hagati ya $ 3.
01 y’ibyoherezwa hanze nyuma yo kongererwa agaciro ndetse n’igihombo cya miliyoni ziri hagati ya 32.
92 ku byinjira mu gihugu bivuye hanze.
Ubwo u Rwanda rwafataga ingamba zikomeye zo kwirinda Covid-19, imodoka n’ingendo z’indege zitwaye imizigo zemerewe gukomeza kugenda.
Bizoza yavuze ko ibyo bitabujije ubucuruzi kugerwaho n’ingaruka kuko butakomeje gukorwa uko bwari busanzwe.
Ati “Nubwo wenda batafunze imipaka ku bicuruzwa, ariko ntabwo bikora ku muvuduko umwe n’uwo twari dusanzwe dukoraho.
Byanze bikunze hazabamo ingaruka.
Yakomeje agira ati “Icyiza ni uko twatangiye gufungura gahoro gahoro, biragaragaza ko tugize amahirwe bigakomeza gutyo, bizadufasha kugabanya ubuzahare n’ingaruka byakagombye kugira ku bukungu bwacu.
Mu bushakashatsi bagaragaza ko ingaruka za Covid-19 zizagera no ku bucuruzi buto n’ubuciriritse busanzwe bwinjiza 25 % ku musaruro mbumbe w’igihugu, bugaha akazi abagera kuri 60 % by’abakozi bose bari mu gihugu.
Ubucuruzi bukenewe gufashwa
Abenshi mu bakora ubwo bucuruzi bahagaritse imirimo, abakozi bakoragamo batakaza akazi.
Icyakora, abashakashatsi bavuga ko ugereranyije n’izindi nzego, ubuhinzi bwo butazagerwaho n’ingaruka nyinshi za Covid-19.
Prof Bizoza yavuze ko bitewe n’uburyo Covid-19 ikizahaje ibihugu byinshi, nta buryo buhamye bwakwizerwa ko buzazahura ubukungu, icyakora yemeza ko hari ubushobora gufasha mu kugabanya igihombo.
Leta yagiriwe inama yo gushyiraho gahunda yo kuzahura ubukungu (recovery plan), kandi inzego zibasiwe cyane akaba ari zo ziherwaho zifashwa nk’izitanga akazi kenshi nk’ubuhinzi, ubucuruzi buto n’ubuciriritse, inganda, ubwubatsi n’ibindi.
Ati “Nk’ubu Leta ishyize amafaranga menshi mu bikorwa rusange nka biriya byo kubaka imishinga minini, bizatuma ba bandi batari bafite akazi bongera kukabona.
Hakaba n’ingamba zijyanye no korohereza abantu kubona inguzanyo kuri bamwe bakora ubucuruzi kugira ngo bongere bakore.
Bizoza yongeyeho ko nubwo banki zatangiye korohereza kwishyura abari bafite inguzanyo, hakenewe uburyo bwo gufasha abacuruzi kubona ubundi bushobozi butuma basubukura ibikorwa byabo.
Mu buhinzi naho, Bizoza avuga ko hakwiriye “gushyirwamo imbaraga kuko niho abantu benshi bafite akazi, dukomeje gukaza umurego mu buryo bwo gushyigikira ubuhinzi byagabanya ingaruka.
Inzego zinjiriza igihugu cyane ni zimwe mu zagizweho ingaruka na Covid-19.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ibarurishamibare, NISR kigaragaza ko umusaruro mbumbe wa serivisi wihariye 48% by’umusaruro mbumbe wose, ubuhinzi bufite 28% by’umusaruro mbumbe naho umusaruro w’inganda uri kuri 17% by’umusaruro mbumbe w’igihugu wose.
Coronavirus ishobora gutuma Afurika ihomba miliyari 4.
8 $ yavaga mu bihingwa byoherezwa mu mahanga
Umugabane wa Afurika ushobora guhomba akayabo kangana na miliyari 4.
8 z’amadolari ya Amerika winjizaga biturutse mu kohereza mu mahanga umusaruro ukomoka ku buhinzi.
Umugabane wa Afurika ushobora guhomba akayabo kangana na miliyari 4.
8 z’amadolari ya Amerika winjizaga biturutse mu kohereza mu mahanga umusaruro ukomoka ku buhinzi.
Imibare y’Ikigo McKinsey & Co.
igaragaza ko guhagarikwa kw’ingendo z’indege ndetse no gufunga kw’inganda zitunganya umusaruro ukomoka ku buhinzi mu bihugu by’u Burayi, byagize ingaruka zikomeye ku bahinzi ku buryo imibereho yabo izahinduka bakabura imirimo ndetse n’ibiciro bikagabanuka.
Muri Afurika, ubuhinzi bwihariye 23% by’umusaruro mbumbe wose w’ibihugu n’imirimo ku kigero cya 60% muri Afurika yo munsi y’Ubutayu bwa Sahara.
Ibyoherezwa mu mahanga kuri uyu mugabane biba biri hagati ya miliyari 35 z’amadolari ku mwaka na miliyari 40 z’amadolari.
Imibare ya McKinsey & Co igaragaza ko imboga n’imbuto zifite agaciro ka miliyoni ziri hagati ya 500 z’amadolari na miliyari ebyiri z’amadolari arizo zoherezwaga mu mahanga zivuye mu bihugu birimo Afurika y’Epfo.
Nko mu bihugu bya Afurika y’Uburasirazuba, byoherezaga mu mahanga ibicuruzwa birimo ikawa ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 200 z’amadolari, ku buryo amafaranga yavagamo yafashaga abahinzi barenga miliyoni 6.
Hose ubu ingano y’ibyoherezwaga mu mahanga yaragabanutse ku buryo hari ubwoba ko uyu mugabane uzahura n’igihombo gikabije.
Cherno Gaye uyobora Cogebanque yavuze ku ngaruka za Coronavirus n’ingamba bafashe
Urwego rw’amabanki mu Rwanda rwakoze impinduka muri serivisi rutanga hagamijwe kunganira ingamba za Guverinoma zo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19, giterwa n’agakoko ka Coronavirus.
Urwego rw’amabanki mu Rwanda rwakoze impinduka muri serivisi rutanga hagamijwe kunganira ingamba za Guverinoma zo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19, giterwa n’agakoko ka Coronavirus.
Amabanki n’ibindi bigo by’imari byakuyeho amafaranga acibwa abakoresheje serivisi zabyo bayohererezanya cyangwa bishyurana.
Ibyo byajyanye no gusubika kwishyura inguzanyo ku bakiliya kubera ibikorwa byabo byagizweho ingaruka n’ihagarikwa ry’imirimo mu kwirinda Coronavirus.
Iki cyorezo cyagize ingaruka ku bukungu rusange bitewe n’ibikorwa byahagaritswe byari byitezweho inyungu.
Urwego rw’amabanki ruri mu zizagirwaho ingaruka bitewe nuko ubukungu bw’ibigo [aribyo bakiliya b’amabanki] buzahungabana ku buryo hari n’ibiza bitagishobora kwibeshaho bigakenera inkunga n’igihe cyo kwiyubaka.
Mu kiganiro kivuga ku mikorere y’urwego rw’amabanki nyuma ya COVID-19, Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Banki Nyarwanda y’u Bucuruzi, Cogebanque, Cherno Gaye, yagiranye na Televiziyo CNBC Africa, yavuze ko Coronavirus izatuma ubucuruzi bw’amafaranga bugorana.
Ati “Haracyari kare ngo umuntu ngo abe yamenya igihombo nyakuri kizaterwa na COVID-19, usibye ko bigaragara neza ko hazabaho guhungabana gukomeye, aho tuzabona bigora ibigo gusubira nk’uko byahoze.
Hari bimwe bizahura n’ibibazo ariko bishobore kubyikuramo, ibyo ni ibyubakiye ku nkingi zitajegajega.
Hari n’ibindi bizahungabana ku buryo bizakenera ubufasha bwa leta kugira ngo byongere gukora.
Kugira ngo byumvikane neza ibyo bizakenera gufata igihe runaka cyo kwiyubaka bundi bushya.
Ihungabana ry’ibikorwa bitandukanye rishobora gutuma amabanki abura abayabitsamo cyangwa bya bigo bikabura uko byishyura inguzanyo byari bifite, nayo akabura uko atanga inguzanyo kuri byinshi n’abantu bashaka kwiyubaka.
Ati “Ikizabaho ni uko, niba tuzahura n’ikibazo cy’inguzanyo [zitishyurwa], icyo bisobanuye ni uko bizahungabanya n’igishoro cyacu, ibyo nabyo icyo bizatanga ni uko ubushobozi bwacu bwo gutanga imyenda bushobora guhungabanaho gato.
Igisabwa ngo ni uko banki zakurikiranira hafi ibibazo abakiliya bari guhura nabyo zikabafasha hakiri kare, kugira ngo impande zombi zitangire kugira icyo zikora amazi atararenga inkombe.
Yakomeje ati “Buri wese atekereza ko mu mabanki ari hamwe mu bagomba kuboneka ibisubizo, nkubwije ukuri ni uko binagendanye no kuba amabanki nayo yarahuye n’iki kibazo, igipimo ubukungu buzahungabana kizaba kinini cyane.
Nta n’ubwo nakwizera niba tuzaba muri hamwe hava ibisubizo usibye ko tubyifuza.
“Ibi ntabwo ari ugutanga impuruza gusa ni uko tugomba kwitonda kandi tugakorana bya hafi n’abakiliya bacu tukanafasha aho bishoboka hakiri kare mu rwego rwo kugabanya ibihombo cyangwa ibyakwangirika.
Amatangazo menshi y’ibigo by’imari n’amabanki yashyizwe hanze mu bihe bya COVID-19 yerekana isubikwa ryo kwishyura inguzanyo mu gihe cy’amezi atatu.
Gaye asanga ari umwanzuro mwiza kuko iyo habaho abasonera abakiliya inguzanyo cyangwa inyungu kuri zo byari kuba ikibazo kuri urwo rwego.
Kuri ruhande rwa Cogebanque yagize ati “Nka banki [Cogebanque] turi gukorana bya hafi n’abakiliya bacu mu buryo dushoboye, nko kuborohereza no kubongerera igihe cyo kwishyura inguzanyo, kubafasha guhererekanya amafaranga hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga nta kiguzi n’ibindi.
Muri COVID-19 ikoranabuhanga ryateye imbere mu ngeri zitandukanye ndetse ryifashishwa na buri wese.
Cherno Gaye yavuze ko hari “Abatinyaga kurikoresha bakemanga ibibazo by’umutekano waryo barikoresheje nko kugerageza.
Abasesenguzi basanga hari amahirwe menshi yuko banki zaba zigiye guhindura serivisi mu buryo buhoraho hagakomeza kwimakazwa ikoranabuhanga mu gihe kirambye.
Cogebanque Plc imaze imyaka 20 itanga serivisi za banki mu Rwanda, ifite serivisi zitangwa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga binyuze muri Internet Banking, Mobile Banking, Smartcash Card n’amakarita ya MasterCard (Debit, Credit na Prepaid) afasha abayakoresha kwishyura no kubikuza ahantu harenga miliyoni 36 ku Isi yose.
Uburyo bushya bwo kuzahura urwego rw’ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro rwagizweho ingaruka na Coronavirus
Icyorezo cya Coronavirus, gifite ingaruka nyinshi mu nzego zitandukanye zibumbatiye ubukungu n’imibereho rusange y’abantu.
Urwego rw’ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro, ni rumwe mu zagizweho ingaruka cyane n’iki cyorezo.
Icyorezo cya Coronavirus, gifite ingaruka nyinshi mu nzego zitandukanye zibumbatiye ubukungu n’imibereho rusange y’abantu.
Urwego rw’ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro, ni rumwe mu zagizweho ingaruka cyane n’iki cyorezo.
Ibiciro by’amabuye y’agaciro anyuranye byaraguye cyane ku masoko yose bitewe n’ingamba zafashwe zirimo gufunga ibikorwa no guhagarika ingendo z’indege mu kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
U Rwanda kimwe n’ibindi bihugu bicukura amabuye y’agaciro, izi ngaruka ntizarusize.
Faida Jean Marie Vianney, ufite ikigo cyitwa Blue Change Mining, gicukura Coltan na gasegereti, yavuze ko Coronavirus, yashegeshe ibikorwa byabo ikabasiga nta kazi bucuruzi bafite.
Ati “Hari hashize hafi amezi abiri nta gikorwa na kimwe cy’ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro gikorwa kubera gufunga ibikorwa no kuguma mu rugo.
Ibi bivuze ko nta mabuye turimo kugurisha ndetse abakozi bategetswe gusubira mu rugo".
Ingendo z’abantu mu byerekezo byoherezwamo amabuye y’agaciro nk’u Burayi, Aziya na Amerika ntizikorwa, byategetse ko ingano y’atumizwa igabanuka, ibi bikaba byaratumye abayacukura benshi basigara nta cyo bakora.
Faida akomeza avuga ko mu minsi ishize basubiye mu bikorwa byabo ariko hari ibitarasubira ku murongo neza nk’ingendo, ibi bikagira ingaruka ku ngano y’amabuye akenewe.
Amabuye u Rwanda rucukura cyane ari yo; gasegereti, Wolfram, na Coltan, ari mu yashegeshwe cyane na Coronavirus, kuko ibiciro byayo basubiye hasi cyane.
Imibare yerekana ko nk’amafaranga aturuka mu mabuye y’agaciro ya tin, tantalum na tungsten yoherezwa ku isoko yagabanutse ku kigero cya 30.
9%, bitewe n’igabanuka ry’ibiciro ku isoko mpuzamahanga muri Mutarama na Gashyantare 2020, ugereranyije n’igihe nk’iki mu 2019.
Muri ariya mezi ibiciro bya Coltan byagabanutseho -4.
6%, Wolfram -15.
3% gasegereti ni -14.
5%, bitewe n’uko abayakenera bagabanutse kuko ibikorwa by’ubukungu bidahagaze neza.
Amabuye y’agaciro kandi yanahuye n’imbogamizi ikomeye y’intambara y’ubucuruzi hagati y’u Bushinwa na Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Mu mezi atandatu ya mbere ya 2019, ibiciro by’amabuye u Rwanda rwohereza mu mahanga [gasegereti, coltan na Wolfram], byaragabanutse bigira n’ingaruka ku yandi nka Zahabu.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ibikorwa muri Aldango, itunganya Zahabu, Aime Ngabo, yavuze ko ababagemurira amabuye bakererewe bityo n’umusaruro w’uruganda ugasubira inyuma.
Yerekana kandi ko bihenze kohereza mu mahanga amabuye ahari kuko nta ndege zigenda.
Ati “Ubu turimo gushaka indege yihariye ngo itugereze amabuye yacu ku bakiliya i Dubai, kuko RwandAir itagikorera muri icyo cyerekezo.
Ibiciro by’ubwikorezi biri hejuru".
Nubwo inganda n’ibindi bijyanye n’ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro byasubukuye ibikorwa, bizafata igihe ngo uru rwego ruzahuke, kuko ibihugu byinshi biracyari muri gahunda ya guma mu rugo, aho ibikorwa by’ubukungu bitarimo gukorwa ku kigero nyacyo.
Gahunda yo kuzahura ubucukuzi
Ubukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro buri mu nzego z’ibanze guverinoma ishaka kuzahura muri gahunda yayo yo kuzahura ubukungu yo muri Gicurasi 2020 kugeza mu Ukuboza 2021.
Muri iyi gahunda, guverinoma irateganya guhuriza hamwe abacukuzi bo ku rwego ruto n’uruciriritse, bakajya mu matsinda y’ishoramari.
Inyandiko ya Minisiteri y’imari n’igenamigambi ku kuzahura ubukungu nyuma ya Coronavirus, yerekana ko ‘ibi bizahanga imirimo myinshi ikenewe mu bucukuzi mu bice by’icyaro ndetse binafashe abacukuzi kwishyira hamwe boroherwe no kubona igishoro’.
Habarurwa abacukuzi bato n’ababikora mu buryo gakondo babarirwa mu 100, bakaba bakoresha abakozi babariwa mu bihumbi 34 na 77.
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Mine, Peteroli na Gaz (RMB), Francis Gatare, avuga ko ibibazo ibigo bicukura amabuye y’agaciro byahuye nabyo kubera Coronavirus babizi, ibi bikaba byaragize ingaruka ku musaruro ndetse n’ibyo binjiza, muri rusange bikaba byaragize ingaruka ku buzima bw’abakora muri uru rwego.
Ati “Turashaka gufasha ibigo bikora mu bucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro na kariyeri gusubukura ibikorwa ku kigero cya 100% mu myaka ibiri iri imbere binyuze mu kwimakaza ubunyamwuga muri uru rwego ndetse no gushaka ishoramari rishya".
Gatare yashimye uburyo abari muri urwo rwego rw’ubucukuzi bari kwitwara mu gukomeza ibikorwa byabo bubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda avuga ko nubwo nta ruhare rwo guhindura ibyabaye ku isoko mpuzamahanga hari uburyo bwo kubigabanyiriza ubukana.
Ati “Uburyo bwa mbere cyane ku mabuye y’agaciro tuzashyiramo imbaraga zo kuzamura umusaruro, aho igiciro cyagabanutse tukohereza byinshi ku isoko mpuzamahanga.
Ariko noneho no kongera agaciro ibyo twoherezaga biri ku cyiciro (grade) cyo hasi tukabyongerera agaciro, ibishobora gukoreshwa mu gihugu cyacu bigakoreshwa mu gihugu cyacu kugeza igihe ku isoko mpuzamahanga bizahinduka.
Izi ngamba zirasanga kuba mu 2018, harashyizweho itegeko rigamije guca akajagari mu bucukuzi n’ubucuruzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro ndetse no gushyira imbaraga mu gukusanya amakuru kuyanoza kugira ngo abashoramari bayashingireho bakora imishinga ibafitiye akamaro.
Amabuye y’agaciro aza ku mwanya wa kabiri mu kwinjiriza igihugu amadovize nyuma y’ikawa n’icyayi.
Mu mwaka wa 2019 amafaranga yinjizwa n’amabuye y’agaciro yagabanutseho 30% bisobanuye ko yari kuri miliyoni 92.
2 z’amadolari ugereranije na miliyoni 132.
1 z’amadolari zinjijwe n’uru rwego mu mwaka wa 2018.
Ingano y’amabuye acukurwa na yo yasubiye inyuma kuko yavuye kuri toni 7663 muri 2018 agera kuri toni 6555 bingana n’igabanuka rya 14.
5% mu mwaka wa 2019.
StarTimes yazanye poromosiyo ya ’Baho Neza na StarTimes’ izatangwamo ibihembo birimo na Moto
Mu rwego rwo kurwanya Coronavirus, StarTimes yahisemo gutanga ibihembo byafasha abaturarwanda kurwanya iki cyorezo, inashyira ibicuruzwa byayo kuri promosiyo yise ’Baho Neza na StarTimes’, yatangiye taliki ya 15/06/2020 ikazarangira taliki 31/07/2020.
Mu rwego rwo kurwanya Coronavirus, StarTimes yahisemo gutanga ibihembo byafasha abaturarwanda kurwanya iki cyorezo, inashyira ibicuruzwa byayo kuri promosiyo yise ’Baho Neza na StarTimes’, yatangiye taliki ya 15/06/2020 ikazarangira taliki 31/07/2020.
Abafatabuguzi ba StarTimes bazabona amahirwe yo gutsindira ibihembo byinshi bitandukanye buri ku cyumweru, birimo Televisiyo Digital za StarTimes, telefone za TECNO CAMON 12 Pro, za Firigo na Moto.
Ibi bihembo byose hamwe bifite agaciro ka miliyoni icumi z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda (10,000,000 FRW).
Bisaba iki ngo umuntu ajye muri iyi poromosiyo.
Kumuguzi Mushya:
Asabwa kugura decoderi ikoresha antenne y’udushami, ubungubu muri promosiyo iri kugura 7,000 Frw ukongeraho 8,000 Frw bya Classic Bouquet.
Uwifuza kugura umugozi na entenne yongeraho 7,000 Frw.
Cyangwa kugura decoderi ifite Dish (igisahani) yaguraga 30,000 Frw, ubu iri kugura 10,000 Frw ukongeraho 15,000 Frw bya Super Bouquet.
Cyangwa ugure televisiyo digital za StarTimes.
Ku muguzi usanzwe:
Asabwa kugura ifatabuguzi ry’ukwezi nkuko bisanzwe.
Abatsinze bazajya batangazwa buri ku cyumweru kuri BTN 19:30 20:00, kuva taliki ya 21/06/2020 - 02/08/2020.
Ni ukuvuga tariki 21/06/2020; 28/06/2020; 05/07/2020; 12/07/2020; 19/07/2020; 26/07/2020; 02/08/2020)
Ibiciro byifatabuguzi rya StarTimes.
EU yahaye u Rwanda inkunga ya miliyari 55 Frw yo guhangana n’ingaruka za Coronavirus
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda n’Umuryango w’Ubumwe bw’u Burayi kuri uyu wa Mbere basinye amasezerano y’inkunga ya miliyoni 52 z’amayero (miliyari 55.
5 Frw) yo gufasha u Rwanda guhangana n’ingaruka zatewe n’icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda n’Umuryango w’Ubumwe bw’u Burayi kuri uyu wa Mbere basinye amasezerano y’inkunga ya miliyoni 52 z’amayero (miliyari 55.
5 Frw) yo gufasha u Rwanda guhangana n’ingaruka zatewe n’icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Minisiteri y’Imari n’igenamigambi yatangaje ko ayo mafaranga azifashishwa muri gahunda zigamije kwita ku mibereho myiza y’abaturage no guteza imbere urwego rw’ubuhinzi.
Ku ruhande rwa EU iyo nkunga yatanzwe na Ambasaderi w’uwo muryango mu Rwanda, Nicola Bellomo naho ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda yakirwa na Minisitiri w’Imari n’Igenamigambi, Dr Uzziel Ndagijimana.
Aya mafaranga u Rwanda rwahawe agize inkunga ya miliyoni 460 z’amayero Komisiyo ya EU yemereye u Rwanda muri Nzeri 2014.
Iyo nkunga izafasha Guverinoma y’u Rwanda muri gahunda yayo yo guteza imbere imibereho myiza y’abaturage n’ubuhinzi muri gahunda yayo yo kuzahura ubukungu bwashegeshwe n’ingamba zo kwirinda coronavirus.
Inkunga izashyirwa mu bikorwa bitandukanye byibanda ku bufasha bw’amafaranga n’ibiribwa bigenewe abaturage no guteza imbere ubuhinzi hagamijwe kwihaza mu biribwa.
Minisitiri w’Imari n’Igenamigambi, Dr Uzziel Ndagijimana yagize ati “Ingaruka za Coronavirus ku bukungu n’imibereho myiza byatumye dufata ingamba zisumbuye zigamije kwihaza mu birindwa, kugabanya ubukene no guteza imbere ubukungu budaheza.
Ubufatanye mu iterambere n’inkunga y’ingoboka EU yageneye u Rwanda mu guhashya coronavirus, igaragaza icyizere n’umubano mwiza uri hagati ya EU na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda.
Ambasaderi wa EU mu Rwanda, Nicola Bellomo yagize ati “Inkunga yacu ni imwe mu nkunga yagutse yiswe #TeamEurope.
Ni uburyo bwo kwerekana ubufatanye.
Bikubiye kandi mu ntego za EU mu gufasha ibihugu by’inshuti mu guhangana n’icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Inkunga u Rwanda rwahawe izatangwa mu byiciro bibiri.
Icya mbere kizatangwamo miliyoni 36 z’amayero, ikindi gitangwemo miliyoni 15.
5 z’amayero mu gihe cy’imyaka ibiri y’ingengo y’imari, 2019/2020 na 2020/2021.
Uretse miliyoni 52 z’amayero zahawe Guverinoma y’u Rwanda, EU yatanze indi nkunga ya miliyoni 1.
8 z’amayero agenewe imiryango itegamiye kuri Leta ikorana bya hafi n’inzego z’ibanze mu guhangana n’ingaruka za coronavirus ku mibereho myiza y’abaturage.
Ambasaderi w’Umuryango w’Ubumwe bw’u Burayi mu Rwanda, Nicola Bellomo, aherutse gushima uko u Rwanda rurimo guhangana n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, yizeza ko uyu muryango uzakomeza gufatanya na rwo muri uru rugamba no mu zindi gahunda z’iterambere.
Yakomeje ashimira ingamba u Rwanda rwafashe mu gukumira no guhangana n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, zirimo gahunda ya guma mu rugo, gukaraba intoki, guhana intera n’izindi nyinshi.
Ambasaderi Bellomo yavuze ko bishimira ubufatanye burambye hagati ya EU n’u Rwanda, bushingiye nanone ku bufatanye hagati y’imigabane ya Afurika n’u Burayi.
Yavuze kandi ko muri ibi bihe bya Coronavirus barimo gukorana n’u Rwanda mu kurebera hamwe uko inkunga yakwifashishwa guhangana n’iki cyorezo.
Mu mwaka wa 2020/21, u Rwanda ruteganya kuzakoresha ingengo y’imari ingana miliyari 3245.
7 Frw ivuye kuri 3017.
1 Frw yakoreshejwe mu mwaka w’ingengo y’imari ushize.
Minecofin iherutse gutangariza abagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ko ingengo y’imari ya 2020/21, izibanda mu guhangana n’ingaruka icyorezo cya Coronavirus, cyagize mu bukungu n’imibereho myiza y’abaturage, ikazakoreshwa mu gushyira mu bikorwa gahunda y’igihugu yo kuzahura ubukungu izakoreshwamo agera muri miliyari 882 Frw mu myaka ibiri y’ingengo y’imari, ni ukuvuga uyu wa 2019/20 n’utaha wa 2020/21 uzatangira muri Nyakanga.
Mu nyandiko y’igenamigambi ryo kuzahura ubukungu bwashegeshwe n’ingaruka za Coronavirus, gahunda y’imibereho myiza y’abaturage izatwara 133 616 548 506 Frw.
Kwita ku batishoboye, gushyigikira ibikorwa by’ubuvuzi, ubuhinzi, gutera inkunga ibigo bya leta, imishinga y’ibikorwa remezo, inkunga ya leta mu kigega cyo kuzahura ubukungu n’izindi ngamba, bizitabwaho mu kuzahura ubukungu.
Prime Life Insurance yatangije “Ikimina cyacu", ubwishingizi buzorohereza Abanyarwanda kwizigamira
Sosiyete y’Ubwishingizi ya Prime Life Insurance yatangije ku mugaragaro ubwishingizi bwitwa Ikimina cyacu bwitezweho gusobanurira neza Abanyarwanda akamaro ko kwizigamira no kuborohereza kubigeraho.
Sosiyete y’Ubwishingizi ya Prime Life Insurance yatangije ku mugaragaro ubwishingizi bwitwa Ikimina cyacu bwitezweho gusobanurira neza Abanyarwanda akamaro ko kwizigamira no kuborohereza kubigeraho.
Ikimina cyacu ni gahunda Prime Life Insurance yatekerejeho igendeye ku buryo bwa gakondo bw’Abanyarwanda bwo kwizigamira busanzwe buzwi nk’ibimina, ariko yo ibushyira mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga kandi burushaho gutanga umutekano ku mafaranga y’ababugannye.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Prime Life Insurance, Habarurema Innocent, yavuze ko ’Ikimina cyacu’ cyatangijwe nyuma yo kubona hakiri imbogamizi mu buryo bwo kwiteganyiriza butekanye, bworohereza abaturage kandi bukanabungukira.
Yashimangiye ko basanze bakwiye gushyiraho ubu buryo kugira ngo barusheho kugira uruhare mu iterambere ry’Abanyarwanda.
Yakomeje ati “Igituma bagomba kugana Prime Life Insurance mu buryo bw’umwihariko, ni uko noneho bafite umutekano wizewe w’amafaranga yabo kandi bakayabonaho n’inyungu.
Ikindi akaba ashobora kuyategurira umushinga runaka w’igihe kigufi cyangwa kirekire.
Kumenya amafaranga ufitemo n’inyungu zayo ubirebera muri telefoni yawe.
Ku wifuza kwinjira muri ubu buryo bwo kwiteganyiriza abikora yifashishije telefoni igendanwa aho yandika *177#, agahitamo ahanditse “Ubuzima no Kwizigamira" ubundi agakurikiza amabwiriza.
Ku watangiye gukoresha ubu buryo buri mwaka yungukirwa 3% by’amafaranga by’ubwiteganyirize bwe, kandi mu gihe yamaze gutanga ubwiteganyirize bw’amezi atatu akaba yabikuzaho agera kuri 50%, amezi atandatu 70% naho nyuma y’umwaka akabikuza 100%.
Habarurema yagiriye inama Abanyarwanda ko kwizigama bitakabaye bikorwa n’usaguye, ahubwo ni ukureba kure.
Umwe mu bamaze ukwezi batangiye gukoresha Ikimina Cyacu, Habanabariho Théoneste avuga ko kuri we amaze kubibonamo inyungu nyinshi.
Yagize ati “Iki kimina iyo ukigiyemo uba wizigamye kandi ufite n’ubwishingizi icya rimwe, kuko tuzi ahahise ariko uko ejo bizagenda ntabyo tuzi, niyo mpamvu nyamukuru kuri njyewe nahisemo iki kimina.
Abanyarwanda bibukijwe kugira umuco wo kwiteganyiriza no kwigira ku bihe igihugu kimazemo iminsi kubera icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Umuyobozi w’Inama y’Ubutegetsi ya Prime Life Insurance, Ceaser Nkusi Nkwesi, yavuze ko “Kwizigamira ntabwo bisaba amafaranga menshi, bisaba gusa gufata icyemezo ukabifata nk’igikorwa cy’ingirakamaro mu buzima bwawe kigufasha mu bihe biri imbere, cyane cyane ibitunguranye bisaba amafaranga.
Uwayobotse ikimina cyacu mu gihe yitabye Imana, Prime Life Insurance iha umuryango we umusanzu yari amaze kugezamo n’inyungu zawo hakaniyongeraho n’impozamarira ingana na 5% y’ubwizigame bwose.
Uretse ubu bwiteganyirize bw’Ikimina Cyacu, Prime Life Insurance Ltd ifite ubundi buryo bwo kwiteganyiriza burimo guteganyiriza amashuri y’abana mu byiciro byose, Ubwishingizi bw’umuryango, guteganyiriza iza bukuru, ubwishingizi bw’abakozi mu ngeri zose, ubwishingizi bwo gutabara ndetse n’ubwishingizi ku nguzanyo.
