Umunya-Ireland yaguye ubucuruzi bw’imyambaro ikorerwa mu Rwanda kuri internet
Isoko ryo guhahira kuri internet rirarushaho kwaguka mu Rwanda, abaranga n’abagura ibicuruzwa kuva ku biribwa kugera ku myambaro banyuze kuri internet bagenda biyongera.
Isoko ryo guhahira kuri internet rirarushaho kwaguka mu Rwanda, abaranga n’abagura ibicuruzwa kuva ku biribwa kugera ku myambaro banyuze kuri internet bagenda biyongera.
Mu kwagura ubu bucuruzi, Lorcan Cathain ukomoka muri Ireland yatangije urubuga Ronkos.
rw rugiye guhuza inzu zikora imyenda mu Rwanda n’abakiriya bazo bagahahirana nta nkomyi.
rw igamije kwita ku igurisha n’igura ry’imyambaro izatuma uyikora akomeza akazi ke gasanzwe, bikamworohereza kubona isoko n’uyifuza akabona aho ayigura; Uru rubuga rushyiraho imyambaro yose rwerekana n’inzu ziyikora.
Mu mezi atandatu ashize uru rubuga rwegereye inzu zikora imyenda zirenga icumi ruri mu igeragezwa, muri zo hari izakunze imikorere yarwo n’uburyo rucuruza.
rw yafunguye ku mugaragaro ku ya 5 Gicurasi 2017.
Kuva icyo gihe nyuma y’iminsi itatu gusa ibikorwa byarwo byageze ku bantu barenga ibihumbi mirongo ine, rwakira ubusabe bufite agaciro k’amafaranga miliyoni imwe n’igice.
Igitekerezo cyo gutangiza uru rubuga Lorcan Cathain yakigize ubwo yari agiye guhahira mu isoko rya Kimironko akabona uburyo ryuzuye abantu benshi bifuza imyambaro ikorerwa mu Rwanda, bamwe ntibayibone.
Cathain ukomoka muri Ireland yatangarije IGIHE ko yahise atekereza ku gutangiza isoko rimwe ryahuza inzu zose zikora imyambaro mu Rwanda bikazorohereza kwerekana imyambaro yazo n’umuguzi akagira amahitamo.
Lorcan Cathain ateganya kwagura ibikorwa by’uru rubuga hanze y’u Rwanda mu kurushaho kwamamaza imyenda ikorerwa mu gihugu.
rw yita ku igurisha n’igura, kwamamaza, guhuza abadozi n’abaguzi, kuganira n’abaguzi, gufotora imyambaro, kwakira amafaranga no kugeza imyambaro kuri nyirayo.
Ku rubuga rwa Ronkos.
rw hari imyambaro myinshi aho umukiliya ahitamo uwo ahaka akawugura hanyuma bakawumushyira aho aherereye.
Umukiriya ni we wihitiramo ingano y’umwenda yifuza ndetse ashobora no gutanga uko awifuza, bakamwoherereza abadozi bo gufata ibipimo, bakamudodera ibimukwiriye.
Intego nyamukuru ya Ronkos.
rw ni ugushyiraho ahantu hahurira ibikorwa byinshi byo kugura no kugurisha imyambaro ikorerwa mu Rwanda bityo bikorohereza ababibamo binateza imbere uruganda rw’imideli.
Kigali International Fashion Week igiye kubera mu bihugu bitatu i Burayi
Ibirori ngarukamwaka bya Kigali Fashion Week byagejejwe ku yindi ntera n’ababitegura mu bufatanye n’ikigo cya BerexInvest Corporation, bigiye gutangira kubera i Burayi nyuma y’imyaka irindwi bitangijwe mu Rwanda.
Ibirori ngarukamwaka bya Kigali Fashion Week byagejejwe ku yindi ntera n’ababitegura mu bufatanye n’ikigo cya BerexInvest Corporation, bigiye gutangira kubera i Burayi nyuma y’imyaka irindwi bitangijwe mu Rwanda.
Ibi birori byaherukaga kubera i Kigali muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka, aho byamaze iminsi itatu biba, hakerekanwa imodoka, imyambaro isanzwe n’itamenyerewe ndetse n’ibindi bikorwa bitandukanye bigaragaza umwihariko n’intera ibijyanye no kumurika imideli bimaze kugeraho mu Rwanda.
Mu kiganiro n’itangazamakuru, Umuyobozi wa Kigali Fashion Week, John Bunyeshuri, yatangaje ko umwaka wa 2018 uzasiga isura nshya n’iterambere ridasanzwe ku bakora n’abamurika imideli b’Abanyarwanda biturutse ku mushinga udasanzwe bafite wo gutangira kubafasha kumenyekanisha ibikorwa mu mahanga.
Yagize ati "Nk’uko twambara Gucci, Nike n’indi myenda tukumva turabyishimiye cyane, kuki abanyamahanga nabo batakwambara amashati n’imyenda byanditseho ’Made in Rwanda?
’" Yongeyeho ati "Ibirori bya Kigali Fashion Week tugiye kubigeza ahashimishije kurushaho, turifuza ko n’Abanyarwanda bakora imideli bamenyekana ku Isi n’ibyo bakora bikarenga imbibi.
Yavuze ko byibuze abakora imideli bagera ku icumi mu Rwanda bazahabwa amahirwe yo kumurika ibikorwa byabo mu birori bya Kigali International Fashion Week bizabera mu bihugu bitatu i Burayi ndetse n’abamurika imideli bagera kuri 16 akaba ari bo bamaze kwemererwa guhabwa amahirwe yo kugaragaza impano zabo.
Ku ikubitiro, ibirori bya Kigali International Fashion Week bizabera i Berlin mu Budage kuva ku itariki 12 kugeza kuri 14 Mutarama 2017, bizerekeza i Amsterdam mu Buholandi kuva ku wa 26 kugeza ku wa 28 Mutarama, hanyuma mu i Bruxelles mu Bubiligi habere ibisoza urugendo muri uwo mwaka i Burayi kuva ku itariki 19 kugeza kuri 25 Werurwe 2017.
Dieudonne Ntasinzira, Umuyobozi wa BerexInvest Corporation ikorera mu Bubiligi, yasinye amasezerano y’ubufatanyabikorwa na Kigali International Fashion Week, yavuze ko amarembo afunguye ku banyarwanda bifuza kugira ibyo bamenyekanisha yizeza umusanzu ukomeye mu guteza imbere abakora ibijyanye n’imideli mu Rwanda.
Abateguye Kigali International Fashion Week batangaje ko iki gikorwa batangije cyo kugeza hanze y’u Rwanda ibi birori, nibigenda neza i Burayi, hazarebwa uko byagezwa no ku yindi migabane nka Amerika, Aziya n’ahandi hatandukanye ku Isi.
Perezida Pierre Nkurunziza yashyinguwe: Uko umuhango wagenze mu mafoto
Ibihumbi by’Abarundi, inshuti n’abahagarariye ibihugu byabo mu Burundi, bazindukiye kuri Stade Ingoma mu Mujyi wa Gitega mu muhango wo gusezera no gushyingura Nkurunziza Pierre wahoze ayoboye icyo gihugu.
Ibihumbi by’Abarundi, inshuti n’abahagarariye ibihugu byabo mu Burundi, bazindukiye kuri Stade Ingoma mu Mujyi wa Gitega mu muhango wo gusezera no gushyingura Nkurunziza Pierre wahoze ayoboye icyo gihugu.
Perezida Nkurunziza yapfuye tariki 8 Kamena 2020 aguye mu bitaro byiswe ‘Cinquantenaire Natwe turashoboye’ bya Karusi.
Itangazo Guverinoma y’u Burundi yasohoye tariki 9 Kamena ryavugaga ko Nkurunziza yazize guhagarara k’umutima.
Mu bitabiriye umuhango wo gushyingura Nkurunziza harimo Perezida mushya w’u Burundi Gen Evariste Ndayishimiye n’umugore, Visi Perezida w’u Burundi, Prosper Bazambanza n’abandi bayobozi bakuru n’abaturage bari bahagarariye uturere dutandukanye.
Abashyitsi bakuru muri uyu muhango bari Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Tanzania, Kassim Majaliwa n’umugore wa Perezida wa Zambia.
Wanitabiriwe kandi n’abahagarariye ibihugu byabo ndetse n’amadini.
Umurambo wa Nkurunziza wagejejwe muri Stade Ingoma, uhabwa icyubahiro mu buryo bwa gisirikare, uzengurutswa muri Stade mu buryo bwo kumuha icyubahiro cya gisirikare, ukorerwa amasengesho n’ibindi hanyuma ujya gushyingurwa mu irimbi ryihariye rimaze iminsi ryubakirwa i Gitega.
Umugore wa Nkurunziza, Denise Bucumi, yavuze ko abuze umukunzi, abana bakaba babuze umubyeyi.
Yashimye Imana ko yabashoboje gukomera muri ibi bihe bitoroshye.
Ati “Kubura umuntu mu mwanya mutoya wari ugikunze kubana nawe ntibiba byoroshe, ariko mu muryango Imana yaduhaye imbaraga zo guhagarara muri ibi bihe".
Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yavuze ko we n’Abarundi bose bazahora bakurikiza umurage Nkurunziza abasigiye wo gukunda igihugu nk’uko nawe yabikoze yishingikirije abakurambere bamubanjirije.
Ati “Ubwanjye ndahombye, umujyanama mukuru, wa wundi ubaza byose, akaba azi n’akari mu nda y’ingoma nk’uwayikanye, wa wundi umenya icyasongoye ihwa".
Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Tanzania, Kassim Majaliwa, yashimye Nkurunziza avuga ko ikibabaje ari uko agiye atinjije u Burundi mu muryango w’Ubukungu bwa Afurika y’Amajyepfo, SADC, ariko igihugu cye kizabufasha kubigeraho.
Pierre Nkurunziza yavutse ku wa 18 Ukuboza 1964, ayobora u Burundi kuva mu 2005 yongera gutorwa mu 2015 muri manda yagombaga kurangira muri uyu mwaka wa 2020.

Tariki 30 Kamena ni umunsi w’182 mu mateka.
Hasigaye iminsi 183 uyu mwaka ukagera ku musozo.
Bimwe mu byaranze uyu munsi mu mateka
1559: Umwami Henry II wayoboraga igihugu cy’u Bufaransa yakomerekeye bikomeye mu mukino ujya gusa n’umwe mu mikino njyarugamba mu bihe bya kera uzwi nka Jousting, aho abarwana baba bari ku ndogobe.
Yakomerekejwe na Gabriel wari umwe mu barinzi b’I bwami.
1864: Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika Abraham Lincoln yagabiye Leta ya California ikibaya cya Yosemite mu rwego rwo kugira ngo gikorereshwe na rubanda nk’ahantu ho kwidagadurira.
1905: Albert Einstein, yashyize ahagaragara inyandiko yise On the Electrodynamics of Moving Bodies.
Iyi nyandiko ni yo yashyizemo umwihariko w’ umutwe w’inyandiko yise special relativity.
1935: Bwa mbere, mu gihugu cya Senegal hateranye inama y’umutwe wa Politiki witwa Senegalese Socialist Party washinzwe na Lamine Guèye mu mwaka w’1934.
1960: Igihugu cya Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo cyabonye ubwigenge nyuma yo kumara imyaka n’imyaka gikolonizwa n’Ababiligi.
1963: Hakozwe ubwicanyi mu gitero cy’ubwiyahuzi cyari cyateguwe n’umukuru w’abagizi ba nabi (mafia) Salvatore Greco, ubwo imodoka ipakiye ibisasu yasandariraga hagati y’abayobozi ba Polisi n’abasirikare kigahitana abagera kuri barindwi.
Ubu bwicanyi bwiswe Ciaculli bwabereye mu gihugu cy’u Butaliyani.
1990: Habayeho ubwiyunge hagati y’u Budage bw’Iburasirazuba ndetse n’ubw’Iburengerazuba.
1997: U Bwongereza bweguriye u Bushinwa ububasha bwari bufite kuri Hong Kong.
Bamwe mu bavutse kuri uyu munsi
1755: Paul François Jean Nicolas Barras, umunyapolitiki ukomoka mu gihugu cy’u Bufaransa.
1807: Friedrich Theodor von Vischer, Umwanditsi n’umufilozofe ukomoka mu gihugu cy’u Budage.
1966: Michael Gerard "Mike" Tyson wahoze ari umukinnyi w’umukino w’iteramakofe (Box) wo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika.
Uyu yabaye ikirangirire mu cyiciro cy’abakinnyi b’uyu mukino baremereye ku rwego rw’isi (Heavyweight Champion of the World).
Bamwe mu batabarutse uyu munsi
1953: Charles William Miller, umukinnyi ukomeye w’umupira w’amaguru mu gihugu cya Brazil, ufatwa nk’umubyeyi wa Football muri Brazil.
2005: Clancy Eccles, umuhanzi w’umuririmbyi wo mu njyana ya reggae.
Hashimangiwe ko Centre Culturel Francophone izafungurwa mbere y’uko uyu mwaka urangira
Ambasade y’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda ikomeje imyiteguro yo gufungura ku mugaragaro Ikigo Ndangamuco cy’Igifaransa, Centre Culturel Francophone, biteganyijwe ko kizafungurwa mbere y’uko uyu mwaka wa 2020 urangira.
Ambasade y’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda ikomeje imyiteguro yo gufungura ku mugaragaro Ikigo Ndangamuco cy’Igifaransa, Centre Culturel Francophone, biteganyijwe ko kizafungurwa mbere y’uko uyu mwaka wa 2020 urangira.
Gufungura iki kigo ndangamuco biri mu byaganiriweho kuri uyu wa Kane hagati ya Chargé d’Affaires w’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda, Jérémie Blin n’Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’amahanga, Prof Nshuti Manasseh.
Ni igikorwa byashimangiwe ko cyitezwe mbere y’uko uyu mwaka wa 2020 urangira.
Blin aheruka gutangaza ko iki kigo kizaba giherereye iruhande rwa Kigali Convention Centre, nibura kizafungurwa mu Ukwakira uyu mwaka.
Amakuru agera kuri IGIHE yemeza ko Ambasade y’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda yamaze gukodesha inzu izakurerwamo n’icyo kigo, ubu hari gukorwa inyigo y’uko hazatunganywa hakurikijwe ibikorwa bizajya bihabera.
Biteganywa ko hazaba hari ahabera imurikabikorwa rishingiye ku muco, inama, kikazaba ari ikigo giha urubyiruko uburyo bwose bwo kwiga ururimi rw’Igifaransa, n’abanyabugeni b’abanyarwanda hakababera aho kwitoreza no guteza imbere umwuga wabo.
Iyi nzu ndangamuco izasimbura iyahahoze yitwaga Ikigo ndangamuco cy’u Bufaransa n’u Rwanda (Centre D’Echanges Culturels Franco-Rwandais) cyafunzwe ndetse n’inzu cyakoreragamo igasenywa.
Iyi nyubako yari iherereye iruhande rwa rond-point nini yo mu Mujyi wa Kigali rwagati ku ruhande rugana mu Kiyovu, yafunzwe ndetse isenywa mu 2014 n’ubuyobozi bw’Umujyi wa Kigali, bwavuze ko ubutaka bw’aho yari iherereye butakoreshwaga neza ndetse iyo nyubako itari ikitajyanye n’imyubakire ihagenewe.
Ni ibikorwa byabaye mu gihe umubano w’ibihugu byombi utari wifashe neza.
Ibi biganiro kandi byibanze ku ngingo zirimo isubukurwa ry’ibikorwa by’Ikigega Mpuzamahanga cy’Abafaransa gishinzwe Iterambere, AFD, by’umwihariko mu gufasha mu guhangana n’ingaruka z’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Mu zindi nzego zaganiriweho harimo ubutabera, ishoramari, ubukerarugendo, ikoranabuhanga n’iterambere ry’imibereho y’abaturage.
Mu bufatanye bw’impande zombi, Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubuzima, RBC, giheruka gusinyana amasezerano na Ambasade y’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda, agamije gushyira ikoranabuhanga muri telefoni zigezweho, Smartphones z’abajyanama b’ubuzima bagera kuri 400, rizabafasha mu guhangana na Coronavirus.
Ubu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga bwakozwe n’Ikigo Institut Pasteur na AP-HP (Assistance publique – Hôpitaux de Paris) cyo mu Bufaransa, butuma hamenyekana ku buryo bwagutse kandi bwihuse abafite iki cyorezo cyane cyane mu bice by’icyaro.
Amasezerano hagati y’impande zombi agaragaza ko uyu mushinga uzatwara 223 077 789 Frw, igice kimwe kizatangwa n’Urwego rw’u Bufaransa rushinzwe ubushakashatsi kuri Sida na Hepatite, aho ruzatanga 126 783 000 Frw, naho Ambasade y’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda itange 94 010 152 Frw.
Mu mwaka ushize Umuyobozi Mukuru wa AFD yaje mu Rwanda yizeza gukomeza gufatanya mu bikorwa by’iterambere.
Umuyobozi w’icyo kigo yahaherukaga mu 1992.
Mu mwaka ushize kandi AFD yahaye Banki ya Kigali inguzanyo ya miliyoni 20 z’amayero (asaga miliyari 20 Frw) yo guteza imbere ibigo bito n’ibiciriritse mu Rwanda, inemera gutanga ibihumbi 300 by’amayero (asaga miliyoni 300 Frw) azifashishwa mu bya tekiniki.
Aya mafaranga y’inguzanyo azatangwa mu nzego ziganjemo ikoranabuhanga, ubuhinzi, ubworozi ndetse n’ingufu.

Huye: Babiri mu bakekwaho kwica umuntu bafashwe, inka ze zifatirwa i Nyaruguru
Babiri mu bagizi ba nabi bakekwaho kwica umugabo wari uragiye inka ze mu Murenge wa Gishamvu mu Karere ka Huye batawe muri yombi naho izo nka uko ari esheshatu zifatirwa mu Murenge wa Mata mu Karere ka Nyaruguru.
Babiri mu bagizi ba nabi bakekwaho kwica umugabo wari uragiye inka ze mu Murenge wa Gishamvu mu Karere ka Huye batawe muri yombi naho izo nka uko ari esheshatu zifatirwa mu Murenge wa Mata mu Karere ka Nyaruguru.
Ku mugoroba wo ku Cyumweru tariki ya 28 Kamena 2020 nibwo abagizi ba nabi bishe umugabo wo mu Murenge Gishamvu mu Karere ka Huye bamutsinda mu kabande kari mu gishanga cy’Akagera aho yari aragiye inka ze.
Uwo mugabo w’imyaka 57 y’amavuko witwa Ndabunguye Vincent yamenyekanye saa sita z’ijoro ubwo umugore we yatabazaga ubuyobozi ko yagiye kuragira inka aramutegereza aramubura.
Abatabaye basanze yamaze kwicwa ndetse n’inka esheshatu yari aragiye ziburirwa irengero.
Inzego z’umutekano ku bufatanye n’ubuyobozi ndetse n’abaturage bakomeje ubufatanye mu gushakisha abamwishe no kumenya irengero ry’izo nka; mu ijoro ryakeye ni bwo zafatiwe mu Murenge wa Mata ariko abari bazishoreye barirukanka bacika abanyerondo.
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Nyaruguru, Habitegeko François, yabwiye IGIHE ko abari bashoreye izo nka bahuye n’abanyerondo mu ijoro ryakeye mu Kagari ka Ramba barazibatesha bariruka.
Ati “Twazifashe, ni irondo ry’abaturage ryazifatiye ahitwa mu i Ramba mu Murenge wa Mata mu Mudugudu wa Cyafurwe ariko abari baziyoboye birukanse.
Twazifashe nka saa cyenda z’ijoro.
Ubu ni ukuzisubiza ba nyirazo, twamenyesheje Akarere ka Huye kugira ngo baze bazifate.
Ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Nyaruguru bwahise buhanahana amakuru n’Umurenge wa Maraba mu Karere ka Huye ko abo birukanse ari ho berekeje, barabatangatanga bafatamo babiri.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Maraba, Hakuzimana Jean Baptiste, yabwiye IGIHE ko abo babiri bafashwe bamaze gushyikirizwa ubugenzacyaha ngo bakorweho iperereza.
Ati “Mu Murenge wa Mata bamaze kuduha amakuru twahise dutangatanga maze ahagana saa kumi n’ebyiri z’igitondo dufata abagabo babiri bakekwa barimo umwe wo mu Murenge wa Cyahinda mu Karere ka Nyaruguru n’undi wo mu Murenge wa Tumba mu Karere ka Huye.
Abo bagabo bombi bafatiwe mu Kagari ka Buremera; kuri ubu bafungiye kuri Sitasiyo ya RIB ya Ngoma mu Karere ka Huye.

RDC: Umugore wa Tshisekedi yanyomoje abamushinja gufasha imfubyi zo mu Rwanda asize iz’iwabo
Denise Nyakeru, umufasha wa Perezida wa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, Felix Tshisekedi yanyomoje amakuru yari amaze iminsi avugwa y’uko hari imfubyi zigera kuri 500 yemeye kurera zo mu Rwanda.
Denise Nyakeru, umufasha wa Perezida wa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, Felix Tshisekedi yanyomoje amakuru yari amaze iminsi avugwa y’uko hari imfubyi zigera kuri 500 yemeye kurera zo mu Rwanda.
Denise Nyakeru, umufasha wa Perezida wa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, Félix Tshisekedi yanyomoje amakuru yari amaze iminsi avugwa y’uko hari imfubyi zigera kuri 500 yemeye kurera zo mu Rwanda.
Abakwirakwiza ayo makuru bavuga ko yafashe abo bana mu ruzinduko aherukamo mu Rwanda muri Kamena umwaka ushize, bakabihuza n’imyumvire ya bamwe mu banyapolitiki n’abatavuga rumwe na Leta ya Congo batwerera abantu bavuka i Bukavu kuba Abanyarwanda.
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu ubwo yari mu kiganiro Le débat cyatambutse kuri Radiyo Top Congo FM, Madamu Nyakeru yahakanye ayo makuru, avuga ko atajya gufasha imfubyi z’ahandi asize iz’iwabo.
Yagize ati “Ntabwo nigeze mfata imfubyi zo mu Rwanda ngo nzirere.
Bavuga ko nafashe imfubyi 500, nari kuzifatira iki kandi no muri RDC zihari?
Tariki 9 Kamena 2019 nibwo Madamu Denise Nyakeru Tshisekedi, umugore wa Perezida wa RDC yagiriye uruzinduko rw’iminsi ibiri mu Rwanda.
Ku munsi wa mbere w’uruzinduko rwe, Madamu Tshisekedi yatambagijwe Umujyi wa Kigali yerekwa ibyiza biwutatse, awusoza mu byishimo by’ikirenga mu isangira yakiriwemo na Madamu Jeannette Kagame.
Ku munsi wa kabiri w’uruzinduko rwe rw’akazi, ku wa Mbere yasuye Ikigo Isange One Stop Centre cyita ku bakorewe ihohoterwa ryaba iryo mu miryango cyangwa irishingiye ku gitsina mu Bitaro bya Kacyiru, aho yashimye serivisi zihatangirwa.
Muri gahunda ye mu Rwanda, Madamu Tshisekedi, yagaragaje ubushake bwo kwigira ku mikorere y’Umuryango wa Imbuto Foundation umaze imyaka 18 utangijwe mu gukomeza kubaka ibikorwa by’umuryango we.
Abinyujije mu muryango we, yatangije gahunda yise ‘Plus Fortes’ igamije guha ubushobozi abakobwa n’abagore bubagira abanyembaraga bahambaye, mu kwiteza imbere bo n’imiryango yabo.
Brexit: Abongereza 56.
8% bagaragaje ko batakongera gutora kwivana muri EU
Ubushakashatsi bushya bwagaragaje ko Abongereza benshi kuri ubu bongeye guhabwa amahirwe yo guhitamo kuva cyangwa kuguma mu Muryango w’Ubumwe bw’u Burayi (EU) ‘Brexit’, batora kuwugumamo.
Ubushakashatsi bushya bwagaragaje ko Abongereza benshi kuri ubu bongeye guhabwa amahirwe yo guhitamo kuva cyangwa kuguma mu Muryango w’Ubumwe bw’u Burayi (EU) ‘Brexit’, batora kuwugumamo.
Hashize imyaka ine abaturage b’u Bwongereza batoye icyemezo cyo kwivana muri EU.
Mu bushakashatsi bukorwa na ESS [European Social Survey], buri myaka ibiri, bwerekanye ko 56.
8% by’abasubije bose mu Bwongereza batora kuguma muri EU baramutse babonye ayo mahitamo.
Uyu mubare ukaba wiyongereye kuko mu bushakashatsi buheruka bwa 2018, bari 49.
Icyakora ubushakashatsi bwinshi bwaherukaga bwerekanaga ko mu Bongereza babajijwe, abagera kuri 34.
9%, bavugaga ko batora kuva muri EU naho 8.
3% bakavuga ko batabitora muri kamarampaka.
Ku wa 31 Mutarama saa sita z’ijoro nibwo u Bwongereza bwatandukanye ku mugaragaro n’Umuryango w’Ubumwe by’Ibihugu by’u Burayi (EU) nyuma y’imyaka 47 bwari buwumazemo, n’igihe gisaga imyaka itatu hatowe ko buva muri uyu muryango.
Uyu mwanzuro wagiye mu ngiro nyuma y’uko mu 2016 Abongereza 52 ku ijana batoye muri kamarampaka ko igihugu cyabo kiva muri EU.
Ubushakashatsi bwakorewe mu bihugu 26 birimo bine bitari ibinyamuryango bya EU, bwagaragaje ko bishyigikiye uyu muryango, bwerekana ko ibivugwa ko hari ibindi bihugu bishobora gukurikira u Bwongereza, ari ibihuha.
Umuyobozi wa ESS, Prof.
Rory Fitzgerald, yavuze ko imibare babonye yerekana ko u Bwongereza butumva kimwe gahunda ya Brexit, ariko mu bindi bihugu byasigaye muri EU bishyigikiye cyane ko iki gihugu cyari kuguma muri uyu muryango.
Ati “Gushyigikira ko u Bwongereza buguma muri EU biri ku gipimo cya 66% muri République Tchèque, naho muri Espagne bigera kuri 89%, bikaba byerekana ko kutishimira kuba muri EU kuri mu Bwongereza kutari mu bindi bihugu".
EU n’u Bwongereza bemeranyije ku gihe cy’inzibacyuho, nibura kugeza mu mpera za 2020, aho u Bwongereza buzakomeza kubahiriza ihuzwa rya gasutamo za EU n’isoko rusange no kubahiriza itegeko rigenga EU, nubwo butakibarwa nk’umunyamuryango.
Abayobozi n’abakozi ba Leta 15 bakurikiranyweho kudasobanura inkomoko y’umutungo wabo
Umuvunyi Mukuru, Anastase Murekezi, yatangaje ko hari abayobozi n’abakozi ba Leta 15 bari gukurikiranwa mu butabera kubera kunanirwa gusobanura inkomoko y’umutungo wabo nk’uko biteganywa n’amategeko.
Umuvunyi Mukuru, Anastase Murekezi, yatangaje ko hari abayobozi n’abakozi ba Leta 15 bari gukurikiranwa mu butabera kubera kunanirwa gusobanura inkomoko y’umutungo wabo nk’uko biteganywa n’amategeko.
Yabitangaje kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 29 Kamena 2020, ubwo biro ya Sena y’u Rwanda yakiraga Inyandiko z’Imenyekanishamutungo y’Umuvunyi Mukuru n’Abavunyi Bungirije n’iy’abandi bakozi b’Urwego rw’Umuvunyi.
Kwakira, kubika no gukurikirana buri mwaka amakuru agaragaza imitungo nyakuri y’abayobozi b’igihugu kuva ku rwego rwo hejuru kugera ku rwo hasi n’abandi bakozi bateganywa n’Itegeko, ni imwe mu shingano nyamukuru Urwego rw’Umuvunyi.
Muri uyu mwaka wa 2020, abagomba kumenyekanisha imitungo yabo mu gihugu ni ibihumbi 13.
Tariki ya nyuma yo kumenyekanisha imitungo ikaba ari 30 Kamena 2020.
Nyuma yo gushyikiriza Sena inyandiko z’imenyekanishamutungo, Umuvunyi mukuru Anastase Murekezi yavuze ko mu bayobozi n’abakozi ba Leta basabwa kumenyekanisha umutungo wabo, abamaze kubikora bagera ku 11000.
Yavuze ko hari abantu 15 bari gukorwaho iperereza n’abashyikirijwe ubutabera kubera ko bananiwe gusobanura inkomoko y’umutungo wabo.
Yavuze ko muri abo 15, dosiye za batandatu zohererejwe inkiko, barindwi baracyakorwaho iperereza mu bugenzacyaha naho babiri baracyakorwa iperereza n’Umuvunyi.
Ahanini kumenyekanisha umutungo ku bayobozi n’abakozi ba Leta, bigamije kwirinda ko hari abayobozi bigwizaho imitungo bayikomoye ku kunyereza ibyagenewe rubanda.
Ku bakunda kwandikisha imitungo ku bandi bantu ngo batazavumburwa, Umuvunyi Mukuru Murekezi yabihanangirije, abasaba kubireka kuko ari igikorwa kigayitse, kandi abafatwa bibagiraho ingaruka zikomeye.
Yasabye kandi abataramenyekanisha imitungo yabo kubikora vuba bitarenze kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 30 Kamena, bitaba ibyo bagahanwa.
Bimwe mu bihano bishobora guhabwa umuyobozi cyangwa umukozi utamenyekanishije umutungo harimo kugawa ku mugaragaro mu nyandiko cyangwa bagakatwa ¼ cy’umushara n’ibindi.
Ingengo y’imari y’Umujyi wa Kigali ya 2020/2021 yagabanutseho 19%
Umujyi wa Kigali wemeje Ingengo y’imari uzakoresha mu 2020/2021 ingana na miliyari 100 Frw, yagabanutseho 19% ugereranyije n’iy’umwaka ushize yanganaga na miliyari 124 Frw.
Umujyi wa Kigali wemeje Ingengo y’imari uzakoresha mu 2020/2021 ingana na miliyari 100 Frw, yagabanutseho 19% ugereranyije n’iy’umwaka ushize yanganaga na miliyari 124 Frw.
Ni ingengo y’imari irimo amafaranga azaturuka mu kigega cya leta agera kuri 40%, azava mu misoro n’amahoro yinjizwa n’Umujyi wa Kigali nayo agera kuri 40% mu gihe andi akazava mu baterankunga batandukanye.
Imishinga y’ibikorwa remezo niyo izatwara ingengo y’imari nini igera kuri 51%, ibindi bikorwa bitware 49%.
Irimo imihanda na za ruhurura bizabanza kuzuzwa, kunoza ibyo gutwara abantu mu Mujyi wa Kigali, gucanira imihanda itandukanye no kubaka imihanda mishya ya kilometero zirenga 30.
Mu miturire biteganyijwe ko muri uyu mwaka w’ingengo y’imari, Umujyi wa Kigali uzakora inyigo kandi ugatangira kubakira abatuye mu manegeka harimo abo kuri ruhurura ya Mpazi n’abatuye ahashyira ubuzima bwabo mu kaga muri Nyabisindu, Gatenga na Nyagatovu.
Harimo kandi kubaka inzu z’abatishoboye n’abasanzwe bafashwa n’Ikigega gifasha Abacitse ku icumu, FARG.
Muri gahunda zo gukura abantu mu bukene ziziharira 4.
9% by’ingengo y’imari hazabaho guhanga imirimo mishya ibihumbi 49 ndetse hafashwe n’amakoperative agamije kuzamura abayagize.
Mu yindi mishinga, iyi ngengo y’imari izasiga hubatswe ibyumba by’amashuri 1634 n’ubwiherero 2263 ndetse n’ibigo nderabuzima bishya bitatu.
Umuyobozi w’Umujyi wa Kigali, Pudence Rubingisa, yavuze ko igabanuka rya 19% rishingiye ku nguzanyo n’amafaranga y’abaterankunga ataragarutse mu ngengo y’imari y’uyu mwaka.
Mu mwaka ushize harimo umushinga minini wo kubaka imihanda ireshya n’ibilometero 54 yari yihariye miliyari 29 Frw.
Yavuze ko muri rusange amafaranga Umujyi wa Kigali winjiza n’azava muri leta yo aziyongera.
Ati “Kugabanuka kw’ingengo y’imari, urebye iyo tuzakoresha ni izava mu misoro n’amahoro iziyongera ku kigereranyo cya 10% n’izava mu kigega cya leta iziyongeraho 10%.
Izagabanuka ni izava mu baterankunga, ku buryo ariyo ituma tugabanukaho 19% ariko ni ayabaga yarafashwe mu gukora ibikorwa remezo nk’inkunga cyangwa umwenda ayo rero ntabwo ahari.
Rubingisa yagaragaje ko ingengo y’imari ikiri ntoya, atanga ingero avuga ko Umujyi wa Kigali ufite ruhurura 40 zo gukora ariko ukaba ufite gusa iyo gukora enye ndetse hakiri abagituye mu manegeka bakeneye gutuzwa neza n’imihanda ikeneye kubakwa n’ibindi.
Ibikorwa by’Umujyi wa Kigali biteganywa mu ngengo y’imari hashingiwe ku cyerekezo cy’igihugu ariko by’umwihariko ku cyerekezo cyo kugira Kigali umujyi w’icyitegererezo mu 2050.
Macron yashinje Turikiya uruhare mu byaha bikorerwa muri Libya
Perezida Emmanuel Macron yashinje Turikiya ko ikomeje kwenyegeza intambara muri Libya, aho yavuze ko ifite uruhare mu byaha bikorerwa muri iki gihugu kubera uruhande yafashe.
Perezida Emmanuel Macron yashinje Turikiya ko ikomeje kwenyegeza intambara muri Libya, aho yavuze ko ifite uruhare mu byaha bikorerwa muri iki gihugu kubera uruhande yafashe.
Macron yavuze ko Turikiya yinjije muri Libya abarwanyi bavuye muri Syria.
Turikiya ishyigikiye Guverinoma ya Gisirikare ikomeje kurwanya Gen Khalifa Haftar.
Macron yavuze ko Turikiya iri gukina imikino mibi cyane kandi ko inyuranyije n’ibyemejwe n’inama ya Berlin igamije gushakira amahoro Libya.
Ati “Ntabwo tuzihanganira uruhare Turikiya igira uyu munsi muri Libya".
Turikiya iherutse kohereza muri Libya indege n’intwaro ku ruhande ishyigikiye, ndetse byifashishwa mu mirwano igamije kwigarurira uduce twose tw’igihugu.
U Bufaransa kandi buherutse gushinja Turikiya ko yabangamiye ubwato bwabwo bwari mu nkengero za Libya bwashakaga kugenzura ubwa Turikiya bwari buhari nabwo bwakekwaga ho kurenga ku mabwiriza yashyizwe na Loni ajyanye n’ibihano byafatiwe Libya mu by’intwaro.
Libya yatangiye kuba isibaniro ry’ibibazo kuva mu 2011 ubwo Muammar Gaddafi wari umaze igihe kinini ayiyobora yari amaze kwicwa.
Ubu igihugu kiyobowe na Guverinoma y’Ubumwe bw’Igihugu ikorera mu Murwa Mukuru Tripoli, ishyigikiwe na Qatar na Turikiya.
Ihanganye n’Igisirikare kiyobowe na Gen Haftar, aho we abarizwa mu Burasirazuba bw’Igihugu ariko agenzura ibice byinshi.
Ashyigikiwe na Misiri, u Burusiya na Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu.
Gen Haftar yagabye ibitero muri Mata umwaka ushize ashaka kwigarurira Umurwa Mukuru ariko ntibiramukundira.
Raporo ya Loni iherutse guhishura ko hari abacanshuro b’Abarusiya bibumbiye mu kigo cyitwa Wagner Group bari kurwana muri Libya bashyigikiye Gen Khalifa Haftar, uhanganye na Guverinoma iriho.
Bivugwa ko Wagner ibarizwamo abo bacanshuro yanagize uruhare mu mvururu zabaye muri Ukraine, Syrie n’ahandi.
Guverinoma y’u Burusiya yakunze guhakana ivuga ko nta sano na ruto ifitanye n’uwo mutwe w’abarwanyi.
Iyi raporo ya Loni yakozwe n’itsinda ryigenga rya Loni rishinzwe ibijyanye no kureba uburyo ibihano byafatiwe Libya bishyirwa mu bikorwa.
Ntabwo irasohoka kugeza ubu ariko ibigo bitandukanye byamaze kuyibona.
Ni raporo ya paji 57 ivuga ko aba bacanshuro bo muri Wagner bari muri Libya kuva mu Ukwakira 2018 aho “batanga ubufasha mu bya tekiniki mu gukanika imodoka no mu mirwano".
Bagira n’uruhare mu bikorwa byo kugenzura ikirere no mu gutanga ba mudahusha bifashishwa mu mirwano.
COVID-19: Abaturage barashwe no kugaburira abatishoboye mu bikubiye muri raporo ku iyubahirizwa ry’uburenganzira bwa muntu
Komisiyo y’Uburenganzira bwa muntu mu Rwanda (NCHR) yashyize hanze raporo y’agateganyo yerekana uko u Rwanda ruhagaze mu bijyanye n’iyubahirizwa ry’uburenganzira bwa muntu mu Rwanda muri ibi bihe bya COVID-19.
Komisiyo y’Uburenganzira bwa muntu mu Rwanda (NCHR) yashyize hanze raporo y’agateganyo yerekana uko u Rwanda ruhagaze mu bijyanye n’iyubahirizwa ry’uburenganzira bwa muntu mu Rwanda muri ibi bihe bya COVID-19.
Ibikubiye muri raporo ya NCHR bishingiye ku bugenzuzi iyi komisiyo yakoze muri ibi bihe igihugu gihanganye na COVID-19 iterwa na Coronavirus.
Iri genzura ryakozwe hagamijwe kureba uburyo iyubahirizwa ry’uburenganzira bwa muntu rihagaze, ibyavuyemo NCHR ikazabigenderaho igira inama inzego zitandukanye kugira ngo ibitanoze bizarusheho kunozwa.
NCHR mu gukusanya amakuru yibanze mu nguni zose z’ingingo zigize uburenganzira bwa muntu harimo uburenganzira bwo kubaho, ubwo kwishyira ukizana, ubwo gutanga ibitekerezo, ubwo kubona iby’ibanze mu buzima, ubwo kudateshwa agaciro hashingiwe ku miterere n’ibitekerezo byawe n’uburenganzira ku byo wemerewe n’amategeko.
Ku bijyanye n’uburenganzira bwo kubaho iyi komisiyo yasuzumye ibijyanye n’urupfu rw’abantu babiri bo mu Karere ka Nyanza, Umurenge wa Nyagisozi barashwe n’umupolisi muri Werurwe.
Muri iyi raporo NCHR igaragaza ko yakurikiranye iki kibazo isanga cyarageze mu Rwego rw’Igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha ndetse dosiye ikaba yaragejejwe mu Bushinjacyaha.
Ku bijyanye n’uburyo Abanyarwanda babasha kubona iby’ibanze mu buzima mu bihe bya COVID-19, iyi raporo igaragaza ko mu igenzura NCHR yakoreye mu bice bitandukanye by’Umujyi wa Kigali no mu Turere twa Nyanza, Kirehe na Rubavu, mu bihe bya guma mu rugo yasanze uburenganzira bwo kubona ibyo kurya bwarubahirijwe ndetse abatishoboye bakagenda bagobokwa na Leta, abaturanyi babo bifashije n’imiryango nterankunga.
NCHR yashimye iyi gahunda ivuga ko yafashije ba nyakabyizi babashaga kurya ari uko bakoze kuticwa n’inzara.
Mu bugenzuzi bw’iyi komisiyo yasanze mu Mujyi wa Kigali honyine mu bantu 215 052 bagombaga kugerwaho n’iyi nkunga y’ibiribwa abagera kuri 99% barayibonye kandi ikabasha kubagoboka.
Muri iyi raporo Umujyi wa Kigali kandi washimiwe gahunda washyizeho yo gutanga nimero ya telefoni ishobora kwifashishwa n’ufite ikibazo cy’ibyo kurya, gahunda yatumye abagera kuri 9432 bagobokwa.
Inerekana ko kandi hari imbaraga zashyizwe mu gukurikirana abayobozi b’inzego z’ibanze bagaragaweho amakosa yo kunyereza inkunga.
Indi ngingo yasuzumwe na NCHR mu bijyanye n’iyubahirizwa ry’uburenganzira bwa muntu mu Rwanda ni ikibazo cy’abasirikare b’u Rwanda bahohoteye abaturage bo mu Karere ka Gasabo, Umurenge wa Remera, Akagali ka Nyarutarama, Umudugudu wa Kangondo II.
Mu igenzura NCHR yakoze yashimye ko aba basirikare bakurikiranyweho gufata ku ngufu abagore batatu, kwiba no gukubita bagejejwe mu butabera ubu ikibazo cyabo kikaba kiri mu rukiko.
Uretse guhana abakoze amakosa, iyi raporo igaragaza ko Minisiteri y’Ingabo yanakoze ibishoboka byose mu gufasha abahohotewe ibajyana muri Isange One stop ndetse n’abagize ihungabana baraganirizwa n’ibyangijwe birarihwa.
Iyi komisiyo kandi yagaragaje ko uburengazira bwa muntu bwagiye bwubahirizwa mu buryo bwose bushoboka burimo gufasha abari mu nkiko gukomeza kuburana hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga, korohereza Abanyarwanda bari mu mahanga gutaha n’abanyamahanga bakoroherezwa gusubira iwabo.
Mu minsi ya vuba NCHR izashyira hanze indi raporo ivuga mu buryo bwuzuye ibijyanye n’igenzura yakoze ryerekana uko uburenganzira bw’ikiremwamuntu bwubahirijwe mu bihe cya Coronavirus.
Urubanza rw’ukekwaho gukoresha inyandiko mpimbano akambura leta miliyoni 300 Frw rwasubitswe
Urukiko rwisumbuye rwa Gasabo rwasubitse isomwa ku ifungwa n’ifungurwa mu rubanza ruregwamo rwiyemezamirimo witwa Uwemeye Jean Baptiste ufite Sosiyete ya ECOAT, akaba akurikiranyweho gukoresha inyandiko mpimbano zatumye yishyurwa ibikorwa atakoze mu gusana umuhanda Muhanga-Karongi.
Urukiko rwisumbuye rwa Gasabo rwasubitse isomwa ku ifungwa n’ifungurwa mu rubanza ruregwamo rwiyemezamirimo witwa Uwemeye Jean Baptiste ufite Sosiyete ya ECOAT, akaba akurikiranyweho gukoresha inyandiko mpimbano zatumye yishyurwa ibikorwa atakoze mu gusana umuhanda Muhanga-Karongi.
Ibyaha Uwizeye akurikiranyweho birimo gukoresha inyandiko mpimbano, zatumye ngo yishyurwa arenga miliyoni 300 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Amakuru IGIHE ifite agaragaza ko uyu rwiyemezamirimo yari yarahawe isoko ryo gusana umuhanda Muhanga-Karongi, ariko we ngo akaba yarishyuzaga ibikorwa atakoze, biciye mu guhimba inyandiko zivuga ko yakoze ibikorwa runaka kandi nta byo yakoze.
Ikindi akurikiranyweho ni uko ngo yahimbaga inyandiko zishyuza, yarangiza kwishyurwa akongeramo izindi bari baramwishyuriyeho mbere.
Amakuru avuga ko uyu rwiyemezamirimo yagendaga areba mu nyemezabwishyu yishyuje mbere, akongera akazihimba akazishyurizaho ku buryo ngo yari ageze ku nshuro ya gatandatu yishyuza.
Uwemeye yageze mu rukiko kuri uyu wa Gatanu aho akomeje kuburana ibijyanye n’ifungwa n’ifungurwa.
Mu rubanza rwe ahakana ibyaha ashinjwa.
Uyu munsi nibwo byari biteganyijwe ko urukiko rusoma uwo mwanzuro ariko isomwa ryawo ryimuriwe tariki 30 Kamena saa Munani z’amanywa, kuko umwe mu bacamanza bagize Inteko Iburanisha ngo yahawe indi mirimo itunguranye.
Mu Ukuboza 2019 nibwo Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe guteza Imbere Ubwikorezi (RTDA) cyatangaje ko cyatangiye kuvugurura umuhanda Muhanga-Karongi.
Ni nyuma y’aho abakora ingendo ziva i Kigali zigana mu Burengerazuba bakoresheje umuhanda Kigali-Karongi-Rusizi, bari barakunze gusaba ko wakorwa kugira ngo ureke kubangamira ingendo.
RTDA iherutse gutangaza ko uwo muhanda wubatswe bwa mbere mu 2002, igice cya Rubengera-Rambura kigomba gutwara miliyari 13 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Umushinjacyaha wo mu Bufaransa ategerejwe i Kigali ku iperereza kuri Félicien Kabuga
Umushinjacyaha wungirije mu Rukiko Rukuru rw’i Paris, Aurélia Devos, ategerejwe i Kigali mu iperereza ku ruhare rwa Félicien Kabuga muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Umushinjacyaha wungirije mu Rukiko Rukuru rw’i Paris, Aurélia Devos, ategerejwe i Kigali mu iperereza ku ruhare rwa Félicien Kabuga muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Félicien Kabuga ufatwa nk’umucurabwenge n’umuterankunga mukuru wa Jenoside aherutse gufatirwa mu Bufaransa aho yari amaze imyaka yihishe ubutabera ku ruhare rwe muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Biteganyijwe ko Aurélia Devos azagera i Kigali mu minsi iri imbere ku iperereza ryimbitse ku byo Kabuga ashinjwa.
Devos asanzwe ashinzwe ishami rishinzwe kurwanya ibyaha byibasiye inyokomuntu.
Devos agiye kuza mu Rwanda mu gihe hategerejwe itariki y’ubujurire bwa Félicien Kabuga, aho ashaka ko urukiko rwisubiraho ku mwanzuro rwafashwe wo kumwohereza muri Tanzania kuburanira ahakorera Urugereko rwasigariyeho urukiko mpanabyaha rwashyiriweho u Rwanda, IRMCT.
Urukiko rw’i Paris tariki 3 Kamena nibwo rwategetse ko Félicien Kabuga yoherezwa muri Tanzania kuhaburanira.
Ni umwanzuro wafashwe nyuma y’uko tariki 27 Gicurasi, urukiko rwari rwamaganye icyifuzo cy’abunganizi be cy’uko yarekurwa akava muri gereza ya “La Santé" afungiyemo mu Mujyi wa Paris agashyirwa mu nzu acunzwe hifashishijwe inzogera y’ikoranabuhanga hanyuma akitabwaho n’abana be.
Mu 1997 nibwo Kabuga yashyiriweho na ICTR impapuro zisaba ko atabwa muri yombi kubera ibyaha birindwi akurikiranweho, birimo ibya Jenoside n’ibyaha byibasiye inyokomuntu.
Ubwo IRMCT yasimburaga ICTR mu 2012, byashimangiwe ko Kabuga nafatwa azoherezwa i Arusha akaba ariho aburanira.
Ibyaha Kabuga akurikiranweho birimo icyaha cya Jenoside, ubufatanyacyaha mu cyaha cya Jenoside, gukangurira abantu gukora Jenoside, ubwinjiracyaha bwa Jenoside n’ibindi bifitanye isano na Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Kabuga afatwa nk’uwagize uruhare runini mu gutera inkunga umugambi wa Jenoside, anatanga umusanzu mu gushinga radio RTLM yabibaga urwango.
Ubwo RTLM yashingwaga, Kabuga yatanzemo 500 000 Frw ndetse ikimara gutangizwa, ni we wabazwaga imikorere yayo ya buri munsi nka Perezida wayo, Ferdinand Nahimana aba Umuyobozi wayo (Directeur), Jean Bosco Barayagwiza aba umuyobozi wungirije (Directeur adjoint).
Abo nabo bahamijwe ibyaha bya Jenoside.
Perezida Kagame yazamuye mu ntera abapolisi 2282, abandi 261 bashyirwa mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru
Perezida wa Repubulika, Paul Kagame, yazamuye mu ntera abapolisi 2282 abandi 261 bashyirwa mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru.
Perezida wa Repubulika, Paul Kagame, yazamuye mu ntera abapolisi 2282 abandi 261 bashyirwa mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru.
Mu bazamuwe mu ntera, harimo abapolisi babiri bari bafite ipeti rya Assistant Commissioner of Police bazamuwe ku ipeti rya Commissioner of Police (CP).
Abo ni Emmanuel Hatari na Costa Joseph Habyara.
Hatari asanzwe ari Umuyobozi wa Polisi mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba mu gihe Costa Joseph Habyara yakoze muri Minisiteri y’Ubutabera nk’Umuyobozi ushinzwe iyubahirizwa ry’amategeko.
Abandi umunani bari bafite ipeti rya Chief Superintendent of Police (CSP) bazamuwe ku ntera ya Assistant Commissioner of Police (ACP).
(1) Burora Jacques (2) Muzezayo Toussaint (3) Mpayimana Gerald (4) Mugwiza Egide (5) Baguma Ismail  (6) Rutikanga Boniface (7) Bayingana Michel (8) Bugingo Nelson
Abandi 22 bari ku ipeti rya Senior Superintendent of Police bo bazamuwe ku ipeti rya Chief Superintendent of Police (CSP).
Ni mu gihe 39 bari bafite ipeti rya Superintendent of Police (SP) bo bazamuwe ku ipeti rya Senior Superintendent of Police (SSP).
Abapolisi 37 bari ku ipeti rya Chief Inspector of Police (CIP) 37 bazamuwe mu ntera baba Superintendent of Police (SP).
Mu gihe 35 bari bafite ipeti rya Inspector of Police (IP) 35 bazamuwe ku ipeti rya Chief Inspector of Police (CIP).
Abapolisi 333 bari bafite ipeti rya Assistant Inspector of Police (AIP) 333 bazamuwe ku ntera ya Inspector of Police (IP).
Muri izi mpinduka, umupolisi umwe wari ufite ipeti rya Chief Sergeant (CSGT) yazamuwe ku ipeti rya Assistant Inspector of Police (AIP).
Ba su-ofisiye icyenda bari bafite ipeti rya Senior Sergeant (SSGT) bo bazamuwe ku ipeti rya Chief Sergeant (CSGT).
Ba Su-Ofisiye 25 bari bafite ipeti rya Sergeant (SGT) bazamuwe ku ipeti rya Senior Sergeant (SSGT).
Abandi 62 bari bafite ipeti rya Corporal (CPL) na Police Constable (PC) bazamuwe ku ipeti rya Sergeant (SGT), naho 1709 bari bafite ipeti rya Police Constable (PC) bo bazamuwe ku ipeti rya Corporal (CPL).
Polisi y’u Rwanda yashimiye abazamuwe mu ntera ndetse n’ubwitange bwaranze abagiye mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru.
Ba rwiyemezamirimo bubatse Agakiriro ka Gatsibo barashinjwa kwambura abaturage
Abaturage bakoze imirimo y’ubwubatsi ku Gakiriro ka Gatsibo gaherereye mu Murenge wa Kabarore, barashinja ba rwiyemezamirimo babiri bagasimburanyweho mu kukubaka ko babambuye, bagasaba leta kubishyuriza.
Abaturage bakoze imirimo y’ubwubatsi ku Gakiriro ka Gatsibo gaherereye mu Murenge wa Kabarore, barashinja ba rwiyemezamirimo babiri bagasimburanyweho mu kukubaka ko babambuye, bagasaba leta kubishyuriza.
Mu 2014 nibwo rwiyemezamirimo witwa Niyigena Eraste yasinyanye n’Akarere ka Gatsibo amasezerano yo kubaka Ikigo Nderabuzima cya Ngarama n’Agakiriro ka Gatsibo.
Nyuma y’igihe akoresha abaturage mu kubaka ibi bikorwa, yaje gufungwa azira kwifashisha impapuro mpimbano mu gutsindira iryo soko.
Icyo gihe yasize atishyuye asaga miliyoni 154 Frw abaturage bubakaga ikigo nderabuzima ndetse n’abaturage barenga 80 bubakaga agakiriro kagezweho mu Karere ka Gatsibo.
Muhoracyeye Justine wakoze kuri aka gakiriro, avuga ko rwiyemezamoromo wabakoresheje yamusigayemo ibihumbi 60 Frw.
Yagize ati “Nishwe n’inzara kandi nari narakoze, nari ncumbitse ahantu nsiga ntishyuye n’inzu, ubu benshi bamfashe nka bihemu kandi byaratewe n’abadukoreshaga batatwishyuraga.
“Yatugeragamo nk’amezi atatu agacunga twarakaye twanze gukora akatwishyuramo nk’ibyumweru bibiri akongera akamara igihe kinini kugeza ubwo atwambuye burundu.
Ntukabumwe Samuel, umwe mu bari bayoboye abubakaga, yavuze ko bambuwe na rwiyemezamirimo wa mbere n’uwo asimbuye nawe akagenda atabishyuye.
Ati “Twambuwe na rwiyemezamirimo wa mbere haciyeho nk’umwaka tubona haje undi, afatanya n’akarere baratwandika batwizeza ko bagiye kutwishyura.
Nkanjye nakoreshaga abakozi 11 tubishyuza ibihumbi 418 Frw kandi hari amakipe y’abakozi benshi ku buryo twageraga nko kuri 80 ukongeraho abazanaga ibikoresho birimo umucanga, ibiti, amabuye n’ibindi abo nabo baramwishyuza.
Mu ntangiriro za 2017 nibwo Agakiriro ka Gatsibo kahawe rwiyemezamirimo mushya witwa Bayijahe Innocent kugira ngo arangize imirimo yo kukubaka, bamwe mu baturage bakomezanyije nawe bavuga ko atababaniye kuko hari amafaranga yabambuye.
Nkubito Francis uri mu bafashaga uyu rwiyemezamirimo avuga ko yamwambuye ibihumbi 470 Frw hakiyongeraho n’undi witwa Nkusi Bosco uberewemo arenga miliyoni 2 Frw.
Buhayija Innocent uregwa kwambura abaturage yabwiye IGIHE ko kuri we ntacyo yishinja ngo kuko abakozi bose yakoresheje yamaze kubishyura, asaba abamurega kujyana ikirego mu nkiko cyangwa ku Karere bakaza ibimenyetso byerekana ko yabambuye.
Ati" Abo ngabo bose byaba byiza bagiye mu buyobozi ubwo aribwo bwose nkamenya ikibazo cyabo, kuko abakozi umuntu aba akoresha buri wese ntiwamumenya ariko bagannye ubuyobozi twazana ibitabo buri wese tukagaragaza uko twamwishyuye ariko icyo nahamya neza ni uko buri wese twakoresheje twamwishyuye.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Akarere ka Gatsibo, Nankunda Jolly, yabwiye IGIHE ko iki kibazo bakizi ariko bari bazi ko ari rwiyemezamirimo umwe wambuye abaturage.
Ati “Uwo nzi ni Eraste ni we navuga ko yabambuye, uwa kabiri sinemeranya nabo kuko iyo tugiye kumwishyura amafaranga ya nyuma azana ibyangombwa byerekana ko adafitiye imyenda abaturage rero tujya kumwishyura yarabizanye.
Nankunda yakomeje avuga ko Ubuyobozi bw’Akarere bwagiriye inama abaturage yo kwishyira hamwe bakarega uwo bafitanye amasezerano kandi ngo abenshi barabikoze.
Yanavuze ko uyu rwiyemezamirimo banagerageje gushaka gufatira imitungo ye bagasanga nta n’umwe umubaruyeho.
Agakiriro kagezweho ka Gatsibo kuzuye gatwaye miliyoni 691 Frw kakaba karatangiye gukorerwamo mu Ukuboza 2018.
Ubwo twateguraga iyi nkuru twagerageje kuvugisha rwiyemezamirimo Bayijahe Innocent ushinjwa kwambura abaturage ariko ntibyakunda kuko inshuro zose twagerageje kumuhamagara atitabye ndetse n’ubutumwa bugufi ntiyabusubije.
Uburyo Gaddafi yigeze gutega utwuma dufata amajwi intumwa z’u Rwanda zirimo na Perezida
Colonel Muammar al-Gaddafi, ni umwe mu bagabo b’abanyapolitiki bakomeye Isi yagize ariko basize amateka avangavanze, aho kuri bamwe afatwa nk’intwari mu gihe abandi bamufata nk’umwiyemezi, umunyagitugu n’andi mazina amutwerera kuba nyirabayazana w’irimbuka rye.
Colonel Muammar al-Gaddafi, ni umwe mu bagabo b’abanyapolitiki bakomeye Isi yagize ariko basize amateka avangavanze, aho kuri bamwe afatwa nk’intwari mu gihe abandi bamufata nk’umwiyemezi, umunyagitugu n’andi mazina amutwerera kuba nyirabayazana w’irimbuka rye.
Gaddafi yayoboye Libya imyaka isaga 40, yubaka izina imbere mu gihugu no hanze yacyo nk’umwe mu banyagitugu bahizwe kenshi n’amahanga akamubura.
Ni umugabo wari warakangaranyije byinshi mu bihugu byo ku Isi, byagera muri Afurika ho bikaba ibindi bindi kuko uwerekanaga ku mugaragaro ko atamushyigikiye, yashoboraga kumugirira nabi akoresheje ubushobozi yari afite.
Ambasaderi Prof Joseph Nsengimana ni umwe mu bahagarariye u Rwanda mu Muryango wa Afurika yunze Ubumwe mu gihe Gaddafi yari mu marembera.
Prof Nsengimana guhera Nzeri 2009 kugeza mu 2014 aho yari ahagarariye u Rwanda mu Muryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe (AU) anaruhagarariye Addis Abeba muri Ethiopia.
Yaruhagarariye muri AU avuye kuruhagararira i New York mu Muryango w’Abibumbye aho yageze mu 2006.
Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 70 wanabaye Umujyanama wihariye wa Perezida kuva mu 2000 kugeza 2006, iyo myaka yamaze muri dipolomasi yamuhaye kumenya byimbitse imiyoborere itandukanye ku Isi irimo n’iya Gaddafi utaravugwaho rumwe.
Yateze utwuma dufata amajwi intumwa z’u Rwanda
U Rwanda ni kimwe mu bihugu bitiyumvisemo cyane Libya, by’umwihariko nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Prof Nsengimana yavuze ko ahanini byashingiraga kuri iyo myitwarire ya Gaddafi yo gushaka kwigira mpatsibihugu.
U Rwanda rwashyigikiye umugambi w’Akanama gashinzwe amahoro ka Loni wo gukora ibishoboka byose muri Libya hakagaruka amahoro, igikorwa cyari gishyigikiwe n’ibihugu birimo u Bufaransa, u Bwongereza na Qatar cyaje gusiga Gaddafi yishwe.
Uruhande u Rwanda rwafashe rufite impamvu.
Hari amakuru yizewe IGIHE ifite y’uko ahagana mu 2010, Polisi y’u Rwanda yatahuye ko hari intwaro muri Ambasade ya Libya mu Rwanda zashoboraga kwifashishwa mu bikorwa bimwe na bimwe byo gutera ama-gerenade mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Umwe mu bakozi b’iyi Ambasade niwe watanze aya makuru, hanyuma Polisi ikoze iperereza izitahura muri iyo nyubako.
Mu kiganiro Archives du Rwanda gitambuka kuri IGIHE, Prof Nsengima yavuze ko imyitwarire ya Gaddafi yatangiye kurakaza u Rwanda ubwo yategaga utwuma dufata amajwi intumwa zarwo zirimo na Perezida Pasteur Bizimungu.
Nubwo Nsengimana atibuka neza igihe byabereye, mu isesengura IGIHE yakoze yasanze bishobora kuba byarabaye muri Nzeri 1999, ubwo Gaddafi yizihizaga imyaka 30 amaze ahiritse ubutegetsi.
Intumwa z’u Rwanda zitabiriye ibyo birori nk’abandi batumirwa, bageze muri Libya Perezida Bizimungu ahabwa inzu yo gucumbikamo nk’uko bigenda ku bakuru b’ibihugu.
Iyo nzu ni nayo yahuriragamo intumwa zamuherekeje mu gihe hagiye gukorwa nk’inama.
Umunsi wo kugaruka mu Rwanda, baje kuvumbura ko bari baratezwe utwumwa dufata amajwi (recorders).
Ati “Yaje (Gaddafi) no kudusura muri iyo nzu.
Umunsi wo gutaha basubiyeyo kureba ibyo bari bibagiriwe mu nzu basanga bari gushwanyuza intebe bakuramo utwuma dufata amajwi.
Rero ikintu nk’icyo kikwereka uwo yari we.
Akenshi iyo umuntu ari mu nzu arisanzura akavuga icyo atekereza.
Prof Nsengimana yabajijwe niba nta ngaruka u Rwanda rwaba rwarahuye nazo nyuma kubera ayo majwi yari yafashwe, asubiza ati “Nta wamenya ariko ibyo ni ibintu hagati y’abakuru b’ibihugu bidakorwa, iyo ubibonye gutyo bituma umenya uwo muntu uwo ari we.
" Prof Nsengimana yasobanuye ko Gaddafi utavuga ko yari akunzwe cyangwa yanzwe na bose muri Afurika, ari nayo mpamvu igihe ibihugu byafataga umwanzuro wo gushyigikira abashaka kumuhirika, byinshi bya Afurika byamwihoreye.
Ati “Ku banyafurika bamwe babyakiriye uko biri, ariko bavuga bati n’ubundi ntacyo yari kuzatumarira kuko yazanagamo ayo macakubiri muri AU.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na Financial Times mu 2017, Perezida Paul Kagame yavuze ko Gaddafi yahoraga yifuza kugaragara nk’umwami wa Afurika, agasuzugura abandi.
Yagize ati “Colonel Gaddafi yari umuntu mubi.
Njye nakundaga gushwana nawe kurusha undi muntu uwo ariwe wese.
Yifuzaga kugaragara nk’umwami wa Afurika ubundi agategeka abandi ababwira ibyo bagomba gukora.
Hari ubwo numvaga kubyihanganira binaniye.
Perezida Kagame yagaragaje uko hari ubwo Gaddafi yajyaga amwita umukozi w’ibihugu bikomeye ku Isi, inshuti y’Abanyamerika n’Abongereza, ibihugu bitacanaga uwaka na Gaddafi.
Yakomeje agira ati “Naramubwiye, njyewe uko nteye, mu buzima bwanjye, uko nakuze, ntabwo njya nifuza kuba umugaragu w’undi muntu, bivuze ngo urakorera mu nyungu ze, ntabwo uri kwikorera.
Ubwo Gaddafi yari amaze kuva ku butegetsi, mu 2012 u Rwanda rwinjiye mu kanama gashinzwe amahoro n’umutekano muri Loni ruranakayobora.
Rwitabiriye kenshi inama ziga ku bibazo bya Libya n’uburyo igihugu cyasubirana nyuma ya Gaddafi.
Gaddafi ibihugu byamubonaga ugutandukanye Prof Nsengimana yavuze ko urebye neza wasanga Gaddafi ntaho yari atandukaniye na mpatsibihugu kuko aho yageraga hose yabaga ashaka kwerekana imbaraga.
Prof Nsengimana yagize ati “Yari afite icyerecyezo yavugaga ko ashakira Afurika ariko icyo cyerecyezo cyari gishingiye ku cyifuzo cye cyo kuba igihangange muri Afurika.
Ntabwo yari ku neza ya Afurika kuko yabanje gushaka kuyobora Umuryango uhuza ibihugu by’Abarabu, agenda ashaka kwerekana ubuhangange bwe Abarabu baramunanira, nibwo yaje kubishakira muri Afurika.
Yavuze ko aho yageraga hose yashakaga kuyobora, bikarushaho kuba bibi kuko yashakaga guhanganisha ubuhange bwe n’ubw’abazungu.
Ibyo bigaragarira mu 1988, ubwo yagiraga uruhare mu ihanurwa ry’indege y’Abanyaburayi muri Ecosse igahitana abantu 259 mu cyiswe ‘Lockerbie bombing’.
Nubwo bakomeje kumuhiga bakamubura, Prof Nsengimana avuga ko abanyaburayi batigeze bibagirwa icyo gikorwa.
Ibyo byatumye umubare w’abamuhiga n’abamwanga ukomeza kuba mwinshi.
Ambasaderi Nsengimana avuga ko hari ubwo Gaddafi yigeze kujya i Addis Abeba ku cyicaro cy’Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe (AU), agasanga abadipolomate bahaba batabayeho neza akiyemeza kubafasha ariko icyicaro cya AU kikimukira mu Mujyi wa Sirte muri Libya.
Ati “Ubwabyo byari uguteranya abanyafurika.
Ibyo byose byatumaga atumvikana cyane muri AU kandi bishingiye ku bifatika.
Hari n’ibihugu yategekaga, byaba bitumviye agahirika ubutegetsi nko muri Tchad.
“Ibintu bya mpatsibihugu byari bimurimo, icyo ashatse nicyo yumvaga igihugu kigomba gukora niba kitagikoze bagahangana akoresheje ubushobozi yari afite.
Ambasaderi Prof Nsengimana yavuze ko kuba nyuma ya Gaddafi harabaye imvururu muri Libya, byasaga nk’ibyigaragaza na mbere hose ukurikije imiyoborere yamuranze.
Kugeza ubu haracyari ikibazo cy’intambara muri Libya aho Guverinoma yemewe ku rwego mpuzamahanga ibarizwa i Tripoli ihanganye n’ingabo za General Khalifa Haftar kandi buri ruhande hakaba hari ibihugu by’amahanga birushyigikiye.
Nsengimana yemeza ko nubwo hakiri intambara, Guverinoma yemewe ifite amahirwe yo gutsinda.
Ati “Ibintu biragenda bijya mu buryo, Haftar imbaraga ze ziragenda zikendera.
Arimo atakaza Sirte, n’imbaraga zamushyigikiraga ndakeka ko ugereranyije n’izo Leta yemewe ifite, Leta yemewe iragenda igira imbaraga.
Col Muammar Gaddafi yayoboye Libya kuva mu 1969 aza kwicwa ku wa 20 Ukwakira 2011 n’ingabo zari zirangajwe imbere n’ibihugu bikomeye.
Hamenetse amaraso y’abazize ubusa n’ay’abarwaniye igihugu, mwarangiza mukabikinira hejuru?
- Perezida Kagame
Perezida Kagame yaburiye abayobozi batuzuza inshingano zabo uko bikwiye n’abangiza umutungo w’igihugu, avuga ko agiye kugendera ku bwihutirwe bwo kurwanya icyorezo cya Coronavirus mu gukemura ibyo yise ibindi “byorezo" bihari ku buryo abashaka gusubiza igihugu inyuma birengagije aho cyavuye babyishyura.
Perezida Kagame yaburiye abayobozi batuzuza inshingano zabo uko bikwiye n’abangiza umutungo w’igihugu, avuga ko agiye kugendera ku bwihutirwe bwo kurwanya icyorezo cya Coronavirus mu gukemura ibyo yise ibindi “byorezo" bihari ku buryo abashaka gusubiza igihugu inyuma birengagije aho cyavuye babyishyura.
Umukuru w’Igihugu yabigarutseho ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu wa Gatanu ubwo yayoboraga inama ya Komite Nyobozi yaguye ya FPR Inkotanyi yabereye ku cyicaro cy’uyu muryango giherereye i Rusororo mu Karere ka Gasabo.
Yavuze ko iyi nama yayitumije kugira ngo haganirwe uko u Rwanda rwitwaye n’uko ruzakomeza kwitwara kuko bisa n’aho icyorezo ntaho kirajya ndetse abenshi bakibona nk’aho aribwo kigitangira.
Iyi nama yahuje abanyamuryango 250 bayobora inzego zitandukanye muri uyu muryango.
Yabaye mu gihe u Rwanda rugihanganye n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus ndetse abayitabiriye bakurikije amabwiriza yo kwirinda nko kwambara agapfukamunwa no guhana intera hagati yabo.
Perezida Kagame yabwiye abayobozi batandukanye ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyaje mu gihe hari n’ibindi bibazo igihugu gisanganywe ku buryo kugisohokamo bisaba kwibuka ko hari n’ibindi bisanzwe bitarakemuka bikwiye kuva mu nzira.
Yaburiye abayobozi batubahiriza inshingano zabo, abanyereza umutungo wa rubanda, ko igihe cyabo cyarangiye ahubwo ubu bagiye gutangira kubyishyura.
Ati “Ngiye kugendera ku bwihutirwe bw’icyorezo mbukoreshe mu gukemura ibi byorezo bindi [.
] mushinzwe abaturage, mufite akazi mushinzwe, namwe mukwiye kwiha agaciro nk’abanyarwanda.
“Ntabwo ari ibintu byo gukina, ntabwo ari igihugu twubatse [.
] amaraso yamenetse y’abazize ubusa, hameneka ay’abarwaniye igihugu mwarangiza mukabikinira hejuru, ndabasezeranya ko abantu baraza gutangira kubyishyura.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko mu mikorere ya muntu amakosa abaho umunsi ku wundi, ko atari yo aba bayobozi bazaryozwa ahubwo ko bazabazwa ibyo batubahiriza mu buryo busa n’agahimano.
Ati “Amakosa yo ya buri munsi arasanzwe, ayo ntabwo ariyo tuziza abantu.
Ntabwo waziza abantu amakosa asanzwe, abantu bakora amakosa ariko ibi bindi by’agahimano, byo kwangiza, ukangiza umutungo w’igihugu, ukangiza ibikwiriye kuba bifasha abaturage ukabigira ibyawe, byo birahagarara byanze bikunze.
Byanze bikunze, ubu byarangiye.
Umukuru w’Igihugu yavuze ko iyi ngingo iganirwaho inshuro nyinshi n’abayobozi mu nama n’indi mihuro inyuranye ariko ko nta gihinduka, kandi ababa bari muri izo nama ari abantu bamwe.
Ati “Buri munsi turabiganira.
Buri gihe ni abantu bamwe cyangwa abandi, ubundi tukaba twahuye, tugahurira mu mwiherero, tugahurira mu mushyikirano, mu nama z’umuryango zisanzwe, ziduhuza turi benshi ubwo ndavuga RPF ariko no mu zindi nzego za leta.
Turi abantu bari bakwiye kuba bumva icyo dushaka, uko twakigeraho, ibigomba gukorwa, ibyo dutanga.
Yavuze ko ku Isi hari ibihugu bigera ku byo bishaka ku buryo uko byari bimeze mu myaka nka 20 cyangwa 30 ishize atari ko bimeze ubu, ariko n’iyo bigize icyo bigeraho biticara ahubwo byiha izindi ntego zisumbuyeho.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko abagera kuri ibyo, ari abuzuza ibyo bagomba gukora mu byo baba barahisemo, mu nshingano baba barihaye.
Ati “Ni abagira ukubazwa inshingano, udakoze uko byagakwiriye kuba bikorwa hakagira umubaza, bakagenda bapima intambwe batera bashakisha n’uburyo bwabashoboresha no kugera ku bindi.
Nta nzira y’ubusamo.
Nta nzira zindi wanyuramo ugenda uhunga ibikomeye ngo ntuhangane nabyo ugahora ushakisha ibyoroshye ngo hanyuma hari inzira yoroshye abantu banyuramo mu kugera ku byo bashaka.
Nta yibaho na busa.
Yavuze ko n’iyo iyo nzira ibayeho, ibaho rimwe kandi n’ibyavuyemo ntibirambe.
Yasabye abakiri bato nibura abagejeje ku myaka 45, kumva ko ibihe biri imbere aribo bafite igihugu mu maboko.
Ati “Nibatiga hakiri kare gukosora amakosa yakozwe n’ababaje imbere, ba twebwe, ukumva bayakomeje, bakayabamo ntacyo bayatwaye, ubwo icyo gihugu kizaba gifite ibyago.
Ni uguhitamo nabi, ntabwo baba nka bya bihugu navuze bigera ku byo bifuza.
Perezida Kagame yihanije aba bayobozi mu gihe hashize iminsi abayobozi mu nzego zitandukanye bavanwa ku mirimo yabo ku bw’amakosa atandukanye.
Mu minsi ishize uwari Minisitiri w’Umutekano, Gen Patrick Nyamvumba yakuwe kuri uyu mwanya, ndetse ba Guverineri babiri, Gatabazi JMV wayoboraga Intara y’Amajyaruguru na Gasana Emmanuel wayoboraga iy’Amajyepfo barahagarikwa, batangira gukorwaho iperereza “kubera ibyo bagomba kubazwa bakurikiranweho".
Ni ihagarikwa ku mirimo kandi ryari rikurikiye ubwegure bwakunze kubaho muri uyu mwaka cyane mu myanya yo hejuru mu buyobozi bw’igihugu.
Amafoto: Village Urugwiro
Ethiopia: Umusaza w’imyaka isaga ijana yakize Coronavirus
Umusaza wo muri Ethiopia w’imyaka 114 witwa Aba Tilahun Woldemichael yakize Coronavirus nk’uko byatangajwe n’inzego z’ubuzima muri icyo gihugu.
Umusaza wo muri Ethiopia w’imyaka 114 witwa Aba Tilahun Woldemichael yakize Coronavirus nk’uko byatangajwe n’inzego z’ubuzima muri icyo gihugu.
Kuri uyu wa Kane nibwo byatangajwe ko uwo musaza yakize, amakuru yatangaje benshi bitewe n’uburyo ubushakashatsi bwose kuri iki cyorezo bwagiye bugaragaza ko ari indwara izahaza cyane abageze mu zabukuru.
Tilahun yatahuwe ko yanduye Coronavirus mu minsi ishize ubwo bapimaga abaturage bo mu gace atuyemo mu murwa mukuru Addis Abeba.
Akigera mu bitaro, yamaze hafi icyumweru ari ku mashini zongerera abarwayi umwuka ndetse ubuzima bwe bwari habi, ku bw’amahirwe aza koroherwa.
Nubwo nta byemeza ko uwo musaza afite imyaka 114 nk’uko umuryango we ubivuga, abaganga nabo bemeza ko arengeje imyaka ijana dore ko ametaka menshi igihugu cye cyanyuzemo ayibuka nk’ayabaye ejo.
Abantu basaga 5000 bamaze guhitanwa na Coronavirus muri Ethiopia barimo 81 yahitanye.
Perezida Kagame yasabye abanyarwanda kwirinda “gukinisha" ingamba zo kurwanya Coronavirus
Perezida Kagame akaba na Chairman w’Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi, yasabye abanyarwanda kwirinda gukinisha ingamba zashyizweho mu kurwanya icyorezo cya Coronavirus, ahubwo bakazubahiriza uko zakabaye batarobanura izo bashyira mu bikorwa ngo izindi bazireke.
Perezida Kagame akaba na Chairman w’Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi, yasabye abanyarwanda kwirinda gukinisha ingamba zashyizweho mu kurwanya icyorezo cya Coronavirus, ahubwo bakazubahiriza uko zakabaye batarobanura izo bashyira mu bikorwa ngo izindi bazireke.
Umukuru w’Igihugu yabigarutseho ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu wa Gatanu ubwo yayoboraga inama ya Komite Nyobozi yaguye ya FPR Inkotanyi yabereye ku cyicaro cy’uyu muryango giherereye i Rusororo mu Karere ka Gasabo.
Iyi nama yahuje abanyamuryango 250 bayobora inzego zitandukanye muri uyu muryango.
Yabaye mu gihe u Rwanda rugihanganye n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus ndetse abayitabiriye bakurikije amabwiriza yo kwirinda nko kwambara agapfukamunwa no guhana intera hagati yabo.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko muri ibi bihe u Rwanda rurimo byatewe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, amahirwe ari uko atari umwihariko warwo gusa nubwo rwo rugerwaho n’ingaruka zitandukanye bitewe n’uko igihugu giteye.
Umukuru w’Igihugu yavuze ko iyi nama yayitumije kugira ngo haganirwe uko u Rwanda rwitwaye n’uko ruzakomeza kwitwara kuko bisa n’aho icyorezo ntaho kirajya ndetse abenshi bakibona nk’aho aribwo kigitangira.
Ati “Ni ukuvuga ngo ibyo dukora kugira ngo tucyirinde, byo bizakomeza cyangwa se bikwiye no gukomeza kurushaho.
Ni ingamba nyinshi zigenda zifatwa zizwi ntabwo ari ibintu byo gukinisha [.
] buri munsi ababikurikiranira hafi, abashakashatsi, abahanga muri siyansi, abahanga mu buzima, nabo ntabwo baramenya byose bijyanye n’iyi Coronavirus.
Baracyashakisha kuyimenya neza noneho bikaganisha ko hazaboneka uburyo bayirinda ku buryo bw’urukingo cyangwa se bw’umuti.
Yavuze ko igihe ibyo bigitegerejwe, urugamba rugomba gukomeza gushingirwa ku buryo abantu bitwara mu kwirinda aho bigomba gushingira ku buryo bubiri, aribwo kwirinda umuntu ku giti cye no kurinda abandi.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko abantu bakwiriye kwipimisha, usanze yaranduye agaharanira ko nta wundi yakwanduza.
Ibi bikajyana no kwambara agapfukamunwa kuko bifasha ko umuntu atirinda we ubwe ahubwo akarinda n’abandi.
Ati “Uburyo bwa gatatu, ni ukudakomeza umuco wacu wo guhoberana cyane ku buryo twegerana.
Guhana intera, kugira ngo nabyo bifashe kutegerana cyane tugahana umwanya [.
] ibindi birimo isuku, gukaraba kenshi cyangwa se igihe cyose bibaye ngombwa, nabwo birafasha.
Ibyo byose bivamo ko twirinda ariko cyane ndetse turinda abandi.
Umukuru w’Igihugu yavuze ko ubu ari uburyo bizwi ko bufasha, kandi ko bwuzuzanya, bityo ntawe ukwiriye kubirengaho ahubwo bigomba kubahirizwa mu kwirinda.
Yavuze ko u Rwanda rwabaye mu bihugu bya mbere muri Afurika mu kubahiriza izi ngamba, biza no kugeza ku gusaba abantu kuguma mu ngo nubwo byari bifite ingaruka zatumye bamwe ibyo bakoraga bihagaragara, abandi bagasonza, ariko byakozwe kugira ngo “dushobore kubaho tunyure muri iki gihe hanyuma tuzagere no ku bindi".
Ati “Ndetse cyane cyane n’ibyo abantu binubira ukabikora kuko uzi ngo birakurinda, ukabikora ugononwa, winuba ariko uba uzi ngo urabikorera kugira ngo ubeho noneho ikindi gihe uzashobore gukora ibyo wifuzaga [.
] inzira iracyari ndende ntabwo umuntu yabinyura iruhande ngo avuge ko turi hafi kubirangiza.
Kuva umurwayi wa mbere wa Coronavirus yagaragara mu Rwanda muri Werurwe 2020, abantu 858 nibo bamaze kwandura iki cyorezo, 398 barakize basezererwa mu gihe mu gihe 458 aribo bakiri kwitabwaho n’abaganga; babiri barimo umushoferi w’imyaka 65 n’umupolisikazi bo bitabye Imana.

Minisanté yasobanuye uko Coronavirus yageze muri kasho, yongera imbaraga mu gupima
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yaraye itangaje ko mu Rwanda hagaragaye abantu 101 banduye Coronavirus, umubare munini w’abarwayi wabonetse mu munsi umwe kuva iki cyorezo cyagera mu Rwanda muri Werurwe.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yaraye itangaje ko mu Rwanda hagaragaye abantu 101 banduye Coronavirus, umubare munini w’abarwayi wabonetse mu munsi umwe kuva iki cyorezo cyagera mu Rwanda muri Werurwe.
